  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-863">Sur Windows depuis la version84 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-863">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-864">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-864">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-865">Configure les paramètres de proxy pour Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-865">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-866">Si vous activez cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge Application Guard ignore les autres sources de configuration proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-866">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard ignores other sources of proxy configurations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-867">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge Application Guard utilise la configuration proxy de l’hôte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-867">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard uses the proxy configuration of the host.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-868">Cette stratégie n’affecte pas la configuration par proxy de Microsoft Edge en dehors de Application Guard (sur l’hôte).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-868">This policy does not affect the proxy configuration of Microsoft Edge outside of Application Guard (on the host).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-869">Le champ ProxyMode vous permet de spécifier le serveur proxy utilisé par MicrosoftEdge Application Guard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-869">The ProxyMode field lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-870">Le champ ProxyPacUrl est une URL d’un fichier .pac du proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-870">The ProxyPacUrl field is a URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-871">Le champ ProxyServer est une URL pour le serveur proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-871">The ProxyServer field is a URL for the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-872">Si vous choisissez la valeur ’direct’ comme ’ProxyMode’, tous les autres champs sont ignorés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-872">If you choose the 'direct' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-873">Si vous choisissez la valeur ’auto_detect’ comme ’ProxyMode’, tous les autres champs sont ignorés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-873">If you choose the 'auto_detect' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-874">Si vous choisissez la valeur «fixed_servers» comme « ProxyMode », le champs « ProxyServer» est utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-874">If you choose the 'fixed_servers' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyServer' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-875">Si vous choisissez la valeur 'pac_script' comme 'ProxyMode', le champ 'ProxyPacUrl' est utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-875">If you choose the 'pac_script' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyPacUrl' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-876">Pour plus d’informations sur l’identification du trafic Application Guard via un proxy double, visitez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-876">For more information about identifying Application Guard traffic via dual proxy, visit [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-877">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-877">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-878">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-878">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-879">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-879">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-880">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-880">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-881">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-881">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-882">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-882">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-883">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-883">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-884">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-884">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-885">Nom unique de stratégie de groupe: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-885">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-886">Nom de stratégie de groupe : Proxy conteneur de Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-886">GP name: Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-887">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Paramètres des modèles administratifs/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-887">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-888">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-888">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-889">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-889">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-890">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-890">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-891">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-891">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-892">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-892">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-893">Nom de la valeur : ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-893">Value Name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-894">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-894">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-895">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-895">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {
  "ProxyMode": "direct", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-896">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-896">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {"ProxyMode": "direct", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```

  ### <a name="applicationguardfavoritessyncenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-898">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-898">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-favorites-sync-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-899">Synchronisation des favoris d’Application Guard activée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-899">Application Guard Favorites Sync Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-900">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-900">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-901">Sur Windows depuis la version 90 ou ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-901">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-902">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-902">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-903">Cette stratégie permet aux ordinateurs/appareils MicrosoftEdge sur les ordinateurs/appareils dont l’Application Guard est activée pour synchroniser les favoris de l’hôte vers le conteneur afin que les favoris correspondent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-903">This policy allows Microsoft Edge computers/devices that have application guard enabled to sync favorites from the host to the container so the favorites match.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-904">Si [ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites) est configuré, ces favoris sont également synchronisés avec le conteneur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-904">If [ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites) are configured, those favorites will also be synced to the container.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-905">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la modification des favoris dans le conteneur est désactivée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-905">If you enable this policy, editing favorites in the container is disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-906">Ainsi, les boutons Ajouter des favoris et Ajouter le dossier des favoris seront floutés dans l’interface utilisateur du navigateur de conteneur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-906">So, the add favorites and add favorites folder buttons will be blurred out in the UI of the container browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-907">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les favoris de l’hôte ne seront pas partagés avec le conteneur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-907">If you disable or don't configure this policy, favorites on the host will not be shared to the container.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-908">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-908">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-909">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-909">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-910">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-910">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-911">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-911">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-912">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-912">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-913">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-913">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-914">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-914">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-915">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-915">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-916">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-916">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-917">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: Synchronisation des favoris d’Application Guard activée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-917">GP name: Application Guard Favorites Sync Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-918">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Paramètres des modèles administratifs/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-918">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-919">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-919">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-920">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-920">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-921">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-921">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-922">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-922">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-923">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-923">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-924">Nom de la valeur : ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-924">Value Name: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-925">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-925">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-926">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-926">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="applicationguardtrafficidentificationenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-928">ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-928">ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-traffic-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-929">Identification du trafic Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-929">Application Guard Traffic Identification</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-930">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-930">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-931">Sur Windows depuis la version91 ou ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-931">On Windows since 91 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-932">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-932">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-933">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, Application Guard ajoute un en-tête HTTP supplémentaire (X-MS-ApplicationGuard-Initiated) à toutes les demandes HTTP sortantes provenant du conteneur Application Guard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-933">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Application Guard will add an extra HTTP header (X-MS-ApplicationGuard-Initiated) to all outbound HTTP requests made from the Application Guard container.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-934">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, l’en-tête supplémentaire n’est pas ajouté au trafic.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-934">If you disable this policy, the extra header is not added to the traffic.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-935">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-935">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-936">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-936">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-937">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-937">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-938">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-938">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-939">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-939">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-940">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-940">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-941">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-941">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-942">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-942">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-943">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe : ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-943">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-944">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : Identification du trafic Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-944">GP name: Application Guard Traffic Identification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-945">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Paramètres des modèles administratifs/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-945">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-946">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-946">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-947">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-947">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-948">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-948">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-949">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-949">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-950">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-950">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-951">Nom de la valeur : ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-951">Value Name: ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-952">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-952">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-953">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-953">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="enablemediarouter"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-957">EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-957">EnableMediaRouter</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-google-cast"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-958">Activer Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-958">Enable Google Cast</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-959">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-959">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-960">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-960">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-961">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-961">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-962">Activez cette stratégie pour activer Google Cast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-962">Enable this policy to enable Google Cast.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-963">Les utilisateurs pourront le lancer à partir du menu de l’application, des menus contextuels de la page, des commandes multimédias sur les sites web compatibles avec Cast, et (le cas échéant) de l’icône Cast sur la barre d’outils.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-963">Users will be able to launch it from the app menu, page context menus, media controls on Cast-enabled websites, and (if shown) the Cast toolbar icon.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-964">Désactivez cette stratégie pour désactiver Google Cast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-964">Disable this policy to disable Google Cast.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-965">Par défaut, Google Cast est activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-965">By default, Google Cast is enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-966">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-966">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-967">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-967">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-968">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-968">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-969">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-969">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-970">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-970">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-971">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-971">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-972">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-972">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-973">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-973">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-974">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-974">GP unique name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-975">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: Activer Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-975">GP name: Enable Google Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-976">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-976">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-977">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-977">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-978">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-978">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-979">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-979">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-980">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-980">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-981">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-981">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-982">Nom de la valeur: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-982">Value Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-983">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-983">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-984">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-984">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-985">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-985">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-986">Nom clé de la préférence: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-986">Preference Key Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-987">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-987">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="showcasticonintoolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-989">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-989">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-the-cast-icon-in-the-toolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-990">Afficher l’icône Cast dans la barre d’outils</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-990">Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-991">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-991">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-992">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-992">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-993">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-993">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-994">Attribuez la valeur true à cette stratégie pour afficher l’icône Cast dans la barre d’outils ou le menu latéral.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-994">Set this policy to true to show the Cast toolbar icon on the toolbar or the overflow menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-995">Les utilisateurs ne pourront pas la supprimer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-995">Users won't be able to remove it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-996">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée ou si elle est désactivée, les utilisateurs peuvent épingler ou supprimer l’icône depuis son menu contextuel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-996">If you don't configure this policy or if you disable it, users can pin or remove the icon by using its contextual menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-997">Si vous avez également configuré la stratégie [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) sur false, cette stratégie est ignorée et l’icône de la barre d’outils n’apparaît pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-997">If you've also set the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy to false, then this policy is ignored, and the toolbar icon isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-998">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-998">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-999">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-999">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1000">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1000">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1001">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1001">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1002">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1002">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1003">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1003">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1004">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1004">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1005">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1005">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1006">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1006">GP unique name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1007">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: afficher l’icône Cast dans la barre d’outils</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1007">GP name: Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1008">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1008">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1009">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1009">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1010">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1010">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1011">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1011">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1012">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1012">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1013">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1013">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1014">Nom de la valeur: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1014">Value Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1015">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1015">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1016">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1016">Example value:</span></span>

```

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1018">Nom clé de la préférence: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1018">Preference Key Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>

<false/>

  ## <a name="content-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1021">Stratégies des paramètres de contenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1021">Content settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1022">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1022">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoselectcertificateforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1023">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1023">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="automatically-select-client-certificates-for-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1024">Sélectionner automatiquement les certificats clients pour ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1024">Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1025">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1025">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1026">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1026">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1027">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1027">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1028">La définition de stratégie vous permet de créer une liste de modèles d’URL spécifiant les sites pour lesquels MicrosoftEdge peut automatiquement sélectionner un certificat client.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1028">Setting the policy lets you make a list of URL patterns that specify sites for which Microsoft Edge can automatically select a client certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1029">La valeur est un groupe de dictionnaires JSON à séquences, chacun ayant le format { «modèle»: «$URL_PATTERN», «filtre»: $FILTER }, où $URL_PATTERN correspond à un schéma de paramètres de contenu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1029">The value is an array of stringified JSON dictionaries, each with the form { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, where $URL_PATTERN is a content setting pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1030">$FILTER limite les certificats client à partir desquels le navigateur effectue une sélection automatique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1030">$FILTER restricts the client certificates the browser automatically selects from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1031">Indépendamment du filtre, seuls les certificats correspondant à la demande de certificats du serveur sont sélectionnés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1031">Independent of the filter, only certificates that match the server's certificate request are selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1032">Exemples d’utilisation de la section $FILTER:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1032">Examples for the usage of the $FILTER section:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1033">Lorsque $FILTER est défini sur { «ÉMETTEUR»: { «CN»: «$ISSUER_CN» } }, seuls les certificats client émis par un certificat dont la valeur CommonName est $ISSUER_CN sont sélectionnés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1033">When $FILTER is set to { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, only client certificates issued by a certificate with the CommonName $ISSUER_CN are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1034">Lorsque $FILTER comprend les sections «ÉMETTEUR» et «OBJET», seuls les certificats clients répondant aux deux conditions sont sélectionnés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1034">When $FILTER contains both the "ISSUER" and the "SUBJECT" sections, only client certificates that satisfy both conditions are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1035">Lorsque $FILTER comprend une section «OBJET» avec la valeur «O», un certificat nécessite au moins une organisation qui correspond à la valeur spécifiée à sélectionner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1035">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with the "O" value, a certificate needs at least one organization matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1036">Lorsque $FILTER comprend une section «OBJET» avec une valeur «OU», un certificat nécessite au moins une unité organisationnelle qui correspond à la valeur spécifiée à sélectionner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1036">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with a "OU" value, a certificate needs at least one organizational unit matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1037">Lorsque $FILTER est défini sur {}, la sélection de certificats client ne fait pas l’objet de restrictions supplémentaires.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1037">When $FILTER is set to {}, the selection of client certificates is not additionally restricted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1038">Notez que les filtres fournis par le serveur web continuent de s’appliquer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1038">Note that filters provided by the web server still apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1039">Si la stratégie reste non définie, il n’existe pas de sélection automatique des sites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1039">If you leave the policy unset, there's no autoselection for any site.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1040">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1040">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1041">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1041">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1042">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1042">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1043">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1043">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1044">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1044">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1045">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1045">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1046">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1046">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1047">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1047">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1048">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1048">GP unique name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1049">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: sélectionner automatiquement les certificats clients pour ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1049">GP name: Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1050">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1050">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1051">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1051">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1052">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1052">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1053">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1053">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1054">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1054">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1055">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1055">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1056">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1056">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1057">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1057">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1058">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1058">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls\1 = "{\"pattern\":\"https://www.contoso.com\",\"filter\":{\"ISSUER\":{\"CN\":\"certificate issuer name\", \"L\": \"certificate issuer location\", \"O\": \"certificate issuer org\", \"OU\": \"certificate issuer org unit\"}, \"SUBJECT\":{\"CN\":\"certificate subject name\", \"L\": \"certificate subject location\", \"O\": \"certificate subject org\", \"OU\": \"certificate subject org unit\"}}}"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1059">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1059">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1060">Nom clé de la préférence: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1060">Preference Key Name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1061">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1061">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="cookiesallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1063">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1063">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-cookies-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1064">Autoriser les cookies sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1064">Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1065">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1065">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1066">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1066">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1067">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1067">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1068">Déterminez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui sont autorisés à définir des cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1068">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1069">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1069">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1070">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus, consultez les stratégies [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) et [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1070">See the [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1071">Il ne peut pas y avoir de modèles d’URL en conflit définis entre ces trois stratégies:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1071">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1072">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1072">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1073">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1073">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1074">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1074">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1075">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1075">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1076">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1076">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1077">Pour exclure la suppression des cookies lors de la fermeture, configurez la stratégie de [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1077">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1078">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1078">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1079">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1079">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1080">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1080">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1081">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1081">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1082">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1082">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1083">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1083">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1084">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1084">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1085">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1085">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1086">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1086">GP unique name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1087">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les cookies sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1087">GP name: Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1088">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1088">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1089">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1089">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1090">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1090">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1091">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1091">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1092">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1092">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1093">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1093">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1094">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1094">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1095">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1095">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1096">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1096">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1097">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1097">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1098">Nom clé de la préférence: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1098">Preference Key Name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1099">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1099">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="cookiesblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1101">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1101">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-cookies-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1102">Bloquer les cookies sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1102">Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1103">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1103">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1104">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1104">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1105">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1105">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1106">Déterminez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui ne sont pas autorisés à définir des cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1106">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1107">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1107">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1108">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus, consultez les stratégies [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) et [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1108">See the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1109">Il ne peut pas y avoir de modèles d’URL en conflit définis entre ces trois stratégies:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1109">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1110">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1110">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1111">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1111">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1112">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1112">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1113">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1113">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1114">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1114">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1115">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1115">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1116">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1116">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1117">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1117">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1118">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1118">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1119">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1119">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1120">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1120">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1121">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1121">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1122">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1122">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1123">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1123">GP unique name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1124">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer les cookies sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1124">GP name: Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1125">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1125">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1126">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1126">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1127">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1127">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1128">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1128">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1129">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1129">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1130">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1130">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1131">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1131">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1132">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1132">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1133">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1133">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1134">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1134">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1135">Nom clé de la préférence: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1135">Preference Key Name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1136">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1136">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="cookiessessiononlyforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1138">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1138">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="limit-cookies-from-specific-websites-to-the-current-session"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1139">Limiter les cookies de sites web spécifiques à la session en cours</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1139">Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1140">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1140">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1141">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1141">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1142">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1142">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1143">Les cookies, créés par les sites web qui correspondent à un modèle d’URL déterminés, sont supprimés à la fin de la session (lors de la fermeture de la fenêtre).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1143">Cookies created by websites that match a URL pattern you define are deleted when the session ends (when the window closes).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1144">Les cookies créés par les sites web qui ne correspondent pas au modèle sont contrôlés par la stratégie [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting), si elle est définie, ou par la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1144">Cookies created by websites that don't match the pattern are controlled by the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or by the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1145">Il s’agit également du comportement par défaut si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1145">This is also the default behavior if you don't configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1146">Si MicrosoftEdge s’exécute en mode arrière-plan, la session peut rester ouverte lors de la fermeture de la dernière fenêtre, ce qui signifie que les cookies ne seront pas effacés lors de la fermeture de la fenêtre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1146">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1147">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur la configuration de ce comportement, consultez la stratégie [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1147">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1148">Vous pouvez également utiliser les stratégies [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) et [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) pour contrôler les sites web pouvant créer des cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1148">You can also use the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) policies to control which websites can create cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1149">Il ne peut pas y avoir de modèles d’URL en conflit définis entre ces trois stratégies:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1149">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1150">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1150">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1151">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1151">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1152">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1152">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1153">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1153">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1154">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1154">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1155">Si vous définissez la stratégie [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) de manière à restaurer les URL à partir des sessions précédentes, cette stratégie est ignorée et les cookies sont stockés définitivement pour ces sites. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1155">If you set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to restore URLs from previous sessions, this policy is ignored, and cookies are stored permanently for those sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1156">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1156">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1157">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1157">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1158">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1158">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1159">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1159">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1160">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1160">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1161">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1161">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1162">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1162">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1163">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1163">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1164">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1164">GP unique name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1165">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: limiter les cookies de sites web spécifiques à la session en cours</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1165">GP name: Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1166">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1166">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1167">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1167">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1168">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1168">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1169">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1169">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1170">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1170">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1171">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1171">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1172">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1172">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1173">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1173">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1174">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1174">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1175">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1175">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1176">Nom clé de la préférence: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1176">Preference Key Name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1177">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1177">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
