  ### <a name="defaultcookiessetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1179">DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1179">DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1180">Configurer les cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1180">Configure cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1181">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1181">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1182">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1182">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1183">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1183">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1184">Déterminez si les sites web peuvent créer des cookies sur l’appareil de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1184">Control whether websites can create cookies on the user's device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1185">Il s’agit de la stratégie du «tout ou rien»: vous pouvez autoriser tous les sites web à créer des cookies, ou bien, aucun site web ne peut en créer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1185">This policy is all or nothing - you can let all websites create cookies, or no websites create cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1186">Vous ne pouvez pas utiliser cette stratégie pour activer les cookies provenant de sites web spécifiques.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1186">You can't use this policy to enable cookies from specific websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1187">Définissez la stratégie sur « SessionOnly » pour effacer les cookies à la fermeture de la session.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1187">Set the policy to 'SessionOnly' to clear cookies when the session closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1188">Si MicrosoftEdge s’exécute en mode arrière-plan, la session peut rester ouverte lors de la fermeture de la dernière fenêtre, ce qui signifie que les cookies ne seront pas effacés lors de la fermeture de la fenêtre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1188">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1189">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur la configuration de ce comportement, consultez la stratégie [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1189">See [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1190">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut « AllowCookies » est utilisée ; les utilisateurs peuvent, en accédant aux paramètres de MicrosoftEdge, le modifier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1190">If you don't configure this policy, the default 'AllowCookies' is used, and users can change this setting in Microsoft Edge Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1191">(Si vous souhaitez que les utilisateurs ne puissent pas modifier ce paramètre, configurez la stratégie.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1191">(If you don't want users to be able to change this setting, set the policy.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1192">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1192">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1193">AllowCookies (1)=Permettre à tous les sites de créer des cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1193">AllowCookies (1) = Let all sites create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1194">BlockCookies (2)=Ne permettre à aucun site de créer des cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1194">BlockCookies (2) = Don't let any site create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1195">SessionOnly (4) = conserver les cookies pendant la durée de la session, sauf ceux listés dans [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1195">SessionOnly (4) = Keep cookies for the duration of the session, except ones listed in [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1196">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1196">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1197">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1197">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1198">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1198">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1199">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1199">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1200">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1200">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1201">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1201">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1202">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1202">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1203">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1203">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1204">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1204">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1205">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1205">GP unique name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1206">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer les cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1206">GP name: Configure cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1207">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1207">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1208">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1208">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1209">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1209">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1210">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1210">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1211">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1211">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1212">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1212">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1213">Nom de la valeur: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1213">Value Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1214">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1214">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1215">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1215">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1216">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1216">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1217">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1217">Preference Key Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1218">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1218">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1220">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1220">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-file-system-api-for-reading"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1221">Contrôler l’utilisation de l’API du système de fichiers pour la lecture</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1221">Control use of the File System API for reading</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1222">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1222">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1223">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1223">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1224">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1224">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1225">Si vous configurez cette stratégie sur 3, les sites web peuvent demander l’accès en lecture au système de fichiers du système d’exploitation hôte à l’aide de l’API du système de fichiers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1225">If you set this policy to 3, websites can ask for read access to the host operating system's filesystem using the File System API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1226">Si vous attribuez la valeur 2 à cette stratégie, l’accès est refusé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1226">If you set this policy to 2, access is denied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1227">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les sites web peuvent demander l’accès.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1227">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1228">Les utilisateurs peuvent modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1228">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1229">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1229">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1230">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = ne pas autoriser les sites à demander l’accès en lecture aux fichiers et aux répertoires via l’API du système de fichiers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1230">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = Don't allow any site to request read access to files and directories via the File System API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1231">AskFileSystemRead (3) = autoriser les sites à demander à l’utilisateur d’accorder l’accès en lecture aux fichiers et aux répertoires via l’API du système de fichiers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1231">AskFileSystemRead (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant read access to files and directories via the File System API</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1232">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1232">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1233">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1233">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1234">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1234">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1235">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1235">Can be recommended: No</span></span>

  ### <a name="defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1256">DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1256">DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-file-system-api-for-writing"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1257">Contrôler l’utilisation de l’API du système de fichiers pour l’écriture</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1257">Control use of the File System API for writing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1258">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1258">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1259">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1259">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1260">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1260">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1261">Si vous configurez cette stratégie sur 3, les sites web peuvent demander l’accès en écriture au système de fichiers du système d’exploitation hôte à l’aide de l’API du système de fichiers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1261">If you set this policy to 3, websites can ask for write access to the host operating system's filesystem using the File System API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1262">Si vous attribuez la valeur 2 à cette stratégie, l’accès est refusé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1262">If you set this policy to 2, access is denied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1263">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les sites web peuvent demander l’accès.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1263">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1264">Les utilisateurs peuvent modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1264">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1265">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1265">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1266">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = ne pas autoriser les sites à demander l’accès en écriture aux fichiers et aux répertoires</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1266">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = Don't allow any site to request write access to files and directories</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1267">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = autoriser les sites à demander à l’utilisateur d’accorder l’accès en écriture aux fichiers et aux répertoires</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1267">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant write access to files and directories</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1268">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1268">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1269">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1269">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1270">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1270">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1271">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1271">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1272">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1272">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1273">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1273">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1274">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1274">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1275">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1275">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1276">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1276">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1277">Nom unique de stratégie de groupe: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1277">GP unique name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1278">Nom de stratégie de groupe:contrôler l’utilisation de l’API du système de fichiers pour l’écriture</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1278">GP name: Control use of the File System API for writing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1279">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1279">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1280">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1280">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1281">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1281">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1282">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1282">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1283">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1283">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1284">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1284">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1285">Nom de la valeur: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1285">Value Name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1286">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1286">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1287">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1287">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1288">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1288">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1289">Nom de la clé de préférence: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1289">Preference Key Name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1290">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1290">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultgeolocationsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1292">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1292">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-geolocation-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1293">Paramètre par défaut de la géolocalisation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1293">Default geolocation setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1294">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1294">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1295">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1295">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1296">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1296">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1297">Indiquez si les sites web sont autorisés à suivre la position géographique des utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1297">Set whether websites can track users' physical locations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1298">Vous pouvez autoriser le suivi par défaut (« AllowGeolocation »), le refuser par défaut (« BlockGeolocation ») ou faire en sorte que l’utilisateur reçoive un message chaque fois qu’un site Web demande sa localisation (« AskGeolocation »).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1298">You can allow tracking by default ('AllowGeolocation'), deny it by default ('BlockGeolocation'), or ask the user each time a website requests their location ('AskGeolocation').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1299">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, l’option « AskGeolocation » est utilisée et l’utilisateur peut la modifier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1299">If you don't configure this policy, 'AskGeolocation' is used and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1300">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1300">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1301">AllowGeolocation (1)=Autoriser les sites à suivre la position géographique des utilisateurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1301">AllowGeolocation (1) = Allow sites to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1302">BlockGeolocation (2)=N’autoriser aucun site à suivre la position géographique des utilisateurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1302">BlockGeolocation (2) = Don't allow any site to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1303">AskGeolocation (3)=Demander chaque fois qu’un site souhaite suivre la position géographique des utilisateurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1303">AskGeolocation (3) = Ask whenever a site wants to track users' physical location</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1304">Utilisez les informations ci-dessus lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1304">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1305">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1305">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1306">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1306">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1307">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1307">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1308">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1308">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1309">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1309">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1310">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1310">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1311">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1311">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1312">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1312">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1313">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1313">GP unique name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1314">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: paramètre par défaut de la géolocalisation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1314">GP name: Default geolocation setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1315">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1315">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1316">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1316">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1317">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1317">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1318">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1318">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1319">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1319">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1320">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1320">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1321">Nom de la valeur: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1321">Value Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1322">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1322">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1323">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1323">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1324">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1324">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1325">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1325">Preference Key Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1326">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1326">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml

```

  ### <a name="defaultimagessetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1328">DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1328">DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-images-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1329">Paramètre par défaut des images</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1329">Default images setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1330">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1330">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1331">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1331">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1332">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1332">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1333">Indiquez si les sites web sont autorisés à afficher des images.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1333">Set whether websites can display images.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1334">Vous pouvez autoriser les images sur tous les sites (« AllowImages ») ou les bloquer sur tous les sites (« BlockImages »).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1334">You can allow images on all sites ('AllowImages') or block them on all sites ('BlockImages').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1335">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, les images sont autorisées par défaut et l’utilisateur peut modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1335">If you don't configure this policy, images are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1336">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1336">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1337">AllowImages (1)=Autoriser tous les sites à afficher toutes les images</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1337">AllowImages (1) = Allow all sites to show all images</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1338">BlockImages (2)=N’autoriser aucun site à afficher les images</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1338">BlockImages (2) = Don't allow any site to show images</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1339">Utilisez les informations ci-dessus lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1339">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1340">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1340">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1341">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1341">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1342">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1342">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1343">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1343">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1344">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1344">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1345">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1345">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1346">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1346">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1347">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1347">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1348">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1348">GP unique name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1349">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: paramètre par défaut des images</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1349">GP name: Default images setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1350">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1350">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1351">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1351">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1352">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1352">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1353">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1353">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1354">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1354">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1355">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1355">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1356">Nom de la valeur: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1356">Value Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1357">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1357">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1358">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1358">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1359">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1359">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1360">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1360">Preference Key Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1361">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1361">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultinsecurecontentsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1363">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1363">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-insecure-content-exceptions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1364">Contrôler l’utilisation des exceptions pour le contenu non sécurisé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1364">Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1365">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1365">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1366">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1366">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1367">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1367">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1368">Vous permet de définir si les utilisateurs peuvent ajouter ou non des exceptions qui autorisent l’affichage de contenu mixte sur des sites spécifiques. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1368">Allows you to set whether users can add exceptions to allow mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1369">Cette stratégie peut être remplacée pour des modèles d’URL spécifiques par les stratégies [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) et [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1369">This policy can be overridden for specific URL patterns using the [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) and [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1370">Si cette stratégie n’est pas définie, les utilisateurs peuvent ajouter des exceptions qui autorisent le contenu mixte blocable et peuvent désactiver les mises à niveau automatique pour le contenu mixte blocable en option.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1370">If this policy isn't set, users will be allowed to add exceptions to allow blockable mixed content and disable autoupgrades for optionally blockable mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1371">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1371">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1372">BlockInsecureContent (2)=N’autoriser aucun site à charger le contenu mixte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1372">BlockInsecureContent (2) = Do not allow any site to load mixed content</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1373">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Autoriser les utilisateurs à ajouter des exceptions afin d’autoriser le contenu mixte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1373">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Allow users to add exceptions to allow mixed content</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1374">Utilisez les informations ci-dessus lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1374">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1375">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1375">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1376">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1376">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1377">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1377">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1378">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1378">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1379">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1379">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1380">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1380">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1381">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1381">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1382">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1382">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1383">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1383">GP unique name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1384">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: contrôler l’utilisation des exceptions pour le contenu non sécurisé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1384">GP name: Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1385">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1385">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1386">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1386">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1387">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1387">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1388">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1388">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1389">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1389">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1390">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1390">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1391">Nom de la valeur: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1391">Value Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1392">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1392">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1393">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1393">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1394">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1394">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1395">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1395">Preference Key Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1396">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1396">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultjavascriptsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1398">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1398">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-javascript-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1399">Paramètre par défaut de JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1399">Default JavaScript setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1400">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1400">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1401">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1401">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1402">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1402">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1403">Indiquez si les sites web sont autorisés à exécuter JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1403">Set whether websites can run JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1404">Vous pouvez l’autoriser pour tous les sites («AllowJavaScript») ou le bloquer pour tous les sites («BlockJavaScript»).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1404">You can allow it for all sites ('AllowJavaScript') or block it for all sites ('BlockJavaScript').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1405">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, tous les sites peuvent exécuter JavaScript par défaut, et l’utilisateur peut modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1405">If you don't configure this policy, all sites can run JavaScript by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1406">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1406">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1407">AllowJavaScript (1)=Autoriser tous les sites à exécuter JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1407">AllowJavaScript (1) = Allow all sites to run JavaScript</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1408">BlockJavaScript (2)=N’autoriser aucun site à exécuter JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1408">BlockJavaScript (2) = Don't allow any site to run JavaScript</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1409">Utilisez les informations ci-dessus lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1409">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1410">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1410">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1411">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1411">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1412">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1412">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1413">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1413">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1414">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1414">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1415">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1415">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1416">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1416">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1417">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1417">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1418">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1418">GP unique name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1419">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: paramètre par défaut de JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1419">GP name: Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1420">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1420">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1421">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1421">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1422">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1422">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1423">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1423">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1424">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1424">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1425">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1425">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1426">Nom de la valeur: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1426">Value Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1427">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1427">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1428">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1428">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1429">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1429">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1430">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1430">Preference Key Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1431">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1431">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultnotificationssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1433">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1433">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-notification-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1434">Paramètre par défaut des notifications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1434">Default notification setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1435">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1435">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1436">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1436">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1437">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1437">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1438">Indiquez si les sites web sont autorisés à afficher des notifications de bureau.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1438">Set whether websites can display desktop notifications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1439">Vous pouvez autoriser l’affichage des notifications par défaut (« AllowNotifications »), le refuser par défaut (« BlockNotifications ») ou l’utilisateur peut recevoir un message chaque fois qu’un site veut afficher une notification (« AskNotifications »).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1439">You can allow them by default ('AllowNotifications'), deny them by default ('BlockNotifications'), or have the user be asked each time a website wants to show a notification ('AskNotifications').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1440">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, les notifications sont autorisées par défaut et l’utilisateur peut modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1440">If you don't configure this policy, notifications are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1441">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1441">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1442">AllowNotifications (1)=Autoriser les sites à afficher les notifications de bureau</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1442">AllowNotifications (1) = Allow sites to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1443">BlockNotifications (2)=N’autoriser aucun site à afficher les notifications de bureau</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1443">BlockNotifications (2) = Don't allow any site to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1444">AskNotifications (3)=Demander chaque fois qu’un site souhaite afficher les notifications de bureau</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1444">AskNotifications (3) = Ask every time a site wants to show desktop notifications</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1445">Utilisez les informations ci-dessus lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1445">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1446">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1446">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1447">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1447">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1448">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1448">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1449">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1449">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1450">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1450">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1451">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1451">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1452">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1452">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1453">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1453">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1454">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1454">GP unique name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1455">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: paramètre par défaut des notifications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1455">GP name: Default notification setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1456">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1456">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1457">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1457">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1458">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1458">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1459">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1459">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1460">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1460">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1461">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1461">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1462">Nom de la valeur: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1462">Value Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1463">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1463">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1464">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1464">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1465">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1465">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1466">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1466">Preference Key Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1467">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1467">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultpluginssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1469">DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1469">DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-adobe-flash-setting-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1470">Paramètre Adobe Flash par défaut (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1470">Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1471">OBSOLÈTE: cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas sur les versions ultérieures à Microsoft Edge87.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1471">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1472">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1472">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1473">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 et jusqu’à la version87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1473">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1474">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1474">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1475">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, car Flash n’est plus pris en charge par MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1475">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1476">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) et [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) sont vérifiés en premier, avant cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1476">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) are checked first, then this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1477">Les options sont «ClickToPlay» et «BlockPlugins».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1477">The options are 'ClickToPlay' and 'BlockPlugins'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1478">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «BlockPlugins», ce plugin est refusé pour tous les sites web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1478">If you set this policy to 'BlockPlugins', this plugin is denied for all websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1479">«ClickToPlay» permet au plugin Flash de s’exécuter, mais les utilisateurs cliquent sur l’espace réservé pour le démarrer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1479">'ClickToPlay' lets the Flash plugin run, but users click the placeholder to start it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1480">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, l’utilisateur peut modifier ce paramètre manuellement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1480">If you don't configure this policy, the user can change this setting manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1481">Remarque: la lecture automatique est utilisée uniquement pour les domaines répertoriés explicitement dans la stratégie [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1481">Note: Automatic playback is only for domains explicitly listed in the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1482">Pour activer la lecture automatique pour tous les sites, ajoutez http://\* et https://\* à la liste des URL autorisées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1482">To turn automatic playback on for all sites, add http://\* and https://\* to the allowed list of URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1483">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1483">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1484">BlockPlugins (2)=Bloquer le plug-in Adobe Flash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1484">BlockPlugins (2) = Block the Adobe Flash plugin</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1485">ClickToPlay (3) = Cliquez pour exécuter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1485">ClickToPlay (3) = Click to play</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1486">Utilisez les informations ci-dessus lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1486">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1487">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1487">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1488">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1488">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1489">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1489">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1490">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1490">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1491">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1491">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1492">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1492">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1493">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1493">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1494">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1494">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1495">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1495">GP unique name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1496">Nom de la stratégie: paramètre Adobe Flash par défaut (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1496">GP name: Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1497">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1497">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1498">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1498">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1499">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1499">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1500">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1500">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1501">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1501">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1502">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1502">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1503">Nom de la valeur: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1503">Value Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1504">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1504">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1505">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1505">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1506">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1506">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1507">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1507">Preference Key Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1508">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1508">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultpopupssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1510">DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1510">DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-pop-up-window-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1511">Paramètre par défaut de la fenêtre contextuelle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1511">Default pop-up window setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1512">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1512">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1513">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1513">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1514">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1514">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1515">Indiquez si les sites web sont autorisés à afficher des fenêtres contextuelles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1515">Set whether websites can show pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1516">Vous pouvez autoriser les fenêtres contextuelles sur tous les sites web (« AllowPopups ») ou les bloquer sur tous les sites (« BlockPopups »).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1516">You can allow them on all websites ('AllowPopups') or block them on all sites ('BlockPopups').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1517">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, les fenêtres contextuelles sont bloquées par défaut et les utilisateurs peuvent modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1517">If you don't configure this policy, pop-up windows are blocked by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1518">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1518">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1519">AllowPopups (1)=Autoriser tous les sites à afficher des fenêtres contextuelles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1519">AllowPopups (1) = Allow all sites to show pop-ups</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1520">BlockPopups (2) = N’autoriser aucun site à afficher des fenêtres contextuelles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1520">BlockPopups (2) = Do not allow any site to show popups</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1521">Utilisez les informations ci-dessus lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1521">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1522">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1522">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1523">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1523">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1524">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1524">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1525">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1525">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1526">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1526">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1527">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1527">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1528">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1528">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1529">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1529">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1530">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1530">GP unique name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1531">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: paramètre par défaut de la fenêtre contextuelle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1531">GP name: Default pop-up window setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1532">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1532">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1533">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1533">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1534">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1534">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1535">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1535">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1536">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1536">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1537">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1537">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1538">Nom de la valeur: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1538">Value Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1539">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1539">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1540">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1540">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1541">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1541">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1542">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1542">Preference Key Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1543">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1543">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
