  ### <a name="defaultwebbluetoothguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1545">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1545">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-web-bluetooth-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1546">Contrôler l’utilisation de l’API Web Bluetooth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1546">Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1547">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1547">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1548">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1548">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1549">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1549">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1550">Déterminez si les sites web sont autorisés à accéder aux appareils Bluetooth à proximité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1550">Control whether websites can access nearby Bluetooth devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1551">Vous pouvez bloquer complètement l’accès ou obliger le site à demander à l’utilisateur chaque fois qu’il souhaite accéder à un appareil Bluetooth.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1551">You can completely block access or require the site to ask the user each time it wants to access a Bluetooth device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1552">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut (« AskWebBluetooth », c’est-à-dire que les utilisateurs sont interrogés à chaque fois) est utilisée et les utilisateurs peuvent la modifier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1552">If you don't configure this policy, the default value ('AskWebBluetooth', meaning users are asked each time) is used and users can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1553">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1553">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1554">BlockWebBluetooth (2)=N’autoriser aucun site à demander l’accès à des appareils Bluetooth à l’aide de l’API Web Bluetooth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1554">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to Bluetooth devices via the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1555">AskWebBluetooth (3)=Autoriser des sites à demander à l’utilisateur d’accorder l’accès à un appareil Bluetooth à proximité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1555">AskWebBluetooth (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a nearby Bluetooth device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1556">Utilisez les informations ci-dessus lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1556">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1557">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1557">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1558">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1558">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1559">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1559">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1560">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1560">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1561">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1561">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1562">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1562">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1563">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1563">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1564">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1564">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1565">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1565">GP unique name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1566">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: contrôler l’utilisation de l’API Web Bluetooth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1566">GP name: Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1567">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1567">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1568">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1568">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1569">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1569">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1570">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1570">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1571">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1571">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1572">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1572">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1573">Nom de la valeur: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1573">Value Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1574">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1574">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1575">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1575">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1576">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1576">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1577">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1577">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1578">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1578">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultwebusbguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1580">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1580">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-webusb-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1581">Contrôler l’utilisation de l’API WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1581">Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1582">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1582">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1583">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1583">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1584">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1584">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1585">Indiquez si les sites web sont autorisés à accéder à des périphériques USB connectés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1585">Set whether websites can access connected USB devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1586">Vous pouvez bloquer complètement l’accès ou interroger l’utilisateur chaque fois qu’un site web souhaite accéder à des appareils USB connectés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1586">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to connected USB devices.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1587">Vous pouvez remplacer cette stratégie pour des modèles d’URL spécifiques par les stratégies [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) et [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1587">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) and [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1588">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, des sites peuvent demander aux utilisateurs s’ils sont autorisés à accéder aux appareils USB connectés (« AskWebUsb ») par défaut, et les utilisateurs peuvent modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1588">If you don't configure this policy, sites can ask users whether they can access the connected USB devices ('AskWebUsb') by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1589">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1589">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1590">BlockWebUsb (2)=N’autoriser aucun site à demander l’accès à des appareils USB via l’API WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1590">BlockWebUsb (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to USB devices via the WebUSB API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1591">AskWebUsb (3)=Autoriser des sites à demander à l’utilisateur d’accorder l’accès à un appareil USB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1591">AskWebUsb (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a connected USB device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1592">Utilisez les informations ci-dessus lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1592">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1593">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1593">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1594">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1594">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1595">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1595">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1596">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1596">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1597">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1597">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1598">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1598">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1599">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1599">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1600">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1600">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1601">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1601">GP unique name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1602">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: contrôler l’utilisation de l’API WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1602">GP name: Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1603">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1603">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1604">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1604">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1605">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1605">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1606">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1606">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1607">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1607">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1608">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1608">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1609">Nom de la valeur: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1609">Value Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1610">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1610">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1611">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1611">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1612">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1612">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1613">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1613">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1614">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1614">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1615">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1615">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="filesystemreadaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1616">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1616">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-read-access-via-the-file-system-api-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1617">Autoriser l’accès en lecture via l’API du système de fichiers sur ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1617">Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1618">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1618">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1619">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1619">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1620">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1620">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1621">La définition de la stratégie vous permet de répertorier les modèles d’URL qui indiquent quels sites peuvent inviter les utilisateurs à leur octroyer l’accès en lecture aux fichiers ou aux répertoires dans le système de fichiers du système d’exploitation hôte via l’API du système de fichiers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1621">Setting the policy lets you list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1622">Laisser la stratégie en suspens signifie la [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) s’applique à tous les sites, s’il est défini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1622">Leaving the policy unset means [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1623">Si ce n'est pas le cas, les paramètres personnels des utilisateurs s'appliquent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1623">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1624">Les modèles d’URL ne peuvent pas entrer en conflit avec [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1624">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1625">Aucune stratégie n’est prioritaire si une URL correspond aux deux.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1625">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1626">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1626">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1627">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1627">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1628">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1628">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1629">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1629">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1630">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1630">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1631">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1631">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1632">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1632">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1633">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1633">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1634">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1634">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1635">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1635">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1636">Name unique de la stratégie de groupe: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1636">GP unique name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1637">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’accès en lecture via l’API du système de fichiers sur ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1637">GP name: Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1638">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1638">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1639">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1639">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1640">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1640">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1641">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1641">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1642">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1642">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1643">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1643">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1644">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1644">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1645">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1645">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1646">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1646">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1647">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1647">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1648">Nom de la clé de préférence: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1648">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>

``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="filesystemreadblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1651">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1651">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-read-access-via-the-file-system-api-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1652">Bloquer l’accès en lecture via l’API du système de fichiers sur ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1652">Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1653">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1653">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1654">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1654">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1655">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1655">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1656">Si vous définissez cette stratégie, vous pouvez répertorier les modèles d’URL qui indiquent quels sites peuvent inviter les utilisateurs à leur octroyer l’accès en lecture aux fichiers ou aux répertoires dans le système de fichiers du système d’exploitation hôte via l’API du système de fichiers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1656">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1657">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) s’applique à tous les sites, s’il est paramétré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1657">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1658">Si ce n'est pas le cas, les paramètres personnels des utilisateurs s'appliquent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1658">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1659">Les modèles d’URL ne peuvent pas entrer en conflit avec [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1659">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1660">Aucune stratégie n’est prioritaire si une URL correspond aux deux.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1660">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1661">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1661">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1662">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1662">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1663">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1663">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1664">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1664">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1665">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1665">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1666">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1666">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1667">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1667">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1668">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1668">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1669">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1669">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1670">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1670">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1671">Name unique de la stratégie de groupe: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1671">GP unique name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1672">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer l’accès en lecture via l’API du système de fichiers sur ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1672">GP name: Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1673">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1673">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1674">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1674">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1675">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1675">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1676">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1676">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1677">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1677">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1678">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1678">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1679">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1679">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1680">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1680">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1681">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1681">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1682">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1682">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1683">Nom de la clé de préférence: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1683">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1684">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1684">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="filesystemwriteaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1686">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1686">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-write-access-to-files-and-directories-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1687">Autoriser l’accès en écriture aux fichiers et aux répertoires sur ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1687">Allow write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1688">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1688">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1689">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1689">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1690">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1690">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1691">Si vous définissez cette stratégie, vous pouvez répertorier les modèles d’URL qui indiquent quels sites peuvent inviter les utilisateurs à leur octroyer l’accès en écriture aux fichiers ou aux répertoires dans le système de fichiers du système d’exploitation hôte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1691">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1692">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) s’applique à tous les sites, s’il est paramétré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1692">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1693">Si ce n'est pas le cas, les paramètres personnels des utilisateurs s'appliquent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1693">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1694">Les modèles d’URL ne peuvent pas entrer en conflit avec [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1694">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1695">Aucune stratégie n’est prioritaire si une URL correspond aux deux.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1695">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1696">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1696">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1697">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1697">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1698">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1698">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1699">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1699">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1700">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1700">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1701">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1701">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1702">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1702">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1703">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1703">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1704">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1704">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1705">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1705">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1706">Name unique de la stratégie de groupe: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1706">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1707">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: Autoriser l’accès en écriture aux fichiers et aux répertoires sur ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1707">GP name: Allow write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1708">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1708">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1709">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1709">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1710">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1710">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1711">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1711">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1712">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1712">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1713">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1713">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1714">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1714">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1715">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1715">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1716">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1716">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1717">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1717">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1718">Nom de la clé de préférence: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1718">Preference Key Name: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1719">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1719">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="filesystemwriteblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1721">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1721">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-write-access-to-files-and-directories-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1722">Bloquer l’accès en écriture aux fichiers et aux répertoires sur ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1722">Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1723">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1723">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1724">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1724">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1725">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1725">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1726">Si vous définissez cette stratégie, vous pouvez répertorier les modèles d’URL qui indiquent quels sites peuvent inviter les utilisateurs à leur octroyer l’accès en écriture aux fichiers ou aux répertoires dans le système de fichiers du système d’exploitation hôte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1726">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1727">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) s’applique à tous les sites, s’il est paramétré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1727">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1728">Si ce n'est pas le cas, les paramètres personnels des utilisateurs s'appliquent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1728">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1729">Les modèles d’URL ne peuvent pas entrer en conflit avec [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1729">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1730">Aucune stratégie n’est prioritaire si une URL correspond aux deux.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1730">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1731">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1731">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1732">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1732">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1733">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1733">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1734">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1734">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1735">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1735">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1736">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1736">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1737">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1737">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1738">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1738">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1739">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1739">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1740">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1740">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1741">Name unique de la stratégie de groupe: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1741">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1742">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer l’accès en écriture aux fichiers et aux répertoires sur ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1742">GP name: Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1743">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1743">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1744">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1744">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1745">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1745">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1746">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1746">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1747">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1747">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1748">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1748">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1749">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1749">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1750">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1750">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1751">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1751">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1752">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1752">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1753">Nom de la clé de préférence: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1753">Preference Key Name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1754">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1754">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="imagesallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1756">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1756">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-images-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1757">Autoriser les images sur ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1757">Allow images on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1758">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1758">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1759">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1759">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1760">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1760">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1761">Déterminez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui sont autorisés à afficher des images.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1761">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1762">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1762">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value is used for all sites either from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1763">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1763">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1764">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1764">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1765">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1765">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1766">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1766">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1767">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1767">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1768">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1768">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1769">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1769">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1770">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1770">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1771">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1771">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1772">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1772">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1773">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1773">GP unique name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1774">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les images sur ces sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1774">GP name: Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1775">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1775">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1776">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1776">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1777">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1777">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1778">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1778">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1779">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1779">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1780">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1780">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1781">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1781">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1782">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1782">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1783">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1783">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1784">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1784">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1785">Nom clé de la préférence: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1785">Preference Key Name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1786">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1786">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="imagesblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1788">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1788">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-images-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1789">Bloquer les images sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1789">Block images on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1790">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1790">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1791">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1791">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1792">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1792">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1793">Déterminez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui ne sont pas autorisés à afficher des images.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1793">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1794">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1794">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1795">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1795">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1796">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1796">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1797">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1797">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1798">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1798">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1799">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1799">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1800">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1800">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1801">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1801">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1802">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1802">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1803">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1803">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1804">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1804">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1805">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1805">GP unique name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1806">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer les images sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1806">GP name: Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1807">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1807">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1808">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1808">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1809">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1809">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1810">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1810">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1811">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1811">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1812">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1812">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1813">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1813">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1814">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1814">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1815">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1815">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1816">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1816">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1817">Nom clé de la préférence: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1817">Preference Key Name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1818">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1818">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="insecurecontentallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1820">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1820">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-insecure-content-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1821">Autoriser le contenu non sécurisé sur les sites spécifiés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1821">Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1822">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1822">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1823">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1823">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1824">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1824">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1825">Créez une liste de modèles d’URL pour spécifier les sites pouvant afficher du contenu mixte non sécurisé (contenu HTTP sur les sites HTTPS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1825">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that can display insecure mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1826">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, le contenu mixte pouvant être bloqué le sera et le contenu mixte pouvant facultativement être bloqué sera mis à jour.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1826">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1827">Toutefois, les utilisateurs seront autorisés à définir des exceptions pour autoriser du contenu mixte non sécurisé pour des sites spécifiques.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1827">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1828">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1828">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1829">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1829">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1830">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1830">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1831">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1831">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1832">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1832">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1833">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1833">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1834">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1834">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1835">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1835">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1836">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1836">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1837">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1837">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1838">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1838">GP unique name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1839">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser le contenu non sécurisé sur les sites spécifiés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1839">GP name: Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1840">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1840">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1841">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1841">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1842">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1842">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1843">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1843">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1844">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1844">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1845">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1845">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1846">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1846">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1847">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1847">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1848">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1848">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1849">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1849">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1850">Nom clé de la préférence: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1850">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1851">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1851">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="insecurecontentblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1853">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1853">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-insecure-content-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1854">Bloquer le contenu non sécurisé sur les sites spécifiés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1854">Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1855">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1855">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1856">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1856">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1857">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1857">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1858">Créez une liste des modèles d’URL pour spécifier les sites qui ne sont pas autorisés à afficher du contenu mixte blocable, c’est-à-dire actif, (contenu HTTP sur des sites HTTPS) et pour lesquels les mises à jour du contenu mixte pouvant facultativement être bloqué vont être désactivées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1858">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that aren't allowed to display blockable (i.e. active) mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites) and for which optionally blockable mixed content upgrades will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1859">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, le contenu mixte pouvant être bloqué le sera et le contenu mixte pouvant facultativement être bloqué sera mis à jour.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1859">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1860">Toutefois, les utilisateurs seront autorisés à définir des exceptions pour autoriser du contenu mixte non sécurisé pour des sites spécifiques.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1860">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1861">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1861">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1862">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1862">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1863">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1863">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1864">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1864">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1865">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1865">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1866">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1866">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1867">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1867">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1868">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1868">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1869">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1869">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1870">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1870">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1871">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1871">GP unique name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1872">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer le contenu non sécurisé sur les sites spécifiés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1872">GP name: Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1873">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1873">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1874">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1874">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1875">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1875">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1876">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1876">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1877">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1877">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1878">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1878">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1879">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1879">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1880">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1880">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1881">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1881">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1882">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1882">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1883">Nom clé de la préférence: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1883">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1884">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1884">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
