  ### <a name="javascriptallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1886">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1886">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-javascript-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1887">Autoriser JavaScript sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1887">Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1888">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1888">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1889">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1889">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1890">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1890">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1891">Déterminez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui sont autorisés à exécuter JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1891">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1892">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1892">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1893">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1893">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1894">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1894">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1895">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1895">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1896">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1896">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1897">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1897">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1898">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1898">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1899">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1899">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1900">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1900">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1901">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1901">GP unique name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1902">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser JavaScript sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1902">GP name: Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1903">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1903">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1904">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1904">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1905">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1905">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1906">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1906">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1907">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1907">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1908">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1908">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1909">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1909">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1910">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1910">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1911">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1911">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1912">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1912">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1913">Nom clé de la préférence: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1913">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>

``` xml
</array>
```

  ### <a name="javascriptblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1916">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1916">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-javascript-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1917">Bloquer JavaScript sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1917">Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1918">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1918">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1919">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1919">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1920">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1920">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1921">Déterminez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui ne sont pas autorisés à exécuter JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1921">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1922">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1922">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1923">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1923">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1924">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1924">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1925">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1925">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1926">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1926">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1927">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1927">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1928">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1928">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1929">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1929">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1930">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1930">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1931">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1931">GP unique name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1932">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer JavaScript sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1932">GP name: Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1933">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1933">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1934">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1934">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1935">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1935">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1936">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1936">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1937">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1937">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1938">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1938">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1939">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1939">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1940">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1940">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1941">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1941">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1942">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1942">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1943">Nom clé de la préférence: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1943">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  ### <a name="legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1946">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1946">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-default-legacy-samesite-cookie-behavior-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1947">Activer le paramètre de comportement hérité par défaut du cookie SameSite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1947">Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1948">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1948">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1949">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1949">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1950">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1950">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1951">Vous permet de rétablir le comportement SameSite hérité pour tous les cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1951">Lets you revert all cookies to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1952">Le rétablissement du comportement hérité entraîne le traitement des cookies qui ne spécifient pas d’attribut SameSite comme s’ils étaient «SameSite=None», supprime la condition requise pour que les cookies «SameSite=None» transportent l’attribut «Secure» et ignore la comparaison de schéma lorsque vous évaluez si deux sites sont same-site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1952">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1953">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le comportement SameSite par défaut pour les cookies dépend d’autres sources de configuration pour la fonctionnalité SameSite par défaut, la fonctionnalité Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure et la fonctionnalité Schemeful Same-Site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1953">If you don't set this policy, the default SameSite behavior for cookies will depend on other configuration sources for the SameSite-by-default feature, the Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure feature, and the Schemeful Same-Site feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1954">Ces fonctionnalités peuvent également être configurées à l’aide d’une version d’évaluation de terrain ou de l’indicateur same-site-by-default-cookies, l’indicateur cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure ou l’indicateur schemeful-same-site dans edge://flags.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1954">These features can also be configured by a field trial or the same-site-by-default-cookies flag, the cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure flag, or the schemeful-same-site flag in edge://flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1955">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1955">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1956">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = Rétablir le comportement SameSite hérité pour les cookies sur tous les sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1956">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1957">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = Utiliser le comportement SameSite par défaut pour les cookies sur tous les sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1957">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = Use SameSite-by-default behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1958">Utilisez les informations ci-dessus lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1958">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1959">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1959">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1960">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1960">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1961">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1961">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1962">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1962">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1963">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1963">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1964">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1964">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1965">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1965">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1966">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1966">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1967">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1967">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1968">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer le paramètre de comportement hérité par défaut du cookie SameSite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1968">GP name: Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1969">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1969">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1970">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1970">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1971">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1971">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1972">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1972">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1973">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1973">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1974">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1974">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1975">Nom de la valeur: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1975">Value Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1976">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1976">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1977">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1977">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1978">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1978">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1979">Nom clé de la préférence: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1979">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1980">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1980">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabledfordomainlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1982">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1982">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>

  #### <a name="revert-to-legacy-samesite-behavior-for-cookies-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1983">Revenir au comportement hérité de SameSite pour les cookies sur des sites spécifiés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1983">Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1984">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1984">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1985">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1985">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1986">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1986">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1987">Les cookies définis pour les domaines correspondant aux modèles spécifiés sont rétablis vers le comportement SameSite hérité. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1987">Cookies set for domains match specified patterns will revert to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1988">Le rétablissement du comportement hérité entraîne le traitement des cookies qui ne spécifient pas d’attribut SameSite comme s’ils étaient «SameSite=None», supprime la condition requise pour que les cookies «SameSite=None» transportent l’attribut «Secure» et ignore la comparaison de schéma lorsque vous évaluez si deux sites sont same-site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1988">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1989">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur globale par défaut est utilisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1989">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1990">La valeur globale par défaut est également utilisée pour les cookies sur les domaines non couverts par les modèles que vous spécifiez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1990">The global default will also be used for cookies on domains not covered by the patterns you specify.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1991">La valeur globale par défaut peut être configurée à l’aide de la stratégie [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1991">The global default value can be configured using the [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1992">Si [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) n’est pas définie, la valeur globale par défaut revient aux autres sources de configuration.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1992">If [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) is unset, the global default value falls back to other configuration sources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1993">Les modèles que vous répertoriez dans cette stratégie sont traités comme des domaines, et non comme des URL. Vous ne devez donc pas spécifier des schémas ou des ports.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1993">Note that patterns you list in this policy are treated as domains, not URLs, so you should not specify a scheme or port.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1994">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1994">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1995">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1995">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1996">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1996">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1997">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1997">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1998">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1998">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-1999">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-1999">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2000">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2000">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2001">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2001">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2002">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2002">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2003">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: revenir au comportement hérité de SameSite pour les cookies sur des sites spécifiés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2003">GP name: Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2004">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2004">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2005">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2005">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2006">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2006">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2007">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2007">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2008">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2008">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2009">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2009">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2010">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2010">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2011">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2011">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2012">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2012">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\1 = "www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2013">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2013">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2014">Nom clé de la préférence: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2014">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2015">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2015">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="notificationsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2017">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2017">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-notifications-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2018">Autoriser les notifications sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2018">Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2019">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2019">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2020">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2020">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2021">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2021">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2022">Vous permet de créer une liste de modèles d’URL pour spécifier les sites autorisés à afficher les notifications.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2022">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2023">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur globale par défaut est utilisée pour tous les sites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2023">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2024">Cette valeur par défaut est comprise dans la stratégie [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) si elle est définie, ou à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2024">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2025">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2025">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2026">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2026">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2027">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2027">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2028">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2028">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2029">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2029">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2030">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2030">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2031">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2031">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2032">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2032">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2033">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2033">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2034">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2034">GP unique name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2035">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les notifications sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2035">GP name: Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2036">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2036">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2037">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2037">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2038">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2038">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2039">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2039">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2040">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2040">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2041">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2041">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2042">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2042">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2043">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2043">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2044">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2044">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2046">Nom clé de la préférence: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2046">Preference Key Name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

``` xml
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
```

  ### <a name="notificationsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2049">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2049">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2053">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2053">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2054">Vous permet de créer une liste de modèles d’URL pour spécifier les sites non autorisés à afficher les notifications.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2054">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are not allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2055">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur globale par défaut est utilisée pour tous les sites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2055">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2056">Cette valeur par défaut est comprise dans la stratégie [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) si elle est définie, ou à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2056">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2057">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2057">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2058">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2058">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2059">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2059">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2060">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2060">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2061">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2061">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2063">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2063">List of strings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2065">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2065">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2066">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2066">GP unique name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2067">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer les notifications sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2067">GP name: Block notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2068">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2068">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2069">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2069">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2070">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2070">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2071">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2071">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2072">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2072">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2073">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2073">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2074">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2074">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2075">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2075">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2076">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2076">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2078">Nom clé de la préférence: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2078">Preference Key Name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  ### <a name="pluginsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2081">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2081">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-adobe-flash-plug-in-on-specific-sites-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2082">Autoriser le plug-in Adobe Flash sur des sites spécifiques (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2082">Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2083">OBSOLÈTE: cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas sur les versions ultérieures à Microsoft Edge87.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2083">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2084">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2084">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2085">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 et jusqu’à la version87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2085">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2086">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2086">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2087">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, car Flash n’est plus pris en charge par MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2087">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2088">Déterminez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui sont autorisés à exécuter le plug-in Adobe Flash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2088">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can run the Adobe Flash plug-in.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2089">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2089">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2090">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2090">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2091">Toutefois, à partir de M85, les modèles avec des caractères génériques comme «\*» et «[\*.]» dans l’hôte ne sont plus pris en charge pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2091">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2092">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2092">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2093">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2093">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2094">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2094">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2095">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2095">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2096">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2096">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2097">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2097">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2098">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2098">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2099">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2099">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2100">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2100">GP unique name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2101">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser le plug-in Adobe Flash sur des sites spécifiques (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2101">GP name: Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2102">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2102">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2103">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2103">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2104">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2104">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2105">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2105">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2106">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2106">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2107">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2107">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2108">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2108">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2109">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2109">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2110">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2110">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2111">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2111">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2112">Nom clé de la préférence: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2112">Preference Key Name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2113">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2113">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="pluginsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2115">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2115">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-the-adobe-flash-plug-in-on-specific-sites-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2116">Bloquer le plug-in Adobe Flash sur des sites spécifiques (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2116">Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2117">OBSOLÈTE: cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas sur les versions ultérieures à Microsoft Edge87.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2117">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2120">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2120">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2121">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, car Flash n’est plus pris en charge par MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2121">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2122">Déterminez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui ne sont pas autorisés à exécuter Adobe Flash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2122">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from running Adobe Flash.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2123">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2123">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2124">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2124">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2125">Toutefois, à partir de M85, les modèles avec des caractères génériques comme «\*» et «[\*.]» dans l’hôte ne sont plus pris en charge pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2125">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2126">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2126">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2127">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2127">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2128">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2128">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2129">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2129">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2130">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2130">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2131">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2131">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2132">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2132">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2133">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2133">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2134">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2134">GP unique name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2135">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer le plug-in Adobe Flash sur des sites spécifiques (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2135">GP name: Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2136">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2136">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2137">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2137">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2138">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2138">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2139">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2139">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2140">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2140">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2141">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2141">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2142">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2142">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2143">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2143">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2144">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2144">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2146">Nom clé de la préférence: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2146">Preference Key Name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2153">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2153">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2154">Déterminez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui sont autorisés à ouvrir des fenêtres contextuelles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2154">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can open pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2155">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2155">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2156">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2156">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2159">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2159">Can be recommended: No</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2170">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2170">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2171">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2171">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2172">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2172">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2173">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2173">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2174">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2174">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2175">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2175">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2176">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2176">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2177">Nom clé de la préférence: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2177">Preference Key Name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2178">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2178">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="popupsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2180">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2180">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-pop-up-windows-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2181">Bloquer les fenêtres contextuelles sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2181">Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2182">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2182">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2183">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2183">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2184">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2184">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2185">Déterminez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui ne sont pas autorisés à ouvrir des fenêtres contextuelles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2185">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from opening pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2186">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2186">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2187">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2187">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2188">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2188">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2189">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2189">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2190">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2190">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2191">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2191">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2192">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2192">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2193">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2193">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2194">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2194">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2195">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2195">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2196">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2196">GP unique name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2197">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer les fenêtres contextuelles sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2197">GP name: Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2198">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2198">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2199">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2199">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2200">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2200">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2201">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2201">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2202">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2202">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2203">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2203">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2204">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2204">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2205">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2205">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2206">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2206">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2207">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2207">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2208">Nom clé de la préférence: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2208">Preference Key Name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2209">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2209">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="registeredprotocolhandlers"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2211">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2211">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>

  #### <a name="register-protocol-handlers"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2212">Enregistrer les gestionnaires de protocoles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2212">Register protocol handlers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2213">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2213">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2214">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2214">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2215">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2215">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2216">Définissez cette stratégie (recommandé uniquement) pour inscrire une liste de gestionnaires de protocoles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2216">Set this policy (recommended only) to register a list of protocol handlers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2217">Cette liste est fusionnée avec celles inscrites par l’utilisateur et toutes peuvent être utilisées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2217">This list is merged with ones registered by the user and both are available to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2218">Enregistrer un gestionnaire de protocoles :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2218">To register a protocol handler:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2219">Attribuez la propriété de protocole au schéma (par exemple «mailto»)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2219">Set the protocol property to the scheme (for example, "mailto")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2220">Définissez la propriété URL sur la propriété URL de l’application qui gère le schéma spécifié dans le champ « Protocole ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2220">Set the URL property to the URL property of the application that handlers the scheme specified in the "protocol" field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2221">Le modèle peut inclure le paramètre substituable « %s », qui sera remplacé par l’URL traitée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2221">The pattern can include a "%s" placeholder, which the handled URL replaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2222">Les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas supprimer un gestionnaire de protocoles inscrit par cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2222">Users can't remove a protocol handler registered by this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2223">Ils peuvent toutefois installer un nouveau gestionnaire de protocoles par défaut pour outrepasser les gestionnaires de protocoles existants.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2223">However, they can install a new default protocol handler to override the existing protocol handlers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2224">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2224">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2225">Peut être obligatoire: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2225">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2226">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2226">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2227">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2227">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2228">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2228">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2229">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2229">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2230">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2230">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2231">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2231">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2232">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2232">GP unique name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2233">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: enregistrer les gestionnaires de protocoles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2233">GP name: Register protocol handlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2234">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (obligatoire): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2234">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2235">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2235">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2236">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2236">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2237">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2237">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2238">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2238">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2239">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2239">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2240">Nom de la valeur: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2240">Value Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2241">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2241">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2242">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2242">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [
  {
    "default": true, 
    "protocol": "mailto", 
    "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2243">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2243">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [{"default": true, "protocol": "mailto", "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2244">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2244">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2245">Nom clé de la préférence: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2245">Preference Key Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2246">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2246">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>RegisteredProtocolHandlers</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>default</key>
    <true/>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>mailto</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
