  ### <a name="spotlightexperiencesandrecommendationsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2248">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2248">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="choose-whether-users-can-receive-customized-background-images-and-text-suggestions-notifications"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2249">Déterminer si les utilisateurs peuvent recevoir des images d’arrière-plan et du texte personnalisés, des suggestions, des notifications,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2249">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications,</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2250">et des conseils pour les services Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2250">and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2251">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2251">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2252">Sur Windows depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2252">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2253">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2253">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2254">Déterminer si les utilisateurs peuvent recevoir des images d’arrière-plan et du texte personnalisés, des suggestions, des notifications et des conseils pour les services Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2254">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2255">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas ce paramètre, les expériences à la une et les recommandations sont activées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2255">If you enable or don't configure this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2256">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre, les expériences à la une et les recommandations sont désactivées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2256">If you disable this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned off.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2257">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2257">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2258">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2258">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2259">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2259">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2260">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2260">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2261">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2261">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2262">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2262">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2263">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2263">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2264">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2264">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2265">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2265">GP unique name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2266">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: déterminer si les utilisateurs peuvent recevoir des images d’arrière-plan et du texte personnalisés, des suggestions, des notifications et des conseils pour les services Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2266">GP name: Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2267">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2267">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2268">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2268">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2269">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2269">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2270">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2270">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2271">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2271">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2272">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2272">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2273">Nom de la valeur: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2273">Value Name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2274">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2274">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2275">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2275">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="webusballowdevicesforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2277">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2277">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="grant-access-to-specific-sites-to-connect-to-specific-usb-devices"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2278">Accorder l’accès à des sites spécifiques pour la connexion à des périphériques USB spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2278">Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2279">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2279">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2280">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2280">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2281">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2281">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2282">Vous permet de définir une liste d’URL qui spécifient les sites qui seront automatiquement autorisés à accéder à un appareil USB avec les ID de produit et de fournisseur spécifiés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2282">Allows you to set a list of urls that specify which sites will automatically be granted permission to access a USB device with the given vendor and product IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2283">Chaque élément de la liste doit contenir à la fois les appareils et les URL pour que la stratégie soit valide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2283">Each item in the list must contain both devices and urls in order for the policy to be valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2284">Chaque élément des appareils peut contenir un champ d’ID fournisseur et produit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2284">Each item in devices can contain a vendor ID and product ID field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2285">Tout ID omis est traité comme un caractère générique avec une exception et cette exception indique qu’un ID produit ne peut pas être spécifié sans qu’un ID fournisseur soit également spécifié.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2285">Any ID that is omitted is treated as a wildcard with one exception, and that exception is that a product ID cannot be specified without a vendor ID also being specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2286">Sinon, la stratégie n’est pas valide et est ignorée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2286">Otherwise, the policy will not be valid and will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2287">Le modèle d’autorisation USB utilise l’URL du site demandeur («URL de demande») et l’URL du site de niveau supérieur («URL d’incorporation») pour accorder l’autorisation à l’URL de demande d’accéder au périphérique USB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2287">The USB permission model uses the URL of the requesting site ("requesting URL") and the URL of the top-level frame site ("embedding URL") to grant permission to the requesting URL to access the USB device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2288">L’URL de demande peut être différente de l’URL d’incorporation si le site demandeur est chargé dans un iframe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2288">The requesting URL may be different than the embedding URL when the requesting site is loaded in an iframe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2289">Par conséquent, le champ «URL» peut contenir jusqu’à deux chaînes d’URL, séparées par une virgule, pour spécifier respectivement l’URL de demande et l’URL d’incorporation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2289">Therefore, the "urls" field can contain up to two URL strings delimited by a comma to specify the requesting and embedding URL respectively.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2290">Si une seule URL est spécifiée, l’accès aux périphériques USB correspondants est accordé lorsque l’URL du site demandeur correspond à cette URL, quel que soit le statut d’incorporation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2290">If only one URL is specified, then access to the corresponding USB devices will be granted when the requesting site's URL matches this URL regardless of embedding status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2291">Les URL dans «url» doivent être des URL valides, sinon la stratégie est ignorée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2291">The URLs in "urls" must be valid URLs, otherwise the policy will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2292">Si cette stratégie n’est pas définie, la valeur globale par défaut est utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting), si elle est définie, ou de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2292">If this policy is left not set, the global default value will be used for all sites either from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy if it is set, or the user's personal configuration otherwise.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2293">Les modèles d’URL de cette stratégie ne doivent pas entrer en conflit avec ceux configurés via [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2293">URL patterns in this policy should not clash with the ones configured via [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2294">En cas de conflit, cette stratégie prévaut sur les stratégies [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) et [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2294">If there is a clash, this policy will take precedence over [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) and [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2295">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2295">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2296">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2296">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2297">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2297">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2298">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2298">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2299">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2299">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2300">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2300">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2301">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2301">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2302">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2302">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2303">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2303">GP unique name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2304">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: accorder l’accès à des sites spécifiques pour la connexion à des périphériques USB spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2304">GP name: Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2305">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2305">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2306">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2306">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2307">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2307">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2308">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2308">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2309">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2309">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2310">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2310">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2311">Nom de la valeur: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2311">Value Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2312">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2312">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2313">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2313">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [
  {
    "devices": [
      {
        "product_id": 5678, 
        "vendor_id": 1234
      }
    ], 
    "urls": [
      "https://contoso.com", 
      "https://fabrikam.com"
    ]
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2314">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2314">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [{"devices": [{"product_id": 5678, "vendor_id": 1234}], "urls": ["https://contoso.com", "https://fabrikam.com"]}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2315">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2315">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2316">Nom clé de la préférence: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2316">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2317">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2317">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>devices</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>product_id</key>
        <integer>5678</integer>
        <key>vendor_id</key>
        <integer>1234</integer>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>urls</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://contoso.com</string>
      <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
    </array>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webusbaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2319">WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2319">WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-webusb-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2320">Autoriser WebUSB sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2320">Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2321">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2321">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2322">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2322">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2323">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2323">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2324">Définissez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui sont autorisés à demander à l’utilisateur l’accès à un périphérique USB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2324">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2325">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2325">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2326">Les modèles d’URL définis dans cette stratégie ne peuvent pas entrer en conflit avec ceux configurés dans la stratégie [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls): vous ne pouvez pas à la fois autoriser et bloquer une URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2326">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policy - you can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2327">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, veuillez consulter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2327">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2328">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2328">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2329">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2329">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2330">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2330">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2331">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2331">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2332">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2332">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2333">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2333">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2334">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2334">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2335">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2335">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2336">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2336">GP unique name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2337">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser WebUSB sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2337">GP name: Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2338">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2338">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2339">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2339">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2340">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2340">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2341">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2341">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2342">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2342">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2343">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2343">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2344">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2344">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2345">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2345">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2346">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2346">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2347">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2347">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2348">Nom clé de la préférence: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2348">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2349">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2349">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webusbblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2351">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2351">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-webusb-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2352">Bloquer WebUSB sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2352">Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2353">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2353">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2354">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2354">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2355">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2355">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2356">Définissez une liste des sites, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui ne sont pas autorisés à demander à l’utilisateur l’accès à un périphérique USB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2356">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2357">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2357">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2358">Les modèles d’URL dans cette stratégie ne peuvent pas être en conflit avec ceux configurés dans la stratégie [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2358">URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2359">Vous ne pouvez pas à la fois autoriser et bloquer une URL. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2359">You can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2360">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2360">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2361">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2361">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2362">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2362">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2363">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2363">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2364">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2364">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2365">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2365">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2366">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2366">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2367">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2367">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2368">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2368">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2369">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2369">GP unique name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2370">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer WebUSB sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2370">GP name: Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2371">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2371">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2372">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2372">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2373">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2373">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2374">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2374">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2375">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2375">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2376">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2376">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2377">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2377">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2378">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2378">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2379">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2379">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2380">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2380">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2381">Nom clé de la préférence: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2381">Preference Key Name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2382">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2382">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ## <a name="default-search-provider-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2384">Stratégies du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2384">Default search provider policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2385">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2385">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2386">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2386">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-default-search-provider"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2387">Activer le moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2387">Enable the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2388">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2388">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2389">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2389">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2390">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2390">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2391">Permet d’utiliser un moteur de recherche par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2391">Enables the ability to use a default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2392">Si vous activez cette stratégie, un utilisateur peut rechercher un terme en le tapant dans la barre d’adresses (tant que ce n’est pas une URL).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2392">If you enable this policy, a user can search for a term by typing in the address bar (as long as what they type isn't a URL).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2393">Vous pouvez définir le moteur de recherche par défaut à utiliser en activant le reste des stratégies de recherche par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2393">You can specify the default search provider to use by enabling the rest of the default search policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2394">Si celles-ci sont vides (non configurés) ou configurées de manière incorrecte, l’utilisateur peut choisir le moteur de recherche par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2394">If these are left empty (not configured) or configured incorrectly, the user can choose the default provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2395">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, l’utilisateur ne peut pas effectuer de recherche depuis la barre d’adresses.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2395">If you disable this policy, the user can't search from the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2396">Si vous activez ou désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent ni la modifier, ni la remplacer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2396">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2397">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le moteur de recherche par défaut est activé, et l’utilisateur peut le choisir et définir la liste des moteurs de recherche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2397">If you don't configure this policy, the default search provider is enabled, and the user can choose the default search provider and set the search provider list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2398">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2398">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX..</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2399">À partir de Microsoft Edge 84, vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie comme stratégie recommandée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2399">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2400">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2400">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2401">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2401">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2402">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2402">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2403">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2403">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2404">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2404">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2405">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2405">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2406">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2406">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2407">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2407">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2408">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2408">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2409">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer le moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2409">GP name: Enable the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2410">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2410">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2411">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Fournisseur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2411">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2412">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2412">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2413">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2413">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2414">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2414">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2415">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2415">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2416">Nom de la valeur: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2416">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2417">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2417">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2418">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2418">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2419">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2419">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2420">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2420">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2421">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2421">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2422">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2422">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderencodings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2423">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2423">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-encodings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2424">Encodages du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2424">Default search provider encodings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2425">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2425">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2426">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2426">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2427">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2427">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2428">Spécifiez les codages de caractères pris en charge par le moteur de recherche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2428">Specify the character encodings supported by the search provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2429">Les encodages sont des noms de page de codes comme UTF-8, GB2312 et ISO-8859-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2429">Encodings are code page names like UTF-8, GB2312, and ISO-8859-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2430">Elles sont testées dans l’ordre indiqué.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2430">They are tried in the order provided.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2431">Cette stratégie est facultative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2431">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2432">Si cette option n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut UTF-8 est utilisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2432">If not configured, the default, UTF-8, is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2433">Cette stratégie est appliquée uniquement si vous activez les stratégies [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) et [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2433">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2434">À partir de Microsoft Edge 84, vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie comme stratégie recommandée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2434">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2435">Si l’utilisateur a déjà défini un moteur de recherche par défaut, le moteur de recherche par défaut configuré par cette stratégie recommandée ne sera pas ajouté à la liste des fournisseurs de recherche parmi lesquels l’utilisateur peut faire son choix.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2435">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2436">S’il s’agit du comportement souhaité, utilisez la stratégie [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2436">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2437">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2437">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2438">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2438">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2439">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2439">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2440">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2440">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2441">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2441">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2442">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2442">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2443">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2443">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2444">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2444">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2445">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2445">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2446">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: encodages du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2446">GP name: Default search provider encodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2447">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2447">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2448">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Fournisseur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2448">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2449">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2449">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2450">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2450">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2451">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2451">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2452">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2452">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2453">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2453">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2454">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2454">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2455">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2455">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\1 = "UTF-8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\2 = "UTF-16"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\3 = "GB2312"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\4 = "ISO-8859-1"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2456">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2456">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2457">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2457">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2458">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2458">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>UTF-8</string>
  <string>UTF-16</string>
  <string>GB2312</string>
  <string>ISO-8859-1</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderimageurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2460">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2460">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-the-search-by-image-feature-for-the-default-search-provider"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2461">Définit la fonctionnalité de recherche par image pour le moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2461">Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2462">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2462">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2463">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2463">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2464">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2464">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2465">Indique l’URL du moteur de recherche utilisé pour la recherche d’images.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2465">Specifies the URL to the search engine used for image search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2466">Les requêtes de recherche sont envoyées à l’aide la méthode GET.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2466">Search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2467">Cette stratégie est facultative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2467">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2468">Si elle n’est pas configurée, la recherche d’images n’est pas disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2468">If you don't configure it, image search isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2469">Définissez l’URL de recherche d’images Bing comme suit: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2469">Specify Bing's Image Search URL as: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2470">Définissez l’URL de recherche d’images Google comme suit: '{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2470">Specify Google's Image Search URL as: '{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2471">Pour finaliser la configuration de la recherche d’images, consultez la stratégie [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2471">See [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) policy to finish configuring image search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2472">Cette stratégie est appliquée uniquement si vous activez les stratégies [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) et [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2472">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2473">À partir de Microsoft Edge 84, vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie comme stratégie recommandée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2473">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2474">Si l’utilisateur a déjà défini un moteur de recherche par défaut, le moteur de recherche par défaut configuré par cette stratégie recommandée ne sera pas ajouté à la liste des fournisseurs de recherche parmi lesquels l’utilisateur peut faire son choix.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2474">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2475">S’il s’agit du comportement souhaité, utilisez la stratégie [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2475">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2476">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2476">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2477">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2477">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2478">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2478">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2479">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2479">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2480">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2480">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2481">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2481">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2482">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2482">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2483">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2483">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2484">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2484">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2485">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définit la fonctionnalité de recherche par image pour le moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2485">GP name: Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2486">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2486">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2487">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Fournisseur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2487">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2488">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2488">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2489">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2489">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2490">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2490">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2491">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2491">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2492">Nom de la valeur: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2492">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2493">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2493">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2494">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2494">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2495">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2495">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2496">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2496">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2497">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2497">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload</string>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2499">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2499">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>

  #### <a name="parameters-for-an-image-url-that-uses-post"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2500">Paramètres pour une URL d’image utilisant la méthode POST</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2500">Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2501">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2501">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2502">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2502">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2503">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2503">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2504">Lorsqu’elle est activée, cette stratégie définit les paramètres utilisés lors de l’exécution d’une recherche d’images utilisant la méthode POST.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2504">If you enable this policy, it specifies the parameters used when an image search that uses POST is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2505">La stratégie est constituée de paires de noms et de valeurs, séparées par des virgules.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2505">The policy consists of comma-separated name/value pairs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2506">Si une valeur est un paramètre de modèle, comme par exemple {imageThumbnail}, elle est remplacée par des miniatures d’images réelles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2506">If a value is a template parameter, like {imageThumbnail} in the preceding example, it's replaced with real image thumbnail data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2507">Cette stratégie est appliquée uniquement si vous activez les stratégies [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) et [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2507">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2508">Définissez l’URL de recherche d’images Bing post param comme suit: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2508">Specify Bing's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2509">Définissez l’URL de recherche d’images Bing post param comme suit: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2509">Specify Google's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2510">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, les demandes de recherche d’images sont envoyées à l’aide de la méthode GET.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2510">If you don't set this policy, image search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2511">À partir de Microsoft Edge 84, vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie comme stratégie recommandée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2511">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2512">Si l’utilisateur a déjà défini un moteur de recherche par défaut, le moteur de recherche par défaut configuré par cette stratégie recommandée ne sera pas ajouté à la liste des fournisseurs de recherche parmi lesquels l’utilisateur peut faire son choix.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2512">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2513">S’il s’agit du comportement souhaité, utilisez la stratégie [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2513">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2514">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2514">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2515">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2515">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2516">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2516">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2517">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2517">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2518">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2518">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2519">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2519">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2520">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2520">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2521">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2521">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2522">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2522">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2523">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: paramètres pour une URL d’image utilisant la méthode POST</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2523">GP name: Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2524">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2524">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2525">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Fournisseur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2525">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2526">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2526">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2527">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2527">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2528">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2528">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2529">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2529">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2530">Nom de la valeur: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2530">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2531">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2531">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2532">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2532">Example value:</span></span>

```
"content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2533">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2533">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2534">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2534">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2535">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2535">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}</string>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderkeyword"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2537">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2537">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-keyword"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2538">Mot clé du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2538">Default search provider keyword</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2539">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2539">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2540">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2540">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2541">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2541">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2542">Indique le mot clé, qui est le raccourci utilisé dans la barre d’adresses, pour déclencher la recherche de ce moteur de recherche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2542">Specifies the keyword, which is the shortcut used in the Address Bar to trigger the search for this provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2543">Cette stratégie est facultative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2543">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2544">Si elle n’est pas configurée, aucun mot clé n’active le moteur de recherche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2544">If you don't configure it, no keyword activates the search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2545">Cette stratégie est appliquée uniquement si vous activez les stratégies [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) et [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2545">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2546">À partir de Microsoft Edge 84, vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie comme stratégie recommandée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2546">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2547">Si l’utilisateur a déjà défini un moteur de recherche par défaut, le moteur de recherche par défaut configuré par cette stratégie recommandée ne sera pas ajouté à la liste des fournisseurs de recherche parmi lesquels l’utilisateur peut faire son choix.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2547">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2548">S’il s’agit du comportement souhaité, utilisez la stratégie [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2548">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2549">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2549">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2550">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2550">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2551">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2551">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2552">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2552">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2553">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2553">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2554">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2554">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2555">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2555">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2556">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2556">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2557">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2557">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2558">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: mot clé du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2558">GP name: Default search provider keyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2559">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2559">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2560">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Fournisseur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2560">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2561">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2561">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2562">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2562">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2563">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2563">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2564">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2564">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2565">Nom de la valeur: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2565">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2566">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2566">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2567">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2567">Example value:</span></span>

```
"mis"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2568">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2568">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2569">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2569">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2570">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2570">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>mis</string>
```
