  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidername"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2572">DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2572">DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2573">Nom du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2573">Default search provider name</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2574">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2574">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2575">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2575">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2576">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2576">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2577">Spécifie le nom du moteur de recherche par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2577">Specifies the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2578">Si vous activez cette stratégie, vous devez spécifier le nom du moteur de recherche par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2578">If you enable this policy, you set the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2579">Si vous n’activez pas cette stratégie ou si vous la laissez vide, le nom d’hôte, spécifié par l’URL de recherche, est utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2579">If you don't enable this policy or if you leave it empty, the host name specified by the search URL is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2580">«DefaultSearchProviderName» doit être défini sur un moteur de recherche chiffré, approuvé par l’organisation, qui correspond au moteur de recherche chiffré défini dans DTBC-0008.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2580">'DefaultSearchProviderName' should be set to an organization-approved encrypted search provider that corresponds to the encrypted search provider set in DTBC-0008.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2581">Cette stratégie est appliquée uniquement si vous activez les stratégies [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) et [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2581">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2582">À partir de Microsoft Edge 84, vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie comme stratégie recommandée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2582">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2583">Si l’utilisateur a déjà défini un moteur de recherche par défaut, le moteur de recherche par défaut configuré par cette stratégie recommandée ne sera pas ajouté à la liste des fournisseurs de recherche parmi lesquels l’utilisateur peut faire son choix.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2583">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2584">S’il s’agit du comportement souhaité, utilisez la stratégie [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2584">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2585">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2585">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2586">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2586">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2587">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2587">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2588">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2588">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2589">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2589">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2590">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2590">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2591">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2591">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2592">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2592">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2593">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2593">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2594">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: nom du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2594">GP name: Default search provider name</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2595">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2595">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2596">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Fournisseur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2596">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2597">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2597">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2598">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2598">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2599">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2599">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2600">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2600">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2601">Nom de la valeur: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2601">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2602">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2602">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2603">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2603">Example value:</span></span>

```
"My Intranet Search"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2604">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2604">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2605">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2605">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2606">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2606">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>My Intranet Search</string>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidersearchurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2608">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2608">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-search-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2609">URL de recherche du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2609">Default search provider search URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2610">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2610">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2611">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2611">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2612">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2612">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2613">Indique l’URL du moteur de recherche utilisé pour la recherche par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2613">Specifies the URL of the search engine used for a default search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2614">L’URL contient la chaîne «{searchTerms}», qui est remplacée, au moment de la requête, par les termes recherchés par l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2614">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the terms the user is searching for.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2615">Définissez l’URL de recherche Bing comme suit:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2615">Specify Bing's search URL as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2616">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2616">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2617">Définissez l’URL de recherche Google comme suit: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2617">Specify Google's search URL as: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2618">Cette stratégie est requise lorsque vous activez la stratégie [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled). Si vous n’activez pas cette dernière, la stratégie est ignorée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2618">This policy is required when you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy; if you don't enable the latter policy, this policy is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2619">À partir de Microsoft Edge 84, vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie comme stratégie recommandée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2619">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2620">Si l’utilisateur a déjà défini un moteur de recherche par défaut, le moteur de recherche par défaut configuré par cette stratégie recommandée ne sera pas ajouté à la liste des fournisseurs de recherche parmi lesquels l’utilisateur peut faire son choix.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2620">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2621">S’il s’agit du comportement souhaité, utilisez la stratégie [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2621">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2622">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2622">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2623">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2623">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2624">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2624">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2625">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2625">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2626">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2626">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2627">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2627">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2628">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2628">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2629">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2629">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2630">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2630">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2631">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: URL de recherche du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2631">GP name: Default search provider search URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2632">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2632">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2633">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Fournisseur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2633">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2634">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2634">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2635">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2635">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2636">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2636">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2637">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2637">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2638">Nom de la valeur: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2638">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2639">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2639">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2640">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2640">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2641">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2641">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2642">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2642">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidersuggesturl"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2645">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2645">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-url-for-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2646">URL de suggestions de recherche du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2646">Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2647">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2647">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2648">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2648">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2649">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2649">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2650">Indique l’URL du moteur de recherche utilisé pour fournir des suggestions de recherche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2650">Specifies the URL for the search engine used to provide search suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2651">L’URL contient la chaîne «{searchTerms}», qui est remplacée, au moment de la requête, par les termes déjà saisis par l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2651">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the text the user has entered so far.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2652">Cette stratégie est facultative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2652">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2653">Si elle n’est pas configurée, les utilisateurs ne voient pas les suggestions de recherche mais les suggestions provenant de l’historique de navigation et des favoris apparaissent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2653">If you don't configure it, users won't see search suggestions; they will see suggestions from their browsing history and favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2654">L’URL de suggestion de Bing peut être définie comme suit:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2654">Bing's suggest URL can be specified as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2655">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2655">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2656">L’URL de suggestion de Google peut être définie comme suit: '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2656">Google's suggest URL can be specified as: '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2657">Cette stratégie est appliquée uniquement si vous activez les stratégies [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) et [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2657">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2658">À partir de Microsoft Edge 84, vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie comme stratégie recommandée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2658">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2659">Si l’utilisateur a déjà défini un moteur de recherche par défaut, le moteur de recherche par défaut configuré par cette stratégie recommandée ne sera pas ajouté à la liste des fournisseurs de recherche parmi lesquels l’utilisateur peut faire son choix.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2659">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2660">S’il s’agit du comportement souhaité, utilisez la stratégie [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2660">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2661">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2661">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2662">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2662">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2663">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2663">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2664">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2664">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2665">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2665">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2666">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2666">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2667">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2667">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2668">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2668">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2669">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2669">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2670">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: URL de suggestions de recherche du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2670">GP name: Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2671">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2671">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2672">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Fournisseur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2672">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2673">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2673">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2674">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2674">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2675">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2675">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2676">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2676">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2677">Nom de la valeur: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2677">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2678">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2678">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2679">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2679">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2680">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2680">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2681">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2681">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2682">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2682">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}</string>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpagesearchbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2684">NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2684">NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-new-tab-page-search-box-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2685">Configurer l’expérience de zone de recherche dans la nouvelle page d’onglets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2685">Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2686">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2686">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2687">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2687">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2688">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2688">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2689">Vous pouvez configurer la zone de recherche de la nouvelle page d’onglet pour utiliser «zone de recherche (recommandé)» ou «barre d’adresses» pour effectuer une recherche dans les nouveaux onglets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2689">You can configure the new tab page search box to use "Search box (Recommended)" or "Address bar" to search on new tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2690">Cette stratégie fonctionne uniquement si vous définissez le moteur de recherche sur une valeur autre que Bing en définissant les deux stratégies suivantes: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) et [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2690">This policy only works if you set the search engine to a value other than Bing by setting the following two policies: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2691">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégieet:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2691">If you disable or don't configure this policy and:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2692">Si le moteur de recherche par défaut de la barre d’adresse est Bing, la page nouvel onglet utilise la zone de recherche pour effectuer une recherche dans les nouveaux onglets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2692">If the address bar default search engine is Bing, the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2693">Si le moteur de recherche par défaut de la barre d’adresse n’est pas Bing, les utilisateurs sont invités à choisir une option supplémentaire (utilisez la «barre d’adresse») lors de la recherche sur de nouveaux onglets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2693">If the address bar default search engine is not Bing, users are offered an additional choice (use "Address bar") when searching on new tabs.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2694">Si vous activez cette stratégie et configurez-la comme suit:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2694">If you enable this policy and set it to:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2695">«Zone de recherche (recommandé)» («Bing»), la page nouvel onglet utilise la zone de recherche pour effectuer une recherche dans les nouveaux onglets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2695">"Search box (Recommended)" ('bing'), the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2696">«Barre d’adresses» («rediriger»), la zone de recherche de la nouvelle page de l’onglet utilise la barre d’adresses pour effectuer une recherche dans les nouveaux onglets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2696">"Address bar" ('redirect'), the new tab page search box uses the address bar to search on new tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2697">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2697">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2698">bing (bing) = Zone de recherche (Recommandé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2698">bing (bing) = Search box (Recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2699">redirect (redirect) = Barre d’adresse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2699">redirect (redirect) = Address bar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2700">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2700">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2701">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2701">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2702">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2702">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2703">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2703">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2704">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2704">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2705">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2705">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2706">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2706">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2707">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2707">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2708">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2708">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2709">Nom unique GP: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2709">GP unique name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2710">Nom de la stratégie de recherche: configurer l’expérience de zone de recherche nouvelle page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2710">GP name: Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2711">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2711">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2712">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Fournisseur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2712">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2713">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2713">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2714">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2714">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2715">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2715">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2716">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2716">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2717">Nom de la valeur: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2717">Value Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2718">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2718">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2719">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2719">Example value:</span></span>

```
"bing"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2720">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2720">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2721">Nom de la clé de préférence: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2721">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2722">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2722">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>bing</string>
```

  ## <a name="extensions-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2724">Stratégies des extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2724">Extensions policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2725">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2725">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="blockexternalextensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2726">BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2726">BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>

  #### <a name="blocks-external-extensions-from-being-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2727">Empêche l’installation d’extensions externes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2727">Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2728">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2728">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2729">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 88 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2729">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2730">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2730">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2731">Contrôler l’installation d’extensions externes;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2731">Control the installation of external extensions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2732">Si vous activez ce paramètre, les extensions externes ne peuvent pas être installées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2732">If you enable this setting, external extensions are blocked from being installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2733">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre ou si vous ne l’avez pas désactivé, les extensions externes sont autorisées à être installées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2733">If you disable this setting or leave it unset, external extensions are allowed to be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2734">Les extensions externes et leur installation sont documentées sur https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2734">External extensions and their installation are documented at https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2735">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2735">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2736">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2736">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2737">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2737">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2738">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2738">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2739">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2739">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2740">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2740">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2741">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2741">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2742">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2742">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2743">Nom unique de la stratégie de BlockExternalExtensions:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2743">GP unique name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2744">Nom de la stratégie de protection: empêche l’installation d’extensions externes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2744">GP name: Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2745">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2745">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2746">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2746">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2747">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2747">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2748">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2748">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2749">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2749">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2750">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2750">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2751">Nom de la valeur: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2751">Value Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2752">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2752">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2753">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2753">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2754">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2754">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2755">Nom de la clé de préférence: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2755">Preference Key Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2756">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2756">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="extensionallowedtypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2758">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2758">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-allowed-extension-types"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2759">Configurer les types d’extension autorisés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2759">Configure allowed extension types</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2760">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2760">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2761">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2761">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2762">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2762">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2763">La définition de la stratégie détermine les applications et les extensions que vous pouvez installer dans Microsoft Edge, les hôtes avec lesquels elles peuvent interagir et limite l’accès pendant l’exécution.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2763">Setting the policy controls which apps and extensions may be installed in Microsoft Edge, which hosts they can interact with, and limits runtime access.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2764">Si vous ne définissez pas cette stratégie, aucune restriction ne s’appliquera concernant les types d’extension et d’application acceptables.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2764">If you don't set this policy, there aren't any restrictions on acceptable extension and app types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2765">Le programme n’installera pas les extensions et applications ayant un type qui ne figure pas dans la liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2765">Extensions and apps which have a type that's not on the list won't be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2766">Chaque valeur doit être l’une des chaînes suivantes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2766">Each value should be one of these strings:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2767">"extension"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2767">"extension"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2768">"theme"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2768">"theme"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2769">"user_script"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2769">"user_script"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2770">"hosted_app"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2770">"hosted_app"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2771">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur ces types, veuillez consulter la documentation sur les extensions Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2771">See the Microsoft Edge extensions documentation for more information about these types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2772">Remarque: cette stratégie concerne également les extensions et applications à installer de manière forcée à l’aide de [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2772">Note: This policy also affects extensions and apps to be force-installed using [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2773">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2773">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2774">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2774">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2775">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2775">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2776">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2776">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2777">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2777">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2778">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2778">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2779">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2779">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2780">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2780">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2781">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2781">GP unique name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2782">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer les types d’extension autorisés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2782">GP name: Configure allowed extension types</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2783">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2783">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2784">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2784">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2785">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2785">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2786">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2786">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2787">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2787">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2788">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2788">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2789">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2789">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2790">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2790">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2791">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2791">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes\1 = "hosted_app"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2792">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2792">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2793">Nom clé de la préférence: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2793">Preference Key Name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2794">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2794">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>hosted_app</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="extensioninstallallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2796">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2796">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-specific-extensions-to-be-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2797">Autoriser l’installation d’extensions spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2797">Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2798">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2798">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2799">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2799">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2800">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2800">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2801">La définition de cette stratégie spécifie les extensions qui ne sont pas soumises au blocage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2801">Setting this policy specifies which extensions are not subject to the blocklist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2802">Une valeur de liste de blocage de \* signifie que toutes les extensions sont bloquées et que les utilisateurs ne peuvent installer que les extensions indiquées dans la liste verte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2802">A blocklist value of \* means all extensions are blocked and users can only install extensions listed in the allow list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2803">Par défaut, toutes les extensions sont autorisées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2803">By default, all extensions are allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2804">Toutefois, si vous avez interdit les extensions par stratégie, vous pouvez utiliser la liste des extensions autorisées pour modifier cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2804">However, if you prohibited extensions by policy, you can use the list of allowed extensions to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2805">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2805">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2806">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2806">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2807">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2807">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2808">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2808">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2809">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2809">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2810">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2810">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2811">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2811">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2812">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2812">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2813">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2813">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2814">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’installation d’extensions spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2814">GP name: Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2815">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2815">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2816">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2816">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2817">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2817">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2818">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2818">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2819">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2819">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2820">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2820">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2821">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2821">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2822">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2822">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2823">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2823">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2824">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2824">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2825">Nom clé de la préférence: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2825">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2826">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2826">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="extensioninstallblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2828">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2828">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-extensions-cannot-be-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2829">Déterminer les extensions ne pouvant pas être installées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2829">Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2830">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2830">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2831">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2831">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2832">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2832">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2833">Vous permet de spécifier les extensions qui ne peuvent pas être installées par les utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2833">Lets you specify which extensions the users CANNOT install.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2834">Les extensions déjà installées seront désactivées en cas de blocage, sans permettre à l’utilisateur de les activer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2834">Extensions already installed will be disabled if blocked, without a way for the user to enable them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2835">Après la suppression d’une extension désactivée de la liste de blocage, celle-ci est automatiquement réactivée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2835">After a disabled extension is removed from the blocklist it will automatically get re-enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2836">La valeur «\*» de la liste de blocage signifie que toutes les extensions sont bloquées, sauf si elles sont explicitement répertoriées dans la liste verte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2836">A blocklist value of '\*' means all extensions are blocked unless they are explicitly listed in the allowlist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2837">Si cette stratégie n’est pas définie, l’utilisateur peut installer n’importe quelle extension dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2837">If this policy isn't set, the user can install any extension in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2838">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2838">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2839">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2839">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2840">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2840">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2841">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2841">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2842">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2842">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2843">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2843">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2844">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2844">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2845">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2845">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2846">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2846">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2847">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: déterminer les extensions ne pouvant pas être installées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2847">GP name: Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2848">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2848">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2849">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2849">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2850">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2850">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2851">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2851">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2852">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2852">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2853">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2853">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2854">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2854">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2855">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2855">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2856">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2856">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2857">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2857">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2858">Nom clé de la préférence: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2858">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2859">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2859">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
