  ### <a name="extensioninstallforcelist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2861">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2861">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-extensions-are-installed-silently"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2862">Contrôler l’installation silencieuse de certaines extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2862">Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2863">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2863">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2864">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2864">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2865">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2865">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2866">Définissez cette stratégie pour spécifier une liste d’applications et d’extensions à installer en mode silencieux, sans interaction de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2866">Set this policy to specify a list of apps and extensions that install silently, without user interaction.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2867">Les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas désinstaller ou désactiver ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2867">Users can't uninstall or turn off this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2868">Les autorisations sont implicites, y compris pour les API d’extension enterprise.deviceAttributes et enterprise.platformKeys.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2868">Permissions are granted implicitly, including the enterprise.deviceAttributes and enterprise.platformKeys extension APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2869">Remarque: ces 2 API ne sont pas disponibles pour les applications et les extensions non installées de manière forcée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2869">Note: These 2 APIs aren't available to apps and extensions that aren't force-installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2870">Si vous ne définissez pas cette stratégie, aucune application ou extension ne s’installe automatiquement, et les utilisateurs peuvent désinstaller n’importe quelle application dans Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2870">If you don't set this policy, no apps or extensions are autoinstalled and users can uninstall any app in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2871">Cette stratégie remplace la stratégie [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2871">This policy supercedes [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2872">Si vous supprimez de cette liste une extension ou une application déjà installée de manière forcée, Microsoft Edge la désinstalle automatiquement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2872">If a previously force-installed app or extension is removed from this list, Microsoft Edge automatically uninstalls it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2873">Sur les instances Microsoft Windows, les applications et les extensions externes au site web des composants additionnels Microsoft Edge peuvent faire l’objet d’une installation forcée uniquement si l’instance fait partie d’un domaine Microsoft Active Directory et exécute Windows 10 Professionnel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2873">On Microsoft Windows instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be forced installed if the instance is joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, and running Windows 10 Pro.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2874">Sur les instances macOS, les applications et les extensions externes au site web des composants additionnels Microsoft Edge ne peuvent faire l’objet d’une installation forcée uniquement si l’instance est gérée via la gestion des périphériques mobiles, ou si elle est associée à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2874">On macOS instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be force installed if the instance is managed via MDM, or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2875">Des utilisateurs équipés d’outils de développement peuvent modifier le code source de n’importe quelle extension. Cela risque éventuellement de rendre l’extension inopérante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2875">The source code of any extension can be altered by users with developer tools, potentially rendering the extension unfunctional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2876">Si ce point est un problème, configurez la stratégie DeveloperToolsDisabled.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2876">If this is a concern, configure the DeveloperToolsDisabled policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2877">Chaque élément de liste de la stratégie est une chaîne contenant un ID d’extension et, éventuellement, une URL de «mise à jour» séparée par un point-virgule (;).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2877">Each list item of the policy is a string that contains an extension ID and, optionally, an "update" URL separated by a semicolon (;).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2878">L’ID d’extension correspond à la chaîne de 32 caractères détectée, par exemple, sur edge://extensions en mode développeur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2878">The extension ID is the 32-letter string found, for example, on edge://extensions when in Developer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2879">Si vous avez spécifié ce paramètre, l’URL «update» doit pointer vers un document XML Update Manifest ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2879">If specified, the "update" URL should point to an Update Manifest XML document ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2880">Par défaut, le programme utilise l’URL de mise à jour du site web des composants additionnels Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2880">By default, the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website's update URL is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2881">L’URL «update» spécifiée dans cette stratégie ne sert que pour l’installation initiale. Les mises à jour ultérieures de l’extension utilisent l’URL indiquée dans le fichier manifeste de l’extension.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2881">The "update" URL set in this policy is only used for the initial installation; subsequent updates of the extension use the update URL in the extension's manifest.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2882">Remarque: cette stratégie ne s’applique pas au mode InPrivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2882">Note: This policy doesn't apply to InPrivate mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2883">En savoir plus sur les extensions d’hébergement ( https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating) .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2883">Read about hosting extensions (https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2884">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2884">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2885">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2885">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2886">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2886">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2887">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2887">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2888">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2888">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2889">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2889">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2890">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2890">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2891">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2891">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2892">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2892">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2893">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: contrôler l’installation silencieuse de certaines extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2893">GP name: Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2894">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2894">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2895">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2895">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2896">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2896">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2897">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2897">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2898">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2898">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2899">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2899">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2900">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2900">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2901">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2901">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2902">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2902">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\1 = "gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\2 = "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2903">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2903">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2904">Nom clé de la préférence: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2904">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2905">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2905">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx</string>
  <string>abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2906">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2906">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensioninstallsources"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2907">ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2907">ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-and-user-script-install-sources"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2908">Configurer les sources d’installation des extensions et des scripts d’utilisateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2908">Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2909">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2909">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2910">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2910">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2911">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2911">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2912">Définissez les URL qui peuvent installer des extensions et des thèmes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2912">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2913">Définissez les URL qui peuvent installer les extensions et les thèmes directement sans avoir à faire glisser les packages vers la page edge://extensions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2913">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes directly without having to drag and drop the packages to the edge://extensions page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2914">Chaque élément de cette liste est un modèle correspondant au type extension (consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2914">Each item in this list is an extension-style match pattern (see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2915">Les utilisateurs peuvent facilement installer des éléments à partir de n’importe quelle URL qui correspond à un élément de cette liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2915">Users can easily install items from any URL that matches an item in this list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2916">L’emplacement du fichier \*.crx et de la page à partir de laquelle le téléchargement est effectué (en d’autres termes, le référent) doit être autorisé par ces modèles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2916">Both the location of the \*.crx file and the page where the download is started from (in other words, the referrer) must be allowed by these patterns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2917">N’hébergez pas les fichiers à un emplacement nécessitant une authentification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2917">Do not host the files at a location that requires authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2918">La stratégie [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) prévaut sur cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2918">The [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy takes precedence over this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2919">Les extensions figurant dans la liste rouge ne sont pas installées, même si elles proviennent d’un site figurant sur cette liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2919">Any extensions that's on the block list won't be installed, even if it comes from a site on this list.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2920">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2920">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2921">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2921">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2922">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2922">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2923">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2923">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2924">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2924">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2925">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2925">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2926">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2926">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2927">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2927">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2928">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2928">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2929">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer les sources d’installation des extensions et des scripts d’utilisateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2929">GP name: Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2930">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2930">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2931">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2931">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2932">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2932">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2933">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2933">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2934">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2934">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2935">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2935">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2936">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2936">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2937">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2937">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2938">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2938">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources\1 = "https://corp.contoso.com/*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2939">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2939">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2940">Nom clé de la préférence: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2940">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2941">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2941">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://corp.contoso.com/*</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="extensionsettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2943">ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2943">ExtensionSettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-management-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2944">Configurer les paramètres de gestion des extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2944">Configure extension management settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2945">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2945">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2946">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2946">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2947">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2947">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2948">La définition de cette stratégie contrôle les paramètres de gestion des extensions pour Microsoft Edge, y compris tout contrôle par les stratégies associées aux extensions existantes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2948">Setting this policy controls extension management settings for Microsoft Edge, including any controlled by existing extension-related policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2949">Cette stratégie remplace les stratégies héritées éventuellement définies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2949">This policy supersedes any legacy policies that might be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2950">Cette stratégie mappe un ID d’extension ou une URL de mise à jour à son paramètre spécifique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2950">This policy maps an extension ID or an update URL to its specific setting only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2951">Une configuration par défaut peut être définie pour l’ID spécial «\*», qui s’applique à toutes les extensions sans configuration personnalisée de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2951">A default configuration can be set for the special ID "\*", which applies to all extensions without a custom configuration in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2952">Avec une URL de mise à jour, la configuration s’applique aux extensions dont l’URL de mise à jour est exacte, indiquée dans le manifeste de l’extension ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2952">With an update URL, configuration applies to extensions with the exact update URL stated in the extension manifest ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2953">Pour bloquer les extensions d’un magasin tiers particulier, vous devez uniquement bloquer les update_url pour ce magasin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2953">To block extensions from a particular third party store, you only need to block the update_url for that store.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2954">Par exemple, si vous souhaitez bloquer les extensions du Chrome Web Store, vous pouvez utiliser le JSON suivant.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2954">For example, if you want to block extensions from Chrome Web Store, you can use the following JSON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2955">{"update_url: https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx «:{"installation_mode»:"blocked"}}</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2955">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2956">Notez que vous pouvez toujours utiliser [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) et [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) pour autoriser/forcer l’installation d’extensions spécifiques, même si le magasin est bloqué à l’aide du JSON dans l’exemple précédent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2956">Note that you can still use [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) and [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) to allow / force install specific extensions even if the store is blocked using the JSON in the previous example.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2957">Remarque: pour les instances Windows qui ne sont pas jointes à un domaine Microsoft Active Directory, l’installation forcée est limitée aux applications et aux extensions figurant sur le site web des modules complémentaires Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2957">Note: For Windows instances not joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, forced installation is limited to apps and extensions listed in the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2958">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2958">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2959">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2959">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2960">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2960">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2961">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2961">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2962">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2962">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2963">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2963">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2964">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2964">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2965">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2965">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2966">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2966">GP unique name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2967">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer les paramètres de gestion des extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2967">GP name: Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2968">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2968">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2969">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2969">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2970">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2970">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2971">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2971">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2972">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2972">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2973">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2973">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2974">Nom de la valeur: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2974">Value Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2975">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2975">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2976">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2976">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {
  "*": {
    "allowed_types": [
      "hosted_app"
    ], 
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "downloads", 
      "bookmarks"
    ], 
    "install_sources": [
      "https://company-intranet/apps"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "blocked", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ]
  }, 
  "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "history"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed", 
    "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"
  }, 
  "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "force_installed", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"
  }, 
  "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", 
    "installation_mode": "removed"
  }, 
  "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "wallpaper"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed"
  }
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2977">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2977">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {"*": {"allowed_types": ["hosted_app"], "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "blocked_permissions": ["downloads", "bookmarks"], "install_sources": ["https://company-intranet/apps"], "installation_mode": "blocked", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"]}, "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {"blocked_permissions": ["history"], "installation_mode": "allowed", "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"}, "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "installation_mode": "force_installed", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"], "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"}, "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", "installation_mode": "removed"}, "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "blocked_permissions": ["wallpaper"], "installation_mode": "allowed"}}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2978">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2978">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2979">Nom clé de la préférence: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2979">Preference Key Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>

  ### <a name="allowcrossoriginauthprompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2984">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2984">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-cross-origin-http-authentication-prompts"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2985">Autoriser les invites d’authentification HTTP à origines multiples</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2985">Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2986">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2986">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2987">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2987">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2988">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2988">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2989">Détermine si les images tierces d’une page peuvent afficher une invite d’authentification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2989">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2990">Cette option est habituellement désactivée dans le cadre de la protection contre l’hameçonnage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2990">Typically, this is disabled as a phishing defense.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2991">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, elle est désactivée et les images tierces ne peuvent pas afficher d’invite d’authentification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2991">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party images can't show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2992">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2992">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2993">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2993">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2994">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2994">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2995">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2995">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2996">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2996">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2997">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2997">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2998">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2998">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-2999">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-2999">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3000">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3000">GP unique name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3001">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autorise les invites d’authentification HTTP à origines multiples</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3001">GP name: Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3002">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3002">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3003">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3003">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3004">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3004">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3005">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3005">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3006">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3006">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3007">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3007">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3008">Nom de la valeur: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3008">Value Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3009">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3009">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3010">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3010">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3011">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3011">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3012">Nom clé de la préférence: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3012">Preference Key Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3013">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3013">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="authnegotiatedelegateallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3015">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3015">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-a-list-of-servers-that-microsoft-edge-can-delegate-user-credentials-to"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3016">Définit une liste des serveurs auxquels MicrosoftEdge peut déléguer les informations d’identification de l’utilisateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3016">Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3017">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3017">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3018">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3018">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3019">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3019">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3020">Définit une liste des serveurs auxquels MicrosoftEdge peut déléguer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3020">Configure the list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3021">Séparez les noms des serveurs par des virgules.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3021">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3022">Les caractères génériques (\*) sont autorisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3022">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3023">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, MicrosoftEdge ne délègue pas les informations d’identification d’utilisateur, même si un serveur est détecté comme intranet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3023">If you don't configure this policy Microsoft Edge won't delegate user credentials even if a server is detected as Intranet.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3024">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3024">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3025">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3025">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3026">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3026">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3027">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3027">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3028">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3028">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3029">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3029">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3030">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3030">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3031">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3031">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3032">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3032">GP unique name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3033">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définit une liste des serveurs auxquels MicrosoftEdge peut déléguer les informations d’identification de l’utilisateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3033">GP name: Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3034">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3034">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3035">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3035">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3036">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3036">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3037">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3037">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3038">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3038">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3039">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3039">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3040">Nom de la valeur: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3040">Value Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3041">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3041">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3042">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3042">Example value:</span></span>

```
"contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3043">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3043">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3044">Nom clé de la préférence: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3044">Preference Key Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3045">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3045">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>contoso.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="authschemes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3047">AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3047">AuthSchemes</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3049">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3049">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3050">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3050">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3051">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3051">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3052">Indique les schémas d’authentification HTTP qui sont pris en charge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3052">Specifies which HTTP authentication schemes are supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3053">Vous pouvez configurer la stratégie à l’aide des valeurs suivantes: «basic», «digest», «ntlm» et «negotiate».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3053">You can configure the policy by using these values: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', and 'negotiate'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3054">Séparez les valeurs par des virgules.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3054">Separate multiple values with commas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3055">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, les quatre schémas sont utilisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3055">If you don't configure this policy, all four schemes are used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3056">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3056">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3057">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3057">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3058">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3058">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3059">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3059">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3061">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3061">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3062">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3062">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3063">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3063">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3064">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3064">GP unique name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3065">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: méthodes d’authentification prises en charge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3065">GP name: Supported authentication schemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3066">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3066">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3067">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3067">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3068">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3068">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3069">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3069">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3070">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3070">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3071">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3071">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3072">Nom de la valeur: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3072">Value Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3073">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3073">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3074">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3074">Example value:</span></span>

```
"basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate"
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3076">Nom clé de la préférence: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3076">Preference Key Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>

  ### <a name="authserverallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3079">AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3079">AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-list-of-allowed-authentication-servers"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3080">Configurer la liste des serveurs d’authentification autorisés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3080">Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3081">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3081">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3082">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3082">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3083">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3083">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3084">Spécifie les serveurs à activer pour l’authentification intégrée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3084">Specifies which servers to enable for integrated authentication.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3085">L’authentification intégrée n’est activée que lorsque MicrosoftEdge reçoit une demande d’authentification à partir d’un proxy ou d’un serveur de cette liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3085">Integrated authentication is only enabled when Microsoft Edge receives an authentication challenge from a proxy or from a server in this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3086">Séparez les noms des serveurs par des virgules.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3086">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3087">Les caractères génériques (\*) sont autorisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3087">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3088">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge essaie de détecter si un serveur se trouve sur l’intranet. Ce n’est qu’à ce moment-là qu’il répond aux requêtes IWA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3088">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to detect if a server is on the intranet - only then will it respond to IWA requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3089">Si le serveur se trouve sur Internet, les requêtes IWA émanant de celui-ci sont ignorées par MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3089">If the server is on the internet, IWA requests from it are ignored by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3090">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3090">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3091">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3091">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3092">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3092">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3093">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3093">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3094">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3094">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3095">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3095">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3096">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3096">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3097">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3097">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3098">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3098">GP unique name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3099">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la liste des serveurs d’authentification autorisés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3099">GP name: Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3100">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3100">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3101">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3101">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3102">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3102">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3103">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3103">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3104">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3104">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3105">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3105">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3106">Nom de la valeur: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3106">Value Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3107">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3107">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3108">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3108">Example value:</span></span>

```
"*contoso.com,contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3109">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3109">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3110">Nom clé de la préférence: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3110">Preference Key Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3111">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3111">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>*contoso.com,contoso.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="basicauthoverhttpenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3113">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3113">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-basic-authentication-for-http"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3114">Autoriser l’authentification de base pour HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3114">Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3115">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3115">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3116">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 88 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3116">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3117">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3117">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3118">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous la laissez non définie, les défis d’authentification de base reçus sur HTTP non sécurisé seront autorisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3118">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, Basic authentication challenges received over non-secure HTTP will be allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3119">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les demandes HTTP non sécurisées provenant du schéma d’authentification de base sont bloquées et seule la sécurité HTTPS est autorisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3119">If you disable this policy,  non-secure HTTP requests from the Basic authentication scheme are blocked, and only secure HTTPS is allowed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3120">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3120">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3121">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3121">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3122">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3122">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3123">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3123">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3124">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3124">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3125">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3125">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3126">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3126">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3127">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3127">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3128">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe : BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3128">GP unique name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3129">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : autoriser l’authentification de base pour HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3129">GP name: Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3130">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): modèles administratifs/Microsoft Edge/authentification HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3130">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3131">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3131">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3132">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3132">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3133">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3133">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3134">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3134">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3135">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3135">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3136">Nom de la valeur : BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3136">Value Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3137">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3137">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3138">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3138">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3139">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3139">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3140">Nom de clé de la préférence : BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3140">Preference Key Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3141">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3141">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="disableauthnegotiatecnamelookup"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3143">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3143">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-cname-lookup-when-negotiating-kerberos-authentication"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3144">Désactiver la consultation CNAME lors de la négociation de l’authentification Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3144">Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3145">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3145">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3146">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3146">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3147">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3147">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3148">Indique si le SPN Kerberos généré est basé sur le nom DNS canonique (CNAME) ou sur le nom d’origine saisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3148">Determines whether the generated Kerberos SPN is based on the canonical DNS name (CNAME) or on the original name entered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3149">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la consultation CNAME sera ignorée et le nom du serveur sera utilisé tel qu’il a été saisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3149">If you enable this policy, CNAME lookup is skipped and the server name (as entered) is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3150">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si elle n’est pas définie, le nom canonique du serveur est utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3150">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, the canonical name of the server is used.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3151">Celui-ci est déterminé par la consultation CNAME.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3151">This is determined through CNAME lookup.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3152">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3152">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3153">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3153">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3154">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3154">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3155">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3155">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3156">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3156">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3157">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3157">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3158">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3158">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3159">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3159">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3160">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3160">GP unique name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3161">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: désactiver la consultation CNAME lors de la négociation de l’authentification Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3161">GP name: Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3162">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3162">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3163">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3163">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3164">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3164">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3166">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3166">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>

  ### <a name="enableauthnegotiateport"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3175">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3175">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>

  #### <a name="include-non-standard-port-in-kerberos-spn"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3176">Inclure un port non standard dans le SPN Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3176">Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3177">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3177">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3178">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3178">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3179">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3179">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3180">Indique si le SPN Kerberos généré doit inclure un port non standard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3180">Specifies whether the generated Kerberos SPN should include a non-standard port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3181">Si vous activez cette stratégie et qu’un utilisateur inclut un port non standard (c’est-à-dire, un port autre que 80 ou 443) dans une URL, ce port est inclus dans le SPN Kerberos généré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3181">If you enable this policy, and a user includes a non-standard port (a port other than 80 or 443) in a URL, that port is included in the generated Kerberos SPN.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3182">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, le SPN Kerberos généré ne comprend aucun port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3182">If you don't configure or disable this policy, the generated Kerberos SPN won't include a port in any case.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3183">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3183">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3184">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3184">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3185">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3185">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3186">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3186">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3187">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3187">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3188">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3188">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3189">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3189">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3190">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3190">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3191">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3191">GP unique name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3192">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: inclure un port non standard dans le SPN Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3192">GP name: Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3193">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3193">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3194">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3194">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3195">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3195">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3196">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3196">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3197">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3197">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3198">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3198">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3199">Nom de la valeur: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3199">Value Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3200">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3200">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3201">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3201">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3202">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3202">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3203">Nom clé de la préférence: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3203">Preference Key Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3204">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3204">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
