  ### <a name="ntlmv2enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3206">NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3206">NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-whether-ntlmv2-authentication-is-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3207">Contrôler l’activation de l’authentification NTLMv2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3207">Control whether NTLMv2 authentication is enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3208">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3208">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3209">sur macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3209">On macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3210">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3210">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3211">Contrôle si l’authentification NTLMv2 est activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3211">Controls whether NTLMv2 is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3212">Toutes les versions récentes des serveurs Samba et Windows prennent en charge l’authentification NTLMv2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3212">All recent versions of Samba and Windows servers support NTLMv2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3213">Vous devez désactiver l’authentification NTLMv2 uniquement pour résoudre les problèmes de rétrocompatibilité, car cela réduit la sécurité de l’authentification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3213">You should only disable NTLMv2 to address issues with backwards compatibility as it reduces the security of authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3214">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, l’authentification NTLMv2 est activé par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3214">If you don't configure this policy, NTLMv2 is enabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3215">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3215">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3216">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3216">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3217">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3217">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3218">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3218">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3219">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3219">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3220">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3220">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3221">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3221">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3222">Nom clé de la préférence: NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3222">Preference Key Name: NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3223">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3223">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  #### <a name="windows-hello-for-http-auth-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3226">Windows Hello pour HTTP Auth activé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3226">Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3227">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3227">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3228">Sur Windows depuis la version 90 ou ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3228">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3229">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3229">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3230">Indique si l’interface utilisateur des informations d’identification Windows doit être utilisée pour répondre aux problèmes d’authentification NTLM et Négocier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3230">Indicates if Windows Credential UI should be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate authentication challenges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3231">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, une invite de nom d’utilisateur et de mot de passe de base sera utilisée pour répondre aux défis NTLM et Négocier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3231">If you disable this policy, a basic username and password prompt will be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate challenges.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3232">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, l’interface utilisateur des informations d’identification Windows est utilisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3232">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Windows Credential UI will be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3233">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3233">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3234">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3234">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3235">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3235">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3236">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3236">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3237">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3237">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3238">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3238">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3239">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3239">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3240">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3240">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3241">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe : WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3241">GP unique name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3242">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : Windows Hello pour HTTP Auth activé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3242">GP name: Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3243">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): modèles administratifs/Microsoft Edge/authentification HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3243">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3244">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé) : Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Paramètres par défaut (remplacement possible par les utilisateurs)/Authentification HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3244">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3245">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3245">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3247">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3247">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3248">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3248">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3249">Nom de la valeur : WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3249">Value Name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3250">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3250">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>


  ### <a name="kioskaddressbareditingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3255">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3255">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-address-bar-editing-for-kiosk-mode-public-browsing-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3256">Configurer la modification de la barre d’adresse pour l’expérience de navigation publique en mode plein écran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3256">Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3257">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3257">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3258">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3258">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3259">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3259">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3260">Cette stratégie s’applique uniquement au mode plein écran MicrosoftEdge lors de l’utilisation de l’expérience de navigation publique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3260">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode while using the public browsing experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3261">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent modifier l’URL dans la barre d’adresses.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3261">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can change the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3262">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, cela empêche les utilisateurs de modifier l’URL dans la barre d’adresses.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3262">If you disable this policy, it prevents users from changing the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3263">Pour obtenir plus d’informations sur la configuration du mode plein écran, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3263">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3264">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3264">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3265">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3265">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3266">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3266">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3267">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3267">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3268">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3268">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3269">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3269">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3270">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3270">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3271">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3271">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3272">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3272">GP unique name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3273">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la modification de la barre d’adresse pour l’expérience de navigation publique en mode plein écran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3273">GP name: Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3274">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): paramètres Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3274">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3275">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3275">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3276">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3276">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3277">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3277">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3278">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3278">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3279">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3279">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3280">Nom de la valeur: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3280">Value Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3281">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3281">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3282">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3282">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3283">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3283">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3284">Nom de la clé de préférence: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3284">Preference Key Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3285">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3285">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="kioskdeletedownloadsonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3287">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3287">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="delete-files-downloaded-as-part-of-kiosk-session-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3288">Supprimer les fichiers téléchargés dans le cadre d’une session plein écran lorsque MicrosoftEdge se ferme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3288">Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3289">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3289">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3290">Sur Windows depuis la version87 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3290">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3291">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3291">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3292">Cette stratégie s’applique à MicrosoftEdge en mode plein écran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3292">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3293">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les fichiers téléchargés dans le cadre d’une session plein écran sont supprimés lors de chaque fermeture de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3293">If you enable this policy, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3294">Si vous la désactivez ou si vous ne la configurez pas, les fichiers téléchargés dans le cadre d’une session plein écran ne sont pas supprimés lors de la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3294">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are not deleted when Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3295">Pour obtenir plus d’informations sur la configuration du mode plein écran, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3295">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3296">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3296">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3297">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3297">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3298">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3298">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3299">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3299">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3300">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3300">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3301">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3301">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3302">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3302">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3303">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3303">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3304">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3304">GP unique name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3305">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: supprimer les fichiers téléchargés dans le cadre d’une session plein écran lorsque MicrosoftEdge se ferme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3305">GP name: Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3306">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): paramètres Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3306">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3307">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3307">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3308">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3308">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3309">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3309">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3310">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3310">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3311">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3311">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3312">Nom de la valeur: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3312">Value Name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3313">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3313">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3314">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3314">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ## <a name="manageability-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3316">Stratégies de gestion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3316">Manageability policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3317">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3317">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="mamenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3318">MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3318">MAMEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="mobile-app-management-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3319">Gestion des applications mobiles activée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3319">Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3320">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3320">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3321">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 89 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3321">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3322">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3322">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3323">Permet au navigateur Microsoft Edge de récupérer des stratégies à partir des services de gestion des applications Intune et de les appliquer aux profils des utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3323">Allows the Microsoft Edge browser to retrieve policies from the Intune application management services and apply them to users' profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3324">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, les stratégies de gestion des applications mobiles (MAM) peuvent être appliquées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3324">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Mobile App Management (MAM) Policies can be applied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3325">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge ne communiquera pas avec Intune pour demander des stratégies MAM.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3325">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not communicate with Intune to request MAM Policies.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3326">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3326">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3327">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3327">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3328">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3328">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3329">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3329">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3330">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3330">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3331">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3331">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3332">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3332">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3333">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3333">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3334">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3334">GP unique name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3335">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: Gestion des applications mobiles activée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3335">GP name: Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3336">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (obligatoire) : Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Manageability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3336">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Manageability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3337">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3337">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3338">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3338">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3339">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3339">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3340">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3340">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3341">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3341">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3342">Nom de la valeur : MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3342">Value Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3343">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3343">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3344">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3344">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3345">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3345">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3346">Nom de la clé de préférence : MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3346">Preference Key Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3347">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3347">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ## <a name="native-messaging-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3349">Stratégies de messagerie native</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3349">Native Messaging policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3350">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3350">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="nativemessagingallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3351">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3351">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-native-messaging-hosts-users-can-use"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3352">Contrôler les hôtes de messagerie native que les utilisateurs peuvent utiliser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3352">Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3353">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3353">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3354">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3354">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3355">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3355">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3356">La définition de la stratégie spécifie quels hôtes de messagerie natifs ne font pas l’objet de la liste d’exclusion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3356">Setting the policy specifies which native messaging hosts aren't subject to the deny list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3357">Une valeur de liste d’exclusion de \* signifie que tous les hôtes de messagerie natifs sont refusés, sauf s’ils sont explicitement autorisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3357">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3358">Tous les hôtes de messagerie native sont autorisés par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3358">All native messaging hosts are allowed by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3359">Toutefois, si un hôte de messagerie native est refusé par la stratégie, l’administrateur peut utiliser la liste verte pour modifier cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3359">However, if a native messaging host is denied by policy, the admin can use the allow list to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3360">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3360">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3361">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3361">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3362">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3362">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3363">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3363">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3364">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3364">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3365">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3365">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3366">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3366">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3367">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3367">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3368">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3368">GP unique name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3369">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: contrôler les hôtes de messagerie native que les utilisateurs peuvent utiliser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3369">GP name: Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3370">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3370">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3371">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3371">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3372">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3372">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3373">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3373">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3374">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3374">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3375">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3375">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3376">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3376">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3377">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3377">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3378">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3378">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3379">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3379">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3380">Nom clé de la préférence: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3380">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3381">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3381">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="nativemessagingblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3383">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3383">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-native-messaging-block-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3384">Configurer la liste rouge de la messagerie native</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3384">Configure native messaging block list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3385">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3385">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3386">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3386">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3387">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3387">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3388">La définition de cette stratégie spécifie les hôtes de messagerie native qui ne doivent pas être chargés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3388">Setting this policy specifies which native messaging hosts shouldn't be loaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3389">Une valeur de liste d’exclusion de \* signifie que tous les hôtes de messagerie natifs sont refusés, sauf s’ils sont explicitement autorisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3389">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3390">Si vous n’avez pas désactivé cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge charge tous les hôtes de messagerie native installés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3390">If you leave this policy unset , Microsoft Edge loads all installed native messaging hosts.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3391">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3391">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3392">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3392">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3393">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3393">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3394">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3394">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3395">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3395">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3396">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3396">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3397">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3397">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3398">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3398">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3399">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3399">GP unique name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3400">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la liste rouge de la messagerie native</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3400">GP name: Configure native messaging block list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3401">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3401">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3402">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3402">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3403">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3403">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3404">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3404">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3405">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3405">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3406">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3406">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3407">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3407">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3408">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3408">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3409">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3409">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3410">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3410">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3411">Nom clé de la préférence: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3411">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3412">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3412">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="nativemessaginguserlevelhosts"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3414">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3414">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-user-level-native-messaging-hosts-installed-without-admin-permissions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3415">Autoriser les hôtes de messagerie native côté utilisateur (installés sans autorisation d’administrateur)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3415">Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3416">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3416">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3417">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3417">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3418">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3418">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3419">Si vous affectez à cette stratégie la valeur Activé ou si elle n’est pas définie, Microsoft Edge peut utiliser les hôtes de messagerie native installés au niveau de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3419">If you set this policy to Enabled or leave it unset, Microsoft Edge can use native messaging hosts installed at the user level.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3420">Si vous affectez à cette stratégie la valeur Désactivé, Microsoft Edge ne peut utiliser ces hôtes que s’ils sont installés au niveau du système.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3420">If you set this policy to Disabled, Microsoft Edge can only use these hosts if they're installed at the system level.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3421">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3421">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3422">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3422">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3423">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3423">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3424">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3424">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3425">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3425">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3426">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3426">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3427">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3427">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3428">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3428">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3429">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3429">GP unique name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3430">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les hôtes de messagerie native côté utilisateur (installés sans autorisation d’administrateur)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3430">GP name: Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3431">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3431">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3432">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3432">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3433">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3433">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3434">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3434">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3435">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3435">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3436">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3436">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3437">Nom de la valeur: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3437">Value Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3438">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3438">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3439">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3439">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3440">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3440">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3441">Nom clé de la préférence: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3441">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3442">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3442">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="passwordmanagerenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3446">PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3446">PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-saving-passwords-to-the-password-manager"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3447">Activer l’enregistrement des mots de passe dans le gestionnaire de mots de passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3447">Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3448">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3448">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3449">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3449">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3450">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3450">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3451">Autoriser MicrosoftEdge à enregistrer les mots de passe des utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3451">Enable Microsoft Edge to save user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3452">Si cette stratégie est activée, les utilisateurs peuvent enregistrer leurs mots de passe dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3452">If you enable this policy, users can save their passwords in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3453">Lors de leur prochaine visite sur le site, MicrosoftEdge entrera automatiquement le mot de passe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3453">The next time they visit the site, Microsoft Edge will enter the password automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3454">Si cette stratégie est désactivée, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas enregistrer de nouveaux mots de passe, mais ils peuvent toujours utiliser les mots de passe préalablement enregistrés. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3454">If you disable this policy, users can't save new passwords, but they can still use previously saved passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3455">Si cette règle est activée ou désactivée, les utilisateurs ne peuvent ni la modifier, ni la remplacer dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3455">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3456">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, les utilisateurs peuvent enregistrer des mots de passe, mais aussi désactiver cette fonctionnalité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3456">If you don't configure it, users can save passwords, as well as turn this feature off.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3457">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3457">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3458">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3458">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3459">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3459">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3460">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3460">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3461">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3461">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3462">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3462">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3463">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3463">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3464">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3464">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3465">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3465">GP unique name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3466">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer l’enregistrement des mots de passe dans le gestionnaire de mots de passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3466">GP name: Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3467">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3467">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3468">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3468">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3469">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3469">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3470">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3470">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3471">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3471">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3472">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3472">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3473">Nom de la valeur: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3473">Value Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3474">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3474">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3475">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3475">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3476">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3476">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3477">Nom clé de la préférence: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3477">Preference Key Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3478">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3478">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="passwordmonitorallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3480">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3480">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-be-alerted-if-their-passwords-are-found-to-be-unsafe"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3481">Autoriser les utilisateurs à être avertis si leur mot de passe est considéré comme dangereux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3481">Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3482">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3482">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3483">Sur Windows depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3483">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3484">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3484">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3485">Autoriser Microsoft Edge à contrôler les mots de passe des utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3485">Allow Microsoft Edge to monitor user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3486">Si vous activez cette stratégie et qu’un utilisateur a l’autorisation d’activer la stratégie, l’utilisateur reçoit une alerte si l’un de ses mots de passe stockés dans Microsoft Edge est considéré comme non sécurisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3486">If you enable this policy and a user consents to enabling the policy, the user will get alerted if any of their passwords stored in Microsoft Edge are found to be unsafe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3487">Microsoft Edge affiche une alerte. ces informations sont également disponibles dans Paramètres > mots de passe > le moniteur des mots de passe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3487">Microsoft Edge will show an alert and this information will also be available in Settings > Passwords > Password Monitor.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3488">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne sont pas invités à entrer l’autorisation d’activer cette fonctionnalité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3488">If you disable this policy, users will not be asked for permission to enable this feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3489">Les mots de passe ne seront pas analysés et ne seront pas non plus signalés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3489">Their passwords will not be scanned and they will not be alerted either.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3490">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas la stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent activer ou désactiver cette fonctionnalité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3490">If you enable or don't configure the policy, users can turn this feature on or off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3491">Pour en savoir plus sur la manière dont Microsoft Edge trouve les mots de passe dangereux, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3491">To learn more about how Microsoft Edge finds unsafe passwords see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3492">Autres recommandations:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3492">Additional guidance:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3493">Cette stratégie peut être activée à la fois comme recommandée et obligatoire, mais avec une légende importante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3493">This policy can be set as both Recommended as well as Mandatory, however with an important callout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3494">Obligatoire activé: étant donné que le consentement d’un utilisateur individuel est une condition préalable à l’activation de cette fonctionnalité pour un utilisateur donné, cette stratégie ne possède pas de paramètre activé obligatoire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3494">Mandatory enabled: Given that individual user consent is a pre-condition to enabling this feature for a given user, this policy does not have a Mandatory enabled setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3495">Si la stratégie est configurée sur obligatoire, l’interface utilisateur dans les paramètres ne change pas et le message d’erreur suivant s’affiche dans edge://policy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3495">If the policy is set to Mandatory enabled, the UI in Settings will not change and the following error message will be displayed in edge://policy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3496">Exemple de message d’état d’erreur: «cette valeur de stratégie est ignorée, car le moniteur de mot de passe nécessite le consentement de l’utilisateur individuel pour qu’il soit activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3496">Example Error state message: "This policy value is ignored because Password Monitor requires the consent of the individual user for it to be turned on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3497">Vous pouvez demander aux utilisateurs au sein de votre organisation d’accéder aux paramètres > Profil > mot de passe et d’activer la fonctionnalité.»</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3497">You can ask users in your Organization to go to Settings > Profile > Password and turn on the feature."</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3498">Option recommandée: si la stratégie est définie sur recommandé activée, l’interface utilisateur dans les paramètres reste en mode «désactivé», mais une icône de porte-documents est affichée en regard de celle-ci en regard de celle-ci affichée sur Hover-«votre organisation recommande une valeur spécifique et vous avez choisi une autre valeur»</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3498">Recommended enabled: If the policy is set to Recommended enabled, the UI in Settings will remain in 'Off' state, but a briefcase icon will be made visible next to it with this description displayed on hover - "Your organization recommends a specific value for this setting and you have chosen a different value"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3499">Obligatoire et recommandé Désactivé: ces deux États fonctionnent de façon normale, avec les légendes habituelles qui apparaissent aux utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3499">Mandatory and Recommended disabled: Both these states will work the normal way, with the usual captions being shown to users.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3500">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3500">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3501">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3501">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3502">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3502">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3503">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3503">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3504">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3504">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3505">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3505">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3506">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3506">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3507">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3507">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3508">Nom unique GP: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3508">GP unique name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3509">Nom de la stratégie de sécurité: autoriser les utilisateurs à être avertis si leur mot de passe est considéré comme dangereux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3509">GP name: Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3510">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3510">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3511">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3511">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3512">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3512">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3513">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3513">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3514">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3514">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3515">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3515">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3516">Nom de la valeur: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3516">Value Name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3517">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3517">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3518">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3518">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3520">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3520">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-change-password-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3521">Configurer l’URL de modification du mot de passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3521">Configure the change password URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3522">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3522">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3523">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3523">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3524">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3524">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3525">Configure l’URL de modification du mot de passe (schémas HTTP et HTTPS uniquement).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3525">Configures the change password URL (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3526">Le service de protection par mot de passe redirige les utilisateurs vers cette URL pour modifier leur mot de passe après l’affichage d’un avertissement dans le navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3526">Password protection service will send users to this URL to change their password after seeing a warning in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3527">Si vous activez cette stratégie, le service de protection par mot de passe redirige les utilisateurs vers cette URL pour modifier leur mot de passe. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3527">If you enable this policy, then password protection service sends users to this URL to change their password.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3528">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, le service de protection par mot de passe ne redirige pas les utilisateurs vers une URL de modification du mot de passe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3528">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, then password protection service will not redirect users to a change password URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3529">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3529">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3530">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3530">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3531">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3531">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3532">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3532">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3533">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3533">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3534">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3534">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3535">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3535">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3536">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3536">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3537">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3537">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3538">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3538">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3539">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer l’URL de modification du mot de passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3539">GP name: Configure the change password URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3540">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3540">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3541">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3541">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3542">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3542">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3543">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3543">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3544">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3544">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3545">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3545">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3546">Nom de la valeur: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3546">Value Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3547">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3547">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3548">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3548">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://contoso.com/change_password.html"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3549">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3549">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3550">Nom clé de la préférence: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3550">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3551">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3551">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/change_password.html</string>
```
