  ### <a name="passwordprotectionloginurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3553">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3553">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-enterprise-login-urls-where-the-password-protection-service-should-capture-salted-hashes-of-a-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3554">Configurer la liste des URL de connexion d’entreprise dans lesquelles le service de protection par mot de passe doit capturer les codes de hachage d’un mot de passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3554">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3555">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3555">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3556">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3556">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3557">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3557">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3558">Configurez la liste des URL de connexion d’entreprise (schémas HTTP et HTTPS uniquement) où MicrosoftEdge doit capturer les code de hachage salés des mots de passe et l’utiliser pour la détection de la réutilisation des mots de passe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3558">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only) where Microsoft Edge should capture the salted hashes of passwords and use it for password reuse detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3559">Si vous activez cette stratégie, le service de protection par mot de passe capture les empreintes des mots de passe sur les URL définies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3559">If you enable this policy, the password protection service captures fingerprints of passwords on the defined URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3560">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, aucune empreinte de mot de passe n’est capturée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3560">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, no password fingerprints are captured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3561">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3561">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3562">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3562">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3563">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3563">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3564">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3564">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3565">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3565">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3566">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3566">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3567">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3567">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3568">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3568">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3569">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3569">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3570">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3570">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3571">Non de la stratégie de groupe : configurer la liste des URL de connexion d’entreprise dans lesquelles le service de protection par mot de passe doit capturer les codes de hachage d’un mot de passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3571">GP name: Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3572">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3572">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3573">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3573">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3574">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3574">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3575">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3575">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3576">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3576">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3577">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3577">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3578">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3578">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3579">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3579">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3580">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3580">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com/login.html"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\2 = "https://login.contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3581">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3581">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3582">Nom clé de la préférence: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3582">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3583">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3583">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com/login.html</string>
  <string>https://login.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3584">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3584">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordprotectionwarningtrigger"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3585">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3585">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-password-protection-warning-trigger"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3586">Configurer le déclencheur d’avertissement de protection par mot de passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3586">Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3587">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3587">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3588">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3588">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3589">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3589">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3590">Vous permet de contrôler quand déclencher l’avertissement de protection de mot de passe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3590">Allows you to control when to trigger password protection warning.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3591">La protection de mot de passe avertit les utilisateurs lorsqu’ils réutilisent leur mot de passe protégé sur des sites potentiellement suspects.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3591">Password protection alerts users when they reuse their protected password on potentially suspicious sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3592">Vous pouvez utiliser les stratégies [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) et [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) pour configurer les mots de passe à protéger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3592">You can use the [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) policies to configure which passwords to protect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3593">Exemptions: les mots de passe des sites répertoriés dans [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) et [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl), ainsi que ceux répertoriés dans [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains), ne déclencheront pas d’avertissement de protection de mot de passe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3593">Exemptions: Passwords for the sites listed in [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl), as well as for the sites listed in [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains), will not trigger a password-protection warning.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3594">Définissez la stratégie sur «PasswordProtectionWarningOff» pour ne pas afficher les avertissements de protection de mot de passe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3594">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOff' to not show password protection warningss.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3595">Définissez la stratégie sur «PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse» pour afficher les avertissements de protection de mot de passe lorsque l’utilisateur réutilise son mot de passe protégé sur un site ne se trouvant pas dans la liste de sites autorisés. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3595">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse' to show password protection warnings when the user reuses their protected password on a non-allowlisted site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3596">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le déclencheur d’avertissement ne s’affiche pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3596">If you disable or don't configure this policy, then the warning trigger is not shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3597">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3597">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3598">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = L’avertissement de protection de mot de passe est désactivée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3598">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = Password protection warning is off</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3599">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = L’avertissement de protection de mot de passe est déclenché par la réutilisation d’un mot de passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3599">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = Password protection warning is triggered by password reuse</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3600">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3600">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3601">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3601">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3602">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3602">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3603">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3603">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3604">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3604">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3605">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3605">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3606">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3606">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3607">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3607">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3608">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3608">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3609">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3609">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3610">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer le déclencheur d’avertissement de protection par mot de passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3610">GP name: Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3611">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3611">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3612">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3612">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3613">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3613">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3614">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3614">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3615">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3615">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3616">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3616">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3617">Nom de la valeur: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3617">Value Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3618">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3618">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3619">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3619">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3620">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3620">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3621">Nom clé de la préférence: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3621">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3622">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3622">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3623">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3623">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordrevealenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3624">PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3624">PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-password-reveal-button"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3625">Activer le bouton d’affichage du mot de passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3625">Enable Password reveal button</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3626">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3626">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3627">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3627">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3628">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3628">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3629">Vous permet de configurer l’affichage par défaut du bouton d’affichage du mot de passe dans le navigateur pour les champs d’entrée de mot de passe sur les sites web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3629">Lets you configure the default display of the browser password reveal button for password input fields on websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3630">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou ne la configurez pas, le paramètre utilisateur du navigateur affiche par défaut le bouton d’affichage du mot de passe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3630">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the browser user setting defaults to displaying the password reveal button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3631">Si vous la désactivez, le paramètre utilisateur du navigateur n’affiche pas le bouton d’affichage du mot de passe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3631">If you disable this policy, the browser user setting won't display the password reveal button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3632">Pour l’accessibilité, les utilisateurs peuvent modifier les paramètres du navigateur par rapport à la stratégie par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3632">For accessibility, users can change the browser setting from the default policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3633">Cette stratégie affecte uniquement le bouton d’affichage du mot de passe du navigateur. Elle n’affecte pas les boutons d’affichage personnalisés des sites web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3633">This policy only affects the browser password reveal button, it doesn't affect websites' custom reveal buttons.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3634">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3634">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3635">Peut être obligatoire: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3635">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3636">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3636">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3637">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3637">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3638">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3638">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3639">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3639">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3640">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3640">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3641">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3641">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3642">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3642">GP unique name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3643">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer le bouton d’affichage du mot de passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3643">GP name: Enable Password reveal button</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3644">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (obligatoire): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3644">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3645">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3645">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3646">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3646">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3647">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3647">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3648">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3648">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3649">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3649">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3650">Nom de la valeur: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3650">Value Name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3651">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3651">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3652">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3652">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3653">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3653">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3654">Nom de la clé de préférence: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3654">Preference Key Name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3655">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3655">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="startupboostenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3659">StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3659">StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-startup-boost"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3660">Activer l’accélérateur du démarrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3660">Enable startup boost</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3661">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3661">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3662">Sur Windows depuis la version88 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3662">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3663">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3663">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3664">Autorise les processus de MicrosoftEdge à démarrer lors de la connexion au système d’exploitation et à redémarrer en arrière-plan après la fermeture de la dernière fenêtre du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3664">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and restart in background after the last browser window is closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3665">Si MicrosoftEdge est exécuté en mode arrière-plan, il est possible que le navigateur ne se ferme pas lors de la fermeture de la dernière fenêtre, et le navigateur ne redémarrera pas en arrière-plan lors de la fermeture de la fenêtre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3665">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the browser might not close when the last window is closed and the browser won't be restarted in background when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3666">Consultez la stratégie [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) pour découvrir le résultat de la configuration du comportement du mode arrière-plan de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3666">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about what happens after configuring Microsoft Edge background mode behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3667">L’activation de cette stratégie déclenche l’accélération du démarrage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3667">If you enable this policy, startup boost is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3668">La désactivation de cette stratégie désactive l’accélération du démarrage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3668">If you disable this policy, startup boost is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3669">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, l’accélération du démarrage peut être initialement désactivée ou activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3669">If you don't configure this policy, startup boost may initially be off or on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3670">L’utilisateur peut configurer son comportement dans edge://settings/system.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3670">The user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3671">En savoir plus sur l’accélération du démarrage: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3671">Learn more about startup boost: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3672">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3672">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3673">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3673">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3674">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3674">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3675">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3675">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3676">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3676">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3677">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3677">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3678">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3678">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3679">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3679">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3680">Nom unique GP: StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3680">GP unique name: StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3681">Nom GP: Activer l’accélération du démarrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3681">GP name: Enable startup boost</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3682">Chemin d’accès GP (Obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Performance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3682">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Performance</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3683">Chemin d’accès GP (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Paramètres Par défaut (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Performance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3683">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Performance</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3684">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3684">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3685">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3685">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3686">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3686">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3687">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3687">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3688">Nom de valeur: StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3688">Value Name: StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3689">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3689">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3690">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3690">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ## <a name="printing-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3692">Stratégies d’impression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3692">Printing policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3693">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3693">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultprinterselection"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3694">DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3694">DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-printer-selection-rules"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3695">Instructions de sélection de l’imprimante par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3695">Default printer selection rules</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3696">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3696">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3697">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3697">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3698">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3698">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3699">Remplace les instructions de sélection de l’imprimante par défaut pour MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3699">Overrides Microsoft Edge default printer selection rules.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3700">Cette stratégie détermine les instructions de sélection de l’imprimante par défaut dans MicrosoftEdge, la première fois qu’un utilisateur tente d’imprimer une page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3700">This policy determines the rules for selecting the default printer in Microsoft Edge, which happens the first time a user tries to print a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3701">Lorsque cette stratégie est définie, Microsoft Edge tente de trouver une imprimante qui correspond à tous les attributs spécifiés et l’utilise comme imprimante par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3701">When this policy is set, Microsoft Edge tries to find a printer that matches all of the specified attributes and uses it as default printer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3702">Si plusieurs imprimantes remplissent les critères, la première imprimante correspondante est utilisée. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3702">If there are multiple printers that meet the criteria, the first printer that matches is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3703">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie ou si aucune imprimante correspondante n’est détectée dans le délai imparti, l’imprimante est définie par défaut sur l’imprimante PDF intégrée. Si l’imprimante PDF n’est pas disponible, aucune imprimante n’est sélectionnée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3703">If you don't configure this policy or no matching printers are found within the timeout, the printer defaults to the built-in PDF printer or no printer, if the PDF printer isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3704">La valeur est analysée en tant qu’objet JSON, conformément au schéma suivant: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3704">The value is parsed as a JSON object, conforming to the following schema: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3705">L’omission d’un champ signifie que toutes les valeurs correspondent. Par exemple, si vous ne spécifiez pas la connectivité, l’Aperçu avant impression démarre la découverte de tous les types d’imprimantes locales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3705">Omitting a field means all values match; for example, if you don't specify connectivity Print Preview starts discovering all kinds of local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3706">Les modèles d’expressions régulières doivent respecter la syntaxe JavaScript RegExp et les correspondances sont sensibles à la casse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3706">Regular expression patterns must follow the JavaScript RegExp syntax and matches are case sensitive.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3707">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3707">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3708">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3708">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3709">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3709">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3710">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3710">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3711">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3711">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3712">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3712">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3713">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3713">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3714">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3714">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3715">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3715">GP unique name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3716">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: instructions de sélection de l’imprimante par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3716">GP name: Default printer selection rules</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3717">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3717">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3718">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3718">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3719">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3719">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3720">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3720">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3721">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3721">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3722">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3722">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3723">Nom de la valeur: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3723">Value Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3724">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3724">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3725">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3725">Example value:</span></span>

```
"{ \"idPattern\": \".*public\", \"namePattern\": \".*Color\" }"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3726">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3726">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3727">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3727">Preference Key Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3728">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3728">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>{ "idPattern": ".*public", "namePattern": ".*Color" }</string>
```

  ### <a name="printheaderfooter"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3730">PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3730">PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-headers-and-footers"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3731">Imprimer des en-têtes et des pieds de page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3731">Print headers and footers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3732">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3732">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3733">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3733">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3734">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3734">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3735">Forcer l’activation et la désactivation des en-têtes et des pieds de page dans la boîte de dialogue d’impression.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3735">Force 'headers and footers' to be on or off in the printing dialog.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3736">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir d’imprimer les en-têtes et les pieds de page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3736">If you don't configure this policy, users can decide whether to print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3737">Si cette stratégie est désactivée, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas imprimer les en-têtes et les pieds de page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3737">If you disable this policy, users can't print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3738">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs impriment toujours les en-têtes et les pieds de page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3738">If you enable this policy, users always print headers and footers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3739">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3739">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3740">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3740">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3741">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3741">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3742">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3742">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3743">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3743">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3744">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3744">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3745">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3745">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3746">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3746">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3747">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3747">GP unique name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3748">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: imprimer des en-têtes et des pieds de page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3748">GP name: Print headers and footers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3749">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3749">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3750">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3750">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3751">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3751">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3752">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3752">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3753">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3753">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3754">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3754">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3755">Nom de la valeur: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3755">Value Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3756">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3756">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3757">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3757">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3758">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3758">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3759">Nom clé de la préférence: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3759">Preference Key Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3760">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3760">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="printpreviewusesystemdefaultprinter"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3762">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3762">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-system-default-printer-as-the-default-printer"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3763">Définir l’imprimante par défaut du système comme imprimante par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3763">Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3764">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3764">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3765">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3765">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3766">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3766">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3767">Indique à MicrosoftEdge d’utiliser l’imprimante par défaut du système comme choix par défaut dans l’aperçu avant impression au lieu de l’imprimante qui a été utilisée le plus récemment.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3767">Tells Microsoft Edge to use the system default printer as the default choice in Print Preview instead of the most recently used printer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3768">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, l’aperçu avant impression utilise par défaut l’imprimante qui a servi le plus récemment.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3768">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Print Preview uses the most recently used printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3769">Si vous activez cette stratégie, l’aperçu avant impression utilise l’imprimante par défaut du système d’exploitation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3769">If you enable this policy, Print Preview uses the OS system default printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3770">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3770">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3771">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3771">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3772">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3772">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3773">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3773">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3774">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3774">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3775">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3775">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3776">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3776">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3777">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3777">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3778">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3778">GP unique name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3779">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir l’imprimante par défaut du système comme imprimante par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3779">GP name: Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3780">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3780">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3781">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3781">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3782">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3782">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3783">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3783">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3784">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3784">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3785">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3785">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3786">Nom de la valeur: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3786">Value Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3787">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3787">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3788">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3788">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3789">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3789">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3790">Nom clé de la préférence: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3790">Preference Key Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3791">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3791">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="printrasterizationmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3793">PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3793">PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-rasterization-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3794">Mode rastérisation de l’impression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3794">Print Rasterization Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3795">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3795">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3796">Sur Windows depuis la version 90 ou ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3796">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3797">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3797">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3798">Contrôle de l’impression de Microsoft Edge sur Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3798">Controls how Microsoft Edge prints on Windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3799">Lors de l’impression sur une imprimante PostScript sur Windows, les tâches d’impression doivent parfois être rastérisées pour imprimer correctement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3799">When printing to a non-PostScript printer on Windows, sometimes print jobs need to be rasterized to print correctly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3800">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur « Complet » ou si vous ne la configurez pas, Microsoft Edge effectuera la rastérisation des pages complètes si nécessaire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3800">If you set this policy to 'Full' or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will do full page rasterization if necessary.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3801">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «Rapide», Microsoft Edge réduit la rastérisation, ce qui permet de réduire la taille des travail d’impression et d’augmenter la vitesse d’impression.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3801">If you set this policy to 'Fast', Microsoft Edge will reduce the amount of rasterization which can help reduce print job sizes and increase printing speed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3802">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3802">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3803">Full (0) = rastérisation des pages complètes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3803">Full (0) = Full page rasterization</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3804">Rapide (1) = éviter la rastérisation si possible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3804">Fast (1) = Avoid rasterization if possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3805">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3805">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3806">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3806">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3807">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3807">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3808">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3808">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3809">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3809">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3810">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3810">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3811">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3811">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3812">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3812">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3813">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3813">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3814">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe : PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3814">GP unique name: PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3815">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : mode rastérisation d’impression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3815">GP name: Print Rasterization Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3816">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3816">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3817">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3817">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3818">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3818">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3819">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3819">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3820">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3820">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3821">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3821">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3822">Nom de la valeur : PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3822">Value Name: PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3823">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3823">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3824">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3824">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="printertypedenylist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3826">PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3826">PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-printer-types-on-the-deny-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3827">Désactiver les types d’imprimante dans la liste d’exclusion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3827">Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3828">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3828">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3829">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 88 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3829">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3830">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3830">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3831">Les types d’imprimante dans la liste d’exclusion ne seront pas détectés ou leurs fonctionnalités ne seront pas récupérées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3831">The printer types on the deny list won't be discovered or have their capabilities fetched.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3832">Placer tous les types d’imprimante sur la liste d’exclusion désactive l’impression de manière efficace. En effet, il n’existe aucune destination d’impression pour les documents.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3832">Placing all printer types on the deny list effectively disables printing, because there's no print destination for documents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3833">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, ou si la liste des imprimantes est vide, tous les types d’imprimante sont détectables.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3833">If you don't configure this policy, or the printer list is empty, all printer types are discoverable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3834">Les destinations d’impression incluent les imprimantes par extension et les imprimantes locales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3834">Printer destinations include extension printers and local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3835">Les imprimantes par extension sont également appelées destinations du fournisseur d’impression et incluent toute destination associée à une extension MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3835">Extension printers are also known as print provider destinations, and include any destination that belongs to a Microsoft Edge extension.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3836">Les imprimantes locales sont également connues sous le nom de destinations d’impression natives et incluent les destinations disponibles pour l’ordinateur local et les imprimantes réseau partagées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3836">Local printers are also known as native printing destinations, and include destinations available to the local machine and shared network printers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3837">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3837">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3838">privet (privet)=destinations des protocole basées sur Zeroconf (mDNS + DNS-SD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3838">privet (privet) = Zeroconf-based (mDNS + DNS-SD) protocol destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3839">extension (extension)=destinations basées sur une extension</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3839">extension (extension) = Extension-based destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3840">pdf (pdf)=la destination «Enregistrer au format PDF»</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3840">pdf (pdf) = The 'Save as PDF' destination</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3841">locales (locales)=destinations des imprimantes locales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3841">local (local) = Local printer destinations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3842">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3842">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3843">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3843">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3844">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3844">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3845">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3845">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3846">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3846">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3847">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3847">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3848">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3848">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3849">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3849">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3850">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3850">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3851">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3851">GP unique name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3852">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: désactiver les types d’imprimante dans la liste d’exclusion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3852">GP name: Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3853">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3853">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3854">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3854">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3855">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3855">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3856">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3856">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3857">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3857">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3858">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3858">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3859">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3859">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3860">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3860">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3861">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3861">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\1 = "local"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\2 = "privet"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3862">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3862">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3863">Nom clé de la préférence: PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3863">Preference Key Name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3864">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3864">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>local</string>
  <string>privet</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="printingallowedbackgroundgraphicsmodes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3866">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3866">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-background-graphics-printing-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3867">Restreindre le mode d’impression graphique d’arrière-plan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3867">Restrict background graphics printing mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3868">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3868">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3869">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 89 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3869">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3870">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3870">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3871">Restreint le mode d’impression graphique d’arrière-plan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3871">Restricts background graphics printing mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3872">Si cette stratégie n’est pas définie, il n’existe aucune restriction sur l’impression des graphiques d’arrière-plan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3872">If this policy isn't set there's no restriction on printing background graphics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3873">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3873">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3874">tout (tout) = autoriser l’impression avec et sans graphique d’arrière-plan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3874">any (any) = Allow printing with and without background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3875">activée (activée) = autoriser l’impression uniquement avec les graphiques d’arrière-plan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3875">enabled (enabled) = Allow printing only with background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3876">désactivé (désactivé) = autoriser l’impression uniquement sans graphique d’arrière-plan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3876">disabled (disabled) = Allow printing only without background graphics</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3877">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3877">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3878">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3878">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3879">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3879">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3880">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3880">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3881">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3881">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3882">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3882">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3883">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3883">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3884">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3884">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3885">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3885">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3886">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3886">GP unique name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3887">Nom de la stratégie: restreindre le mode d’impression graphique d’arrière-plan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3887">GP name: Restrict background graphics printing mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3888">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3888">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3889">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3889">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3890">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3890">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3891">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3891">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3892">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3892">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3893">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3893">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3894">Nom de valeur: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3894">Value Name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3895">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3895">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3896">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3896">Example value:</span></span>

```
"enabled"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3897">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3897">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3898">Nom de la clé de préférence: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3898">Preference Key Name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3899">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3899">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>enabled</string>
```
