  ### <a name="printingbackgroundgraphicsdefault"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3901">PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3901">PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-background-graphics-printing-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3902">Mode d’impression graphique d’arrière-plan par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3902">Default background graphics printing mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3903">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3903">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3904">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 89 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3904">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3905">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3905">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3906">Remplace le dernier paramètre utilisé pour l’impression des graphiques d’arrière-plan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3906">Overrides the last used setting for printing background graphics.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3907">Si vous activez ce paramètre, l’impression des graphiques d’arrière-plan est activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3907">If you enable this setting, background graphics printing is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3908">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre, l’impression des graphiques d’arrière-plan est désactivée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3908">If you disable this setting, background graphics printing is disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3909">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3909">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3910">activée (activée) = activer le mode d’impression graphique d’arrière-plan par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3910">enabled (enabled) = Enable background graphics printing mode by default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3911">désactivé (désactivé) = désactiver le mode d’impression graphique d’arrière-plan par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3911">disabled (disabled) = Disable background graphics printing mode by default</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3912">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3912">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3913">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3913">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3914">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3914">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3915">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3915">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3916">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3916">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3917">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3917">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3918">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3918">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3919">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3919">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3920">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3920">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3921">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3921">GP unique name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3922">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: mode d’impression graphique d’arrière-plan par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3922">GP name: Default background graphics printing mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3923">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3923">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3924">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3924">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3925">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3925">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3926">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3926">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3927">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3927">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3928">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3928">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3929">Nom de la valeur: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3929">Value Name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3930">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3930">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3931">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3931">Example value:</span></span>

```
"enabled"
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3933">Nom de la clé de préférence: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3933">Preference Key Name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>

  ### <a name="printingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3936">PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3936">PrintingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-printing"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3937">Activer l’impression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3937">Enable printing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3938">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3938">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3939">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3939">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3940">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3940">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3941">Permet d’imprimer dans MicrosoftEdge et empêche les utilisateurs de modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3941">Enables printing in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3942">Si cette stratégie n’est pas activée ou si elle n’est pas configurée, les utilisateurs sont autorisés à imprimer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3942">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3943">Si cette stratégie est désactivée, les utilisateurs ne sont pas autorisés à imprimer depuis MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3943">If you disable this policy, users can't print from Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3944">L’impression est désactivée dans le menu clé à molette, les extensions, les applications JavaScript, etc.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3944">Printing is disabled in the wrench menu, extensions, JavaScript applications, and so on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3945">Les utilisateurs peuvent toujours imprimer à partir de plug-ins qui contournent MicrosoftEdge pendant l’impression.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3945">Users can still print from plug-ins that bypass Microsoft Edge while printing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3946">Par exemple, certaines applications AdobeFlash proposent, dans leur menu contextuel, des fonctionnalités d’impression qui ne sont pas affectées par cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3946">For example, certain Adobe Flash applications have the print option in their context menu, which isn't covered by this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3947">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3947">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3948">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3948">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3949">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3949">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3950">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3950">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3951">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3951">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3952">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3952">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3953">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3953">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3954">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3954">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3955">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3955">GP unique name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3956">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer l’impression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3956">GP name: Enable printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3957">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3957">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3958">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3958">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3959">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3959">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3960">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3960">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3961">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3961">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3962">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3962">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3963">Nom de la valeur: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3963">Value Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3964">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3964">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3965">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3965">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3966">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3966">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3967">Nom clé de la préférence: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3967">Preference Key Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3968">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3968">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="printingpapersizedefault"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3970">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3970">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-printing-page-size"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3971">Taille de page par défaut pour l’impression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3971">Default printing page size</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3972">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3972">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3973">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3973">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3974">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3974">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3975">Remplacements de la taille de page par défaut pour l’impression.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3975">Overrides default printing page size.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3976">le nom doit contenir l’une des mises en forme répertoriées ou «personnalisé» si la taille de papier requise ne figure pas dans la liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3976">name should contain one of the listed formats or 'custom' if required paper size is not in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3977">Si la valeur «personnalisé» est fournie la propriété custom_size doit être spécifiée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3977">If 'custom' value is provided custom_size property should be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3978">Elle décrit la hauteur et la largeur souhaitées en micromètres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3978">It describes the desired height and width in micrometers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3979">Sinon la propriété custom_size ne doit pas être spécifiée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3979">Otherwise custom_size property shouldn't be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3980">La stratégie qui enfreint ces règles est ignorée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3980">Policy that violates these rules is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3981">Si la taille de page n’est pas disponible sur l’imprimante choisie par l’utilisateur, cette stratégie est ignorée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3981">If the page size is unavailable on the printer chosen by the user this policy is ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3982">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3982">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3983">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3983">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3984">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3984">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3985">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3985">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3986">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3986">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3987">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3987">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3988">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3988">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3989">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3989">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3990">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3990">GP unique name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3991">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: taille de page par défaut pour l’impression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3991">GP name: Default printing page size</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3992">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3992">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3993">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3993">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3994">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3994">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3995">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3995">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3996">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3996">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3997">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3997">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3998">Nom de la valeur: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3998">Value Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-3999">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-3999">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4000">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4000">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrintingPaperSizeDefault = {
  "custom_size": {
    "height": 297000, 
    "width": 210000
  }, 
  "name": "custom"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4001">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4001">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrintingPaperSizeDefault = {"custom_size": {"height": 297000, "width": 210000}, "name": "custom"}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4002">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4002">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4003">Nom de la clé de préférence: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4003">Preference Key Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4004">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4004">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>PrintingPaperSizeDefault</key>
<dict>
  <key>custom_size</key>
  <dict>
    <key>height</key>
    <integer>297000</integer>
    <key>width</key>
    <integer>210000</integer>
  </dict>
  <key>name</key>
  <string>custom</string>
</dict>
```

  ### <a name="usesystemprintdialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4006">UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4006">UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-using-system-print-dialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4007">Imprimer via la boîte de dialogue Imprimer du système</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4007">Print using system print dialog</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4008">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4008">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4009">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4009">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4010">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4010">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4011">Affiche la boîte de dialogue d’impression du système au lieu de l’aperçu avant impression.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4011">Shows the system print dialog instead of print preview.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4012">Si vous activez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge ouvre la boîte de dialogue d’impression du système au lieu de l’aperçu avant impression intégré lorsque l’utilisateur imprime une page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4012">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge opens the system print dialog instead of the built-in print preview when a user prints a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4013">Si vous ne configurez pas ou désactivez cette stratégie, les commandes d’impression déclenchent l’écran de l’aperçu avant impression de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4013">If you don't configure or disable this policy, print commands trigger the Microsoft Edge print preview screen.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4014">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4014">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4015">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4015">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4016">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4016">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4017">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4017">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4018">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4018">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4019">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4019">Boolean</span></span>

  ### <a name="proxybypasslist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4039">ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4039">ProxyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-proxy-bypass-rules-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4040">Configurer les règles de contournement du proxy (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4040">Configure proxy bypass rules (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4041">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4041">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4042">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4042">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4043">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4043">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4044">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4044">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4045">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4045">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4046">Cette stratégie est déconseillée, utilisez plutôt[ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4046">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4047">Elle ne fonctionne pas dans la version91 de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4047">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4048">Définit la liste des hôtes pour lesquels MicrosoftEdge contourne les proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4048">Defines a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge bypasses any proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4049">Cette stratégie est appliquée uniquement si la stratégie de [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) n’est pas spécifiée et que vous avez sélectionné fixed_servers dans la stratégie [ProxyMode](#proxymode) .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4049">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected fixed_servers in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4050">Si vous avez sélectionné un autre mode pour la configuration des stratégies proxy, n’activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4050">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4051">Si vous activez cette stratégie, vous pouvez créer une liste d’hôtes pour lesquels MicrosoftEdge n’utilise pas de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4051">If you enable this policy, you can create a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge doesn't use a proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4052">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, aucune liste d’hôtes n’est créée et MicrosoftEdge ne contourne aucun proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4052">If you don't configure this policy, no list of hosts is created for which Microsoft Edge bypasses a proxy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4053">Ne configurez pas cette stratégie si vous avez spécifié une autre méthode de configuration des stratégies de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4053">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4054">Si vous souhaitez voir plus d’exemples plus détaillés, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4054">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4055">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4055">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4056">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4056">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4057">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4057">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4058">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4058">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4059">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4059">Data Type:</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4062">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4062">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4063">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4063">GP unique name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4064">Nom GP: Configurer les règles de contournement du proxy (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4064">GP name: Configure proxy bypass rules (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4065">Chemin de la stratégie de groupe: Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4065">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4066">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4066">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4067">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4067">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4068">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4068">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4069">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4069">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4070">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4070">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4071">Nom de la valeur: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4071">Value Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4072">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4072">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4073">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4073">Example value:</span></span>

```

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4074">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4074">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4075">Nom clé de la préférence: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4075">Preference Key Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>

``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com, https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="proxymode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4078">ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4078">ProxyMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-proxy-server-settings-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4079">Configurer les paramètres du serveur proxy (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4079">Configure proxy server settings (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4080">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4080">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4081">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4081">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4082">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4082">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4083">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4083">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4084">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4084">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4085">Cette stratégie est déconseillée, utilisez plutôt[ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4085">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4086">Elle ne fonctionne pas dans la version91 de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4086">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4087">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur Activé vous pouvez spécifier le serveur proxy que MicrosoftEdge utilise et empêche les utilisateurs de modifier les paramètres du proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4087">If you set this policy to Enabled you can specify the proxy server Microsoft Edge uses and prevents users from changing proxy settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4088">MicrosoftEdge ignore toutes les options liées au proxy spécifiées à partir de la ligne de commande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4088">Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4089">La stratégie est appliquée uniquement si la stratégie [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) n’est pas spécifiée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4089">The policy is only applied if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4090">Les autres options ne sont pas prises en compte si vous choisissez l’une de ces options:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4090">Other options are ignored if you choose one of the following options:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4091">direct = Ne jamais utiliser un serveur proxy et toujours vous connecter directement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4091">direct = Never use a proxy server and always connect directly</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4092">système=Utiliser les paramètres proxy du système</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4092">system = Use system proxy settings</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4093">auto_detect=Détecter automatiquement le serveur proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4093">auto_detect = Auto detect the proxy server</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4094">Si vous choisissez d’utiliser:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4094">If you choose to use:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4095">fixed_servers=Serveurs proxy fixes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4095">fixed_servers = Fixed proxy servers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4096">Vous pouvez spécifier d’autres options avec [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) et [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4096">You can specify further options with [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) and [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist).</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4097">pac_script= UnScript proxy .pac.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4097">pac_script =  A .pac proxy script.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4098">Use [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) pour définir l’URL sur fichier .pac proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4098">Use [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) to set the URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4099">Si vous souhaitez voir des exemples plus détaillés, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4099">For detailed examples, go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4100">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir eux-mêmes leurs paramètres de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4100">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4101">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4101">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4102">ProxyDisabled (direct)=Ne jamais utiliser de proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4102">ProxyDisabled (direct) = Never use a proxy</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4103">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect)=Détecter automatiquement les paramètres du proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4103">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = Auto detect proxy settings</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4104">ProxyPacScript (pac_script)=Utiliser un script proxy .pac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4104">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = Use a .pac proxy script</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4105">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers)=Utiliser des serveurs proxy fixes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4105">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = Use fixed proxy servers</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4106">ProxyUseSystem (system)=Utiliser les paramètres proxy du système</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4106">ProxyUseSystem (system) = Use system proxy settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4107">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4107">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4108">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4108">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4109">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4109">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4110">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4110">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4111">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4111">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4112">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4112">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4113">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4113">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4114">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4114">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ### <a name="proxypacurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4131">ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4131">ProxyPacUrl</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-proxy-pac-file-url-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4132">Définissez l’URL du fichier .pac du proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4132">Set the proxy .pac file URL (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4133">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4133">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4134">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4134">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4135">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4135">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4136">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4136">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4137">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4137">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4138">Cette stratégie est déconseillée, utilisez plutôt[ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4138">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4139">Elle ne fonctionne pas dans la version91 de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4139">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4140">Spécifie l’URL du fichier (PAC) de configuration automatique du proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4140">Specifies the URL for a proxy auto-config (PAC) file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4141">Cette stratégie est appliquée uniquement si la stratégie [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) n’est pas spécifiée et vous avez sélectionné pac_script dans la stratégie [ProxyMode](#proxymode).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4141">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected pac_script in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4142">Si vous avez sélectionné un autre mode pour la configuration des stratégies proxy, n’activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4142">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4143">Si vous activez cette stratégie, vous pouvez spécifier une URL pour un fichier PAC, qui définit la façon dont le navigateur choisit automatiquement le serveur proxy approprié pour l’extraction d’un site web particulier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4143">If you enable this policy, you can specify the URL for a PAC file, which defines how the browser automatically chooses the appropriate proxy server for fetching a particular website.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4144">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, aucun fichier PAC n’est spécifié.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4144">If you disable or don't configure this policy, no PAC file is specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4145">Ne configurez pas cette stratégie si vous avez spécifié une autre méthode de configuration des stratégies de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4145">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4146">Si vous souhaitez voir des exemples plus détaillés, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4146">For detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4147">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4147">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4148">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4148">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4149">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4149">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4150">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4150">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4151">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4151">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4152">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4152">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4153">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4153">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4154">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4154">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4155">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4155">GP unique name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4156">Nom GP: Définir l’URL du fichier .pac proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4156">GP name: Set the proxy .pac file URL (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4157">Chemin de la stratégie de groupe: Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4157">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4158">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4158">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4159">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4159">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4160">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4160">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4161">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4161">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4162">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4162">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4163">Nom de la valeur: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4163">Value Name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4164">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4164">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4165">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4165">Example value:</span></span>


  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4167">Nom clé de la préférence: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4167">Preference Key Name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>

  ### <a name="proxyserver"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4170">ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4170">ProxyServer</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-address-or-url-of-proxy-server-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4171">Configurer l’adresse ou l’URL du serveur proxy (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4171">Configure address or URL of proxy server (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4172">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4172">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4173">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4173">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4176">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4176">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4177">Cette stratégie est déconseillée, utilisez plutôt[ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4177">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4178">Elle ne fonctionne pas dans la version91 de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4178">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4179">Spécifie l’URL du serveur proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4179">Specifies the URL of the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4180">Cette stratégie est appliquée uniquement si la stratégie de [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) n’est pas spécifiée et que vous avez sélectionné fixed_servers dans la stratégie [ProxyMode](#proxymode) .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4180">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected fixed_servers in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4181">Si vous avez sélectionné un autre mode pour la configuration des stratégies proxy, n’activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4181">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4182">Si vous activez cette stratégie, le serveur proxy configuré par cette stratégie sera utilisé pour toutes les URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4182">If you enable this policy, the proxy server configured by this policy will be used for all URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4183">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir eux-mêmes leurs paramètres de proxy dans le mode proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4183">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings while in this proxy mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4184">Ne configurez pas cette stratégie si vous avez spécifié une autre méthode de configuration des stratégies de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4184">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4185">Si vous souhaitez voir plus d’options et plus d’exemples détaillés, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4185">For more options and detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4186">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4186">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4189">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4189">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4194">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4194">GP unique name: ProxyServer</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4196">Chemin de la stratégie de groupe: Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4196">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4211">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4211">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4212">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4212">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4213">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4213">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4214">Configure les paramètres de proxy pour MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4214">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4215">Si vous activez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge ignore toutes les options liées au proxy spécifiées à partir de la ligne de commande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4215">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4216">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir eux-mêmes leurs paramètres de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4216">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4217">Cette stratégie remplace les stratégies individuelles suivantes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4217">This policy overrides the following individual policies:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4218">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4218">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4219">Le paramétrage de la stratégie [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) accepte ces champs:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4219">Setting the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy accepts the following fields:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4220">Le champ ProxyMode vous permet de spécifier le serveur proxy que MicrosoftEdge utilise et empêche les utilisateurs de modifier les paramètres du proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4220">ProxyMode, which lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing proxy settings</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4221">ProxyPacUrl, URL du fichier proxy .pac </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4221">ProxyPacUrl, a URL to a proxy .pac file</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4222">ProxyServer, URL pour le serveur proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4222">ProxyServer, a URL for the proxy server</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4223">ProxyBypassList, liste des hôtes proxy que MicrosoftEdge contourne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4223">ProxyBypassList, a list of proxy hosts that Microsoft Edge bypasses</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4224">Pour ProxyMode, si vous choisissez la valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4224">For ProxyMode, if you choose the value:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4225">direct, un proxy n’est jamais utilisé et tous les autres champs sont ignorés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4225">direct, a proxy is never used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4226">système, le proxy système est utilisé et tous les autres champs sont ignorés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4226">system, the systems's proxy is used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4227">auto_detect, tous les autres champs sont ignorés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4227">auto_detect, all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4228">fixed_servers, les champs ProxyServer et ProxyBypassList sont utilisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4228">fixed_servers, the ProxyServer and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4229">pac_script, les champs ProxyPacUrl et ProxyBypassList sont utilisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4229">pac_script, the ProxyPacUrl and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4230">Si vous souhaitez voir plus d’exemples plus détaillés, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4230">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4231">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4231">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4232">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4232">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4233">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4233">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4234">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4234">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4235">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4235">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4236">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4236">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4237">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4237">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4238">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4238">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4239">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4239">GP unique name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4240">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: paramètres du proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4240">GP name: Proxy settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4241">Chemin de la stratégie de groupe: Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4241">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4242">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4242">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4243">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4243">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4244">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4244">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4245">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4245">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4246">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4246">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4247">Nom de la valeur: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4247">Value Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4248">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4248">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4249">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4249">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {
  "ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", 
  "ProxyMode": "pac_script", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4250">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4250">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {"ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", "ProxyMode": "pac_script", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4251">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4251">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4252">Nom clé de la préférence: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4252">Preference Key Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4253">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4253">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ProxySettings</key>
<dict>
  <key>ProxyBypassList</key>
  <string>https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/</string>
  <key>ProxyMode</key>
  <string>pac_script</string>
  <key>ProxyPacUrl</key>
  <string>https://internal.site/example.pac</string>
  <key>ProxyServer</key>
  <string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
</dict>
```
