  ## <a name="sleeping-tabs-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4255">Stratégies de paramètres des onglets en veille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4255">Sleeping tabs settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4256">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4256">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sleepingtabsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4257">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4257">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-sleeping-tabs-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4258">Bloquer les onglets en veille sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4258">Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4259">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4259">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4260">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 88 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4260">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4261">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4261">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4262">Définissez une liste de sites, basés sur des modèles d’URL, qui ne sont pas autorisés à être mis en veille par des onglets en veille.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4262">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are not allowed to be put to sleep by sleeping tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4263">Si la stratégie [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) est désactivée, cette liste n’est pas utilisée et aucun site n’est mis en veille automatiquement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4263">If the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is disabled, this list is not used and no sites will be put to sleep automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4264">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, tous les sites seront éligibles pour être mis en veille, sauf si la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur les bloque.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4264">If you don't configure this policy, all sites will be eligible to be put to sleep unless the user's personal configuration blocks them.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4265">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4265">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4266">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4266">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4267">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4267">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4268">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4268">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4269">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4269">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4270">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4270">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4271">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4271">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4272">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4272">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4273">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4273">GP unique name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4274">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : bloquer les onglets en veille sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4274">GP name: Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4275">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (obligatoire) : paramètres Modèles d’administration/Microsoft Edge/Onglets en veille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4275">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4276">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé) : Modèles d’administration/Microsoft Edge – Paramètres par défaut (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Paramètres d’onglets en veille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4276">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4277">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4277">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4278">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4278">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4279">Path (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4279">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4280">Path (recommandée): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4280">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4281">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4281">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4282">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4282">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4283">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4283">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4284">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4284">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4285">Nom de la clé de préférence: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4285">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4286">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4286">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4287">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4287">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sleepingtabsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4288">SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4288">SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-sleeping-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4289">Configurer les onglets en veille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4289">Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4290">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4290">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4291">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 88 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4291">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4292">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4292">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4293">Ce paramètre de stratégie vous permet de configurer l’activer ou non pour les onglets en veille.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4293">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on sleeping tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4294">Les onglets en veille réduisent l’utilisation du processeur, de la batterie et de la mémoire en mettant en veille les onglets d’arrière-plan inactifs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4294">Sleeping tabs reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage by putting idle background tabs to sleep.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4295">Microsoft Edge utilise des heuristiques pour éviter de mettre en veille des onglets qui fonctionnent de manière utile en arrière-plan, tels que les notifications d’affichage, la lecture de sons et la vidéo en flux continu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4295">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid putting tabs to sleep that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4296">Par défaut, les onglets en veille sont activés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4296">By default, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4297">La mise en veille des sites individuels peut être bloquée en configurant la stratégie [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4297">Individual sites may be blocked from being put to sleep by configuring the policy [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4298">Si vous activez ce paramètre, les onglets en veille sont activés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4298">If you enable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4299">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre, les onglets en veille sont désactivés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4299">If you disable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4300">Si vous ne configurez pas ce paramètre, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir d’utiliser ou non les onglets en veille.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4300">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use sleeping tabs.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4301">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4301">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4302">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4302">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4303">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4303">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4304">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4304">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4305">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4305">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4306">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4306">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4307">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4307">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4308">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4308">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4309">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4309">GP unique name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4310">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : configurer les onglets en veille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4310">GP name: Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4311">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (obligatoire) : paramètres Modèles d’administration/Microsoft Edge/Onglets en veille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4311">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4312">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé) : Modèles d’administration/Microsoft Edge – Paramètres par défaut (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Paramètres d’onglets en veille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4312">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4313">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4313">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4314">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4314">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4315">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4315">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4316">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4316">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4317">Nom de la valeur: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4317">Value Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4318">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4318">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4319">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4319">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4320">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4320">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4321">Nom de la clé de préférence: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4321">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4322">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4322">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="sleepingtabstimeout"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4324">SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4324">SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-background-tab-inactivity-timeout-for-sleeping-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4325">Définir le délai d’inactivité de l’onglet en arrière-plan pour les onglets en veille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4325">Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4326">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4326">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4327">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 88 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4327">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4328">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4328">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4329">Ce paramètre de stratégie vous permet de configurer le délai d’inactivité, en secondes, après lequel les onglets d’arrière-plan inactifs sont automatiquement mis en veille si les onglets en veille sont activés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4329">This policy setting lets you configure the timeout, in seconds, after which inactive background tabs will be automatically put to sleep if sleeping tabs is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4330">Par défaut, ce délai d’expiration est de 7200secondes (2heures).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4330">By default, this timeout is 7,200 seconds (2 hours).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4331">Les onglets sont automatiquement mis en veille lorsque la stratégie [SleepTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) est activée ou n’est pas configurée et que l’utilisateur a activé le paramètre onglets en veille.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4331">Tabs are only put to sleep automatically when the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is enabled or is not configured and the user has enabled the sleeping tabs setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4332">Si vous ne configurez pas ce paramètre, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir la valeur du délai d’expiration.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4332">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose the timeout value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4333">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4333">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4334">5Minutes (300) = 5 minutes d’inactivité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4334">5Minutes (300) = 5 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4335">15Minutes (900) = 15 minutes d’inactivité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4335">15Minutes (900) = 15 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4336">30Minutes (1800) = 30 minutes d’inactivité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4336">30Minutes (1800) = 30 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4337">1Hour (3600) = 1 heure d’inactivité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4337">1Hour (3600) = 1 hour of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4338">2Hours (7200) = 2 heures d’inactivité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4338">2Hours (7200) = 2 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4339">3Hours (10800) = 3 heures d’inactivité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4339">3Hours (10800) = 3 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4340">6Hours (21600) = 6 heures d’inactivité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4340">6Hours (21600) = 6 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4341">12Hours (43200) = 12 heures d’inactivité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4341">12Hours (43200) = 12 hours of inactivity</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4342">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4342">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4343">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4343">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4344">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4344">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4345">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4345">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4346">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4346">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4347">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4347">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4348">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4348">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4349">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4349">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4350">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4350">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4351">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4351">GP unique name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4352">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir le délai d’inactivité de l’onglet en arrière-plan pour les onglets en veille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4352">GP name: Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4353">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (obligatoire) : paramètres Modèles d’administration/Microsoft Edge/Onglets en veille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4353">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4354">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé) : Modèles d’administration/Microsoft Edge – Paramètres par défaut (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Paramètres d’onglets en veille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4354">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4355">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4355">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4356">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4356">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4357">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4357">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4358">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4358">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4359">Nom de la valeur: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4359">Value Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4360">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4360">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4361">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4361">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000384
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4362">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4362">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4363">Nom de la clé de préférence: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4363">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4364">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4364">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>900</integer>
```

  ## <a name="smartscreen-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4366">Stratégies des paramètres SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4366">SmartScreen settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4367">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4367">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="preventsmartscreenpromptoverride"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4368">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4368">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-bypassing-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-prompts-for-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4369">Empêcher le contournement des avertissements de Microsoft Defender SmartScreen pour les sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4369">Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4370">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4370">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4371">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4371">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4372">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4372">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4373">Ce paramètre de stratégie indique si les utilisateurs peuvent ignorer les avertissements de MicrosoftDefenderSmartScreen concernant les sites web potentiellement malveillants.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4373">This policy setting lets you decide whether users can override the Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about potentially malicious websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4374">Si vous activez ce paramètre, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas ignorer les avertissements de WindowsDefenderSmartScreen et ne peuvent pas accéder au site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4374">If you enable this setting, users can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and they are blocked from continuing to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4375">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas ce paramètre, les utilisateurs peuvent ignorer les avertissements de MicrosoftDefenderSmartScreen et accéder au site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4375">If you disable or don't configure this setting, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and continue to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4376">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4376">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4377">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4377">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4378">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4378">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4379">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4379">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4380">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4380">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4381">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4381">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4382">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4382">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4383">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4383">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4384">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4384">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4385">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4385">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4386">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: empêcher le contournement des avertissements de Microsoft Defender SmartScreen pour les sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4386">GP name: Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4387">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4387">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4388">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4388">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4389">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4389">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4390">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4390">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4391">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4391">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4392">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4392">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4393">Nom de la valeur: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4393">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4394">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4394">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4395">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4395">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4396">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4396">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4397">Nom clé de la préférence: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4397">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4398">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4398">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="preventsmartscreenpromptoverrideforfiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4400">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4400">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-bypassing-of-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-warnings-about-downloads"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4401">Empêcher le contournement des avertissements de Microsoft Defender SmartScreen pour les téléchargements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4401">Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4402">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4402">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4403">sur Windows depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4403">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4404">sur macOS depuis la version79 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4404">On macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4405">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4405">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4406">Cette stratégie vous permet de déterminer si les utilisateurs sont autorisés à ignorer les avertissements de Microsoft Defender SmartScreen pour le téléchargement de fichiers non vérifiés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4406">This policy lets you determine whether users can override Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4407">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs de votre organisation ne peuvent pas ignorer les avertissements de Microsoft Defender SmartScreen, et ne peuvent pas effectuer les téléchargements non vérifiés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4407">If you enable this policy, users in your organization can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings, and they're prevented from completing the unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4408">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent ignorer les avertissements de MicrosoftDefenderSmartScreen et effectuer les téléchargements non vérifiés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4408">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and complete unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4409">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4409">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4410">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4410">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4411">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4411">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4412">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4412">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4413">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4413">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4414">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4414">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4415">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4415">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4416">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4416">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4417">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4417">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4418">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4418">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4419">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: empêcher le contournement des avertissements de Microsoft Defender SmartScreen pour les téléchargements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4419">GP name: Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4420">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4420">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4421">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4421">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4422">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4422">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4423">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4423">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4424">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4424">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4425">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4425">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4426">Nom de la valeur: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4426">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4427">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4427">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4428">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4428">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4429">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4429">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4430">Nom clé de la préférence: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4430">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4431">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4431">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="smartscreenallowlistdomains"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4433">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4433">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-domains-for-which-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-wont-trigger-warnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4434">Configurer la liste des domaines pour lesquels Microsoft Defender SmartScreen ne déclenche pas d’avertissement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4434">Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4435">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4435">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4436">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4436">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4437">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4437">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4438">Configurez la liste des domaines approuvés par Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4438">Configure the list of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusted domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4439">Cela signifie que Microsoft Defender SmartScreen ne recherche pas les ressources potentiellement malveillantes, telles que les logiciels d’hameçonnage et autres programmes malveillants, si les URL sources correspondent à ces domaines.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4439">This means: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't check for potentially malicious resources like phishing software and other malware if the source URLs match these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4440">Le service de protection de téléchargement de Microsoft Defender SmartScreen ne vérifie pas les téléchargements hébergés sur ces domaines.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4440">The Microsoft Defender SmartScreen download protection service won't check downloads hosted on these domains.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4441">Si vous activez cette stratégie, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen approuve ces domaines.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4441">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusts these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4442">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la protection Microsoft Defender SmartScreen par défaut est appliquée à toutes les ressources.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4442">If you disable or don't set this policy, default Microsoft Defender SmartScreen protection is applied to all resources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4443">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4443">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4444">Notez également que cette stratégie ne s’applique pas si votre organisation a activé Microsoft Defender - Protection avancée contre les menaces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4444">Also note that this policy does not apply if your organization has enabled Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4445">Vous devez plutôt configurer vos listes verte et rouge dans le Centre de sécurité Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4445">You must configure your allow and block lists in Microsoft Defender Security Center instead.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4446">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4446">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4447">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4447">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4448">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4448">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4449">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4449">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4450">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4450">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4451">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4451">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4452">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4452">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4453">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4453">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4454">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4454">GP unique name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4455">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la liste des domaines pour lesquels Microsoft Defender SmartScreen ne déclenche pas d’avertissement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4455">GP name: Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4456">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4456">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4457">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4457">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4458">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4458">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4459">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4459">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4460">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4460">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4461">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4461">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4462">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4462">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4463">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4463">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4464">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4464">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\2 = "myuniversity.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4465">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4465">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4466">Nom clé de la préférence: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4466">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4467">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4467">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>mydomain.com</string>
  <string>myuniversity.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="smartscreenenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4469">SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4469">SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-microsoft-defender-smartscreen"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4470">Configurer Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4470">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4471">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4471">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4472">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4472">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4473">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4473">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4474">Ce paramètre de stratégie vous permet de configurer l’activation ou la désactivation de MicrosoftDefenderSmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4474">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4475">MicrosoftDefenderSmartScreen envoie des messages d’avertissement pour protéger les utilisateurs contre d’éventuels courriers indésirables d’hameçonnage et logiciels malveillants.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4475">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect your users from potential phishing scams and malicious software.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4476">Par défaut, MicrosoftDefenderSmartScreen est activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4476">By default, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4477">Si vous activez ce paramètre, MicrosoftDefenderSmartScreen est activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4477">If you enable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4478">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre, MicrosoftDefenderSmartScreen est désactivé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4478">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4479">Si vous ne configurez pas ce paramètre, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir d’utiliser ou non MicrosoftDefenderSmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4479">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4480">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4480">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4481">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4481">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4482">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4482">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4483">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4483">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4484">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4484">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4485">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4485">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4486">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4486">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4487">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4487">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4488">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4488">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4489">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4489">GP unique name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4490">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4490">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4491">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4491">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4492">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4492">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4493">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4493">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4494">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4494">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4495">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4495">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4496">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4496">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4497">Nom de la valeur: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4497">Value Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4498">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4498">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4499">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4499">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4500">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4500">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4501">Nom clé de la préférence: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4501">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4502">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4502">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="smartscreenfortrusteddownloadsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4504">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4504">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-checks-on-downloads-from-trusted-sources"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4505">Forcer Microsoft Defender SmartScreen à vérifier les téléchargements provenant de sources approuvées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4505">Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4506">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4506">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4507">sur Windows depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4507">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4508">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4508">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4509">Ce paramètre de stratégie vous permet de configurer la vérification, par Microsoft Defender SmartScreen, de la réputation des téléchargements provenant d’une source approuvée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4509">This policy setting lets you configure whether Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks download reputation from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4510">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas ce paramètre, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen vérifie la réputation du téléchargement quelle que soit la source.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4510">If you enable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks the download's reputation regardless of source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4511">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen ne vérifie pas la réputation du téléchargement lors d’un téléchargement provenant d’une source approuvée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4511">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen doesn't check the download's reputation when downloading from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4512">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise qui sont inscrites pour la gestion des appareils.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4512">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4513">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4513">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4514">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4514">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4515">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4515">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4516">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4516">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4517">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4517">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4518">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4518">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4519">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4519">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4520">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4520">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4521">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4521">GP unique name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4522">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: forcer Microsoft Defender SmartScreen à vérifier les téléchargements provenant de sources approuvées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4522">GP name: Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4523">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4523">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4524">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4524">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4525">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4525">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4526">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4526">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4527">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4527">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4528">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4528">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4529">Nom de la valeur: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4529">Value Name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4530">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4530">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4531">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4531">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="smartscreenpuaenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4533">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4533">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-to-block-potentially-unwanted-apps"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4534">Configurer Microsoft Defender SmartScreen pour bloquer les applications potentiellement indésirables.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4534">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4535">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4535">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4536">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4536">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4537">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4537">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4538">Ce paramètre de stratégie vous permet de configurer l’activation ou la désactivation du blocage des applications potentiellement indésirables dans MicrosoftDefenderSmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4538">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on blocking for potentially unwanted apps with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4539">Le blocage d’applications potentiellement indésirables dans Microsoft Defender SmartScreen fournit des messages d’avertissement pour protéger les utilisateurs des logiciels de publicité, des minages de cryptomonnaie, des bundleware et autres applications à faible réputation, hébergées par des sites web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4539">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect users from adware, coin miners, bundleware, and other low-reputation apps that are hosted by websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4540">Le blocage d’applications potentiellement indésirables dans Microsoft Defender SmartScreen est désactivé par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4540">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4541">Si vous activez ce paramètre, le blocage des applications potentiellement indésirables dans Microsoft Defender SmartScreen est activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4541">If you enable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4542">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre, le blocage des applications potentiellement indésirables dans Microsoft Defender SmartScreen est désactivé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4542">If you disable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4543">Si vous ne configurez pas ce paramètre, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir s’ils souhaitent utiliser le blocage des applications potentiellement indésirables dans Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4543">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4544">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4544">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4545">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4545">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4546">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4546">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4547">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4547">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4548">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4548">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4549">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4549">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4550">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4550">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4551">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4551">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4552">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4552">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4553">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4553">GP unique name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4554">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer Microsoft Defender SmartScreen pour bloquer les applications potentiellement indésirables.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4554">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4555">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4555">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4556">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4556">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4557">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4557">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4558">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4558">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4559">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4559">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4560">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4560">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4561">Nom de la valeur: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4561">Value Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4562">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4562">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4563">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4563">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4564">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4564">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4565">Nom clé de la préférence: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4565">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4566">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4566">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
