  ## <a name="startupcomma-home-page-and-new-tab-page-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4568">Stratégies de démarrage&comma; page d’accueil et page Nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4568">Startup&comma; home page and new tab page policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4569">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4569">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="homepageisnewtabpage"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4570">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4570">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-new-tab-page-as-the-home-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4571">Définir la page Nouvel onglet comme page d’accueil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4571">Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4572">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4572">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4573">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4573">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4574">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4574">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4575">Configure la page d’accueil par défaut dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4575">Configures the default home page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4576">Vous pouvez définir la page d’accueil sur une URL que vous spécifiez ou sur la page Nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4576">You can set the home page to a URL you specify or to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4577">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la page Nouvel onglet est systématiquement utilisée comme page d’accueil, et l’adresse URL de la page d’accueil est ignorée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4577">If you enable this policy, the new tab page is always used for the home page, and the home page URL location is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4578">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, la page d’accueil de l’utilisateur ne peut pas être la page Nouvel onglet, sauf si l’URL de la page d’accueil est définie sur 'edge://newtab'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4578">If you disable this policy, the user's home page can't be the new tab page, unless the URL is set to 'edge://newtab'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4579">Si la stratégie n’a pas été configurée, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir d’utiliser la page Nouvel onglet comme page d’accueil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4579">If not configured users can choose whether the new tab page is their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4580">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4580">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4581">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4581">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4582">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4582">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4583">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4583">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4584">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4584">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4585">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4585">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4586">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4586">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4587">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4587">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4588">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4588">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4589">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4589">GP unique name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4590">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir la page Nouvel onglet comme page d’accueil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4590">GP name: Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4591">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4591">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4592">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4592">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4593">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4593">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4594">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4594">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4595">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4595">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4596">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4596">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4597">Nom de la valeur: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4597">Value Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4598">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4598">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4599">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4599">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4600">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4600">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4601">Nom clé de la préférence: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4601">Preference Key Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4602">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4602">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="homepagelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4604">HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4604">HomepageLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-home-page-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4605">Configurer l’URL de la page d’accueil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4605">Configure the home page URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4606">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4606">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4607">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4607">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4608">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4608">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4609">Configure l’URL de la page d’accueil par défaut dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4609">Configures the default home page URL in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4610">La page d’accueil est la page qui s’ouvre lorsque le bouton Accueil est sélectionné.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4610">The home page is the page opened by the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4611">Les pages qui s’ouvrent au démarrage sont contrôlées par les stratégies [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4611">The pages that open on startup are controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4612">Vous pouvez spécifier une URL ici ou choisir la page d’accueil pour ouvrir la page Nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4612">You can either set a URL here or set the home page to open the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4613">Si vous choisissez d’ouvrir la page Nouvel onglet, cette stratégie ne s’applique pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4613">If you select to open the new tab page, then this policy doesn't take effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4614">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas modifier l’URL de la page d’accueil, mais ils peuvent ils peuvent définir la page Nouvel onglet comme page d’accueil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4614">If you enable this policy, users can't change their home page URL, but they can choose to use the new tab page as their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4615">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir leur propre page d’accueil, tant que la stratégie [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) n’est pas activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4615">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own home page, as long as the [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) policy isn't enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4616">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4616">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4617">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4617">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4618">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4618">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4619">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4619">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4620">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4620">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4621">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4621">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4622">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4622">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4623">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4623">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4624">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4624">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4625">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4625">GP unique name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4626">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer l’URL de la page d’accueil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4626">GP name: Configure the home page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4627">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4627">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4628">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4628">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4629">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4629">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4630">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4630">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4631">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4631">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4632">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4632">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4633">Nom de la valeur: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4633">Value Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4634">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4634">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4635">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4635">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4636">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4636">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4637">Nom clé de la préférence: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4637">Preference Key Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4638">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4638">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4640">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4640">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-background-types-allowed-for-the-new-tab-page-layout"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4641">Configurer les types d’arrière-plan autorisés pour la disposition du nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4641">Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4642">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4642">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4643">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4643">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4644">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4644">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4645">Vous pouvez définir les types d’image d’arrière-plan qui sont autorisés dans la disposition du nouvel onglet dans Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4645">You can configure which types of background image that are allowed on the new tab page layout in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4646">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, tous les types d’images d’arrière-plan du nouvel onglet sont activés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4646">If you don't configure this policy, all background image types on the new tab page are enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4647">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4647">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4648">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = Désactiver le type d’image d’arrière-plan quotidienne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4648">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = Disable daily background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4649">DisableCustomImage (2) = Désactiver le type d’image d’arrière-plan personnalisée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4649">DisableCustomImage (2) = Disable custom background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4650">DisableAll (3) = Désactiver tous types d’image d’arrière-plan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4650">DisableAll (3) = Disable all background image types</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4651">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4651">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4652">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4652">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4653">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4653">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4654">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4654">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4655">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4655">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4656">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4656">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4657">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4657">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4658">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4658">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4659">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4659">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4660">Nom unique GP : NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4660">GP unique name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4661">Nom GP : Définir les types d’arrière-plan autorisés pour la disposition du nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4661">GP name: Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4662">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4662">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4663">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4663">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4664">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4664">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4665">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4665">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4666">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4666">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4667">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4667">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4668">Nom de la valeur : NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4668">Value Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4669">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4669">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4670">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4670">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4671">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4671">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4672">Nom de clé préféré : NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4672">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4673">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4673">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpagecompanylogo"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4675">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4675">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-new-tab-page-company-logo-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4676">Définir le logo de l’entreprise sur la page Nouvel onglet (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4676">Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4677">OBSOLÈTE: Cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas après la version85 de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4677">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4678">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4678">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4679">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version79 et jusqu’à la version85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4679">On Windows and macOS since 79, until 85</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4680">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4680">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4681">Cette stratégie ne fonctionnait pas comme prévu en raison de modifications apportées aux besoins opérationnels.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4681">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4682">Par conséquent, elle est obsolète et ne doit pas être utilisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4682">Therefore it's obsolete and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4683">Spécifie le logo de l’entreprise à utiliser sur la page Nouvel onglet dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4683">Specifies the company logo to use on the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4684">La stratégie doit être configurée sous la forme d’une chaîne qui exprime le ou les logos au format JSON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4684">The policy should be configured as a string that expresses the logo(s) in JSON format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4685">Par exemple: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4685">For example: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4686">Pour configurer cette stratégie, spécifiez l’URL à partir de laquelle MicrosoftEdge peut télécharger le logo et son hachage de chiffrement (SHA-256), qui permet de vérifier l’intégrité du téléchargement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4686">You configure this policy by specifying the URL from which Microsoft Edge can download the logo and its cryptographic hash (SHA-256), which is used to verify the integrity of the download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4687">Le logo doit être au format PNG ou SVG et sa taille de fichier ne doit pas dépasser16 Mo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4687">The logo must be in PNG or SVG format, and its file size must not exceed 16 MB.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4688">Le logo est téléchargé et mis en cache. Il est téléchargé à nouveau, à chaque modification de l’URL ou du hachage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4688">The logo is downloaded and cached, and it will be redownloaded whenever the URL or the hash changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4689">L’URL doit être accessible sans authentification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4689">The URL must be accessible without any authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4690">Le «default_logo» est obligatoire et est utilisé lorsqu’il n’y a pas d’image d’arrière-plan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4690">The 'default_logo' is required and will be used when there's no background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4691">Si «light_logo» est spécifié, il est utilisé lorsque le nouvel onglet de l’utilisateur a une image d’arrière-plan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4691">If 'light_logo' is provided, it will be used when the user's new tab page has a background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4692">Il est recommandé d’utiliser un logo horizontal, avec un arrière-plan transparent aligné à gauche, et centré verticalement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4692">We recommend a horizontal logo with a transparent background that is left-aligned and vertically centered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4693">Le logo doit avoir une hauteur minimale de 32pixels et des proportions de 1:1 à 4:1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4693">The logo should have a minimum height of 32 pixels and an aspect ratio from 1:1 to 4:1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4694">Le «default_logo» doit avoir un contraste approprié avec un arrière-plan blanc/noir, tandis que le «light_logo» doit avoir un contraste correct par rapport à une image d’arrière-plan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4694">The 'default_logo' should have proper contrast against a white/black background while the 'light_logo' should have proper contrast against a background image.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4695">Si vous activez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge télécharge et affiche le ou les logo spécifiés sur le nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4695">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge downloads and shows the specified logo(s) on the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4696">Les utilisateurs ne peuvent ni remplacer ni masquer le ou les logos. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4696">Users can't override or hide the logo(s).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4697">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, MicrosoftEdge n’affiche pas le logo de l’entreprise, ni le logo Microsoft sur le nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4697">If you disable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show no company logo or a Microsoft logo on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4698">Pour obtenir de l’aide sur la détermination du hachage SHA-256, consultez https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4698">For help with determining the SHA-256 hash, see https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4699">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4699">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4700">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4700">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4701">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4701">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4702">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4702">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4703">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4703">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4704">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4704">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4705">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4705">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4706">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4706">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4707">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4707">GP unique name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4708">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir le logo de l’entreprise sur la page Nouvel onglet (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4708">GP name: Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4709">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4709">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4710">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4710">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4711">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4711">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4712">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4712">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4713">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4713">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4714">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4714">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4715">Nom de la valeur: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4715">Value Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4716">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4716">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4717">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4717">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageCompanyLogo = {
  "default_logo": {
    "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png"
  }, 
  "light_logo": {
    "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png"
  }
}
```


  ### <a name="newtabpagecontentenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4723">NewTabPageContentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4723">NewTabPageContentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-microsoft-news-content-on-the-new-tab-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4724">Autoriser le contenu Microsoft News sur la page Nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4724">Allow Microsoft News content on the new tab page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4725">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4725">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4726">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la mise à jour91 ou ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4726">On Windows and macOS since 91 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4727">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4727">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4728">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge affiche le contenu Microsoft News sur la page Nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4728">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge displays Microsoft News content on the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4729">L’utilisateur peut choisir différentes options d’affichage pour le contenu, y compris, mais sans s’y limiter, contenu visible sur défilement, Titres uniquement et Contenu visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4729">The user can choose different display options for the content, including but not limited to Content off, Content visible on scroll, Headings only, and Content visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4730">L’activation de cette stratégie ne force pas la visibilité du contenu : l’utilisateur peut continuer à définir sa propre position de contenu préférée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4730">Enabling this policy doesn't force content to be visible - the user can continue to set their own preferred content position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4731">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge n’affiche pas le contenu Microsoft News sur la page Nouvel onglet, le contrôle Contenu dans le menu contextuel des paramètres NTP est désactivé et est désactivé et est «Contenu désactivé».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4731">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge does not display Microsoft News content on the new tab page, the Content control in the NTP settings flyout is disabled and set to 'Content off'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4732">Cette stratégie s’applique uniquement aux profils utilisateur locaux MicrosoftEdge, aux profils signés à l’aide d’un compte Microsoft et aux profils signés à l’aide d’Active Directory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4732">This policy only applies for Microsoft Edge local user profiles, profiles signed in using a Microsoft Account, and profiles signed in using Active Directory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4733">Pour configurer la page Nouvel onglet Entreprise pour les profils signés à l’aide d’Azure Active Directory, utilisez le portail d’administration M365.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4733">To configure the Enterprise new tab page for profiles signed in using Azure Active Directory, use the M365 admin portal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4734">Stratégies connexes [: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes](#newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes), [NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled](#newtabpagequicklinksenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4734">Related policies: [NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes](#newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes), [NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled](#newtabpagequicklinksenabled)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4735">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4735">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4736">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4736">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4737">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4737">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4738">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4738">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4739">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4739">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4740">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4740">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4741">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4741">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4742">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4742">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4743">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe : NewTabPageContentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4743">GP unique name: NewTabPageContentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4744">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : autoriser le contenu Microsoft News sur la page nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4744">GP name: Allow Microsoft News content on the new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4745">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, page d’accueil et page Nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4745">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4746">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4746">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4747">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4747">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4748">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4748">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4749">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4749">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4750">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4750">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4751">Nom de la valeur : NewTabPageContentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4751">Value Name: NewTabPageContentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4752">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4752">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4753">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4753">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4754">Informations et paramètres Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4754">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4755">Nom clé de la préférence : NewTabPageContentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4755">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageContentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4756">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4756">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpagehidedefaulttopsites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4758">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4758">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-default-top-sites-from-the-new-tab-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4759">Masquer les sites populaires par défaut dans la page Nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4759">Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4760">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4760">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4761">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4761">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4762">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4762">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4763">Masque les sites populaires par défaut dans la page Nouvel onglet sur MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4763">Hides the default top sites from the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4764">Si vous attribuez la valeur true à cette stratégie, les vignettes de site populaire par défaut sont masquées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4764">If you set this policy to true, the default top site tiles are hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4765">Si vous attribuez la valeur false à cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, les vignettes de site populaire par défaut restent visibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4765">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the default top site tiles remain visible.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4766">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4766">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4767">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4767">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4768">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4768">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4769">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4769">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4770">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4770">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4771">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4771">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4772">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4772">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4773">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4773">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4774">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4774">GP unique name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4775">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: masquer les sites populaires par défaut dans la page Nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4775">GP name: Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4776">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4776">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4777">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4777">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4778">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4778">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4779">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4779">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4780">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4780">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4781">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4781">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4782">Nom de la valeur: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4782">Value Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4783">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4783">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4784">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4784">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4785">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4785">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4786">Nom clé de la préférence: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4786">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4787">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4787">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpagelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4789">NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4789">NewTabPageLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-new-tab-page-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4790">Configurer l’URL de la page Nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4790">Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4791">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4791">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4792">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4792">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4793">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4793">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4794">Configure l’URL par défaut de la page Nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4794">Configures the default URL for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4795">La version recommandée de cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas pour le moment et ne fonctionne pas exactement comme la version obligatoire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4795">The recommended version of this policy does not currently work and functions exactly like the mandatory version.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4796">Cette stratégie détermine la page qui s’ouvre lors de la création de nouveaux onglets (y compris lorsque de nouvelles fenêtres sont ouvertes).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4796">This policy determines the page that's opened when new tabs are created (including when new windows are opened).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4797">Elle affecte également la page de démarrage si celle-ci est configurée pour s’ouvrir sur la page Nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4797">It also affects the startup page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4798">Cette stratégie ne détermine pas la page qui s’ouvre au démarrage. Cette dernière est contrôlée par la stratégie [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4798">This policy doesn't determine which page opens on startup; that's controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4799">Elle n’affecte pas non plus la page d’accueil si celle-ci est configurée pour s’ouvrir sur la page Nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4799">It also doesn't affect the home page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4800">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la page Nouvel onglet par défaut est utilisée. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4800">If you don't configure this policy, the default new tab page is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4801">Si vous configurez cette stratégie\* et \* la stratégie [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype), cette stratégie prévaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4801">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) policy, this policy has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4802">Si un onglet vide est préféré, «about:blank» est l’URL correcte à utiliser, et non «about://blank».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4802">If a blank tab is preferred, "about:blank" is the correct URL to use, not "about://blank".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4803">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4803">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4804">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4804">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4805">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4805">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4806">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4806">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4807">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4807">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4808">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4808">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4809">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4809">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4810">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4810">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4811">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4811">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4812">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4812">GP unique name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4813">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer l’URL de la page Nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4813">GP name: Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4814">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4814">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4815">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4815">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4816">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4816">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4817">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4817">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4818">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4818">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4819">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4819">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4820">Nom de la valeur: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4820">Value Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4821">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4821">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4822">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4822">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.fabrikam.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4823">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4823">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4824">Nom clé de la préférence: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4824">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4825">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4825">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4826">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4826">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpagemanagedquicklinks"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4827">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4827">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-new-tab-page-quick-links"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4828">Définir les liens rapides de la page Nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4828">Set new tab page quick links</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4829">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4829">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4830">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version79 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4830">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4831">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4831">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4832">Par défaut, MicrosoftEdge affiche les liens rapides du nouvel onglet à partir des raccourcis ajoutés par l’utilisateur et des sites populaires en fonction de l’historique de navigation. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4832">By default, Microsoft Edge displays quick links on the new tab page from user-added shortcuts and top sites based on browsing history.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4833">Grâce à cette stratégie, vous pouvez configurer jusqu’à trois vignettes de liens rapides sur la page Nouvel onglet, exprimées sous forme d’objet JSON:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4833">With this policy, you can configure up to three quick link tiles on the new tab page, expressed as a JSON object:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4834">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4834">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4835">Le champ «url» est obligatoire ; les éléments «title» et «pinned» sont facultatifs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4835">The 'url' field is required; 'title' and 'pinned' are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4836">Si «title» n’est pas spécifié, l’URL est utilisée comme titre par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4836">If 'title' is not provided, the URL is used as the default title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4837">Si «pinned» n’est pas spécifié, la valeur par défaut est false.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4837">If 'pinned' is not provided, the default value is false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4838">MicrosoftEdge présente celles-ci dans l’ordre dans lequel elles sont répertoriées, de gauche à droite, avec toutes les vignettes épinglées affichées avant les vignettes non épinglées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4838">Microsoft Edge presents these in the order listed, from left to right, with all pinned tiles displayed ahead of non-pinned tiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4839">Si la stratégie est définie comme obligatoire, le champ «pinned» est ignoré et toutes les vignettes sont épinglées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4839">If the policy is set as mandatory, the 'pinned' field will be ignored and all tiles will be pinned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4840">Les vignettes ne peuvent pas être supprimées par l’utilisateur et apparaissent toujours au début de la liste des liens rapides.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4840">The tiles can't be deleted by the user and will always appear at the front of the quick links list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4841">Si la stratégie est définie comme recommandée, les vignettes épinglées sont conservées dans la liste, mais l’utilisateur peut les modifier et les supprimer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4841">If the policy is set as recommended, pinned tiles will remain in the list but the user has the ability to edit and delete them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4842">Les vignettes de lien rapide qui ne sont pas épinglées se comportent comme des sites populaires par défaut et sont exclues de la liste si d’autres sites web sont visités plus fréquemment.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4842">Quick link tiles that aren't pinned behave like default top sites and are pushed off the list if other websites are visited more frequently.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4843">Lors de l’application de liens non épinglés via cette stratégie à un profil de navigateur existant, il est possible que les liens n’apparaissent pas du tout, suivant la façon dont ils sont classés par rapport à l’historique de navigation de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4843">When applying non-pinned links via this policy to an existing browser profile, the links may not appear at all, depending on how they rank compared to the user's browsing history.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4844">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4844">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4845">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4845">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4846">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4846">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4847">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4847">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4848">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4848">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4849">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4849">Dictionary</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4851">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4851">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4852">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4852">GP unique name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4853">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir les liens rapides de la page Nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4853">GP name: Set new tab page quick links</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4854">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4854">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4855">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4855">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4856">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4856">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4857">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4857">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4858">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4858">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4859">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4859">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4860">Nom de la valeur: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4860">Value Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4861">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4861">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4862">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4862">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [
  {
    "pinned": true, 
    "title": "Contoso Portal", 
    "url": "https://contoso.com"
  }, 
  {
    "title": "Fabrikam", 
    "url": "https://fabrikam.com"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4863">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4863">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [{"pinned": true, "title": "Contoso Portal", "url": "https://contoso.com"}, {"title": "Fabrikam", "url": "https://fabrikam.com"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4864">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4864">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4865">Nom clé de la préférence: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4865">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4866">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4866">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>pinned</key>
    <true/>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Contoso Portal</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Fabrikam</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpageprerenderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4868">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4868">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4870">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4870">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4871">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4871">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4872">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4872">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4873">Si vous configurez cette stratégie, le préchargement de la page de l’onglet nouveau est activé, et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4873">If you configure this policy, preloading the New tab page is enabled, and users can't change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4874">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le préchargement est activé et un utilisateur peut modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4874">If you don't configure this policy, preloading is enabled and a user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4875">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4875">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4876">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4876">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4877">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4877">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4878">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4878">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4879">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4879">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4880">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4880">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4881">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4881">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4882">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4882">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4883">Nom unique GP: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4883">GP unique name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4884">Nom de la stratégie de contrôle: activer le préchargement de la nouvelle page d’onglet pour un rendu plus rapide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4884">GP name: Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4885">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4885">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4886">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4886">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4887">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4887">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4888">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4888">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4889">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4889">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4890">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4890">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4891">Nom de la valeur: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4891">Value Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4892">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4892">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4893">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4893">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4894">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4894">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4895">Nom de la clé de préférence: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4895">Preference Key Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>

