  ### <a name="newtabpagequicklinksenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4898">NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4898">NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-quick-links-on-the-new-tab-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4899">Autoriser les liens rapides sur la page Nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4899">Allow quick links on the new tab page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4900">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4900">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4901">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la mise à jour91 ou ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4901">On Windows and macOS since 91 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4902">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4902">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4903">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge affiche des liens rapides sur la page Nouvel onglet et l’utilisateur peut interagir avec le contrôle, ce qui active et éteint les liens rapides.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4903">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge displays quick links on the new tab page, and the user can interact with the control, turning quick links on and off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4904">L’activation de cette stratégie ne force pas la visibilité des liens rapides : l’utilisateur peut continuer à activer et désactiver les liens rapides.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4904">Enabling this policy does not force quick links to be visible - the user can continue to turn quick links on and off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4905">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge masque les liens rapides sur la page Nouvel onglet et désactive le contrôle de liens rapides dans le volant des paramètres NTP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4905">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge hides quick links on the new tab page and disables the quick links control in the NTP settings flyout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4906">Cette stratégie s’applique uniquement aux profils utilisateur locaux MicrosoftEdge, aux profils signés à l’aide d’un compte Microsoft et aux profils signés à l’aide d’Active Directory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4906">This policy only applies for Microsoft Edge local user profiles, profiles signed in using a Microsoft Account, and profiles signed in using Active Directory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4907">Pour configurer la page Nouvel onglet Entreprise pour les profils signés à l’aide d’Azure Active Directory, utilisez le portail d’administration M365.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4907">To configure the Enterprise new tab page for profiles signed in using Azure Active Directory, use the M365 admin portal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4908">Stratégies connexes [: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes](#newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes), [NewTabPageContentEnabled](#newtabpagecontentenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4908">Related policies: [NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes](#newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes), [NewTabPageContentEnabled](#newtabpagecontentenabled)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4909">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4909">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4910">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4910">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4911">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4911">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4912">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4912">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4913">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4913">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4914">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4914">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4915">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4915">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4916">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4916">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4917">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4917">GP unique name: NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4918">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les liens rapides sur la page nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4918">GP name: Allow quick links on the new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4919">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, page d’accueil et page Nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4919">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4920">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4920">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4921">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4921">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4922">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4922">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4923">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4923">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4924">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4924">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4925">Nom de la valeur : NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4925">Value Name: NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4926">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4926">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4927">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4927">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4928">Informations et paramètres Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4928">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4929">Nom clé de la préférence: NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4929">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4930">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4930">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpagesetfeedtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4932">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4932">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-microsoft-edge-new-tab-page-experience-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4933">Configurer l’expérience de page Nouvel onglet MicrosoftEdge (déconseillée)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4933">Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4934">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4934">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4935">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4935">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4936">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4936">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4937">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version79 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4937">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4938">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4938">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4939">Nous ne recommandons plus cette stratégie, car la nouvelle version de la page Nouvel onglet pour entreprises ne nécessite plus de choisir entre différents types de contenu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4939">We are deprecating this policy because the new version of the enterprise new tab page no longer requires choosing between different content types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4940">Au lieu de cela, le contenu présenté à l’utilisateur peut être contrôlé via le Centre d’administration Microsoft365.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4940">Instead, the content that is presented to the user can be controlled via the Microsoft 365 admin center.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4941">Pour accéder au Centre d’administration Microsoft365, connectez-vous à https://admin.microsoft.com à l’aide de votre compte d’administrateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4941">To get to the Microsoft 365 admin center, sign in at https://admin.microsoft.com with your admin account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4942">La stratégie sera obsolète après la version90 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4942">The policy will be made obsolete after Microsoft Edge version 90.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4943">Vous permet de choisir l’expérience de flux MicrosoftActualités ou Office365 pour la page Nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4943">Lets you choose either the Microsoft News or Office 365 feed experience for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4944">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur « News », les utilisateurs voient l’expérience de flux Microsoft Actualités sur le nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4944">When you set this policy to 'News', users will see the Microsoft News feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4945">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur « Office », les utilisateurs disposant d’une session sur le navigateur AzureActiveDirectory voient l’expérience de flux Office365 sur le nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4945">When you set this policy to 'Office', users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the Office 365 feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4946">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4946">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4947">les utilisateurs disposant d’une connexion au navigateur AzureActiveDirectory se voient proposer l’expérience de flux de la page Nouvel onglet Office365, ainsi que l’expérience standard de flux de la page Nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4947">Users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in are offered the Office 365 new tab page feed experience, as well as the standard new tab page feed experience.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4948">les utilisateurs sans connexion au navigateur AzureActiveDirectory voient l’expérience standard de la page Nouvel onglet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4948">Users without an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the standard new tab page experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4949">Si vous configurez cette stratégie *et* la stratégie [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation), [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) prévaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4949">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) policy, [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4950">Paramètre par défaut: désactivé ou non configuré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4950">Default setting:  Disabled or not configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4951">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4951">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4952">News (0)=Expérience de flux Microsoft Actualités</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4952">News (0) = Microsoft News feed experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4953">Office (1)=Expérience de flux Office365</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4953">Office (1) = Office 365 feed experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4954">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4954">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4955">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4955">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4956">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4956">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4957">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4957">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4958">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4958">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4959">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4959">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4960">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4960">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4961">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4961">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4962">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4962">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4963">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4963">GP unique name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4964">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer l’expérience de page Nouvel onglet MicrosoftEdge (déconseillée)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4964">GP name: Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4965">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4965">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4966">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4966">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4967">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4967">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4968">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4968">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4969">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4969">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4970">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4970">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4971">Nom de la valeur: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4971">Value Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4972">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4972">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4973">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4973">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4974">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4974">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4975">Nom clé de la préférence: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4975">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4976">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4976">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```

  ### <a name="restoreonstartup"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4978">RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4978">RestoreOnStartup</span></span>

  #### <a name="action-to-take-on-startup"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4979">Action à effectuer au démarrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4979">Action to take on startup</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4980">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4980">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4981">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4981">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4982">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4982">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4983">Spécifiez le comportement du navigateur au démarrage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4983">Specify how Microsoft Edge behaves when it starts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4984">Si vous souhaitez qu’un nouvel onglet s’ouvre à chaque démarrage, choisissez «RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4984">If you want a new tab to always open on startup, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4985">Si vous souhaitez rouvrir les URL ouvertes à la dernière fermeture de MicrosoftEdge, choisissez «RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4985">If you want to reopen URLs that were open the last time Microsoft Edge closed, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4986">La session de navigation est restaurée telle que vous l’avez laissée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4986">The browsing session will be restored as it was.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4987">La sélection de cette option entraîne la désactivation de certains paramètres qui sont basés sur les sessions ou qui ont pour effet l’exécution d’actions lors de la fermeture du navigateur, comme la suppression des données de navigation ou des cookies d’une session.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4987">Note that this option disables some settings that rely on sessions or that perform actions on exit (such as Clear browsing data on exit or session-only cookies).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4988">Si vous souhaitez ouvrir un groupe d’URL particulier, choisissez «RestoreOnStartupIsURLs ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4988">If you want to open a specific set of URLs, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsURLs'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4989">La désactivation de ce paramètre revient à le laisser non configuré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4989">Disabling this setting is equivalent to leaving it not configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4990">Les utilisateurs pourront le modifier dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4990">Users will be able to change it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4991">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4991">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4992">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4992">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4993">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = Ouvrir un nouvel onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4993">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = Open a new tab</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4994">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = Restaurer la dernière session</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4994">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = Restore the last session</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4995">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = Ouvrir une liste d’URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4995">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = Open a list of URLs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4996">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4996">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4997">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4997">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4998">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4998">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-4999">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-4999">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5000">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5000">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5001">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5001">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5002">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5002">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5003">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5003">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5004">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5004">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5005">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5005">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5006">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: action à effectuer au démarrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5006">GP name: Action to take on startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5007">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5007">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5008">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5008">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5009">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5009">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5010">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5010">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5011">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5011">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5012">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5012">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5013">Nom de la valeur: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5013">Value Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5014">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5014">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5015">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5015">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000004
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5016">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5016">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5017">Nom clé de la préférence: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5017">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5018">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5018">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>4</integer>
```

  ### <a name="restoreonstartupurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5020">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5020">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-to-open-when-the-browser-starts"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5021">Sites à ouvrir lors du démarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5021">Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5022">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5022">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5023">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5023">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5024">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5024">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5025">Spécifiez une liste de sites web à ouvrir automatiquement lors du démarrage du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5025">Specify a list of websites to open automatically when the browser starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5026">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, aucun site n’est ouvert lors du démarrage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5026">If you don't configure this policy, no site is opened on startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5027">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne que si vous avez également configuré la stratégie [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) sur ’Ouvrir une liste d’URL' (4).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5027">This policy only works if you also set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to 'Open a list of URLs' (4).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5028">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5028">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5029">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5029">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5030">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5030">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5031">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5031">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5032">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5032">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5033">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5033">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5034">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5034">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5035">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5035">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5036">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5036">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5037">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5037">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5038">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: sites à ouvrir lors du démarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5038">GP name: Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5039">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5039">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5040">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5040">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5041">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5041">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5042">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5042">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5043">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5043">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5044">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5044">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5045">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5045">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5046">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5046">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5047">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5047">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\2 = "https://www.fabrikam.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5048">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5048">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5049">Nom clé de la préférence: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5049">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5050">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5050">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="showhomebutton"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5052">ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5052">ShowHomeButton</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-home-button-on-toolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5053">Afficher le bouton Accueil sur la barre d’outils</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5053">Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5054">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5054">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5055">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5055">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5056">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5056">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5057">Affiche le bouton Accueil sur la barre d’outils de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5057">Shows the Home button on Microsoft Edge's toolbar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5058">Activez cette stratégie pour que le bouton Accueil soit toujours affiché.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5058">Enable this policy to always show the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5059">Désactivez-la pour que le bouton ne soit jamais affiché.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5059">Disable it to never show the button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5060">Si vous ne configurez pas la stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir d’afficher ou non le bouton Accueil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5060">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to show the home button.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5061">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5061">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5062">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5062">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5063">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5063">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5064">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5064">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5065">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5065">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5066">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5066">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5067">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5067">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5068">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5068">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5069">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5069">GP unique name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5070">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: afficher le bouton Accueil sur la barre d’outils</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5070">GP name: Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5071">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5071">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5072">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5072">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5073">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5073">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5074">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5074">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5075">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5075">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5076">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5076">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5077">Nom de la valeur: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5077">Value Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5078">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5078">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5079">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5079">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5080">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5080">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5081">Nom clé de la préférence: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5081">Preference Key Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5082">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5082">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="addressbarmicrosoftsearchinbingproviderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5086">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5086">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-microsoft-search-in-bing-suggestions-in-the-address-bar"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5087">Activer les suggestions de la Recherche Microsoft dans la barre d’adresse de Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5087">Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5088">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5088">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5089">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version81 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5089">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5090">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5090">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5091">Permet d’afficher les suggestions de Recherche Microsoft dans Bing appropriées dans la liste de suggestions de la barre d’adresse lorsque l’utilisateur tape une chaîne de recherche dans la barre d’adresse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5091">Enables the display of relevant Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar's suggestion list when the user types a search string in the address bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5092">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, les utilisateurs peuvent voir les résultats internes obtenus par la Recherche Microsoft dans Bing dans la liste de suggestions de la barre d’adresse de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5092">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can see internal results powered by Microsoft Search in Bing in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5093">Pour afficher les résultats de Recherche Microsoft dans Bing, l’utilisateur doit être connecté à MicrosoftEdge avec son compte AzureAD pour cette organisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5093">To see the Microsoft Search in Bing results, the user must be signed into Microsoft Edge with their Azure AD account for that organization.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5094">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas voir les résultats internes dans la liste de suggestions de la barre d’adresse de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5094">If you disable this policy, users can't see internal results in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5095">À partir de la version89 de Microsoft Edge, Microsoft Search dans Bing suggestions sera disponible même si Bing n’est pas le fournisseur de recherche par défaut de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5095">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 89, Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions will be available even if Bing isn't the user's default search provider.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5096">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5096">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5097">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5097">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5098">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5098">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5099">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5099">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5100">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5100">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5101">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5101">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5102">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5102">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5103">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5103">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5104">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5104">GP unique name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5105">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer les suggestions de la Recherche Microsoft dans la barre d’adresse de Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5105">GP name: Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5106">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5106">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5107">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5107">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5108">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5108">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5109">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5109">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5110">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5110">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5111">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5111">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5112">Nom de la valeur: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5112">Value Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5113">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5113">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5114">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5114">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5115">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5115">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5116">Nom clé de la préférence: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5116">Preference Key Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5117">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5117">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="adssettingforintrusiveadssites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5119">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5119">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>

  #### <a name="ads-setting-for-sites-with-intrusive-ads"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5120">Paramètres des annonces pour les sites contenant des annonces gênantes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5120">Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5121">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5121">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5122">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5122">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5123">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5123">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5124">Détermine si les annonces sont bloquées sur les sites présentant des annonces intrusives.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5124">Controls whether ads are blocked on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5125">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5125">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5126">AllowAds (1)=Autoriser les annonces sur tous les sites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5126">AllowAds (1) = Allow ads on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5127">BlockAds (2)=Bloquer les annonces sur les sites présentant des annonces intrusives.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5127">BlockAds (2) = Block ads on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5128">(Valeur par défaut)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5128">(Default value)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5129">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5129">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5130">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5130">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5131">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5131">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5132">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5132">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5133">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5133">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5134">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5134">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5135">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5135">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5136">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5136">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5137">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5137">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5138">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5138">GP unique name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5139">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: paramètres des annonces pour les sites contenant des annonces gênantes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5139">GP name: Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5140">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5140">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5141">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5141">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5142">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5142">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5143">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5143">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5144">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5144">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5145">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5145">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5146">Nom de la valeur: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5146">Value Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5147">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5147">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5148">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5148">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5149">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5149">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5150">Nom clé de la préférence: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5150">Preference Key Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5151">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5151">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="allowdeletingbrowserhistory"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5153">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5153">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-deleting-browser-and-download-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5154">Activer la suppression de l’historique du navigateur et de l’historique des téléchargements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5154">Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5155">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5155">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5156">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5156">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5157">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5157">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5158">Permet la suppression de l’historique du navigateur et de l’historique des téléchargements sans permettre à l’utilisateur de modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5158">Enables deleting browser history and download history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5159">Même si cette stratégie est désactivée, il n’est pas garanti que l’historique du navigateur et l’historique des téléchargements soient conservés: les utilisateurs peuvent modifier ou supprimer directement les fichiers de base de données de ces historiques. De même, le navigateur peut supprimer ou archiver, à tout moment, des éléments de l’historique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5159">Note that even with this policy is disabled, the browsing and download history aren't guaranteed to be retained: users can edit or delete the history database files directly, and the browser itself may remove (based on expiration period) or archive any or all history items at any time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5160">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou que vous ne la configurez pas, les utilisateurs peuvent supprimer l’historique de navigation et de téléchargement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5160">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can delete the browsing and download history.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5161">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas supprimer l’historique de navigation et de téléchargement du navigateur et la synchronisation de l’historique sera désactivée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5161">If you disable this policy, users can't delete browsing and download history, and history sync will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5162">Si vous activez cette stratégie, n’activez pas la stratégie [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit), car elles traitent toutes deux la suppression de données.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5162">If you enable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5163">Si vous activez toutes les deux, la stratégie [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) prévaut et supprime toutes les données lors de la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge, quelle que soit la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5163">If you enable both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how this policy is configured.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5164">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5164">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5165">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5165">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5166">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5166">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5167">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5167">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5168">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5168">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5169">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5169">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5170">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5170">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5171">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5171">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5172">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5172">GP unique name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5173">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la suppression de l’historique du navigateur et de l’historique des téléchargements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5173">GP name: Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5174">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5174">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5175">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5175">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5176">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5176">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5177">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5177">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5178">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5178">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5179">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5179">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5180">Nom de la valeur: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5180">Value Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5181">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5181">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5182">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5182">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5183">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5183">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5184">Nom clé de la préférence: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5184">Preference Key Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5185">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5185">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="allowfileselectiondialogs"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5187">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5187">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-file-selection-dialogs"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5188">Autoriser les boîtes de dialogue de sélection de fichier</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5188">Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5189">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5189">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5190">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5190">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5191">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5191">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5192">Autoriser l’accès aux fichiers locaux en laissant MicrosoftEdge afficher les boîtes de dialogue de sélection de fichier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5192">Allow access to local files by letting Microsoft Edge display file selection dialogs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5193">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent ouvrir normalement les boîtes de dialogue de sélection des fichiers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5193">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open file selection dialogs as normal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5194">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, chaque fois que l’utilisateur effectue une action entraînant l’ouverture d’une boîte de dialogue de sélection de fichiers (par exemple, une importation de favoris, un téléchargement de fichiers ou l’enregistrement de liens), un message s’affiche à la place et l’utilisateur est supposé avoir cliqué sur Annuler dans la boîte de dialogue de sélection de fichiers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5194">If you disable this policy, whenever the user performs an action that triggers a file selection dialog (like importing favorites, uploading files, or saving links), a message is displayed instead, and the user is assumed to have clicked Cancel on the file selection dialog.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5195">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5195">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5196">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5196">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5197">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5197">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5198">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5198">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5199">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5199">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5200">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5200">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5201">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5201">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5202">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5202">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5203">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5203">GP unique name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5204">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les boîtes de dialogue de sélection de fichier</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5204">GP name: Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5205">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5205">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5206">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5206">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5207">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5207">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5208">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5208">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5209">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5209">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5210">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5210">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5211">Nom de la valeur: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5211">Value Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5212">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5212">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5213">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5213">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5214">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5214">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5215">Nom clé de la préférence: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5215">Preference Key Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5216">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5216">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
