  ### <a name="allowpopupsduringpageunload"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5218">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5218">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-a-page-to-show-popups-during-its-unloading-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5219">Permet à une page d’afficher des fenêtres contextuelles pendant son déchargement (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5219">Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5220">OBSOLÈTE: cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas sur les versions ultérieures à Microsoft Edge87.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5220">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5221">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5221">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5222">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la 78, jusqu’à la 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5222">On Windows and macOS since 78, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5223">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5223">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5224">Cette stratégie permet à un administrateur de spécifier si une page peut afficher des fenêtres contextuelles pendant son déchargement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5224">This policy allows an admin to specify that a page can show popups during its unloading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5225">Lorsque la stratégie est activée, les pages sont autorisées à afficher des fenêtres contextuelles pendant leur déchargement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5225">When the policy is set to enabled, pages are allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5226">Lorsque la stratégie est désactivée ou n’est pas configurée, les pages ne sont pas autorisées à afficher des fenêtres contextuelles pendant leur déchargement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5226">When the policy is set to disabled or unset, pages aren't allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5227">Ceci est conforme à la spécification: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5227">This is as per the spec: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5228">Cette stratégie a été supprimée dans MicrosoftEdge88 et est ignorée si elle est définie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5228">This policy was removed in Microsoft Edge 88 and is ignored if set.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5229">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5229">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5230">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5230">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5231">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5231">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5232">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5232">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5233">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5233">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5234">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5234">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5235">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5235">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5236">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5236">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5237">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5237">GP unique name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5238">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : permet à une page d’afficher des fenêtres contextuelles pendant son déchargement (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5238">GP name: Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5239">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Modèles d'administration/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5239">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5240">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5240">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5241">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5241">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5242">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5242">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5243">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5243">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5244">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5244">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5245">Nom de la valeur: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5245">Value Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5246">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5246">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5247">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5247">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5248">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5248">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5249">Nom clé de la préférence: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5249">Preference Key Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5250">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5250">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="allowsurfgame"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5252">AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5252">AllowSurfGame</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-surf-game"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5253">Autoriser le jeu de surf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5253">Allow surf game</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5254">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5254">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5255">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5255">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5256">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5256">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5257">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas jouer au jeu de surf lorsque l’appareil est hors connexion ou si l’utilisateur accède à edge://surf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5257">If you disable this policy, users won't be able to play the surf game when the device is offline or if the user navigates to edge://surf.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5258">Si cette stratégie est activée ou si elle n’est pas configurée, les utilisateurs peuvent jouer au jeu de surf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5258">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can play the surf game.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5259">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5259">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5260">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5260">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5261">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5261">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5262">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5262">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5263">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5263">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5264">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5264">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5265">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5265">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5266">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5266">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5267">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5267">GP unique name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5268">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser le jeu de surf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5268">GP name: Allow surf game</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5269">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5269">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5270">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5270">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5271">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5271">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5272">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5272">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5273">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5273">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5274">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5274">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5275">Nom de la valeur: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5275">Value Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5276">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5276">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5277">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5277">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5278">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5278">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5279">Nom clé de la préférence: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5279">Preference Key Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5280">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5280">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="allowsyncxhrinpagedismissal"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5282">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5282">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-pages-to-send-synchronous-xhr-requests-during-page-dismissal-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5283">Autoriser les pages à envoyer des demandes XHR synchrones lors de l’opération de rejet de page (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5283">Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5284">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5284">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5285">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5285">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5286">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5286">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5287">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version79 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5287">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5288">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5288">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5289">Cette stratégie est déconseillée, car elle n’est destinée qu’à être un mécanisme à court terme qui permet aux entreprises de mettre à jour leur contenu web si et quand il est détecté comme étant incompatible avec la modification pour interdire les demandes XHR synchrones au cours du masquage de page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5289">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the change to disallow synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5290">Elle ne fonctionne pas dans MicrosoftEdge version93.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5290">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 93.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5291">Cette stratégie vous permet de spécifier si une page peut envoyer des demandes XHR synchrones lors de l’opération de masquage de page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5291">This policy lets you specify that a page can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5292">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les pages envoient des demandes XHR synchrones lors de l’opération de rejet de page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5292">If you enable this policy, pages can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5293">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou ne la configurez pas, les pages ne sont pas autorisées à envoyer des demandes XHR synchrones lors de l’opération de rejet de page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5293">If you disable this policy or don't configure this policy, pages aren't allowed to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5294">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5294">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5295">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5295">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5296">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5296">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5297">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5297">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5298">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5298">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5299">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5299">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5300">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5300">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5301">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5301">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5302">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5302">GP unique name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5303">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: Autoriser les pages à envoyer des demandes XHR synchrones lors de l’opération de rejet de page (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5303">GP name: Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5304">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5304">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5305">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5305">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5306">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5306">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5307">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5307">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5308">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5308">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5309">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5309">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5310">Nom de la valeur: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5310">Value Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5311">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5311">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5312">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5312">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5313">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5313">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5314">Nom clé de la préférence: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5314">Preference Key Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5315">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5315">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5316">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5316">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="allowtokenbindingforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5317">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5317">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-sites-for-which-microsoft-edge-will-attempt-to-establish-a-token-binding-with"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5318">Configurer la liste des sites avec lesquels MicrosoftEdge tentera d’établir une liaison de jetons</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5318">Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5319">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5319">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5320">sur Windows depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5320">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5321">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5321">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5322">Configurez la liste des modèles d’URL pour les sites avec lesquels le navigateur tentera d’effectuer le protocole de liaison de jetons.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5322">Configure the list of URL patterns for sites that the browser will attempt to perform the Token Binding protocol with.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5323">Pour les domaines de cette liste, le navigateur envoie la liaison de jeton ClientHello pour l’établissement d’une liaison TLS (consultez https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5323">For the domains on this list, the browser will send the Token Binding ClientHello in the TLS handshake (See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5324">Si le serveur répond par une réponse ServerHello valide, le navigateur crée et envoie des messages de liaison de jetons aux requêtes http suivantes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5324">If the server responds with a valid ServerHello response, the browser will create and send Token Binding messages on subsequent https requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5325">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus, consultez https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5325">See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471 for more info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5326">Si cette liste est vide, la liaison par jeton sera désactivée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5326">If this list is empty, Token Binding will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5327">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les appareils Windows10 disposant de la fonctionnalité Virtual Secure Mode.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5327">This policy is only available on Windows 10 devices with Virtual Secure Mode capability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5328">À compter de MicrosoftEdge86, cette stratégie ne prend plus en charge l’actualisation dynamique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5328">Starting in Microsoft Edge 86, this policy no longer supports dynamic refresh.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5329">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5329">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5330">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5330">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5331">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5331">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5332">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5332">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5333">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5333">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5334">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5334">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5335">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5335">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5336">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5336">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5337">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5337">GP unique name: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5338">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la liste des sites avec lesquels MicrosoftEdge tentera d’établir une liaison de jeton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5338">GP name: Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5339">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5339">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5340">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5340">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5341">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5341">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5342">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5342">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5343">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5343">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5344">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5344">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5345">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5345">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5346">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5346">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5347">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5347">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\2 = "[*.]mydomain2.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\3 = "[*.].mydomain2.com"

```

  ### <a name="allowtrackingforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5349">AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5349">AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-tracking-prevention-exceptions-for-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5350">Configurer les exceptions de prévention du suivi pour des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5350">Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5351">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5351">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5352">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5352">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5353">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5353">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5354">Configurez la liste des modèles d’URL qui sont exclus de la prévention du suivi. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5354">Configure the list of URL patterns that are excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5355">Si vous configurez cette stratégie, la liste des modèles d’URL configurés est exclue de la prévention du suivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5355">If you configure this policy, the list of configured URL patterns is excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5356">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie «Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity», si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5356">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the "Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity" policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5357">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5357">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5358">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5358">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5359">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5359">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5360">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5360">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5361">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5361">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5362">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5362">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5363">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5363">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5364">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5364">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5365">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5365">GP unique name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5366">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer les exceptions de prévention du suivi pour des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5366">GP name: Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5367">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5367">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5368">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5368">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5369">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5369">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5370">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5370">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5371">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5371">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5372">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5372">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5373">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5373">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5374">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5374">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5375">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5375">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5376">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5376">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5377">Nom clé de la préférence: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5377">Preference Key Name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5378">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5378">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5379">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5379">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="alternateerrorpagesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5380">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5380">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="suggest-similar-pages-when-a-webpage-cant-be-found"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5381">Suggérer des pages similaires lorsqu’une page web est introuvable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5381">Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5382">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5382">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5383">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5383">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5384">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5384">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5385">Autorisez MicrosoftEdge à émettre une connexion à un service web pour générer des suggestions d’URL et de recherche pour les problèmes de connectivité tels que les erreurs DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5385">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a connection to a web service to generate URL and search suggestions for connectivity issues such as DNS errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5386">Si vous activez cette stratégie, un service web est utilisé pour générer des suggestions d’URL et de recherche pour les erreurs de réseau.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5386">If you enable this policy, a web service is used to generate url and search suggestions for network errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5387">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, aucun appel au service web n’est effectué et une page d’erreur standard s’affiche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5387">If you disable this policy, no calls to the web service are made and a standard error page is shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5388">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge respecte les préférences de l’utilisateur, définies dans Services sur edge://settings/privacy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5388">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5389">Plus précisément, il existe un bouton **Suggérer des pages similaires lorsqu’une page Web est introuvable**, que l’utilisateur peut activer ou désactiver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5389">Specifically, there's a **Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5390">Si vous avez activé cette stratégie (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), le paramètre Suggérer des pages similaires lorsqu’une page web est introuvable est activé, mais l’utilisateur ne peut pas modifier le paramètre à l’aide du bouton.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5390">Note that if you have enable this policy (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5391">Si vous avez désactivé cette stratégie, le paramètre Suggérer des pages similaires lorsqu’une page web est introuvable est désactivé, et l’utilisateur ne peut pas modifier le paramètre à l’aide du bouton.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5391">If you disable this policy, the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5392">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5392">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5393">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5393">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5394">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5394">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5395">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5395">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5396">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5396">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5397">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5397">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5398">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5398">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5399">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5399">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5400">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5400">GP unique name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5401">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: suggérer des pages similaires lorsqu’une page web est introuvable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5401">GP name: Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5402">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5402">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5403">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5403">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5404">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5404">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5405">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5405">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5406">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5406">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5407">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5407">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5408">Nom de la valeur: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5408">Value Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5409">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5409">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5410">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5410">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5411">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5411">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5412">Nom clé de la préférence: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5412">Preference Key Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5413">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5413">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="alwaysopenpdfexternally"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5415">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5415">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>

  #### <a name="always-open-pdf-files-externally"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5416">Toujours ouvrir les fichiers PDF en externe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5416">Always open PDF files externally</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5417">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5417">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5418">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5418">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5419">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5419">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5420">Désactive la visionneuse de PDF intégrée dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5420">Disables the internal PDF viewer in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5421">Si vous activez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge traite les fichiers PDF de la même manière que les téléchargements et permet aux utilisateurs de les ouvrir avec l’application par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5421">If you enable this policy Microsoft Edge treats PDF files as downloads and lets users open them with the default application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5422">Si MicrosoftEdge est le lecteur PDF par défaut, les fichiers PDF ne sont pas téléchargés et continueront à s’ouvrir dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5422">If Microsoft Edge is the default PDF reader, PDF files aren't downloaded and will continue to open in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5423">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie ou si vous la désactivez, MicrosoftEdge ouvre les fichiers PDF (à moins que l’utilisateur ne le désactive).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5423">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will open PDF files (unless the user disables it).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5424">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5424">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5425">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5425">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5426">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5426">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5427">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5427">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5428">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5428">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5429">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5429">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5430">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5430">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5431">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5431">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5432">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5432">GP unique name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5433">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: toujours ouvrir les fichiers PDF en externe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5433">GP name: Always open PDF files externally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5434">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5434">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5435">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5435">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5436">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5436">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5437">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5437">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5438">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5438">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5439">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5439">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5440">Nom de la valeur: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5440">Value Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5441">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5441">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5442">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5442">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5443">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5443">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5444">Nom clé de la préférence: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5444">Preference Key Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5445">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5445">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="ambientauthenticationinprivatemodesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5447">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5447">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-ambient-authentication-for-inprivate-and-guest-profiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5448">Activer l’authentification par le bruit ambiant pour les profils d’invité et InPrivate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5448">Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5449">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5449">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5450">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version81 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5450">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5451">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5451">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5452">Configurez cette stratégie pour autoriser/refuser l’authentification par le bruit ambiant pour les profils InPrivate et Invité dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5452">Configure this policy to allow/disallow ambient authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5453">L’authentification par le bruit ambient est une authentification http avec des informations d’identification par défaut lorsque les informations d’identification explicites ne sont pas disponibles via les schémas de stimulation/réponse NTLM/Kerberos/Negotiate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5453">Ambient Authentication is http authentication with default credentials when explicit credentials aren't provided via NTLM/Kerberos/Negotiate challenge/response schemes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5454">Si vous définissez la stratégie sur « RegularOnly », l’authentification ambiante est autorisée pour les sessions normales uniquement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5454">If you set the policy to 'RegularOnly', it allows ambient authentication for Regular sessions only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5455">Les sessions InPrivate et invité ne sont pas autorisées à s’authentifier par le bruit ambiant.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5455">InPrivate and Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5456">Si vous définissez la stratégie sur « InPrivateAndRegular », l’authentification ambiante est autorisée pour les sessions InPrivate et les sessions normales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5456">If you set the policy to 'InPrivateAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for InPrivate and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5457">Les sessions Invité ne sont pas autorisées à s’authentifier par le bruit ambiant.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5457">Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5458">Si vous définissez la stratégie sur « GuestAndRegular », l’authentification ambiante est autorisée pour les sessions Invité et normales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5458">If you set the policy to 'GuestAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for Guest and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5459">Les sessions InPrivate ne sont pas autorisées à s’authentifier par le bruit ambiant.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5459">InPrivate sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5460">Si vous définissez la stratégie sur « All », l’authentification ambiante est autorisée pour toutes les sessions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5460">If you set the policy to 'All', it allows ambient authentication for all sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5461">Notez que l’authentification par le bruit ambiant est toujours autorisée sur les profils réguliers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5461">Note that ambient authentication is always allowed on regular profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5462">Dans les versions81 ou ultérieures de MicrosoftEdge, si la stratégie n’est pas configurée, l’authentification par le bruit ambiant est activée uniquement dans les sessions régulières.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5462">In Microsoft Edge version 81 and later, if the policy is left not set, ambient authentication will be enabled in regular sessions only.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5463">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5463">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5464">RegularOnly (0)=Activer l’authentification ambiante dans les sessions normales uniquement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5464">RegularOnly (0) = Enable ambient authentication in regular sessions only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5465">InPrivateAndRegular (1)=Activer l’authentification ambiante dans les sessions InPrivate et normales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5465">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = Enable ambient authentication in InPrivate and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5466">GuestAndRegular (2)=Activer l’authentification ambiante dans les sessions Invité et normales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5466">GuestAndRegular (2) = Enable ambient authentication in guest and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5467">All (3)=Activer l’authentification ambiante dans les sessions normales, InPrivate et Invité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5467">All (3) = Enable ambient authentication in regular, InPrivate and guest sessions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5468">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5468">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5469">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5469">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5470">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5470">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5471">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5471">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5472">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5472">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5473">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5473">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5474">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5474">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5475">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5475">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5476">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5476">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5477">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5477">GP unique name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5478">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer l’authentification par le bruit ambiant pour les profils d’invité et InPrivate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5478">GP name: Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5479">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5479">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5480">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5480">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5481">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5481">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5482">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5482">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5483">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5483">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5484">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5484">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5485">Nom de la valeur: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5485">Value Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5486">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5486">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5487">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5487">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5488">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5488">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5489">Nom clé de la préférence: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5489">Preference Key Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5490">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5490">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```

  ### <a name="appcacheforceenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5492">AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5492">AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-the-appcache-feature-to-be-re-enabled-even-if-its-turned-off-by-default"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5493">Permet de réactiver la fonctionnalité AppCache, même si elle est désactivée par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5493">Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5494">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5494">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5495">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version84 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5495">On Windows and macOS since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5496">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5496">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5497">Si vous attribuez la valeur true à cette stratégie, la AppCache est activée, même si AppCache dans Microsoft Edge n’est pas disponible par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5497">If you set this policy to true, the AppCache is enabled, even when AppCache in Microsoft Edge is not available by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5498">Si vous avez défini cette stratégie sur false ou que vous ne la configurez pas, AppCache suivra les valeurs par défaut de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5498">If you set this policy to false, or don't set it, AppCache will follow Microsoft Edge's defaults.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5499">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5499">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5500">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5500">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5501">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5501">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5502">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5502">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5503">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5503">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5504">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5504">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5505">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5505">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5506">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5506">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5507">Nom unique GP: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5507">GP unique name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5508">Nom de la stratégie de protection: permet de réactiver la fonctionnalité AppCache, même si elle est désactivée par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5508">GP name: Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5509">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5509">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5510">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5510">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5511">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5511">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5512">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5512">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5513">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5513">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5514">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5514">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5515">Nom de la valeur: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5515">Value Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5516">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5516">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5517">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5517">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5519">Nom de la clé de préférence: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5519">Preference Key Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>

``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="applicationlocalevalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5522">ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5522">ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-application-locale"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5523">Définir les paramètres régionaux de l’application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5523">Set application locale</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5524">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5524">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5525">sur Windows depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5525">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5526">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5526">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5527">Configure les paramètres régionaux de l’application dans MicrosoftEdge et empêche les utilisateurs de modifier ces paramètres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5527">Configures the application locale in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing the locale.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5528">Si vous activez ce paramètre, MicrosoftEdge utilise les paramètres régionaux spécifiés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5528">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified locale.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5529">Si les paramètres régionaux configurés ne sont pas pris en charge, la valeur 'en-US' est utilisée à la place.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5529">If the configured locale isn't supported, 'en-US' is used instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5530">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas ce paramètre, MicrosoftEdge utilise les paramètres régionaux favoris de l’utilisateur (s’ils ont été configurés), ou les paramètres régionaux de remplacement ("en-US").</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5530">If you disable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Edge uses either the user-specified preferred locale (if configured) or the fallback locale 'en-US'.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5531">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5531">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5532">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5532">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5533">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5533">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5534">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5534">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5535">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5535">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5536">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5536">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5537">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5537">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5538">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5538">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5539">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5539">GP unique name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5540">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir les paramètres régionaux de l’application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5540">GP name: Set application locale</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5541">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5541">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5542">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5542">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5543">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5543">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5544">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5544">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5545">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5545">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5546">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5546">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5547">Nom de la valeur: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5547">Value Name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5548">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5548">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5549">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5549">Example value:</span></span>

```
"en"
```
