  ### <a name="audiocaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5551">AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5551">AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-block-audio-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5552">Autoriser ou bloquer la capture de sons</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5552">Allow or block audio capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5553">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5553">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5554">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5554">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5555">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5555">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5556">Vous permet de déterminer si un utilisateur est interrogé pour accorder aux sites web l’accès à son appareil de capture audio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5556">Allows you to set whether a user is prompted to grant a website access to their audio capture device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5557">Cette stratégie s’applique à toutes les URL, à l’exception de celles configurées dans la liste [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5557">This policy applies to all URLs except for those configured in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5558">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas (paramètre par défaut), l’utilisateur est interrogé pour l’accès à la capture audio, à l’exception des URL figurant dans la liste [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5558">If you enable this policy or don't configure it (the default setting), the user is prompted for audio capture access except from the URLs in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5559">Les URL répertoriées bénéficient d’un accès instantané.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5559">These listed URLs are granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5560">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, l’utilisateur n’est pas interrogé et la capture audio est accessible uniquement aux URL configurées dans [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5560">If you disable this policy, the user is not prompted, and audio capture is accessible only to the URLs configured in [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5561">Cette stratégie affecte tous les types d’entrées audio, et pas seulement le microphone intégré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5561">This policy affects all types of audio inputs, not only the built-in microphone.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5562">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5562">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5563">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5563">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5564">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5564">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5565">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5565">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5566">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5566">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5567">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5567">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5568">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5568">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5569">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5569">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5570">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5570">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5571">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser ou bloquer la capture de sons</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5571">GP name: Allow or block audio capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5572">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5572">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5573">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5573">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5574">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5574">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5575">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5575">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5576">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5576">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5577">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5577">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5578">Nom de la valeur: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5578">Value Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5579">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5579">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5580">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5580">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5581">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5581">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5582">Nom clé de la préférence: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5582">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5583">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5583">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="audiocaptureallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5585">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5585">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-that-can-access-audio-capture-devices-without-requesting-permission"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5586">Sites autorisés à accéder aux appareils de capture audio sans autorisation préalable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5586">Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5587">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5587">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5588">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5588">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5589">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5589">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5590">Spécifiez les sites web, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui peuvent utiliser les appareils de capture audio sans autorisation préalable de la part de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5590">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use audio capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5591">Les modèles de cette liste sont comparés à la source de sécurité de l’URL à l’origine de la demande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5591">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5592">En cas de correspondance, l’accès aux appareils de capture audio est autorisé automatiquement. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5592">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to audio capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5593">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5593">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5594">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5594">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5595">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5595">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5596">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5596">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5597">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5597">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5598">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5598">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5599">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5599">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5600">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5600">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5601">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5601">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5602">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: sites autorisés à accéder aux appareils de capture audio sans autorisation préalable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5602">GP name: Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5603">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5603">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5604">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5604">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5605">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5605">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5606">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5606">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5607">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5607">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5608">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5608">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5609">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5609">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5610">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5610">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5611">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5611">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5612">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5612">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5613">Nom clé de la préférence: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5613">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5614">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5614">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5615">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5615">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="audiosandboxenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5616">AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5616">AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-audio-sandbox-to-run"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5617">Autoriser l’exécution du bac à sable audio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5617">Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5618">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5618">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5619">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version81 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5619">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5620">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5620">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5621">Cette stratégie contrôle le bac à sable du processus audio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5621">This policy controls the audio process sandbox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5622">Si vous activez cette stratégie, le processus audio s’exécute en mode bac à sable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5622">If you enable this policy, the audio process will run sandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5623">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, le processus audio ne s’exécute pas en mode bac à sable, et le module de traitement audio WebRTC s’exécute lors du processus du convertisseur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5623">If you disable this policy, the audio process will run unsandboxed and the WebRTC audio-processing module will run in the renderer process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5624">Cela expose les utilisateurs aux risques de sécurité liés à l’exécution du sous-système audio sans bac à sable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5624">This leaves users open to security risks related to running the audio subsystem unsandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5625">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la configuration par défaut pour le bac à sable audio est utilisée, ce qui peut varier en fonction de la plateforme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5625">If you don't configure this policy, the default configuration for the audio sandbox will be used, which might differ based on the platform.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5626">Cette stratégie est destinée à offrir aux entreprises de la souplesse pour désactiver le bac à sable audio, s’ils utilisent des configurations de logiciels de sécurité qui interfèrent avec ce dernier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5626">This policy is intended to give enterprises flexibility to disable the audio sandbox if they use security software setups that interfere with the sandbox.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5627">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5627">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5628">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5628">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5629">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5629">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5630">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5630">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5631">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5631">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5632">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5632">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5633">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5633">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5634">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5634">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5635">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5635">GP unique name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5636">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’exécution du bac à sable audio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5636">GP name: Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5637">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5637">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5638">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5638">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5639">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5639">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5640">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5640">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5641">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5641">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5642">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5642">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5643">Nom de la valeur: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5643">Value Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5644">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5644">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5645">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5645">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5646">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5646">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5647">Nom clé de la préférence: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5647">Preference Key Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5648">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5648">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5649">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5649">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoimportatfirstrun"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5650">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5650">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>

  #### <a name="automatically-import-another-browsers-data-and-settings-at-first-run"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5651">Importer automatiquement les données et les paramètres d’un autre navigateur lors de la première exécution</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5651">Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5652">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5652">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5653">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5653">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5654">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5654">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5655">Si vous activez cette stratégie, tous les types de données et paramètres pris en charge par le navigateur spécifié seront importés de façon silencieuse et automatique lors de la première exécution.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5655">If you enable this policy, all supported datatypes and settings from the specified browser will be silently and automatically imported at first run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5656">Lors de la première exécution, la section d’importation est également ignorée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5656">During the First Run Experience, the import section will also be skipped.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5657">Les données du navigateur de l’ancienne version de MicrosoftEdge sont toujours migrées silencieusement lors de la première exécution, quelle que soit la valeur de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5657">The browser data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will always be silently migrated at the first run, irrespective of the value of this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5658">Si cette stratégie est définie sur « FromDefaultBrowser », les types de données correspondant au navigateur par défaut sur l’appareil géré sont importés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5658">If this policy is set to 'FromDefaultBrowser', then the datatypes corresponding to the default browser on the managed device will be imported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5659">Si le navigateur spécifié en tant que valeur de cette stratégie n’est pas présent dans l’appareil géré, MicrosoftEdge ignore simplement l’importation sans notification à l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5659">If the browser specified as the value of this policy is not present in the managed device, Microsoft Edge will simply skip the import without any notification to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5660">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «DisabledAutoImport», la section d’importation de l’expérience de première exécution est ignorée entièrement et MicrosoftEdge n’importe pas automatiquement les données et les paramètres du navigateur. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5660">If you set this policy to 'DisabledAutoImport', the import section of the first-run experience is skipped entirely and Microsoft Edge doesn't import browser data and settings automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5661">Si cette stratégie est définie sur « FromInternetExplorer », les types de données suivants sont importés à partir d’Internet Explorer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5661">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromInternetExplorer', the following datatypes will be imported from Internet Explorer:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5662">Favoris ou marque-pages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5662">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5663">Mots de passe enregistrés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5663">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5664">Moteurs de recherche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5664">Search engines</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5665">Historique de navigation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5665">Browsing history</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5666">Page d’accueil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5666">Home page</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5667">Si cette stratégie est définie sur « FromGoogleChrome », les types de données suivants sont importés à partir de Google Chrome:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5667">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromGoogleChrome', the following datatypes will be imported from Google Chrome:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5668">Favoris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5668">Favorites</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5669">Mots de passe enregistrés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5669">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5670">Adresses et bien plus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5670">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5671">Informations de paiement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5671">Payment info</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5672">Historique de navigation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5672">Browsing history</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5673">Paramètres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5673">Settings</span></span>
7. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5674">Onglets épinglés et ouverts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5674">Pinned and Open tabs</span></span>
8. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5675">Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5675">Extensions</span></span>
9. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5676">Cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5676">Cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5677">Remarque: si vous souhaitez obtenir plus d’informations sur les éléments importés à partir de Google Chrome, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5677">Note: For more details on what is imported from Google Chrome, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5678">Si cette stratégie est définie sur « FromSafari », les données de l’utilisateur ne sont plus importées dans Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5678">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromSafari', user data is no longer imported into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5679">Ceci est dû à la façon dont l’accès au disque complet fonctionne sur Mac.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5679">This is due to the way Full Disk Access works on Mac.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5680">Sur macOS Mojave et versions ultérieures, il n’est plus possible d’importer des données Safari de façon automatisée et autonome dans Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5680">On macOS Mojave and above, it's no longer possible to have automated and unattended import of Safari data into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5681">À partir de la version83 de MicrosoftEdge, si cette stratégie est définie sur « FromMozillaFirefox », les types de données suivants sont importés à partir de MozillaFirefox:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5681">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 83, if this policy is set to the value of 'FromMozillaFirefox', the following datatypes will be imported from Mozilla Firefox:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5682">Favoris ou marque-pages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5682">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5683">Mots de passe enregistrés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5683">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5684">Adresses et bien plus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5684">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5685">Historique de navigation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5685">Browsing History</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5686">Si vous souhaitez limiter l’importation de types de données spécifiques sur les appareils gérés, vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie avec d’autres stratégies, comme [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites), etc.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5686">If you want to restrict specific datatypes from getting imported on the managed devices, you can use this policy with other policies such as [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites), and etc.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5687">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5687">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5688">FromDefaultBrowser (0) =Importer automatiquement tous les types de données et paramètres pris en charge à partir du navigateur par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5688">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from the default browser</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5689">FromInternetExplorer (1)=Importer automatiquement tous les types de données et paramètres pris en charge à partir d’InternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5689">FromInternetExplorer (1) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Internet Explorer</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5690">FromGoogleChrome (2)=Importer automatiquement tous les types de données et paramètres pris en charge à partir de GoogleChrome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5690">FromGoogleChrome (2) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Google Chrome</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5691">FromSafari (3)=Importer automatiquement tous les types de données et paramètres pris en charge à partir de Safari</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5691">FromSafari (3) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Safari</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5692">DisabledAutoImport (4)=Désactiver l’importation automatique et la section d’importation de l’expérience de première exécution est ignorée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5692">DisabledAutoImport (4) = Disables automatic import, and the import section of the first-run experience is skipped</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5693">FromMozillaFirefox (5)=Importer automatiquement tous les types de données et paramètres pris en charge à partir de MozillaFirefox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5693">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Mozilla Firefox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5694">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5694">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5695">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5695">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5696">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5696">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5697">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5697">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5698">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5698">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5699">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5699">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5700">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5700">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5701">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5701">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5702">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5702">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5703">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5703">GP unique name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5704">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: importer automatiquement les données et les paramètres d’un autre navigateur lors de la première exécution</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5704">GP name: Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5705">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5705">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5706">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5706">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5707">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5707">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5708">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5708">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5709">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5709">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5710">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5710">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5711">Nom de la valeur: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5711">Value Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5712">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5712">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5713">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5713">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5715">Nom clé de la préférence: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5715">Preference Key Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>

  ### <a name="autolaunchprotocolsfromorigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5718">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5718">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-a-list-of-protocols-that-can-launch-an-external-application-from-listed-origins-without-prompting-the-user"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5719">Définir une liste de protocoles qui peuvent lancer une application externe à partir d’origines, sans inviter l’utilisateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5719">Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5720">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5720">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5721">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5721">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5722">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5722">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5723">Vous permet de créer une liste de protocoles et, pour chaque protocole, une liste associée de modèles d’origine autorisée, qui peut lancer une application externe sans inviter l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5723">Allows you to set a list of protocols, and for each protocol an associated list of allowed origin patterns, that can launch an external application without prompting the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5724">Le séparateur de fin ne doit pas être inclus lorsque vous répertoriez le protocole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5724">The trailing separator should not be included when listing the protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5725">Par exemple, la liste «Skype» au lieu de «Skype:» ou «skype://».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5725">For example, list "skype" instead of "skype:" or "skype://".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5726">Si vous configurez cette stratégie, un protocole est uniquement autorisé à lancer une application externe sans qu’une invite soit demandée par la stratégie si:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5726">If you configure this policy, a protocol will only be permitted to launch an external application without prompting by policy if:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5727">le protocole est répertorié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5727">the protocol is listed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5728">l’origine du site qui tente de lancer le protocole correspond à l’un des modèles d’origine dans la liste de allowed_origins du protocole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5728">the origin of the site trying to launch the protocol matches one of the origin patterns in that protocol's allowed_origins list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5729">Si l’une ou l’autre condition est fausse, l’invite de lancement de protocole externe ne sera pas omise par une stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5729">If either condition is false, the external protocol launch prompt will not be omitted by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5730">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, vous ne pouvez pas lancer d’autres protocoles sans invite de commandes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5730">If you don't configure this policy, no protocols can launch without a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5731">Les utilisateurs peuvent désactiver les invites sur une base par protocole ou par site, sauf si la stratégie de [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) est désactivée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5731">Users can opt out of prompts on a per-protocol/per-site basis unless the [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) policy is set to Disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5732">Cette stratégie n’a aucun impact sur les exemptions d’invite par protocole ou par site définis par les utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5732">This policy has no impact on per-protocol/per-site prompt exemptions set by users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5733">Les modèles de correspondance d’origine utilisent un format similaire à celui de la stratégie de [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist), documentée dans [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5733">The origin matching patterns use a similar format to those for the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy, which are documented at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5734">Toutefois, les modèles de correspondance d’origine pour cette stratégie ne peuvent pas contenir d’éléments "/path" ou "@query".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5734">However, origin matching patterns for this policy cannot contain "/path" or "@query" elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5735">Tout modèle contenant un élément "/path" ou "@query" sera ignoré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5735">Any pattern that does contain a "/path" or "@query" element will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5736">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5736">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5737">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5737">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5738">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5738">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5739">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5739">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5740">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5740">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5741">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5741">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5742">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5742">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5743">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5743">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5744">Nom unique GP: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5744">GP unique name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5745">Nom de la stratégie de protection: définissez une liste de protocoles qui peuvent lancer une application externe à partir d’origines, sans inviter l’utilisateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5745">GP name: Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5746">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5746">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5747">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5747">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5748">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5748">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5749">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5749">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5750">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5750">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5751">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5751">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5752">Nom de la valeur: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5752">Value Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5753">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5753">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5754">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5754">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "example.com", 
      "http://www.example.com:8080"
    ], 
    "protocol": "spotify"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "https://example.com", 
      "https://.mail.example.com"
    ], 
    "protocol": "teams"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "*"
    ], 
    "protocol": "outlook"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5755">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5755">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [{"allowed_origins": ["example.com", "http://www.example.com:8080"], "protocol": "spotify"}, {"allowed_origins": ["https://example.com", "https://.mail.example.com"], "protocol": "teams"}, {"allowed_origins": ["*"], "protocol": "outlook"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5756">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5756">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5757">Nom de la clé de préférence: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5757">Preference Key Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5758">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5758">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>example.com</string>
      <string>http://www.example.com:8080</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>spotify</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://example.com</string>
      <string>https://.mail.example.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>teams</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>*</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>outlook</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="autoopenallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5760">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5760">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="urls-where-autoopenfiletypes-can-apply"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5761">URL où AutoOpenFileTypes peut s’appliquer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5761">URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5762">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5762">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5763">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5763">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5764">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5764">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5765">Liste d’URL auxquelles [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) s’applique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5765">A list of URLs to which [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will apply to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5766">Cette stratégie n’a aucun impact sur les valeurs ouvertes automatiquement définies par les utilisateurs via l’étagère de téléchargement... > Entrée de menu «toujours ouvrir les fichiers de ce type».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5766">This policy has no impact on automatically open values set by users via the download shelf ... > "Always open files of this type" menu entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5767">Si vous configurez des URL dans cette stratégie, les fichiers s’ouvrent automatiquement uniquement par stratégie si l’URL fait partie de ce groupe et le type de fichier est répertorié dans [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5767">If you set URLs in this policy, files will only automatically open by policy if the URL is part of this set and the file type is listed in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5768">Si l’une ou l’autre condition est fausse, le téléchargement ne s’ouvre pas automatiquement par stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5768">If either condition is false, the download won't automatically open by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5769">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, tous les téléchargements où se trouve le type de fichier dans [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) s’ouvrent automatiquement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5769">If you don't set this policy, all downloads where the file type is in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will automatically open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5770">Un modèle d’URL doit être mis en forme en fonction de [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5770">A URL pattern has to be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5771">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5771">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5772">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5772">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5773">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5773">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5774">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5774">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5775">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5775">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5776">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5776">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5777">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5777">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5778">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5778">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5779">Nom unique GP: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5779">GP unique name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5780">Nom de la stratégie de protection: URL où AutoOpenFileTypes peut s’appliquer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5780">GP name: URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5781">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5781">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5782">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5782">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5783">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5783">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5784">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5784">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5785">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5785">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5786">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5786">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5787">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5787">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5788">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5788">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5789">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5789">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\1 = "example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5790">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5790">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5791">Nom de la clé de préférence: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5791">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5792">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5792">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>example.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5793">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5793">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoopenfiletypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5794">AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5794">AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="list-of-file-types-that-should-be-automatically-opened-on-download"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5795">Liste des types de fichiers qui doivent être automatiquement ouverts au téléchargement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5795">List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5796">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5796">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5797">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5797">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5798">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5798">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5799">Cette stratégie définit la liste des types de fichiers qui doivent être automatiquement ouverts lors du téléchargement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5799">This policy sets a list of file types that should be automatically opened on download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5800">Remarque: le séparateur principal ne doit pas être inclus lorsque vous répertoriez le type de fichier. par conséquent, il vous suffit de répertorier «txt» au lieu de «. txt».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5800">Note: The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type, so list "txt" instead of ".txt".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5801">Par défaut, ces types de fichiers sont automatiquement ouverts sur toutes les URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5801">By default, these file types will be automatically opened on all URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5802">Vous pouvez utiliser la stratégie de [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) pour restreindre les URL pour lesquelles ces types de fichiers seront ouverts automatiquement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5802">You can use the [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) policy to restrict the URLs for which these file types will be automatically opened on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5803">Les fichiers dont le type doit être ouvert automatiquement restent soumis aux vérifications Microsoft Defender SmartScreen activées et ne s’ouvrent pas s’ils ne fonctionnent pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5803">Files with types that should be automatically opened will still be subject to the enabled Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks and won't be opened if they fail those checks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5804">Les types de fichiers qu’un utilisateur a déjà spécifié pour s’ouvrir automatiquement continueront à le faire lors du téléchargement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5804">File types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will continue to do so when downloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5805">L’utilisateur continuera à pouvoir spécifier d’autres types de fichiers à ouvrir automatiquement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5805">The user will continue to be able to specify other file types to be automatically opened.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5806">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, seuls les types de fichiers qu’un utilisateur a déjà spécifié pour s’ouvrir automatiquement le sont lors du téléchargement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5806">If you don't set this policy, only file types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will do so when downloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5807">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5807">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5808">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5808">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5809">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5809">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5810">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5810">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5811">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5811">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5812">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5812">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5813">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5813">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5814">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5814">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5815">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5815">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5816">Nom unique GP: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5816">GP unique name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5817">Nom de la stratégie de protection: liste des types de fichiers qui doivent être automatiquement ouverts lors du téléchargement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5817">GP name: List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5818">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5818">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5819">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5819">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5820">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5820">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5821">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5821">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5822">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5822">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5823">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5823">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5824">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5824">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5825">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5825">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5826">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5826">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\1 = "exe"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\2 = "txt"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5827">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5827">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5828">Nom de la clé de préférence: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5828">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5829">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5829">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>exe</string>
  <string>txt</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5830">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5830">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autofilladdressenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5831">AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5831">AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-autofill-for-addresses"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5832">Activer la saisie automatique pour les adresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5832">Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5833">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5833">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5834">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5834">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5835">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5835">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5836">Active la fonctionnalité de saisie automatique, qui permet à l’utilisateur de remplir automatiquement des formulaires web à partir de données stockées précédemment, telles que des informations relatives à son adresse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5836">Enables the AutoFill feature and allows users to auto-complete address information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5837">Si cette stratégie est désactivé, ces informations ne sont jamais suggérées ni saisies automatiquement. De même, les informations complémentaires relatives à l’adresse que l’utilisateur est susceptible de fournir sur une page web ne sont pas enregistrées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5837">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills in address information, nor does it save additional address information that the user might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5838">Si cette stratégie est activée ou si elle n’est pas configurée, les utilisateurs peuvent contrôler la saisie automatique pour les adresses dans l’interface utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5838">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for addresses in the user interface.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5839">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, vous arrêtez également toutes les activités pour tous les formulaires web, à l’exception des formulaires de paiement et de mot de passe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5839">Note that if you disable this policy you also stop all activity for all web forms, except payment and password forms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5840">Aucune autre entrée n’est enregistrée. MicrosoftEdge ne suggère ni ne remplit automatiquement aucune entrée précédente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5840">No further entries are saved, and Microsoft Edge won't suggest or AutoFill any previous entries.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5841">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5841">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5842">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5842">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5843">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5843">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5844">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5844">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5845">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5845">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5846">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5846">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5847">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5847">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5848">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5848">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5849">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5849">GP unique name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5850">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la saisie automatique pour les adresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5850">GP name: Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5851">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5851">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5852">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5852">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5853">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5853">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5854">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5854">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5855">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5855">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5856">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5856">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5857">Nom de la valeur: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5857">Value Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5858">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5858">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5859">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5859">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5860">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5860">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5861">Nom clé de la préférence: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5861">Preference Key Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5862">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5862">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
