  ### <a name="autofillcreditcardenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5864">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5864">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-autofill-for-credit-cards"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5865">Activer la saisie automatique pour les cartes de crédit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5865">Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5866">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5866">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5867">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5867">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5868">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5868">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5869">Active la fonctionnalité de saisie automatique de MicrosoftEdge, qui permet à l’utilisateur de remplir automatiquement des formulaires web à partir de données stockées précédemment, telles que des informations relatives aux cartes de crédit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5869">Enables Microsoft Edge's AutoFill feature and lets users auto complete credit card information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5870">Si cette stratégie est désactivé, ces informations ne sont jamais suggérées ni saisies automatiquement. De même, les informations complémentaires relatives aux cartes de crédit que l’utilisateur est susceptible de fournir sur une page web ne sont pas enregistrées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5870">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills credit card information, nor will it save additional credit card information that users might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5871">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou ne la configurez pas, les utilisateurs contrôlent la fonctionnalité de saisie automatique pour les cartes de crédit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5871">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for credit cards.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5872">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5872">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5873">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5873">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5874">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5874">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5875">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5875">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5876">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5876">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5877">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5877">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5878">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5878">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5879">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5879">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5880">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5880">GP unique name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5881">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la saisie automatique pour les cartes de crédit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5881">GP name: Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5882">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5882">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5883">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5883">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5884">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5884">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5885">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5885">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5886">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5886">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5887">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5887">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5888">Nom de la valeur: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5888">Value Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5889">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5889">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5890">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5890">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5891">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5891">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5892">Nom clé de la préférence: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5892">Preference Key Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5893">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5893">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="autoplayallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5895">AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5895">AutoplayAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-media-autoplay-for-websites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5896">Autoriser la lecture automatique de média pour les sites web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5896">Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5897">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5897">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5898">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5898">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5899">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5899">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5900">Cette stratégie définit la stratégie de lecture automatique des médias pour les sites web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5900">This policy sets the media autoplay policy for websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5901">Le paramètre par défaut, «Non configuré», respecte les paramètres actuels de lecture automatique des médias et permet aux utilisateurs de configurer leurs paramètres de lecture automatique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5901">The default setting, "Not configured" respects the current media autoplay settings and lets users configure their autoplay settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5902">Le paramètre «Activé» définit la lecture automatique des médias sur «Autoriser».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5902">Setting to "Enabled" sets media autoplay to "Allow".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5903">Tous les sites web sont autorisés à effectuer la lecture automatique des médias.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5903">All websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5904">Les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas remplacer cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5904">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5905">Le paramètre «Désactivé» définit la lecture automatique des médias sur «Bloquer».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5905">Setting to "Disabled" sets media autoplay to "Block".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5906">Aucun site web n’est autorisé à effectuer la lecture automatique des médias.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5906">No websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5907">Les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas remplacer cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5907">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5908">Un onglet doit être fermé et rouvert pour que cette stratégie soit appliquée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5908">A tab will need to be closed and re-opened for this policy to take effect.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5909">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5909">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5910">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5910">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5911">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5911">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5912">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5912">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5913">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5913">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5914">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5914">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5915">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5915">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5916">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5916">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5917">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5917">GP unique name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5918">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser la lecture automatique de média pour les sites web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5918">GP name: Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5919">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5919">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5920">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5920">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5921">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5921">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5922">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5922">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5923">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5923">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5924">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5924">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5925">Nom de la valeur: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5925">Value Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5926">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5926">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5927">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5927">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5928">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5928">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5929">Nom clé de la préférence: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5929">Preference Key Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5930">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5930">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="backgroundmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5932">BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5932">BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="continue-running-background-apps-after-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5933">Poursuivre l’exécution des applications en arrière-plan après la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5933">Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5934">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5934">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5935">sur Windows depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5935">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5936">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5936">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5937">Autorise un processus de MicrosoftEdge à démarrer lors de la connexion au système d’exploitation et à rester ouvert jusqu’à la fermeture de la dernière fenêtre du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5937">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and keep running after the last browser window is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5938">Dans ce cas, les applications en arrière-plan et la session de navigation en cours restent actives, ainsi que les cookies de la session.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5938">In this scenario, background apps and the current browsing session remain active, including any session cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5939">Le processus exécuté en arrière-plan affiche une icône dans la barre d’état système et peut être fermé à tout moment à partir de cet emplacement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5939">An open background process displays an icon in the system tray and can always be closed from there.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5940">Si vous activez cette stratégie, le mode arrière-plan est activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5940">If you enable this policy, background mode is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5941">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, le mode arrière-plan est désactivé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5941">If you disable this policy, background mode is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5942">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le mode arrière-plan est désactivé initialement et peut être contrôlé par l’utilisateur dans edge://settings/system.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5942">If you don't configure this policy, background mode is initially turned off, and the user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5943">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5943">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5944">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5944">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5945">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5945">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5946">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5946">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5947">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5947">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5948">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5948">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5949">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5949">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5950">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5950">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5951">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5951">GP unique name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5952">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: poursuivre l’exécution des applications en arrière-plan après la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5952">GP name: Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5953">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5953">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5954">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5954">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5955">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5955">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5956">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5956">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5957">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5957">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5958">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5958">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5959">Nom de la valeur: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5959">Value Name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5960">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5960">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5961">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5961">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="backgroundtemplatelistupdatesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5963">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5963">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enables-background-updates-to-the-list-of-available-templates-for-collections-and-other-features-that-use-templates"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5964">Active les mises à jour en arrière-plan dans la liste des modèles disponibles pour Collections et d’autres fonctionnalités qui utilisent des modèles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5964">Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5965">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5965">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5966">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version79 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5966">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5967">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5967">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5968">Vous permet d’activer ou de désactiver les mises à jour en arrière-plan pour la liste des modèles disponibles pour les collections et d’autres fonctionnalités qui utilisent des modèles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5968">Lets you enable or disable background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5969">Les modèles permettent d’extraire les métadonnées enrichies d’une page web lorsque la page est enregistrée dans une collection.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5969">Templates are used to extract rich metadata from a webpage when the page is saved to a collection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5970">Si vous activez ce paramètre ou si celui-ci n’est pas configuré, la liste des modèles disponibles est téléchargée en arrière-plan à partir d’un service Microsoft toutes les 24heures.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5970">If you enable this setting or the setting is unconfigured, the list of available templates will be downloaded in the background from a Microsoft service every 24 hours.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5971">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre, la liste des modèles disponibles est téléchargée à la demande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5971">If you disable this setting the list of available templates will be downloaded on demand.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5972">Ce type de téléchargement peut entraîner de légères altérations des performances pour les collections et d’autres fonctionnalités.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5972">This type of download might result in small performance penalties for Collections and other features.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5973">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5973">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5974">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5974">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5975">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5975">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5976">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5976">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5977">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5977">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5978">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5978">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5979">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5979">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5980">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5980">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5981">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5981">GP unique name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5982">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: active les mises à jour en arrière-plan dans la liste des modèles disponibles pour Collections et d’autres fonctionnalités qui utilisent des modèles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5982">GP name: Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5983">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5983">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5984">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5984">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5985">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5985">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5986">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5986">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5987">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5987">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5988">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5988">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5989">Nom de la valeur: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5989">Value Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5990">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5990">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5991">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5991">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5992">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5992">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5993">Nom clé de la préférence: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5993">Preference Key Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5994">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5994">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="bingadssuppression"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5996">BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5996">BingAdsSuppression</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-all-ads-on-bing-search-results"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5997">Bloquer toutes les annonces dans les résultats de recherche Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5997">Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5998">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5998">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-5999">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-5999">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6000">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6000">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6001">Permet une expérience de recherche sans publicité sur Bing.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6001">Enables an ad-free search experience on Bing.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6002">Si vous activez cette stratégie, un utilisateur peut effectuer une recherche sur bing.com et bénéficier d’une expérience de recherche sans publicité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6002">If you enable this policy, then a user can search on bing.com and have an ad-free search experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6003">En même temps, le paramètre Filtre adulte est défini sur «strict» et ne peut pas être modifié par l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6003">At the same time, the SafeSearch setting will be set to 'Strict' and can't be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6004">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, l’expérience par défaut affiche les publicités dans les résultats de la recherche sur bing.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6004">If you don't configure this policy, then the default experience will have ads in the search results on bing.com.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6005">Le Filtre adulte est défini sur «Modéré» par défaut et pourra être modifié par l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6005">SafeSearch will be set to 'Moderate' by default and can be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6006">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement pour les références SKUK-12 qui sont identifiées comme clients EDU par Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6006">This policy is only available for K-12 SKUs that are identified as EDU tenants by Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6007">Si vous souhaitez en apprendre plus sur cette stratégie ou si ces cas s’appliquent à votre situation, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6007">Please refer to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711) to learn more about this policy or if the following scenarios apply to you:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6008">Vous avez un client EDU, mais la stratégie ne fonctionne pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6008">You have an EDU tenant, but the policy doesn't work.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6009">Votre adresse IP était déjà sur la liste d’autorisations pour une expérience de recherche gratuite de la recherche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6009">You had your IP allowlisted for having an ad free search experience.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6010">Vous connaissez une expérience de recherche sans publicités sur l’ancienne version de Microsoft Edge et vous souhaitez effectuer la mise à jour vers la nouvelle version de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6010">You were experiencing an ad-free search experience on Microsoft Edge Legacy and want to upgrade to the new version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6011">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6011">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6012">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6012">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6013">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6013">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6014">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6014">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6015">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6015">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6016">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6016">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6017">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6017">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6018">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6018">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6019">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6019">GP unique name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6020">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer toutes les annonces dans les résultats de recherche Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6020">GP name: Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6021">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6021">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6022">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6022">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6023">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6023">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6024">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6024">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6025">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6025">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6026">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6026">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6027">Nom de la valeur: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6027">Value Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6028">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6028">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6029">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6029">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6030">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6030">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6031">Nom clé de la préférence: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6031">Preference Key Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6032">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6032">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="blockthirdpartycookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6034">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6034">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-third-party-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6035">Bloquer les cookies tiers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6035">Block third party cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6036">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6036">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6037">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6037">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6038">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6038">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6039">Empêchez les éléments d’une page web, qui ne proviennent pas du domaine figurant dans la barre d’adresses, de définir les cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6039">Block web page elements that aren't from the domain that's in the address bar from setting cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6040">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les éléments d’une page web, qui ne proviennent pas du domaine figurant dans la barre d’adresses, ne peuvent pas configurer les cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6040">If you enable this policy, web page elements that are not from the domain that is in the address bar can't set cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6041">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les éléments d’une page web, qui proviennent de domaines autres que la barre d’adresses, peuvent spécifier des cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6041">If you disable this policy, web page elements from domains other than in the address bar can set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6042">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les cookies tiers sont activés, mais les utilisateurs peuvent modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6042">If you don't configure this policy, third-party cookies are enabled but users can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6043">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6043">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6044">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6044">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6045">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6045">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6046">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6046">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6047">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6047">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6048">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6048">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6049">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6049">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6050">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6050">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6051">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6051">GP unique name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6052">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer les cookies tiers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6052">GP name: Block third party cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6053">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6053">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6054">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6054">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6055">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6055">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6056">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6056">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6057">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6057">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6058">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6058">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6059">Nom de la valeur: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6059">Value Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6060">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6060">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6061">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6061">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6063">Nom clé de la préférence: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6063">Preference Key Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>

  ### <a name="browseraddprofileenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6066">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6066">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-profile-creation-from-the-identity-flyout-menu-or-the-settings-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6067">Activer la création de profil à partir du menu déroulant Identité ou de la page Paramètres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6067">Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6068">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6068">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6069">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6069">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6070">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6070">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6071">Permet aux utilisateurs de créer des profils à l’aide de l’option **Ajouter un profil**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6071">Allows users to create new profiles, using the **Add profile** option.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6072">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou ne la configurez pas, MicrosoftEdge autorise les utilisateurs à utiliser **Ajouter un profil** dans le menu déroulant Identité ou sur la page Paramètres pour créer des profils.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6072">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge allows users to use **Add profile** on the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page to create new profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6073">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas ajouter de nouveaux profils à partir du menu déroulant Identité ou de la page Paramètres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6073">If you disable this policy, users cannot add new profiles from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6074">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6074">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6075">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6075">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6076">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6076">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6077">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6077">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6078">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6078">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6079">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6079">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6080">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6080">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6081">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6081">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6082">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6082">GP unique name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6083">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la création de profil à partir du menu déroulant Identité ou de la page Paramètres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6083">GP name: Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6084">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6084">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6085">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6085">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6086">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6086">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6087">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6087">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6088">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6088">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6089">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6089">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6090">Nom de la valeur: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6090">Value Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6091">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6091">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6092">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6092">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6093">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6093">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6094">Nom clé de la préférence: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6094">Preference Key Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6095">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6095">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="browserguestmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6097">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6097">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-guest-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6098">Activer le mode Invité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6098">Enable guest mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6099">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6099">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6100">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6100">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6101">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6101">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6102">Activez l’option permettant d’utiliser les profils invités dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6102">Enable the option to allow the use of guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6103">Dans un profil invité, le navigateur n’importe pas les données de navigation à partir de profils existants et supprime les données de navigation lorsque tous les profils invités sont fermés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6103">In a guest profile, the browser doesn't import browsing data from existing profiles, and it deletes browsing data when all guest profiles are closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6104">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, MicrosoftEdge permet aux utilisateurs de parcourir les profils invités.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6104">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge lets users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6105">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge ne permet pas aux utilisateurs de parcourir les profils invités.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6105">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge doesn't let users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6106">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6106">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6107">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6107">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6108">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6108">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6109">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6109">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6110">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6110">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6111">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6111">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6112">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6112">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6113">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6113">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6114">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6114">GP unique name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6115">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer le mode Invité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6115">GP name: Enable guest mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6116">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6116">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6117">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6117">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6118">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6118">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6119">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6119">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6120">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6120">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6121">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6121">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6122">Nom de la valeur: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6122">Value Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6123">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6123">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6124">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6124">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6125">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6125">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6126">Nom clé de la préférence: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6126">Preference Key Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6127">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6127">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="browsernetworktimequeriesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6129">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6129">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-queries-to-a-browser-network-time-service"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6130">Autoriser l’envoi de requêtes à un service horaire du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6130">Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6131">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6131">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6132">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6132">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6133">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6133">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6134">Empêche MicrosoftEdge d’envoyer occasionnellement des requêtes à un service horaire du navigateur afin de récupérer un horodatage précis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6134">Prevents Microsoft Edge from occasionally sending queries to a browser network time service to retrieve an accurate timestamp.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6135">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge cesse d’envoyer des requêtes à un service horaire du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6135">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will stop sending queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6136">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, MicrosoftEdge enverra parfois des requêtes à un service horaire du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6136">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will occasionally send queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6137">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6137">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6138">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6138">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6139">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6139">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6140">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6140">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6141">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6141">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6142">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6142">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6143">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6143">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6144">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6144">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6145">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6145">GP unique name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6146">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’envoi de requêtes à un service horaire du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6146">GP name: Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6147">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6147">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6148">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6148">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6149">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6149">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6150">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6150">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6151">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6151">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6152">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6152">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6153">Nom de la valeur: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6153">Value Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6154">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6154">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6155">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6155">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6156">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6156">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6157">Nom clé de la préférence: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6157">Preference Key Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6158">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6158">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6159">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6159">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="browsersignin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6160">BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6160">BrowserSignin</span></span>

  #### <a name="browser-sign-in-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6161">Paramètres de connexion du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6161">Browser sign-in settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6162">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6162">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6163">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6163">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6164">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6164">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6165">Spécifiez si un utilisateur peut se connecter à MicrosoftEdge avec son compte et utiliser les services liés au compte, tels que la synchronisation et l’authentification unique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6165">Specify whether a user can sign into Microsoft Edge with their account and use account-related services like sync and single sign on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6166">Pour contrôler la disponibilité de la synchronisation, utilisez plutôt la stratégie [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled). </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6166">To control the availability of sync, use the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6167">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «Disable», veillez à également désactiver la stratégie [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled), car [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) désactive la création d’un profil de navigateur automatiquement connecté.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6167">If you set this policy to 'Disable', make sure that you also set the [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) policy to disabled because [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) disables the creation of an automatically signed in browser profile.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6168">Si les deux stratégies sont définies, MicrosoftEdge utilise la stratégie «Désactiver la connexion au navigateur» et se comporte comme si [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) était désactivée. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6168">If both policies are set, Microsoft Edge will use the 'Disable browser sign-in' policy and behave as if [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) is set to disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6169">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «Enable», les utilisateurs peuvent se connecter au navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6169">If you set this policy to 'Enable', users can sign into the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6170">La connexion au navigateur ne signifie pas que la synchronisation est activée par défaut. L’utilisateur doit accepter séparément l’utilisation de cette fonctionnalité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6170">Signing into the browser doesn't mean that sync is turned on by default; the user must separately opt-in to use this feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6171">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «Force», les utilisateurs doivent se connecter à un profil pour utiliser le navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6171">If you set this policy to 'Force', users must sign into a profile to use the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6172">Par défaut, cela permet à l’utilisateur de choisir s’il veut synchroniser son compte, sauf si la synchronisation est désactivée par l’administrateur de domaine ou avec la stratégie [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6172">By default, this will allow the user to choose whether they want to sync to their account, unless sync is disabled by the domain admin or with the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6173">La valeur par défaut de la stratégie [BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) est définie sur false.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6173">The default value of [BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) policy is set to false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6174">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent décider s’ils souhaitent activer l’option de connexion au navigateur et l’utiliser au mieux.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6174">If you don't configure this policy users can decide if they want to enable the browser sign-in option and use it as they see fit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6175">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6175">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6176">Disable 0=Désactiver la connexion au navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6176">Disable (0) = Disable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6177">Enable (1)=Activer la connexion au navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6177">Enable (1) = Enable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6178">Force (2)=Forcer les utilisateurs à se connecter pour utiliser le navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6178">Force (2) = Force users to sign-in to use the browser</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6179">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6179">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6180">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6180">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6181">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6181">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6182">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6182">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6183">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6183">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6184">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6184">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6185">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6185">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6186">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6186">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6187">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6187">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6188">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6188">GP unique name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6189">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: paramètres de connexion du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6189">GP name: Browser sign-in settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6190">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6190">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6191">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6191">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6192">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6192">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6193">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6193">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6194">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6194">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6195">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6195">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6196">Nom de la valeur: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6196">Value Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6197">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6197">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6198">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6198">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6199">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6199">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6200">Nom clé de la préférence: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6200">Preference Key Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6201">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6201">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
