  ### <a name="browsingdatalifetime"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6203">BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6203">BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>

  #### <a name="browsing-data-lifetime-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6204">Paramètres de durée de vie des données de navigation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6204">Browsing Data Lifetime Settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6205">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6205">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6206">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 89 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6206">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6207">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6207">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6208">Configure les paramètres de durée de vie des données de navigation pour MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6208">Configures browsing data lifetime settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6209">Cette stratégie contrôle la durée de vie des données de navigation sélectionnées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6209">This policy controls the lifetime of selected browsing data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6210">Cette stratégie n’a aucun effet si la synchronisation est activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6210">This policy has no effect if Sync is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6211">Les types de données disponibles sont «browsing_history» ( browsing_history), «download_history» (cookies_and_other_site_data), «cached_images_and_files» (cached_images_and_files), «password_signin» (password_signin), «autofill», «site_settings» (site_settings) et «hosted_app_data» (hosted_app_data).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6211">The available data types are the 'browsing_history', 'download_history', 'cookies_and_other_site_data', 'cached_images_and_files', 'password_signin', 'autofill', 'site_settings' and 'hosted_app_data'.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6212">MicrosoftEdge supprime régulièrement les données des types sélectionnés plus anciens que «time_to_live_in_hours».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6212">Microsoft Edge will regularly remove data of selected types that is older than 'time_to_live_in_hours'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6213">Étant donné que la suppression des données ne se produit qu’à certains intervalles, certaines données peuvent être conservées légèrement plus longtemps, mais jamais plus du double du «time_to_live_in_hours» prévu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6213">Because data deletion only happens at certain intervals, some data might be kept slightly longer but never more than twice its expected 'time_to_live_in_hours'.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6214">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6214">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6215">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6215">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6216">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6216">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6217">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6217">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6218">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6218">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6219">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6219">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6220">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6220">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6221">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6221">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6222">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe : BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6222">GP unique name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6223">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: paramètres de durée de vie des données de navigation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6223">GP name: Browsing Data Lifetime Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6224">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Modèles d'administration/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6224">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6225">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6225">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6226">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6226">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6227">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6227">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6228">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6228">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6229">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6229">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6230">Nom de la valeur: BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6230">Value Name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6231">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6231">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6232">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6232">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\BrowsingDataLifetime = [
  {
    "data_types": [
      "browsing_history"
    ], 
    "time_to_live_in_hours": 24
  }, 
  {
    "data_types": [
      "password_signin", 
      "autofill"
    ], 
    "time_to_live_in_hours": 12
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6233">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6233">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\BrowsingDataLifetime = [{"data_types": ["browsing_history"], "time_to_live_in_hours": 24}, {"data_types": ["password_signin", "autofill"], "time_to_live_in_hours": 12}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6234">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6234">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6235">Nom clé de la préférence: BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6235">Preference Key Name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6236">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6236">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>BrowsingDataLifetime</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>data_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>browsing_history</string>
    </array>
    <key>time_to_live_in_hours</key>
    <integer>24</integer>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>data_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>password_signin</string>
      <string>autofill</string>
    </array>
    <key>time_to_live_in_hours</key>
    <integer>12</integer>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="builtindnsclientenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6238">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6238">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-built-in-dns-client"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6239">Utiliser le client DNS intégré</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6239">Use built-in DNS client</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6240">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6240">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6241">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6241">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6242">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6242">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6243">Détermine si le client DNS intégré doit être utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6243">Controls whether to use the built-in DNS client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6244">Cette stratégie contrôle la pile logicielle utilisée pour communiquer avec le serveur DNS: le client DNS du système d’exploitation ou le client DNS intégré de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6244">This policy controls which software stack is used to communicate with the DNS server: the operating system DNS client, or Microsoft Edge's built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6245">Cette stratégie n’affecte pas les serveurs DNS utilisés: si, par exemple, le système d’exploitation est configuré pour utiliser un serveur DNS d’entreprise, ce même serveur sera utilisé par le client DNS intégré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6245">This policy does not affect which DNS servers are used: if, for example, the operating system is configured to use an enterprise DNS server, that same server would be used by the built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6246">Il ne contrôle pas non plus si DNS-over-HTTPS est utilisé; MicrosoftEdge utilise toujours le résolveur intégré pour les demandes DNS-over-HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6246">It also does not control if DNS-over-HTTPS is used; Microsoft Edge always uses the built-in resolver for DNS-over-HTTPS requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6247">Pour plus d’informations sur le contrôle DNS-over-HTTPS, voir la stratégie [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6247">Please see the [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) policy for information on controlling DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6248">Si vous activez cette stratégie, le client DNS intégré est utilisé, si disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6248">If you enable this policy, the built-in DNS client is used, if it's available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6249">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, le client DNS intégré est utilisé uniquement lorsque DNS-over-HTTPS est en cours d’utilisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6249">If you disable this policy, the built-in DNS client is only used when DNS-over-HTTPS is in use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6250">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le client DNS intégré est activé par défaut sur macOS et Android (lorsque ni le DNS privé ni le VPN ne sont activés).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6250">If you don't configure this policy, the built-in DNS client is enabled by default on macOS and Android (when neither Private DNS nor VPN are enabled).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6251">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6251">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6252">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6252">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6253">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6253">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6254">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6254">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6255">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6255">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6256">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6256">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6257">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6257">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6258">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6258">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6259">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6259">GP unique name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6260">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: utiliser le client DNS intégré</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6260">GP name: Use built-in DNS client</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6261">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6261">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6262">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6262">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6263">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6263">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6264">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6264">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6265">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6265">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6266">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6266">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6267">Nom de la valeur: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6267">Value Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6268">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6268">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6269">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6269">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6270">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6270">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6271">Nom clé de la préférence: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6271">Preference Key Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6272">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6272">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="builtincertificateverifierenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6274">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6274">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="determines-whether-the-built-in-certificate-verifier-will-be-used-to-verify-server-certificates-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6275">Indique si le vérificateur de certificats intégré est utilisé pour la vérification des certificats de serveur (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6275">Determines whether the built-in certificate verifier will be used to verify server certificates (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6276">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6276">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6277">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6277">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6278">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6278">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6279">sur macOS depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6279">On macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6280">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6280">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6281">Cette stratégie est déconseillée, car elle a pour but de servir uniquement comme mécanisme à court terme afin d’offrir aux entreprises davantage de temps pour mettre à jour leurs environnements et signaler les problèmes s’ils sont détectés comme incompatibles avec le vérificateur de certificat intégré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6281">This policy is deprecated because it's intended to serve only as a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their environments and report issues if they are found to be incompatible with the built-in certificate verifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6282">Elle ne fonctionne pas dans Microsoft Edge version92, lorsque la prise en charge du programme de vérification de certificat hérité sur Mac OS X est prévue pour être supprimée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6282">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 92, when support for the legacy certificate verifier on Mac OS X is planned to be removed.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6283">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6283">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6284">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6284">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6285">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6285">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6286">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6286">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6287">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6287">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6288">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6288">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6289">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6289">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6290">Nom clé de la préférence: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6290">Preference Key Name: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6291">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6291">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="certificatetransparencyenforcementdisabledforcas"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6293">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6293">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-certificate-transparency-enforcement-for-a-list-of-subjectpublickeyinfo-hashes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6294">Désactiver l’application des règles de transparence des certificats pour une liste de hachages subjectPublicKeyInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6294">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6295">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6295">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6296">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6296">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6297">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6297">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6298">Désactive l’application des exigences de transparence du certificat pour obtenir la liste des hachages subjectPublicKeyInfo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6298">Disables enforcement of Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6299">Cette stratégie vous permet de désactiver les exigences de divulgation de transparence de certificat pour les chaînes de certificat qui contiennent des certificats avec l’un des hachages subjectPublicKeyInfo spécifiés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6299">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6300">Cela autorise les certificats qui ne seraient pas approuvés dans le cas contraire, car ils n’ont pas été correctement divulgués publiquement, de continuer à être utilisés pour les hôtes Entreprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6300">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed to still be used for Enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6301">Pour désactiver l’application de la transparence du certificat lorsque cette stratégie est définie, l’un des ensembles de conditions suivants doit être rempli:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6301">To disable Certificate Transparency enforcement when this policy is set, one of the following sets of conditions must be met:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6302">Le hachage est celui de subjectPublicKeyInfo du certificat serveur. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6302">The hash is of the server certificate's subjectPublicKeyInfo.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6303">Le hachage est celui d’un subjectPublicKeyInfo qui s’affiche dans un certificat d’autorité de certification dans la chaîne de certificats, que le certificat d’autorité de certification est limité via l’extension nameConstraints X.509v3, au moins un nameConstraints est présent dans le permittedSubtrees et le directoryName contient un attribut organizationName. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6303">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, that CA certificate is constrained via the X.509v3 nameConstraints extension, one or more directoryName nameConstraints are present in the permittedSubtrees, and the directoryName contains an organizationName attribute.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6304">Le hachage est celui d’un subjectPublicKeyInfo qui s’affiche dans un certificat d’autorité de certification dans la chaîne de certificats, que le certificat d’autorité de certification a au moins un attribut organizationName dans le sujet du certificat et le certificat du serveur contient le même nombre d’attributs organizationName, dans le même ordre et avec des valeurs identiques (octet pour octet).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6304">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, the CA certificate has one or more organizationName attributes in the certificate Subject, and the server's certificate contains the same number of organizationName attributes, in the same order, and with byte-for-byte identical values.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6305">Un hachage subjectPublicKeyInfo est spécifié par la concaténation du nom d’algorithme de hachage, le caractère «/» et l’encodage Base64 de cet algorithme de hachage appliqué à la subjectPublicKeyInfo codée DER du certificat spécifié.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6305">A subjectPublicKeyInfo hash is specified by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6306">Cet encodage Base64 est le même format qu’une empreinte digitale SPKI, telle que définie dans la RFC 7469, section 2.4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6306">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6307">Les algorithmes de hachage non reconnus sont ignorés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6307">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6308">Le seul algorithme de hachage pris en charge pour l’instant est «sha256».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6308">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6309">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, tous les certificats obligatoires pour être divulgués via la transparence des certificats sont considérés comme non approuvés s’ils ne sont pas transmis conformément à la stratégie de transparence du certificat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6309">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6310">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6310">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6311">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6311">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6312">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6312">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6313">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6313">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6314">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6314">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6315">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6315">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6316">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6316">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6317">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6317">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6318">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6318">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6319">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: désactiver l’application des règles de transparence des certificats pour une liste de hachages subjectPublicKeyInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6319">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6320">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6320">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6321">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6321">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6322">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6322">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6323">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6323">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6324">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6324">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6325">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6325">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6326">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6326">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6327">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6327">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6328">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6328">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6329">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6329">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6330">Nom clé de la préférence: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6330">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6331">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6331">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="certificatetransparencyenforcementdisabledforlegacycas"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6333">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6333">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-certificate-transparency-enforcement-for-a-list-of-legacy-certificate-authorities"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6334">Désactiver l’application des règles de transparence des certificats pour une liste d’autorités de certification héritées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6334">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6335">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6335">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6336">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6336">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6337">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6337">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6338">Désactive l’application des exigences de transparence de certificat pour une liste d’autorités de certification (AC) héritées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6338">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of legacy certificate authorities (Cas).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6339">Cette stratégie vous permet de désactiver les exigences de divulgation de transparence de certificat pour les chaînes de certificat qui contiennent des certificats avec l’un des hachages subjectPublicKeyInfo spécifiés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6339">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6340">Cela autorise les certificats qui ne seraient pas approuvés dans le cas contraire, car ils n’ont pas été correctement divulgués publiquement, d’être utilisés pour les hôtes Entreprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6340">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed, continue to be used for enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6341">Pour pouvoir désactiver l’application de la transparence de certificat, vous devez définir le hachage sur un subjectPublicKeyInfo apparaissant dans un certificat d’autorité de certification qui n’est reconnu comme une autorité de certification (AC) héritée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6341">In order for Certificate Transparency enforcement to be disabled, you must set the hash to a subjectPublicKeyInfo appearing in a CA certificate that is recognized as a legacy certificate authority (CA).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6342">Une autorité de certification héritée est une autorité de certification qui a été approuvée publiquement par défaut, par un ou plusieurs systèmes d’exploitation pris en charge par MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6342">A legacy CA is a CA that has been publicly trusted by default by one or more operating systems supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6343">Vous spécifiez un hachage subjectPublicKeyInfo par la concaténation du nom d’algorithme de hachage, le caractère «/» et l’encodage Base64 de cet algorithme de hachage appliqué à la subjectPublicKeyInfo codée DER du certificat spécifié.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6343">You specify a subjectPublicKeyInfo hash by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6344">Cet encodage Base64 est le même format qu’une empreinte digitale SPKI, telle que définie dans la RFC 7469, section 2.4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6344">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6345">Les algorithmes de hachage non reconnus sont ignorés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6345">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6346">Le seul algorithme de hachage pris en charge pour l’instant est «sha256».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6346">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6347">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, tous les certificats obligatoires pour être divulgués via la transparence des certificats sont considérés comme non approuvés s’ils ne sont pas transmis conformément à la stratégie de transparence du certificat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6347">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it isn't disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6348">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6348">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6349">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6349">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6350">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6350">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6351">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6351">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6352">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6352">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6353">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6353">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6354">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6354">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6355">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6355">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6356">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6356">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6357">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: désactiver l’application des règles de transparence des certificats pour une liste d’autorités de certification héritées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6357">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6358">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6358">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6359">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6359">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6360">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6360">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6361">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6361">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6362">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6362">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6363">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6363">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6364">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6364">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6365">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6365">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6366">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6366">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6367">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6367">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6368">Nom clé de la préférence: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6368">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6369">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6369">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="certificatetransparencyenforcementdisabledforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6371">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6371">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-certificate-transparency-enforcement-for-specific-urls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6372">Désactiver l’application des règles de transparence des certificats pour des URL spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6372">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6373">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6373">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6374">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6374">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6375">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6375">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6376">Désactive l’application des règles de transparence des certificats pour les URL répertoriées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6376">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for the listed URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6377">Cette règle autorise à ne pas communiquer les certificats associés aux noms d’hôte dans la liste d’URL répertoriées via les règles de transparence des certificats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6377">This policy lets you not disclose certificates for the hostnames in the specified URLs via Certificate Transparency.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6378">Cela vous permet d’utiliser des certificats qui, autrement, ne seraient pas fiables, car ils n’ont pas été correctement divulgués publiquement, mais il est plus difficile de détecter les certificats émis incorrectement pour ces hôtes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6378">This lets you use certificates that would otherwise be untrusted, because they weren't properly publicly disclosed, but it makes it harder to detect mis-issued certificates for those hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6379">Le format d’un modèle d’URL doit être conforme aux règles stipulées à l’adresse [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6379">Form your URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6380">Comme les certificats sont valides pour un nom d’hôte donné, indépendamment du schéma, du port ou du chemin d’accès, seule la partie du nom d’hôte de l’URL est prise en compte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6380">Because certificates are valid for a given hostname, independent of the scheme, port, or path, only the hostname part of the URL is considered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6381">Les caractères génériques ne sont pas pris en charge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6381">Wildcard hosts are not supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6382">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, tout certificat qui doit être communiqué tel que le prévoient les règles de transparence des certificats est considéré comme n’étant pas fiable s’il n’est pas communiqué comme il se doit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6382">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that should be disclosed via Certificate Transparency is treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6383">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6383">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6384">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6384">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6385">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6385">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6386">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6386">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6387">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6387">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6388">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6388">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6389">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6389">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6390">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6390">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6391">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6391">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6392">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: désactiver l’application des règles de transparence des certificats pour des URL spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6392">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6393">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6393">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6394">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6394">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6395">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6395">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6396">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6396">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6397">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6397">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6398">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6398">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6399">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6399">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6400">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6400">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6401">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6401">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\2 = ".contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6402">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6402">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6403">Nom clé de la préférence: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6403">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6404">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6404">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6405">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6405">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="clearbrowsingdataonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6406">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6406">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="clear-browsing-data-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6407">Effacer les données de navigation lors de la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6407">Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6408">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6408">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6409">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6409">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6410">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6410">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6411">MicrosoftEdge n’efface pas les données de navigation par défaut lors de sa fermeture.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6411">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear the browsing data by default when it closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6412">Les données de navigation incluent les informations entrées dans les formulaires, les mots de passe et même les sites web visités.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6412">Browsing data includes information entered in forms, passwords, and even the websites visited.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6413">Si vous activez cette stratégie, toutes les données de navigation sont supprimées à chaque fermeture de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6413">If you enable this policy, all browsing data is deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6414">Si vous activez cette stratégie, elle prévaut sur la configuration de [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6414">Note that if you enable this policy, it takes precedence over how you configured [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6415">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent configurer l’option Effacer les données de navigation dans les Paramètres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6415">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can configure the Clear browsing data option in Settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6416">Si vous activez cette stratégie, ne configurez pas la stratégie [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) ou la stratégie [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit), car elles traitent toutes la suppression de données de navigation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6416">If you enable this policy, don't configure the [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or the [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) policy, because they all deal with deleting browsing data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6417">Si vous configurez les stratégies précédentes et cette stratégie, toutes les données de navigation sont supprimées à la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge, quelle que soit la façon dont vous avez configuré [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) ou [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6417">If you configure the preceding policies and this policy, all browsing data is deleted when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6418">Pour exclure la suppression des cookies lors de la fermeture, configurez la stratégie de [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6418">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6419">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6419">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6420">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6420">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6421">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6421">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6422">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6422">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6423">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6423">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6424">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6424">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6425">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6425">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6426">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6426">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6427">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6427">GP unique name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6428">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: effacer les données de navigation lors de la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6428">GP name: Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6429">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6429">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6430">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6430">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6431">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6431">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6432">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6432">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6433">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6433">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6434">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6434">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6435">Nom de la valeur: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6435">Value Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6436">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6436">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6437">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6437">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6438">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6438">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6439">Nom clé de la préférence: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6439">Preference Key Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6440">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6440">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6442">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6442">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="clear-cached-images-and-files-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6443">Effacer les images et les fichiers mis en cache lors de la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6443">Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6444">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6444">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6445">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6445">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6446">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6446">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6447">MicrosoftEdge ne supprime pas les images et les fichiers mis en cache par défaut lors de sa fermeture.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6447">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear cached images and files by default when it closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6448">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les images et les fichiers mis en cache sont supprimées à chaque fermeture de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6448">If you enable this policy, cached images and files will be deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6449">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas configurer l’option images et fichiers mis en cache dans edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6449">If you disable this policy, users cannot configure the cached images and files option in edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6450">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir si les images et les fichiers mis en cache sont supprimés à la fermeture.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6450">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether cached images and files are cleared on exit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6451">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, n’activez pas la stratégie [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit), car elles traitent toutes deux la suppression de données.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6451">If you disable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6452">Si vous activez les deux stratégies, la stratégie [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) prévaut et supprime toutes les données lors de la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge, quelle que soit la configuration de la stratégie [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6452">If you configure both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6453">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6453">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6454">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6454">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6455">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6455">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6456">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6456">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6457">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6457">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6458">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6458">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6459">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6459">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6460">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6460">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6461">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6461">GP unique name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6462">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: effacer les images et les fichiers mis en cache lors de la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6462">GP name: Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6463">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6463">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6464">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6464">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6465">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6465">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6466">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6466">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6467">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6467">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6468">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6468">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6469">Nom de la valeur: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6469">Value Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6470">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6470">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6471">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6471">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6472">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6472">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6473">Nom clé de la préférence: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6473">Preference Key Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6474">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6474">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="clickonceenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6476">ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6476">ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-open-files-using-the-clickonce-protocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6477">Autoriser les utilisateurs à ouvrir des fichiers à l’aide du protocole ClickOnce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6477">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6478">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6478">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6479">sur Windows depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6479">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6480">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6480">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6481">Autorisez les utilisateurs à ouvrir des fichiers à l’aide du protocole ClickOnce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6481">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6482">Le protocole ClickOnce permet aux sites web de demander au navigateur d’ouvrir les fichiers d’une URL spécifique à l’aide du gestionnaire de fichiers ClickOnce sur lordinateur ou l’appareil de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6482">The ClickOnce protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using the ClickOnce file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6483">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent ouvrir des fichiers à l’aide du protocole ClickOnce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6483">If you enable this policy, users can open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6484">Cette stratégie remplace le paramètre ClickOnce de l'utilisateur sur la page edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6484">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6485">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas ouvrir de fichiers à l’aide du protocole ClickOnce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6485">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6486">Au lieu de cela, le fichier est enregistré dans le système de fichiers utilisant le navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6486">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system using the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6487">Cette stratégie remplace le paramètre ClickOnce de l'utilisateur sur la page edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6487">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6488">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs disposant de Microsoft Edge dont la version précède Microsoft Edge 87 ne peuvent pas ouvrir les fichiers à l’aide du protocole ClickOnce par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6488">If you don't configure this policy, users with Microsoft Edge versions before Microsoft Edge 87 can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6489">Les utilisateurs ont cependant la possibilité d’activer l’utilisation du protocole ClickOnce avec la page edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6489">However, they have the option to enable the use of the ClickOnce protocol with the edge://flags/ page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6490">Les utilisateurs de Microsoft Edge version 87 et ultérieures peuvent ouvrir les fichiers à l’aide du protocole ClickOnce par défaut, mais ont la possibilité de désactiver le protocole ClickOnce depuis la page edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6490">Users with Microsoft Edge versions 87 and later can open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default but have the option to disable the ClickOnce protocol with edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6491">La désactivation de ClickOnce peut empêcher le lancement correct des applications ClickOnce (fichiers .application).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6491">Disabling ClickOnce may prevent ClickOnce applications (.application files) from launching properly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6492">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur ClickOnce, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) et [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6492">For more information about ClickOnce, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6493">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6493">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6494">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6494">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6495">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6495">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6496">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6496">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6497">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6497">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6498">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6498">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6499">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6499">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6500">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6500">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6501">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6501">GP unique name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6502">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les utilisateurs à ouvrir des fichiers à l’aide du protocole ClickOnce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6502">GP name: Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6503">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6503">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6504">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6504">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6505">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6505">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6506">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6506">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6507">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6507">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6508">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6508">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6509">Nom de la valeur: ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6509">Value Name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6510">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6510">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6511">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6511">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```
