  ### <a name="collectionsservicesandexportsblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6513">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6513">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-access-to-a-specified-list-of-services-and-export-targets-in-collections"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6514">Bloquer l’accès à une liste spécifiée de services et de cibles d’exportations dans Collections</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6514">Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6515">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6515">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6516">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6516">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6517">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6517">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6518">Lister les services et les cibles d’exportation spécifiques auxquels les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas accéder dans la fonctionnalité Collections de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6518">List specific services and export targets that users can't access in the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6519">Cela inclut l’affichage de données supplémentaires de Bing et l’exportation de collections vers des produits Microsoft ou des partenaires externes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6519">This includes displaying additional data from Bing and exporting collections to Microsoft products or external partners.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6520">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les services et les cibles d’exportation qui correspondent à la liste donnée sont bloqués.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6520">If you enable this policy, services and export targets that match the given list are blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6521">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, aucune restriction n’est imposée concernant les services et cibles d’exportation acceptables.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6521">If you don't configure this policy, no restrictions on the acceptable services and export targets are enforced.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6522">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6522">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6523">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Suggestions Pinterest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6523">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Pinterest suggestions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6524">collections_share (collections_share) = P°artage de Collections</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6524">collections_share (collections_share) = Sharing of Collections</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6525">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6525">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6526">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6526">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6527">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6527">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6528">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6528">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6529">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6529">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6530">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6530">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6531">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6531">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6532">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6532">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6533">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6533">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6534">Nom unique GP : CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6534">GP unique name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6535">Nom GP : Bloquer l’accès à une liste de services et de cibles d’exportation spécifiée dans Collections</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6535">GP name: Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6536">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6536">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6537">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6537">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6538">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6538">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6539">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6539">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6540">Chemin d’accès (Obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6540">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6541">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6541">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6542">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6542">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6543">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6543">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6544">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6544">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\1 = "pinterest_suggestions"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\2 = "collections_share"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6545">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6545">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6546">Nom de la clé de préférence: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6546">Preference Key Name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6547">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6547">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>pinterest_suggestions</string>
  <string>collections_share</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="commandlineflagsecuritywarningsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6549">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6549">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-security-warnings-for-command-line-flags"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6550">Activer les avertissements de sécurité pour les indicateurs de ligne de commande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6550">Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6551">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6551">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6552">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6552">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6553">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6553">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6554">Si cette stratégie est désactivée, elle empêche l’apparition des avertissements de sécurité lorsque MicrosoftEdge est lancé avec des indicateurs de ligne de commande potentiellement dangereux.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6554">If disabled, this policy prevents security warnings from appearing when Microsoft Edge is launched with potentially dangerous command-line flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6555">Si elle est activée ou non configurée, les avertissements de sécurité s’affichent lorsque ces indicateurs de ligne de commande sont utilisés pour lancer MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6555">If enabled or unset, security warnings are displayed when these command-line flags are used to launch Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6556">Par exemple, l’indicateur --disable-gpu-sandbox génère l’avertissement suivant: Vous utilisez un indicateur de ligne de commande non pris en charge: --disable-gpu-sandbox. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6556">For example, the --disable-gpu-sandbox flag generates this warning:  You're using an unsupported command-line flag: --disable-gpu-sandbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6557">Cela expose à des risques de sécurité et de stabilité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6557">This poses stability and security risks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6558">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6558">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6559">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6559">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6560">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6560">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6561">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6561">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6562">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6562">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6563">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6563">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6564">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6564">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6565">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6565">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6566">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6566">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6567">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6567">GP unique name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6568">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer les avertissements de sécurité pour les indicateurs de ligne de commande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6568">GP name: Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6569">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6569">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6570">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6570">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6571">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6571">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6572">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6572">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6573">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6573">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6574">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6574">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6575">Nom de la valeur: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6575">Value Name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6576">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6576">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6577">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6577">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6578">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6578">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6579">Nom clé de la préférence: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6579">Preference Key Name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6580">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6580">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6581">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6581">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="componentupdatesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6582">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6582">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-component-updates-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6583">Activer les mises à jour des composants dans MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6583">Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6584">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6584">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6585">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6585">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6586">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6586">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6587">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les mises à jour des composants sont activées dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6587">If you enable or don't configure this policy, component updates are enabled in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6588">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous la configurez sur false, les mises à jour des composants sont désactivées pour tous les composants dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6588">If you disable this policy or set it to false, component updates are disabled for all components in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6589">Toutefois, certains composants ne sont pas soumis à cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6589">However, some components are exempt from this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6590">Cela inclut les composants sans code exécutable, qui n’affectent pas de façon significative le comportement du navigateur ou qui sont essentiels à la sécurité du navigateur. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6590">This includes any component that doesn't contain executable code, that doesn't significantly alter the behavior of the browser, or that's critical for security.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6591">Autrement dit, les mises à jour considérées comme «essentielles à la sécurité» sont tout de même appliquées, même si vous désactivez cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6591">That is, updates that are deemed "critical for security" are still applied even if you disable this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6592">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6592">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6593">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6593">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6594">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6594">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6595">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6595">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6596">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6596">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6597">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6597">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6598">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6598">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6599">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6599">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6600">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6600">GP unique name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6601">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer les mises à jour des composants dans MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6601">GP name: Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6602">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6602">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6603">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6603">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6604">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6604">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6605">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6605">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6606">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6606">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6607">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6607">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6608">Nom de la valeur: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6608">Value Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6609">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6609">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6610">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6610">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6611">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6611">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6612">Nom clé de la préférence: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6612">Preference Key Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6613">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6613">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="configuredonottrack"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6615">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6615">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-do-not-track"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6616">Configurer Ne pas me suivre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6616">Configure Do Not Track</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6617">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6617">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6618">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6618">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6619">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6619">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6620">Spécifiez si des requêtes Ne pas me suivre doivent être envoyées aux sites web demandant des informations de suivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6620">Specify whether to send Do Not Track requests to websites that ask for tracking info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6621">Les requêtes Ne pas me suivre indiquent aux sites web que vous visitez que vous ne souhaitez pas que votre activité de navigation soit suivie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6621">Do Not Track requests let the websites you visit know that you don't want your browsing activity to be tracked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6622">Par défaut, les requêtes Ne pas me suivre ne sont pas envoyées, mais les utilisateurs peuvent décider d’activer cette fonctionnalité et d’envoyer des demandes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6622">By default, Microsoft Edge doesn't send Do Not Track requests, but users can turn on this feature to send them.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6623">Si vous activez ce paramètre, des requêtes Ne pas me suivre sont toujours envoyées aux sites web demandant des informations de suivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6623">If you enable this policy, Do Not Track requests are always sent to websites asking for tracking info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6624">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les requêtes ne sont jamais envoyées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6624">If you disable this policy, requests are never sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6625">Si vous ne configurez pas la stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir d’envoyer ou non les requêtes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6625">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to send these requests.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6626">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6626">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6627">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6627">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6628">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6628">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6629">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6629">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6630">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6630">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6631">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6631">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6632">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6632">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6633">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6633">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6634">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6634">GP unique name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6635">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer Ne pas me suivre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6635">GP name: Configure Do Not Track</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6636">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6636">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6637">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6637">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6638">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6638">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6639">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6639">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6640">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6640">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6641">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6641">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6642">Nom de la valeur: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6642">Value Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6643">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6643">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6644">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6644">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6645">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6645">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6646">Nom clé de la préférence: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6646">Preference Key Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6647">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6647">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="configurefriendlyurlformat"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6649">ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6649">ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-default-paste-format-of-urls-copied-from-microsoft-edge-and-determine-if-additional-formats-will-be-available-to-users"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6650">Configurer le format de collage par défaut des URL copiées à partir de Microsoft Edge, et déterminer si d’autres formats sont disponibles pour les utilisateurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6650">Configure the default paste format of URLs copied from Microsoft Edge, and determine if additional formats will be available to users</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6651">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6651">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6652">Sur Windows depuis la version87 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6652">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6653">Sur macOS depuis la version88 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6653">On macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6654">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6654">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6655">Si les URL conviviales sont activées, Microsoft Edge calcule d’autres représentations de l’URL et les place dans le Presse-papiers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6655">If FriendlyURLs are enabled, Microsoft Edge will compute additional representations of the URL and place them on the clipboard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6656">Cette stratégie configure le format du contenu collé lorsque l’utilisateur colle dans des applications externes, ou dans Microsoft Edge sans l’élément de menu contextuel Coller en tant que.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6656">This policy configures what format will be pasted when the user pastes in external applications, or inside Microsoft Edge without the 'Paste as' context menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6657">Si elle est configurée, cette stratégie effectue un choix au nom de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6657">If configured, this policy makes a choice on behalf of the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6658">Les options dans edge://settings/shareCopyPaste sont grisées, et les options du menu contextuel Coller en tant que ne sont pas disponibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6658">The options in edge://settings/shareCopyPaste will be grayed out, and the options in the 'Paste As' context menu will not be available.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6659">Non configuré = l’utilisateur peut choisir son format de collage favori.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6659">Not configured = The user will be able to choose their preferred paste format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6660">Par défaut, il s’agit du format d’URL conviviale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6660">By default, this is set to the friendly URL format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6661">Le menu Coller en tant que est disponible dans Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6661">The 'Paste As' menu will be available in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6662">1 = aucun format supplémentaire n’est stocké dans le Presse-papiers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6662">1 = No additional formats will be stored on the clipboard.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6663">Il n’y a pas d’élément de menu contextuel Coller en tant que dans Microsoft Edge, et le seul format disponible pour coller est le format d’URL en texte brut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6663">There will be no 'Paste as' context menu item in Microsoft Edge and the only format available to paste will be the plain text URL format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6664">En effet, la fonctionnalité d’URL conviviale est désactivée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6664">Effectively, the friendly URL feature will be disabled.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6665">3 = l’utilisateur reçoit une URL conviviale chaque fois qu’il colle du contenu dans des emplacements acceptant du texte enrichi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6665">3 = The user will get a friendly URL whenever they paste into surfaces that accept rich text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6666">L’URL ordinaire reste disponible pour les emplacements non enrichis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6666">The plain URL will still be available for non-rich surfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6667">Le menu Coller en tant que n’apparaît pas dans Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6667">There will be no 'Paste As' menu in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6668">4 = (non utilisé pour l’instant)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6668">4 = (Not currently used)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6669">Il est possible que les formats plus riches ne soient pas correctement pris en charge en cas de collage dans certaines destinations et sur certains sites web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6669">The richer formats may not be well-supported in some paste destinations and/or websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6670">Ainsi, si cette stratégie doit être configurée, l’option URL ordinaire est recommandée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6670">As such, if this policy is to be configured, then the plain URL option is recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6671">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6671">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6672">PlainText (1) = URL ordinaire sans informations supplémentaires, telles que le titre de la page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6672">PlainText (1) = The plain URL without any extra information, such as the page's title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6673">Il s’agit de l’option recommandée lorsque cette stratégie est configurée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6673">This is the recommended option when this policy is configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6674">Pour plus d'informations, reportez-vous à la description.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6674">For more information, see the description.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6675">TitledHyperlink (3) = lien hypertexte intitulé: lien hypertexte qui pointe vers l’URL copiée, mais dont le texte visible est le titre de la page de destination.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6675">TitledHyperlink (3) = Titled Hyperlink: A hyperlink that points to the copied URL, but whose visible text is the title of the destination page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6676">Il s’agit du format d’URL conviviale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6676">This is the Friendly URL format.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6677">WebPreview (4) = bientôt disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6677">WebPreview (4) = Coming soon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6678">Si l’option est activée, elle se comporte comme URL ordinaire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6678">If set, behaves the same as 'Plain URL'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6679">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6679">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6680">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6680">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6681">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6681">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6682">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6682">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6683">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6683">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6684">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6684">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6685">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6685">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6686">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6686">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6687">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6687">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6688">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6688">GP unique name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6689">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer le format de collage par défaut des URL copiées à partir de Microsoft Edge et déterminer si d’autres formats sont disponibles pour les utilisateurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6689">GP name: Configure the default paste format of URLs copied from Microsoft Edge, and determine if additional formats will be available to users</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6690">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6690">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6691">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6691">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6692">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6692">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6693">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6693">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6694">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6694">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6695">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6695">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6696">Nom de la valeur: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6696">Value Name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6697">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6697">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6698">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6698">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000003
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6699">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6699">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6700">Nom Clé de Préférence: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6700">Preference Key Name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6701">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6701">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>3</integer>
```

  ### <a name="configureonpremisesaccountautosignin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6703">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6703">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-automatic-sign-in-with-an-active-directory-domain-account-when-there-is-no-azure-ad-domain-account"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6704">Configurer la connexion automatique avec un compte de domaine Active Directory en l’absence de compte de domaine Azure AD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6704">Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6705">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6705">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6706">sur Windows depuis la version81 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6706">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6707">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6707">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6708">Activez l’utilisation des comptes ActiveDirectory pour la connexion automatique si les ordinateurs de vos utilisateurs sont joints au domaine et si votre environnement n’est pas joint de façon hybride.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6708">Enable the use of Active Directory accounts for automatic sign in if your users' machines are Domain Joined and your environment is not hybrid joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6709">Si vous souhaitez que les utilisateurs soient connectés automatiquement avec leur compte AzureActiveDirectory, créez une jonction AzureAD (consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) si vous souhaitez en savoir plus) ou une jonction hybride (consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) si vous souhaitez en savoir plus) pour votre environnement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6709">If you want users automatically signed in with their Azure Active Directory accounts instead, please Azure AD join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) for more information) or hybrid join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) for more information) your environment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6710">À chaque lancement, Microsoft Edge essaiera de se connecter à l’aide de cette stratégie, tant que le premier profil lancé n’est pas connecté ou qu’une se connecte automatique n’a pas eu lieu auparavant.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6710">On every launch, Microsoft Edge will try to sign-in using this policy, as long as the first profile being launched isn't signed-in or an auto sign-in hasn't happened before.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6711">Si vous avez désactivé la stratégie [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin), celle-ci n’a aucun effet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6711">If you have configured the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy to disabled, this policy will not take any effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6712">Si vous activez cette stratégie et la définissez sur «SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable», MicrosoftEdge connecte automatiquement les utilisateurs qui se trouvent sur des ordinateurs joints au domaine à l’aide de leur compte ActiveDirectory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6712">If you enable this policy and set it to 'SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable', Microsoft Edge will automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines using their Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6713">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur « Disabled » ou ne la définissez pas, MicrosoftEdge ne connecte pas automatiquement les utilisateurs qui se trouvent sur des ordinateurs joints au domaine joint avec un compte Active Directory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6713">If you set this policy to 'Disabled' or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will not automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines with Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6714">À partir de MicrosoftEdge89, s’il existe un profil local existant avec synchronisation désactivée et que l’ordinateur est désormais joint hybride, c’est-à-dire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6714">From Microsoft Edge 89 onwards, if there is an existing on-premises profile with sync disabled and machine is now hybrid joined i.e</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6715">qu’il dispose d’un compte Azure AD, il va mettre à niveau automatiquement le profil local vers le profil Azure AD pour obtenir les installations de synchronisation Azure AD complètes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6715">it has an Azure AD account, it will auto-upgrade the on-premises profile to Azure AD profile to get full Azure AD sync facilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6716">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6716">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6717">Disabled (0) = Désactivé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6717">Disabled (0) = Disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6718">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = Connecter et rendre le compte de domaine non supprimable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6718">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = Sign in and make domain account non-removable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6719">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6719">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6720">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6720">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6721">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6721">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6722">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6722">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6723">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6723">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6724">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6724">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6725">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6725">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6726">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6726">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6727">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6727">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6728">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6728">GP unique name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6729">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la connexion automatique avec un compte de domaine Active Directory en l’absence de compte de domaine Azure AD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6729">GP name: Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6730">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6730">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6731">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6731">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6732">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6732">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6733">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6733">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6734">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6734">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6735">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6735">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6736">Nom de la valeur: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6736">Value Name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6737">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6737">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6738">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6738">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="configureonlinetexttospeech"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6740">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6740">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-online-text-to-speech"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6741">Configurer la synthèse vocale en ligne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6741">Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6742">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6742">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6743">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6743">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6744">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6744">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6745">Déterminez si le navigateur peut exploiter les polices vocales de la synthèse vocale en ligne, qui font partie des services cognitifs de Azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6745">Set whether the browser can leverage Online Text to Speech voice fonts, part of Azure Cognitive Services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6746">Ces polices vocales sont de qualité supérieure à celle des polices vocales du système, qui sont déjà installées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6746">These voice fonts are higher quality than the pre-installed system voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6747">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les applications web qui utilisent l’API SpeechSynthesis peuvent utiliser les polices vocales de la synthèse vocale en ligne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6747">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the SpeechSynthesis API can use Online Text to Speech voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6748">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les polices vocales ne sont pas disponibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6748">If you disable this policy, the voice fonts aren't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6749">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur cette fonctionnalité, consultez les articles: API SpeechSynthesis: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) Services cognitifs: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6749">Read more about this feature here: SpeechSynthesis API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6750">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6750">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6751">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6751">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6752">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6752">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6753">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6753">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6754">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6754">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6755">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6755">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6756">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6756">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6757">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6757">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6758">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6758">GP unique name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6759">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la conversion de texte par synthèse vocale en ligne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6759">GP name: Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6760">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6760">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6761">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6761">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6762">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6762">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6763">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6763">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6764">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6764">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6765">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6765">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6766">Nom de la valeur: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6766">Value Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6767">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6767">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6768">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6768">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6769">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6769">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6770">Nom clé de la préférence: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6770">Preference Key Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6771">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6771">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6772">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6772">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="configureshare"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6773">ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6773">ConfigureShare</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-share-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6774">Configurer l’expérience de partage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6774">Configure the Share experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6775">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6775">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6776">sur Windows depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6776">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6777">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6777">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6778">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur « ShareAllowed » (valeur par défaut), les utilisateurs peuvent accéder à l’expérience de partage de Windows10 à partir des menus Paramètres et Plus dans MicrosoftEdge pour échanger avec d’autres applications sur le système.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6778">If you set this policy to 'ShareAllowed' (the default), users will be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience from the Settings and More Menu in Microsoft Edge to share with other apps on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6779">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «ShareDisallowed», les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas accéder à l’expérience de partage de Windows10.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6779">If you set this policy to 'ShareDisallowed', users won't be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6780">Si le bouton Partager se trouve dans la barre d’outils, celui-ci est également masqué.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6780">If the Share button is on the toolbar, it will also be hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6781">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6781">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6782">ShareAllowed (0)=Autoriser l’utilisation de l’expérience de partage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6782">ShareAllowed (0) = Allow using the Share experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6783">ShareDisallowed (1)=Ne pas autoriser l’utilisation de l’expérience de partage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6783">ShareDisallowed (1) = Don't allow using the Share experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6784">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6784">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6785">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6785">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6786">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6786">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6787">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6787">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6788">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6788">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6789">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6789">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6790">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6790">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6791">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6791">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6792">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6792">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6793">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6793">GP unique name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6794">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer l’expérience de partage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6794">GP name: Configure the Share experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6795">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6795">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6796">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6796">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6797">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6797">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6798">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6798">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6799">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6799">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6800">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6800">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6801">Nom de la valeur: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6801">Value Name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6802">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6802">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6803">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6803">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="customhelplink"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6805">CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6805">CustomHelpLink</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-custom-help-link"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6806">Spécifier le lien d’aide personnalisé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6806">Specify custom help link</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6807">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6807">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6808">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version79 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6808">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6809">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6809">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6810">Spécifiez un lien pour le menu Aide ou la touche F1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6810">Specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6811">Si vous activez cette stratégie, un administrateur peut spécifier un lien pour le menu Aide ou la touche F1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6811">If you enable this policy, an admin can specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6812">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le lien par défaut du menu Aide ou de la touche F1 est utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6812">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default link for the Help menu or the F1 key is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6813">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6813">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6814">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6814">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6815">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6815">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6816">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6816">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6817">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6817">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6818">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6818">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6819">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6819">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6820">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6820">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6821">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6821">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6822">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6822">GP unique name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6823">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: spécifier le lien d’aide personnalisé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6823">GP name: Specify custom help link</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6824">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6824">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6825">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6825">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6826">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6826">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6827">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6827">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6828">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6828">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6829">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6829">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6830">Nom de la valeur: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6830">Value Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6831">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6831">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6832">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6832">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6833">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6833">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6834">Nom clé de la préférence: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6834">Preference Key Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6835">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6835">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734</string>
```
