  ### <a name="dnsinterceptionchecksenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6837">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6837">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="dns-interception-checks-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6838">Vérifications d’interception DNS activées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6838">DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6839">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6839">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6840">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6840">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6841">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6841">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6842">Cette stratégie configure un commutateur local qui peut être utilisé pour désactiver les vérifications d’interception DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6842">This policy configures a local switch that can be used to disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6843">Ces vérifications essaient de déterminer si le navigateur se situe derrière un proxy qui redirige des noms d’hôtes inconnus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6843">These checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6844">Cette détection n’est peut-être pas nécessaire dans un environnement d’entreprise dans lequel la configuration réseau est connue.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6844">This detection might not be necessary in an enterprise environment where the network configuration is known.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6845">Elle peut être désactivée afin d’éviter tout trafic DNS et HTTP supplémentaire au démarrage et lors de chaque modification de la configuration DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6845">It can be disabled to avoid additional DNS and HTTP traffic on start-up and each DNS configuration change.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6846">Si vous activez ou ne définissez pas cette stratégie, les vérifications d’interception DNS sont effectuées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6846">If you enable or don't set this policy, the DNS interception checks are performed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6847">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les vérifications d’interception DNS ne sont pas effectuées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6847">If you disable this policy, DNS interception checks aren't performed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6848">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6848">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6849">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6849">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6850">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6850">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6851">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6851">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6852">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6852">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6853">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6853">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6854">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6854">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6855">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6855">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6856">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6856">GP unique name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6857">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: vérifications d’interception DNS activées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6857">GP name: DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6858">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6858">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6859">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6859">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6860">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6860">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6861">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6861">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6862">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6862">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6863">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6863">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6864">Nom de la valeur: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6864">Value Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6865">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6865">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6866">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6866">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6867">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6867">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6868">Nom clé de la préférence: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6868">Preference Key Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6869">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6869">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="defaultbrowsersettingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6871">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6871">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-microsoft-edge-as-default-browser"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6872">Définir MicrosoftEdge comme navigateur par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6872">Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6873">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6873">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6874">sur Windows7 et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6874">On Windows 7 and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6875">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6875">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6876">Si vous attribuez la valeur true à cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge vérifie toujours qu’il s’agit du navigateur par défaut au démarrage et, si possible, s’inscrit automatiquement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6876">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge always checks whether it's the default browser on startup and, if possible, automatically registers itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6877">Si vous attribuez la valeur false à cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge cesse de vérifier si c’est la valeur par défaut et désactive les contrôles utilisateur pour cette option.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6877">If you set this policy to False, Microsoft Edge is stopped from ever checking if it's the default and turns user controls off for this option.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6878">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge permet aux utilisateurs de contrôler s’il s’agit de la valeur par défaut. si ce n’est pas le cas, les notifications de l’utilisateur doivent s’afficher.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6878">If you don't set this policy, Microsoft Edge lets users control whether it's the default and, if not, whether user notifications should appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6879">Remarque pour les administrateurs Windows: L’activation de cette stratégie ne fonctionne que pour les ordinateurs fonctionnant sous Windows7.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6879">Note for Windows administrators: This policy only works for PCs running Windows 7.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6880">Pour les versions ultérieures de Windows, vous devez déployer un fichier «associations d’applications par défaut» qui définit MicrosoftEdge comme gestionnaire des protocoles https et http (et, éventuellement, du protocole ftp et des formats de fichiers tels que .html, .htm, .pdf, .svg ou .webp).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6880">For later versions of Windows, you have to deploy a "default application associations" file that makes Microsoft Edge the handler for the https and http protocols (and, optionally, the ftp protocol and file formats such as .html, .htm, .pdf, .svg, .webp).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6881">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6881">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932) for more information.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6882">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6882">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6883">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6883">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6884">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6884">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6885">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6885">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6886">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6886">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6887">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6887">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6888">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6888">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6889">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6889">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6890">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6890">GP unique name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6891">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir MicrosoftEdge comme navigateur par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6891">GP name: Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6892">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6892">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6893">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6893">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6894">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6894">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6895">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6895">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6896">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6896">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6897">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6897">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6898">Nom de la valeur: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6898">Value Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6899">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6899">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6900">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6900">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6901">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6901">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6902">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6902">Preference Key Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6903">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6903">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidercontextmenuaccessallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6905">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6905">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-default-search-provider-context-menu-search-access"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6906">Autoriser l’accès au menu contextuel du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6906">Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6907">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6907">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6908">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6908">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6909">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6909">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6910">Active l’utilisation d’un moteur de recherche par défaut dans le menu contextuel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6910">Enables the use of a default search provider on the context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6911">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, l’élément de recherche du menu contextuel qui dépend de votre moteur de recherche par défaut ainsi que de la barre latérale de recherche ne seront pas disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6911">If you set this policy to disabled the search context menu item that relies on your default search provider and sidebar search will not be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6912">Si cette stratégie est activée ou non définie, l’élément de recherche du menu contextuel qui dépend de votre moteur de recherche par défaut ainsi que de la barre latérale de recherche sont disponibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6912">If this policy is set to enabled or not set, the context menu item for your default search provider and sidebar search will be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6913">La valeur de la stratégie est uniquement prise en compte lorsque la stratégie [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) est activée, et ne l’est  pas dans le cas contraire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6913">The policy value is only appled when the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy is enabled, and is not applicable otherwise.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6914">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6914">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6915">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6915">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6916">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6916">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6917">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6917">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6918">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6918">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6919">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6919">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6920">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6920">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6921">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6921">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6922">Nom unique GP : DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6922">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6923">Nom GP : Autoriser l’accès au menu contextuel du moteur de recherche par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6923">GP name: Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6924">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6924">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6925">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6925">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6926">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6926">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6927">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6927">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6928">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6928">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6929">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6929">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6930">Nom de la valeur : DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6930">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6931">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6931">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6932">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6932">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6933">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6933">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6934">Nom de la clé de préférence: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6934">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6935">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6935">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsensorssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6937">DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6937">DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-sensors-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6938">Paramètre par défaut des capteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6938">Default sensors setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6939">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6939">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6940">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6940">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6941">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6941">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6942">Indiquer si les sites web peuvent accéder aux capteurs et utiliser les capteurs tels que les capteurs de mouvement et de luminosité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6942">Set whether websites can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6943">Vous pouvez bloquer ou autoriser complètement les sites web à accéder aux capteurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6943">You can completely block or allow websites to get access to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6944">Définir la stratégie sur1 permet aux sites web d’accéder et d’utiliser des capteurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6944">Setting the policy to 1 lets websites access and use sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6945">Définir la stratégie sur2 refuse l’accès aux capteurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6945">Setting the policy to 2 denies acess to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6946">Vous pouvez remplacer cette stratégie pour des modèles d’URL spécifiques par les stratégies [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) et [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6946">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6947">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les sites web peuvent accéder et utiliser des capteurs, et les utilisateurs peuvent modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6947">If you don't configure this policy, websites can access and use sensors, and users can change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6948">Il s’agit de la valeur par défaut globale pour [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) et [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6948">This is the global default for [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6949">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6949">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6950">AllowSensors (1) = autoriser les sites à accéder aux capteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6950">AllowSensors (1) = Allow sites to access sensors</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6951">BlockSensors (2) = ne pas autoriser les sites à accéder aux capteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6951">BlockSensors (2) = Do not allow any site to access sensors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6952">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6952">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6953">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6953">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6954">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6954">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6955">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6955">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6956">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6956">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6957">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6957">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6958">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6958">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6959">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6959">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6960">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6960">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6961">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6961">GP unique name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6962">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: paramètre des capteurs par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6962">GP name: Default sensors setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6963">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6963">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6964">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6964">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6965">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6965">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6966">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6966">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6967">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6967">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6968">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6968">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6969">Nom de la valeur: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6969">Value Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6970">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6970">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6971">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6971">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6972">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6972">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6973">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6973">Preference Key Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6974">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6974">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultserialguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6976">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6976">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-serial-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6977">Contrôler l’utilisation de l’API Serial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6977">Control use of the Serial API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6978">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6978">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6979">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6979">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6980">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6980">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6981">Déterminer si les sites web peuvent accéder aux ports série.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6981">Set whether websites can access serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6982">Vous pouvez bloquer complètement l’accès ou demander à l’utilisateur, chaque fois qu’un site web souhaite accéder à un port série.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6982">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6983">Définir la stratégie sur3 permet aux sites web de demander l’accès aux ports série.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6983">Setting the policy to 3 lets websites ask for access to serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6984">Définir la stratégie sur2 refuse l’accès aux ports série.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6984">Setting the policy to 2 denies access to serial ports.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6985">Vous pouvez remplacer cette stratégie pour des modèles d’URL spécifiques par les stratégies [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) et [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6985">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) and [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6986">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, par défaut, les sites web peuvent demander aux utilisateurs s’ils peuvent accéder à un port série, et les utilisateurs peuvent modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6986">If you don't configure this policy, by default, websites can ask users whether they can access a serial port, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6987">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6987">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6988">BlockSerial (2) = ne pas autoriser les sites à demander l’accès aux ports série via l’API Serial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6988">BlockSerial (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to serial ports via the Serial API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6989">AskSerial (3) = autoriser les sites à demander l’autorisation de l’utilisateur à accéder à un port série</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6989">AskSerial (3) = Allow sites to ask for user permission to access a serial port</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6990">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6990">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6991">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6991">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6992">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6992">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6993">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6993">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6994">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6994">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6995">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6995">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6996">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6996">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6997">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6997">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6998">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6998">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-6999">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-6999">GP unique name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7000">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: contrôler l’utilisation de l’API Serial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7000">GP name: Control use of the Serial API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7001">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7001">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7002">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7002">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7003">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7003">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7004">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7004">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7005">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7005">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7006">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7006">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7007">Nom de la valeur: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7007">Value Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7008">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7008">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7009">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7009">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7010">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7010">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7011">Nom clé de la préférence: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7011">Preference Key Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7012">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7012">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="definepreferredlanguages"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7014">DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7014">DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-an-ordered-list-of-preferred-languages-that-websites-should-display-in-if-the-site-supports-the-language"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7015">Définir une liste ordonnée des langues préférées que les sites web doivent afficher si le site prend en charge la langue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7015">Define an ordered list of preferred languages that websites should display in if the site supports the language</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7016">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7016">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7017">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 89 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7017">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7018">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7018">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7019">Configure les variantes de langue que MicrosoftEdge envoie aux sites web dans le cadre de l’en-tête HTTP de demande Accept-Language et empêche les utilisateurs d’ajouter, de supprimer ou de modifier l’ordre des langues préférées dans les paramètres MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7019">Configures the language variants that Microsoft Edge sends to websites as part of the Accept-Language request HTTP header and prevents users from adding, removing, or changing the order of preferred languages in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7020">Les utilisateurs qui souhaitent modifier les langues que MicrosoftEdge affiche ou propose de traduire des pages seront limités aux langues configurées dans cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7020">Users who want to change the languages Microsoft Edge displays in or offers to translate pages to will be limited to the languages configured in this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7021">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les sites web apparaissent dans la première langue de la liste qu’ils prennent en charge, sauf si une autre logique spécifique au site est utilisée pour déterminer la langue d’affichage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7021">If you enable this policy, websites will appear in the first language in the list that they support unless other site-specific logic is used to determine the display language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7022">Les variantes de langue définies dans cette stratégie remplacent les langues configurées dans le cadre de la stratégie [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7022">The language variants defined in this policy override the languages configured as part of the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7023">Si vous ne configurez pas ou ne désactivez pas cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge envoie aux sites web les langues préférées spécifiées par l’utilisateur dans le cadre de l’en-tête HTTP Accept-Language demande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7023">If you don't configure or disable this policy, Microsoft Edge sends websites the user-specified preferred languages as part of the Accept-Language request HTTP header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7024">Pour plus d’informations sur les variantes de langue valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7024">For detailed information on valid language variants, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7025">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7025">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7026">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7026">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7027">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7027">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7028">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7028">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7029">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7029">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7030">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7030">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7031">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7031">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7032">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7032">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7033">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7033">GP unique name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7034">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir une liste ordonnée des langues préférées que les sites web doivent afficher si le site prend en charge la langue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7034">GP name: Define an ordered list of preferred languages that websites should display in if the site supports the language</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7035">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7035">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7036">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7036">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7037">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7037">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7038">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7038">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7039">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7039">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7040">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7040">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7041">Nom de la valeur : DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7041">Value Name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7042">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7042">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7043">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7043">Example value:</span></span>

```
"en-US,fr,es"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7044">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7044">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7045">Nom clé de la préférence : DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7045">Preference Key Name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7046">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7046">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>en-US,fr,es</string>
```

  ### <a name="delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7048">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7048">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>

  #### <a name="require-that-the-enterprise-mode-site-list-is-available-before-tab-navigation"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7049">Exiger que la liste des sites en mode entreprise soit disponible avant la navigation à l’onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7049">Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7050">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7050">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7051">Sur Windows depuis la version84 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7051">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7052">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7052">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7053">Vous permet de spécifier si les onglets Microsoft Edge doivent patienter jusqu’à ce que le navigateur ait téléchargé la liste initiale de sites de mode entreprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7053">Lets you specify whether Microsoft Edge tabs wait to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7054">Ce paramètre est destiné au scénario dans lequel la page d’accueil du navigateur doit être chargée en mode Internet Explorer. il est important que le navigateur s’exécute pour la première fois lorsque le mode IE est activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7054">This setting is intended for the scenario where the browser home page should load in Internet Explorer mode, and it is important that is does so on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7055">Si ce scénario n’existe pas, nous vous recommandons de ne pas activer ce paramètre, car cela peut avoir un impact négatif sur les performances de chargement de la page d’accueil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7055">If this scenario does not exist, we recommend not enabling this setting because it can negatively impact the performance of loading the home page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7056">Le paramètre s’applique uniquement lorsque Microsoft Edge ne possède pas de liste de sites en mode entreprise mis en cache, par exemple, sur le navigateur pour la première fois, lorsque le mode IE est activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7056">The setting only applies when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached Enterprise Mode Site List, such as on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7057">Ce paramètre fonctionne conjointement avec: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) défini sur «IEMode» et [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) avec une liste comportant au moins une entrée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7057">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7058">Le comportement de cette stratégie peut être configuré avec la stratégie de [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7058">The timeout behavior of this policy can be configured with the [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7059">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur « All », lorsque Microsoft Edge ne possède pas de version mise en cache de la liste de sites en mode Entreprise, les onglets retardent la navigation jusqu’à ce que le navigateur ait téléchargé cette liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7059">If you set this policy to 'All', when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs delay navigating until the browser has downloaded the site list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7060">Les sites configurés pour s’ouvrir en mode Internet Explorer par le biais de la liste des sites se chargent en mode Internet Explorer, même pendant la navigation initiale du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7060">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will load in Internet Explorer mode, even during the initial navigation of the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7061">Sites qui ne peuvent pas être configurés pour s’ouvrir dans Internet Explorer, par exemple, les sites dont le modèle n’est pas http:, https:, fichier: ou FTP: ne retardez pas la navigation et le chargement immédiatement en mode Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7061">Sites that cannot possibly be configured to open in Internet Explorer, such as any site with a scheme other than http:, https:, file:, or ftp: do not delay navigating and load immediately in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7062">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur « None » ou si vous ne la configurez pas, lorsque Microsoft Edge ne possède pas de version mise en cache de la liste de sites en mode Entreprise, les onglets permettent immédiatement la navigation sans attendre que le navigateur ait téléchargé cette liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7062">If you set this policy to 'None' or don't configure it, when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs will navigate immediately, and not wait for the browser to download the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7063">Les sites configurés pour s’ouvrir en mode Internet Explorer par le biais de la liste des sites s’ouvrent en mode Microsoft Edge jusqu’à ce que le navigateur ait terminé de télécharger la liste des sites en mode entreprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7063">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will open in Microsoft Edge mode until the browser has finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7064">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7064">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7065">None (0) = Aucune</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7065">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7066">All (1) = Toutes les navigations éligibles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7066">All (1) = All eligible navigations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7067">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7067">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7068">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7068">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7069">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7069">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7070">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7070">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7071">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7071">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7072">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7072">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7073">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7073">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7074">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7074">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7075">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7075">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7076">Nom unique GP: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7076">GP unique name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7077">Nom de la stratégie de protection: la liste des sites en mode entreprise est disponible avant la navigation à l’onglet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7077">GP name: Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7078">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7078">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7079">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7079">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7080">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7080">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7081">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7081">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7082">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7082">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7083">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7083">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7084">Nom de la valeur: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7084">Value Name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7085">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7085">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7086">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7086">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```
