  ### <a name="deletedataonmigration"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7088">DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7088">DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>

  #### <a name="delete-old-browser-data-on-migration"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7089">Supprimer les anciennes données de navigateur lors de la migration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7089">Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7090">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7090">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7091">sur Windows depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7091">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7092">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7092">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7093">Cette stratégie détermine si les données de navigation, provenant des utilisateurs des versions antérieures de Microsoft Edge, sont supprimées après la migration vers la version81 de MicrosoftEdge ou une version ultérieure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7093">This policy determines whether user browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will be deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7094">Si vous activé cette stratégie, toutes les données de navigation provenant des versions antérieures de MicrosoftEdge sont supprimées après la migration vers la version81 de MicrosoftEdge ou une version ultérieure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7094">If you set this policy to "Enabled", all browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later will be deleted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7095">Cette stratégie doit être activée avant d’effectuer la migration vers la version81 de MicrosoftEdge ou une version ultérieure, pour qu’elle s’applique aux données de navigation existantes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7095">This policy must be set before migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later to have any effect on existing browsing data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7096">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, ou si la stratégie n’est pas configurée, les données de navigation de l’utilisateur ne sont pas supprimées après la migration vers la version83 de MicrosoftEdge ou une version ultérieure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7096">If you set this policy to "Disabled", or the policy is not configured, user browsing data isn't deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 83 or later.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7097">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7097">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7098">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7098">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7099">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7099">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7100">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7100">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7101">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7101">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7102">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7102">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7103">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7103">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7104">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7104">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7105">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7105">GP unique name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7106">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: supprimer les anciennes données de navigateur lors de la migration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7106">GP name: Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7107">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7107">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7108">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7108">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7109">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7109">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7110">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7110">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7111">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7111">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7112">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7112">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7113">Nom de la valeur: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7113">Value Name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7114">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7114">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7115">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7115">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7116">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7116">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="developertoolsavailability"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7117">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7117">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-where-developer-tools-can-be-used"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7118">Contrôler où les outils de développement peuvent être utilisés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7118">Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7119">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7119">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7120">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7120">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7121">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7121">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7122">Déterminer où les outils de développement peuvent être utilisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7122">Control where developer tools can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7123">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions» (valeur par défaut), les utilisateurs peuvent accéder aux outils de développement et à la console JavaScript en général, mais pas dans le contexte des extensions installées par la stratégie d’entreprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7123">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions' (the default), users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in general, but not in the context of extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7124">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «DeveloperToolsAllowed», les utilisateurs peuvent accéder aux outils de développement et à la console JavaScript dans tous les contextes, y compris pour les extensions installées par la stratégie d’entreprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7124">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsAllowed', users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in all contexts, including extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7125">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «DeveloperToolsDisallowed», les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas accéder aux outils de développement ni inspecter les éléments du site web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7125">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowed', users can't access the developer tools or inspect website elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7126">Les raccourcis clavier et les entrées de menu ou de menu contextuel qui ouvrent les outils de développement ou la console JavaScript sont désactivées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7126">Keyboard shortcuts and menu or context menu entries that open the developer tools or the JavaScript Console are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7127">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7127">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7128">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0)=Bloquer les outils de développement sur les extensions installées par la stratégie d’entreprise, autoriser dans les autres contextes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7128">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = Block the developer tools on extensions installed by enterprise policy, allow in other contexts</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7129">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = Autoriser l’utilisation des outils de développement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7129">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = Allow using the developer tools</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7130">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = Ne pas autoriser l’utilisation des outils de développement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7130">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = Don't allow using the developer tools</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7131">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7131">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7132">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7132">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7133">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7133">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7134">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7134">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7135">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7135">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7136">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7136">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7137">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7137">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7138">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7138">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7139">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7139">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7140">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7140">GP unique name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7141">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: contrôler où les outils de développement peuvent être utilisés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7141">GP name: Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7142">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7142">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7143">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7143">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7144">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7144">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7145">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7145">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7146">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7146">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7147">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7147">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7148">Nom de la valeur: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7148">Value Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7149">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7149">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7150">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7150">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7151">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7151">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7152">Nom clé de la préférence: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7152">Preference Key Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7153">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7153">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7154">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7154">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="diagnosticdata"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7155">DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7155">DiagnosticData</span></span>

  #### <a name="send-required-and-optional-diagnostic-data-about-browser-usage"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7156">Envoyer les données de diagnostic requises et facultatives relatives à l’utilisation du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7156">Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7157">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7157">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7158">Sur Windows7 et macOS depuis la version86 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7158">On Windows 7 and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7159">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7159">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7160">Cette stratégie contrôle l’envoi à Microsoft de données de diagnostic requises et facultatives relatives à l’utilisation du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7160">This policy controls sending required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7161">Les données de diagnostic requises sont collectées pour garantir le niveau attendu de sécurité, de mise à jour et de performance de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7161">Required diagnostic data is collected keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7162">Les données de diagnostic facultatives incluent des données sur la façon dont vous utilisez le navigateur, les sites web que vous visitez et les rapports d’incident à Microsoft afin d’améliorer les produits et services.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7162">Optional diagnostic data includes data about how you use the browser, websites you visit and crash reports to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7163">Cette stratégie n’est pas prise en charge sur les appareils Windows10.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7163">This policy is not supported on Windows 10 devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7164">Pour contrôler cette collecte de données sur Windows10, les administrateurs informatiques doivent utiliser la stratégie de groupe de données de diagnostic de Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7164">To control this data collection on Windows 10, IT admins must use the Windows diagnostic data group policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7165">Selon la version de Windows, cette stratégie est soit «Autoriser la télémétrie», soit «Autoriser les données de diagnostic».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7165">This policy will either be 'Allow Telemetry' or 'Allow Diagnostic Data', depending on the version of Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7166">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur la collecte de données de diagnostic Windows10: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7166">Learn more about Windows 10 diagnostic data collection: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7167">Utilisez l’un des paramètres suivants pour configurer cette stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7167">Use one of the following settings to configure this policy:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7168">«Désactivé» désactive la collecte de données de diagnostic requises et facultatives.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7168">'Off' turns off required and optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7169">Cette option n'est pas conseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7169">This option is not recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7170">«RequiredData» envoie les données de diagnostic requises, mais désactive la collecte de données de diagnostic facultatives.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7170">'RequiredData' sends required diagnostic data but turns off optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7171">MicrosoftEdge envoie les données de diagnostic requises pour garantir le niveau attendu de sécurité, de mise à jour et de performance de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7171">Microsoft Edge will send required diagnostic data to keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7172">«OptionalData» envoie les données de diagnostic facultatives qui incluent des données relatives à l’utilisation du navigateur, les sites web visités et les rapports d’incidents envoyés à Microsoft afin d’améliorer les produits et services.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7172">'OptionalData' sends optional diagnostic data includes data about browser usage, websites that are visited, crash reports sent to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7173">Sur Windows7/macOS, cette stratégie contrôle l’envoi à Microsoft de données de diagnostic requises et facultatives.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7173">On Windows 7/macOS, this policy controls sending required and optional data to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7174">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie ou si vous la désactivez, MicrosoftEdge est défini par défaut sur les préférences de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7174">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7175">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7175">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7176">Désactivé (0) = Désactivé (non recommandé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7176">Off (0) = Off (Not recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7177">RequiredData (1) = Données requises</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7177">RequiredData (1) = Required data</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7178">OptionalData (2) = Données facultatives</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7178">OptionalData (2) = Optional data</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7179">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7179">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7180">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7180">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7181">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7181">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7182">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7182">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7183">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7183">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7184">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7184">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7185">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7185">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7186">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7186">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7187">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7187">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7188">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7188">GP unique name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7189">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: Envoyer les données de diagnostic requises et facultatives relatives à l’utilisation du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7189">GP name: Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7190">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7190">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7191">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7191">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7192">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7192">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7193">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7193">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7194">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7194">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7195">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7195">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7196">Nom de valeur: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7196">Value Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7197">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7197">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7198">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7198">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7199">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7199">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7200">Nom de la clé de préférence: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7200">Preference Key Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7201">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7201">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="directinvokeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7203">DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7203">DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-open-files-using-the-directinvoke-protocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7204">Autoriser les utilisateurs à ouvrir des fichiers à l’aide du protocole DirectInvoke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7204">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7205">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7205">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7206">sur Windows depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7206">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7207">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7207">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7208">Autorisez les utilisateurs à ouvrir des fichiers à l’aide du protocole DirectInvoke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7208">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7209">Le protocole DirectInvoke permet aux sites web de demander au navigateur d’ouvrir les fichiers d’une URL spécifique à l’aide du gestionnaire de fichiers DirectInvoke sur l’ordinateur ou l’appareil de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7209">The DirectInvoke protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using a specific file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7210">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent ouvrir des fichiers à l’aide du protocole DirectInvoke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7210">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7211">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas ouvrir de fichiers à l’aide du protocole DirectInvoke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7211">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7212">Au lieu de cela, le fichier est enregistré dans le système de fichiers. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7212">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7213">Remarque : la désactivation de DirectInvoke peut empêcher certaines fonctionnalités de Microsoft SharePoint Online d’être utilisées correctement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7213">Note: Disabling DirectInvoke may prevent certain Microsoft SharePoint Online features from working as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7214">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur DirectInvoke, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) et [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7214">For more information about DirectInvoke, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7215">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7215">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7216">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7216">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7217">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7217">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7218">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7218">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7219">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7219">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7220">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7220">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7221">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7221">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7222">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7222">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7223">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7223">GP unique name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7224">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les utilisateurs à ouvrir des fichiers à l’aide du protocole DirectInvoke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7224">GP name: Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7225">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7225">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7226">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7226">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7227">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7227">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7228">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7228">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7229">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7229">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7230">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7230">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7231">Nom de la valeur: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7231">Value Name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7232">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7232">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7233">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7233">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="disable3dapis"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7235">Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7235">Disable3DAPIs</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-support-for-3d-graphics-apis"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7236">Désactiver la prise en charge des API graphiques 3D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7236">Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7237">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7237">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7238">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7238">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7239">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7239">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7240">Empêcher les pages web d’accéder au processeur graphique (GPU)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7240">Prevent web pages from accessing the graphics processing unit (GPU).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7241">Plus précisément, les pages web ne peuvent pas accéder à l’API WebGL, et les plug-ins ne peuvent pas utiliser l’API Pepper 3D.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7241">Specifically, web pages can't access the WebGL API and plug-ins can't use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7242">Si vous ne configurez pas ou si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les pages web peuvent utiliser l’API WebGL et les plug-ins ont accès à l’API Pepper 3D.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7242">If you don't configure or disable this policy, it potentially allows web pages to use the WebGL API and plug-ins to use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7243">Par défaut, MicrosoftEdge peut exiger que les arguments de la ligne de commande soient transmis pour pouvoir utiliser ces API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7243">Microsoft Edge might, by default, still require command line arguments to be passed in order to use these APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7244">Si la stratégie [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) est définie sur false, la configuration de ’Disable3DAPIs’ est ignorée, ce qui équivaut à définir ’Disable3DAPIs’ sur true.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7244">If [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) policy is set to false, the setting for 'Disable3DAPIs' policy is ignored - it's the equivalent of setting 'Disable3DAPIs' policy to true.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7245">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7245">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7246">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7246">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7247">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7247">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7248">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7248">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7249">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7249">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7250">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7250">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7251">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7251">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7252">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7252">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7253">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7253">GP unique name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7254">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: désactiver la prise en charge des API graphiques 3D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7254">GP name: Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7255">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7255">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7256">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7256">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7257">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7257">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7258">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7258">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7259">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7259">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7260">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7260">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7261">Nom de la valeur: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7261">Value Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7262">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7262">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7263">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7263">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7264">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7264">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7265">Nom clé de la préférence: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7265">Preference Key Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7266">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7266">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="disablescreenshots"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7268">DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7268">DisableScreenshots</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-taking-screenshots"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7269">Désactiver la création de captures d’écran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7269">Disable taking screenshots</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7270">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7270">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7271">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7271">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7272">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7272">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7273">Détermine si les utilisateurs peuvent effectuer des captures d’écran de la page du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7273">Controls if users can take screenshots of the browser page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7274">Si elle est activée, l’utilisateur ne peut pas effectuer de captures d’écran à l’aide des raccourcis clavier ou des API d’extension.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7274">If enabled, user can't take screenshots by using keyboard shortcuts or extension APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7275">Si elle est désactivée ou si elle n’est pas configurée, les utilisateurs peuvent effectuer des captures d’écran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7275">If disabled or don't configure this policy, users can take screenshots.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7276">Cette stratégie contrôle les captures d’écran effectuées dans le navigateur proprement dit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7276">Please note this policy controls screenshots taken from within the browser itself.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7277">Même si vous activez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent toujours prendre des captures d’écran à l’aide d’une méthode extérieure au navigateur (par l’intermédiaire d’une fonctionnalité du système d’exploitation ou d’une autre application).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7277">Even if you enable this policy, users might still be able to take screenshots using some method outside of the browser (like using an operating system feature or another application).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7278">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7278">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7279">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7279">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7280">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7280">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7281">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7281">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7282">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7282">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7283">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7283">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7284">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7284">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7285">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7285">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7286">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7286">GP unique name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7287">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: désactiver la création de captures d'écran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7287">GP name: Disable taking screenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7288">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7288">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7289">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7289">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7290">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7290">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7291">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7291">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7292">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7292">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7293">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7293">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7294">Nom de la valeur: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7294">Value Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7295">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7295">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7296">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7296">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7297">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7297">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7298">Nom clé de la préférence: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7298">Preference Key Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7299">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7299">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7300">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7300">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="diskcachedir"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7301">DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7301">DiskCacheDir</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-disk-cache-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7302">Définir le répertoire du cache disque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7302">Set disk cache directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7303">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7303">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7304">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7304">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7305">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7305">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7306">Configure le répertoire utilisé pour stocker les fichiers mis en cache. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7306">Configures the directory to use to store cached files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7307">Si vous activez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge utilise le répertoire fourni, que l'utilisateur ait ou non spécifié l'indicateur "--disk-cache-dir".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7307">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7308">Pour éviter la perte de données ou d'autres erreurs inattendues, ne configurez pas cette stratégie sur le répertoire racine d'un volume ni sur un répertoire utilisé à d'autres fins, car MicrosoftEdge gère son contenu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7308">To avoid data loss or other unexpected errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7309">Consultez la page [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) pour obtenir la liste des variables qui peuvent être utilisées pour spécifier des répertoires ou des chemin d'accès.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7309">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use when specifying directories and paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7310">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le répertoire cache par défaut est utilisé et les utilisateurs peuvent remplacer ce paramètre par défaut par l’indicateur de ligne de commande «--disk-cache-dir».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7310">If you don't configure this policy, the default cache directory is used, and users can override that default with the '--disk-cache-dir' command line flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7311">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7311">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7312">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7312">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7313">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7313">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7314">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7314">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7315">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7315">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7316">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7316">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7317">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7317">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7318">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7318">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7319">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7319">GP unique name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7320">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir le répertoire du cache disque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7320">GP name: Set disk cache directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7321">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7321">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7322">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7322">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7323">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7323">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7324">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7324">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7325">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7325">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7326">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7326">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7327">Nom de la valeur: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7327">Value Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7328">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7328">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7329">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7329">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${user_home}/Edge_cache"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7330">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7330">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7331">Nom clé de la préférence: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7331">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7332">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7332">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${user_home}/Edge_cache</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7333">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7333">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="diskcachesize"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7334">DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7334">DiskCacheSize</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-disk-cache-size-in-bytes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7335">Définir la taille du cache disque, en octets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7335">Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7336">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7336">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7337">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7337">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7338">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7338">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7339">Configure la taille du cache utilisé, en octets, pour stocker les fichiers en cache. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7339">Configures the size of the cache, in bytes, used to store files on the disk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7340">Si vous définissez cette règle, Microsoft Edge utilise le cache en fonction de la taille indiquée, que l'utilisateur ait spécifié l'indicateur "--disk-cache-size" ou non.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7340">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided cache size regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7341">La valeur définie dans cette stratégie ne constitue pas une limite absolue, il s'agit plutôt d'une suggestion pour le système de mise en cache. En effet, toute valeur inférieure à quelques mégaoctets est trop faible et est arrondie pour atteindre un minimum acceptable. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7341">The value specified in this policy isn't a hard boundary but rather a suggestion to the caching system; any value below a few megabytes is too small and will be rounded up to a reasonable minimum.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7342">Si la valeur de cette stratégie est définie sur 0, la taille du cache par défaut est utilisée, mais l'utilisateur ne peut pas la modifier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7342">If you set the value of this policy to 0, the default cache size is used, and users can't change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7343">Si cette stratégie n'est pas configurée, la taille par défaut est utilisée, et l'utilisateur peut la remplacer à l'aide de l'indicateur "--disk-cache-size".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7343">If you don't configure this policy, the default size is used, but users can override it with the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7344">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7344">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7345">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7345">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7346">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7346">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7347">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7347">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7348">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7348">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7349">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7349">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7350">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7350">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7351">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7351">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7352">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7352">GP unique name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7353">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir la taille du cache disque, en octets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7353">GP name: Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7354">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7354">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7355">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7355">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7356">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7356">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7357">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7357">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7358">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7358">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7359">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7359">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7360">Nom de la valeur: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7360">Value Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7361">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7361">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7362">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7362">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x06400000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7363">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7363">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7364">Nom clé de la préférence: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7364">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7365">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7365">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>104857600</integer>
```

  ### <a name="dnsoverhttpsmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7367">DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7367">DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-the-mode-of-dns-over-https"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7368">Contrôler le mode du protocole DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7368">Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7369">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7369">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7370">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7370">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7371">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7371">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7372">Contrôlez le mode du programme de résolution du protocole DNS-over-HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7372">Control the mode of the DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7373">Cette stratégie permet uniquement de choisir le mode par défaut pour chaque requête.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7373">Note that this policy will only set the default mode for each query.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7374">Le mode peut être remplacé pour les types de requêtes spéciaux, tels que les demandes de résolution d’un nom d’hôte du serveur DNS-over-HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7374">The mode can be overridden for special types of queries such as requests to resolve a DNS-over-HTTPS server hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7375">Le mode «désactivé» désactive DNS-over-HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7375">The "off" mode will disable DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7376">Le mode «automatique» envoie d’abord les requêtes DNS-over-HTTPS si un serveur DNS-over-HTTPS est disponible et peut envoyer des requêtes non sécurisées en cas d’erreur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7376">The "automatic" mode will send DNS-over-HTTPS queries first if a DNS-over-HTTPS server is available and may fallback to sending insecure queries on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7377">Le mode «sécurisé» envoie uniquement les requêtes DNS-over-HTTPS et ne peut pas se résoudre en cas d’erreur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7377">The "secure" mode will only send DNS-over-HTTPS queries and will fail to resolve on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7378">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le navigateur peut envoyer des requêtes DNS-over-HTTPS à un programme de résolution associé au programme de résolution système configuré de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7378">If you don't configure this policy, the browser might send DNS-over-HTTPS requests to a resolver associated with the user's configured system resolver.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7379">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7379">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7380">off (off) = Désactiver DNS over HTTPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7380">off (off) = Disable DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7381">automatic (automatic) = Activer DNS over HTTPs avec un secours non sécurisé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7381">automatic (automatic) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS with insecure fallback</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7382">secure (secure) = Activer DNS over HTTPs sans secours non sécurisé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7382">secure (secure) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS without insecure fallback</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7383">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7383">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7384">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7384">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7385">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7385">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7386">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7386">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7387">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7387">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7388">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7388">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7389">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7389">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7390">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7390">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7391">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7391">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7392">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7392">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7393">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: contrôler le mode du protocole DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7393">GP name: Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7394">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7394">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7395">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7395">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7396">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7396">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7397">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7397">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7398">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7398">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7399">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7399">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7400">Nom de la valeur: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7400">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7401">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7401">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7402">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7402">Example value:</span></span>

```
"off"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7403">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7403">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7404">Nom clé de la préférence: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7404">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7405">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7405">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>off</string>
```
