  ### <a name="dnsoverhttpstemplates"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7407">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7407">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-uri-template-of-desired-dns-over-https-resolver"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7408">Spécifier le modèle d’URI du programme de résolution DNS-over-HTTPS souhaité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7408">Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7409">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7409">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7410">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7410">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7411">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7411">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7412">L modèle d’URI du programme de résolution DNS-over-HTTPS souhaité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7412">The URI template of the desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7413">Pour spécifier plusieurs programmes de résolution DNS-over-HTTPS, séparez les modèles d’URI correspondants par des espaces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7413">To specify multiple DNS-over-HTTPS resolvers, separate the corresponding URI templates with spaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7414">Si vous avez définissez [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) sur «sécurisé», alors cette stratégie doit être configurée et ne peut pas être vide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7414">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "secure" then this policy must be set and cannot be empty.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7415">Si vous définissez [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) sur «automatique» et que cette stratégie est définie, les modèles d’URI spécifiés sont utilisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7415">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "automatic" and this policy is set then the URI templates specified will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7416">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les mappages codés en dur seront utilisés pour tenter de mettre à jour la résolution DNS en cours de l’utilisateur vers un programme de résolution DoH, géré par le même fournisseur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7416">If you don't set this policy, then hardcoded mappings will be used to attempt to upgrade the user's current DNS resolver to a DoH resolver operated by the same provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7417">Si le modèle d’URI contient une variable DNS, les requêtes adressées au programme de résolution utilisent la méthode GET. dans le cas contraire, les requêtes utilisent la méthode POST.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7417">If the URI template contains a dns variable, requests to the resolver will use GET; otherwise requests will use POST.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7418">Les modèles au format incorrect sont ignorés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7418">Incorrectly formatted templates will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7419">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7419">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7420">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7420">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7421">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7421">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7422">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7422">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7423">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7423">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7424">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7424">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7425">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7425">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7426">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7426">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7427">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7427">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7428">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: spécifier le modèle d’URI du programme de résolution DNS-over-HTTPS souhaité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7428">GP name: Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7429">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7429">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7430">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7430">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7431">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7431">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7432">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7432">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7433">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7433">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7434">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7434">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7435">Nom de la valeur: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7435">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7436">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7436">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7437">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7437">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7438">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7438">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7439">Nom clé de la préférence: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7439">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7440">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7440">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7441">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7441">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="downloaddirectory"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7442">DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7442">DownloadDirectory</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-download-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7443">Définir le répertoire de téléchargement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7443">Set download directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7444">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7444">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7445">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7445">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7446">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7446">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7447">Configure le répertoire utilisé pour télécharger les fichiers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7447">Configures the directory to use when downloading files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7448">Si vous définissez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge utilise le répertoire fourni, que l'utilisateur en ait spécifié un ou non, ou qu'il ait ou non activé l'indicateur permettant d'être invité à renseigner l'emplacement du téléchargement à chaque fois.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7448">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified one or chosen to be prompted for download location every time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7449">Vous pouvez consulter la liste des variables utilisables sur [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041). </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7449">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7450">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le répertoire de téléchargement par défaut est utilisé et l’utilisateur peut le modifier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7450">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default download directory is used, and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7451">Si vous avez défini un chemin d’accès non valide, MicrosoftEdge utilise, par défaut, le répertoire de téléchargement de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7451">If you set an invalid path, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's default download directory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7452">Si le dossier spécifié par le chemin d’accès n’existe pas, le téléchargement déclenche une invite demandant à l’utilisateur où il souhaite enregistrer son téléchargement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7452">If the folder specified by the path doesn't exist, the download will trigger a prompt that asks the user where they want to save their download.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7453">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7453">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7454">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7454">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7455">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7455">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7456">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7456">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7457">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7457">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7458">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7458">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7459">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7459">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7460">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7460">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7461">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7461">GP unique name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7462">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir le répertoire de téléchargement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7462">GP name: Set download directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7463">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7463">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7464">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7464">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7465">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7465">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7466">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7466">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7467">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7467">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7468">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7468">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7469">Nom de la valeur: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7469">Value Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7470">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7470">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7471">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7471">Example value:</span></span>

```
"\n      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads\n      Windows: C:\\Users\\${user_name}\\Downloads"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7472">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7472">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7473">Nom clé de la préférence: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7473">Preference Key Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7474">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7474">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>
      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads
      Windows: C:\Users\${user_name}\Downloads</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7475">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7475">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="downloadrestrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7476">DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7476">DownloadRestrictions</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-download-restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7477">Autoriser les restrictions de téléchargement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7477">Allow download restrictions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7478">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7478">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7479">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7479">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7480">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7480">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7481">Configure les types de téléchargements que MicrosoftEdge bloque complètement, et pour lesquels les utilisateurs ne sont pas autorisés à ignorer l'avertissement de sécurité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7481">Configures the type of downloads that Microsoft Edge completely blocks, without letting users override the security decision.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7482">Si vous sélectionnez l'option « BlockDangerousDownloads », tous les téléchargements sont autorisés, sauf ceux déclenchant un avertissement Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7482">Set 'BlockDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7483">Si vous sélectionnez l'option «BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads», tous les téléchargements sont autorisés, sauf ceux déclenchant un avertissement Microsoft Defender SmartScreen pour des téléchargements potentiellement dangereux ou indésirables.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7483">Set 'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings of potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7484">Si vous sélectionnez l'option « BlockAllDownloads », tous les téléchargements sont bloqués.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7484">Set 'BlockAllDownloads' to block all downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7485">Si cette stratégie n'est pas configurée ou si vous la définissez sur « DefaultDownloadSecurity », les restrictions de sécurité habituelles basées sur les résultats de l'analyse de Microsoft Defender SmartScreen s'appliquent aux téléchargements. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7485">If you don't configure this policy or set the 'DefaultDownloadSecurity' option, the downloads go through the usual security restrictions based on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen analysis results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7486">Ces restrictions s'appliquent aux téléchargements déclenchés à partir du contenu d'une page web et de l'option de menu contextuel "Télécharger le lien...".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7486">Note that these restrictions apply to downloads from web page content, as well as the 'download link...' context menu option.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7487">Elles ne s'appliquent pas à l'enregistrement ni au téléchargement de la page actuellement affichée, ni à l'enregistrement au format PDF depuis les options d'impression.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7487">These restrictions don't apply to saving or downloading the currently displayed page, nor do they apply to the Save as PDF option from the printing options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7488">Consultez la page [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) pour en savoir plus sur Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7488">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) for more info on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7489">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7489">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7490">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = Aucune restriction spéciale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7490">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = No special restrictions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7491">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Bloquer les téléchargements dangereux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7491">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Block dangerous downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7492">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Bloquer les téléchargements potentiellement dangereux ou indésirables</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7492">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Block potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7493">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Bloquer tous les téléchargements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7493">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Block all downloads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7494">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7494">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7495">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7495">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7496">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7496">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7497">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7497">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7498">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7498">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7499">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7499">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7500">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7500">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7501">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7501">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7502">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7502">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7503">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7503">GP unique name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7504">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les restrictions de téléchargement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7504">GP name: Allow download restrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7505">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7505">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7506">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7506">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7507">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7507">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7508">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7508">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7509">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7509">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7510">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7510">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7511">Nom de la valeur: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7511">Value Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7512">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7512">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7513">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7513">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7514">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7514">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7515">Nom clé de la préférence: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7515">Preference Key Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7516">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7516">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7517">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7517">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="edgecollectionsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7518">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7518">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-collections-feature"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7519">Activer la fonctionnalité Collections</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7519">Enable the Collections feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7520">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7520">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7521">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7521">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7522">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7522">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7523">Vous permet d'autoriser les utilisateurs à accéder à la fonctionnalité Collections afin de pouvoir collecter, organiser, partager et exporter du contenu de manière plus efficace et avec l'intégration d'Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7523">Lets you allow users to access the Collections feature, where they can collect, organize, share, and export content more efficiently and with Office integration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7524">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent accéder à la fonctionnalité Collections et l'utiliser dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7524">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can access and use the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7525">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas accéder à la fonctionnalité Collections et ne peuvent pas l'utiliser dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7525">If you disable this policy, users can't access and use Collections in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7526">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7526">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7527">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7527">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7528">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7528">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7529">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7529">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7530">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7530">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7531">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7531">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7532">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7532">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7533">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7533">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7534">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7534">GP unique name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7535">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la fonctionnalité Collections</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7535">GP name: Enable the Collections feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7536">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7536">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7537">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7537">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7538">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7538">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7539">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7539">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7540">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7540">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7541">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7541">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7542">Nom de la valeur: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7542">Value Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7543">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7543">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7544">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7544">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7545">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7545">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7546">Nom clé de la préférence: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7546">Preference Key Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7547">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7547">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="edgeshoppingassistantenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7549">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7549">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="shopping-in-microsoft-edge-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7550">Achats activés dans MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7550">Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7551">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7551">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7552">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7552">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7553">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7553">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7554">Cette stratégie permet aux utilisateurs de comparer les prix d’un produit qu’ils recherchent, d’obtenir des coupons ou des remises à partir du site web où ils se trouvent, ou d’appliquer automatiquement des coupons lors de l’achat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7554">This policy lets users compare the prices of a product they are looking at, get coupons or rebates from the website they're on, or auto-apply coupons during checkout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7555">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les fonctionnalités d’achat telles que la comparaison des prix, les coupons et les remises sont automatiquement appliquées aux domaines de vente au détail.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7555">If you enable or don't configure this policy, shopping features such as price comparison, coupons and rebates will be automatically applied for retail domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7556">Les bons de réduction pour le détaillant actuel et les prix d’autres détaillants sont récupérés à partir d’un serveur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7556">Coupons for the current retailer and prices from other retailers will be fetched from a server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7557">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les fonctionnalités d’achat telles que la comparaison des prix, les coupons et les remises ne seront pas automatiquement trouvés pour les domaines de vente au détail.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7557">If you disable this policy shopping features such as price comparison, coupons and rebates will not be automatically found for retail domains.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7558">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7558">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7559">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7559">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7560">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7560">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7561">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7561">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7562">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7562">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7563">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7563">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7564">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7564">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7565">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7565">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7566">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7566">GP unique name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7567">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: achats activés dans MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7567">GP name: Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7568">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7568">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7569">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7569">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7570">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7570">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7571">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7571">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7572">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7572">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7573">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7573">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7574">Nom de la valeur: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7574">Value Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7575">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7575">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7576">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7576">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7577">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7577">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7578">Nom de la clé de préférence: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7578">Preference Key Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7579">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7579">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="editfavoritesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7581">EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7581">EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-users-to-edit-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7582">Autorise les utilisateurs à modifier les favoris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7582">Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7583">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7583">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7584">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7584">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7585">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7585">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7586">Activez cette stratégie pour permettre aux utilisateurs d'ajouter, de supprimer et de modifier des favoris.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7586">Enable this policy to let users add, remove, and modify favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7587">Il s'agit du comportement par défaut si vous ne configurez pas la stratégie. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7587">This is the default behavior if you don't configure the policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7588">Désactivez cette stratégie pour empêcher les utilisateurs d'ajouter, de supprimer et de modifier des favoris.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7588">Disable this policy to stop users from adding, removing, or modifying favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7589">Ils peuvent toujours utiliser des favoris existants.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7589">They can still use existing favorites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7590">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7590">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7591">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7591">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7592">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7592">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7593">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7593">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7594">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7594">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7595">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7595">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7596">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7596">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7597">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7597">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7598">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7598">GP unique name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7599">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autorise les utilisateurs à modifier les favoris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7599">GP name: Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7600">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7600">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7601">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7601">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7602">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7602">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7603">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7603">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7604">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7604">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7605">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7605">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7606">Nom de la valeur: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7606">Value Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7607">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7607">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7608">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7608">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7609">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7609">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7610">Nom clé de la préférence: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7610">Preference Key Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7611">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7611">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="enabledeprecatedwebplatformfeatures"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7613">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7613">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>

  #### <a name="re-enable-deprecated-web-platform-features-for-a-limited-time-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7614">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: réactiver les fonctionnalités des plateformes web déconseillées pendant une durée limitée (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7614">Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7615">OBSOLÈTE: Cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas après la version 86 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7615">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 86.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7616">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7616">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7617">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7617">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 86</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7618">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7618">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7619">Cette stratégie est obsolète, car des stratégies de plateforme Web dédiées sont désormais utilisées pour gérer les désapprobations des fonctionnalités de plateforme Web individuelles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7619">This policy is obsolete because dedicated web platform policies are now used to manage individual web platform feature deprecations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7620">Spécifiez une liste de fonctionnalités de plateforme web déconseillées à réactiver temporairement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7620">Specify a list of deprecated web platform features to temporarily re-enable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7621">Cette stratégie vous permet de réactiver des fonctionnalités déconseillées de la plateforme en ligne pendant une durée limitée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7621">This policy lets you re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7622">Les fonctionnalités sont identifiées par une balise de chaîne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7622">Features are identified by a string tag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7623">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, si la liste est vide ou si une fonctionnalité ne correspond pas à l’une des balises de chaîne prises en charge, toutes les fonctionnalités de plateforme web déconseillées restent désactivées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7623">If you don't configure this policy, if the list is empty, or if a feature doesn't match one of the supported string tags, all deprecated web platform features remain disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7624">Bien que la stratégie elle-même soit compatible avec les plateformes citées, la fonctionnalité qu'elle active peut n'être disponible que sur un nombre plus restreint de plateformes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7624">While the policy itself is supported on the above platforms, the feature it's enabling might not be available on all of those platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7625">Les fonctionnalités déconseillées de la plateforme web ne peuvent pas toutes être réactivées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7625">Not all deprecated Web Platform features can be re-enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7626">Seules celles qui sont énumérées ci-dessous peuvent l'être pendant une durée limitée, qui varie en fonction de la fonctionnalité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7626">Only those explicitly listed below can be re-enabled, and only for a limited period of time, which differs per feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7627">Vous pouvez découvrir les raisons pour lesquelles des motivations ont été apportées aux fonctionnalités des plates-formes en ligne en consultant la page https://bit.ly/blinkintents.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7627">You can review the intent behind the Web Platform feature changes at https://bit.ly/blinkintents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7628">Le format général de la balise de chaîne est [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7628">The general format of the string tag is [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd].</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7629">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7629">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7630">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = Activer l'API ExampleDeprecatedFeature jusqu'au 02/09/2008</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7630">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = Enable ExampleDeprecatedFeature API through 2008/09/02</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7631">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7631">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7632">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7632">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7633">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7633">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7634">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7634">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7635">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7635">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7636">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7636">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7637">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7637">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7638">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7638">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7639">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7639">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7640">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7640">GP unique name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7641">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: réactiver les fonctionnalités des plateformes web déconseillées pendant une durée limitée (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7641">GP name: Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7642">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7642">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7643">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7643">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7644">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7644">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7645">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7645">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7646">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7646">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7647">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7647">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7648">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7648">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7649">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7649">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7650">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7650">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures\1 = "ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7651">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7651">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7652">Nom clé de la préférence: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7652">Preference Key Name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7653">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7653">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="enabledomainactionsdownload"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7655">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7655">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-domain-actions-download-from-microsoft-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7656">Activer le téléchargement des actions de domaine à partir de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7656">Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7657">OBSOLÈTE: Cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas après la version 84 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7657">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7658">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7658">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7659">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 et jusqu’à la version84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7659">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7660">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7660">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7661">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, car les États conflictuels doivent être évités.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7661">This policy doesn't work because conflicting states should be avoided.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7662">Cette stratégie était utilisée pour activer/désactiver le téléchargement de la liste des actions de domaine, mais elle n’a pas toujours atteint l’état souhaité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7662">This policy was used to enable/disable download of the domain actions list, but it didn't always achieve the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7663">Le service d’expérimentation et de configuration, qui gère le téléchargement, a sa propre stratégie pour configurer les éléments téléchargés à partir du service.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7663">The Experimentation and Configuration Service, which handles the download, has its own policy to configure what is downloaded from the service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7664">Utilisez plutôt la stratégie [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7664">Use the [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7665">Dans MicrosoftEdge, les actions de domaine représentent une série de fonctionnalités de compatibilité permettant au navigateur de fonctionner correctement sur le web. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7665">In Microsoft Edge, Domain Actions represent a series of compatibility features that help the browser work correctly on the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7666">Microsoft conserve la liste des actions à entreprendre sur certains domaines pour des raisons de compatibilité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7666">Microsoft keeps a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7667">Par exemple, le navigateur peut remplacer la chaîne Agent utilisateur sur un site web si ce site web a été bloqué en raison de la nouvelle chaîne Agent utilisateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7667">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7668">Chacune de ces actions est destinée à être temporaire, tandis que Microsoft tente de résoudre le problème avec le propriétaire du site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7668">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7669">Au démarrage du navigateur, puis régulièrement par la suite, le navigateur va contacter le service de Configuration et d'Expérimentation qui contient la liste la plus à jour des actions de compatibilité a exécuter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7669">When the browser starts up and then periodically afterwards, the browser will contact the Experimentation and Configuration Service that contains the most up to date list of compatibility actions to perform.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7670">Cette liste est enregistrée localement une fois qu'elle a été récupérée afin que les demandes ultérieures ne mettent à jour que la liste, si la copie du serveur a été modifiée. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7670">This list is saved locally after it is first retrieved so that subsequent requests will only update the list if the server's copy has changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7671">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la liste des actions de domaine continue à être téléchargée à partir du service de Configuration et d'Expérimentation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7671">If you enable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7672">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, la liste des actions de domaine n'est plus téléchargée à partir du service de Configuration et d'Expérimentation. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7672">If you disable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will no longer be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7673">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la liste des actions de domaine continue à être téléchargés à partir du service de Configuration et d'Expérimentation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7673">If you don't configure this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7674">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7674">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7675">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7675">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7676">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7676">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7677">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7677">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7678">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7678">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7679">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7679">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7680">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7680">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7681">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7681">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7682">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7682">GP unique name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7683">Nom GP: Activer le téléchargement des actions de domaine à partir de Microsoft (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7683">GP name: Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7684">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7684">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7685">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7685">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7686">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7686">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7687">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7687">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7688">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7688">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7689">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7689">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7690">Nom de la valeur: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7690">Value Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7691">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7691">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7692">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7692">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7693">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7693">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7694">Nom clé de la préférence: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7694">Preference Key Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7695">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7695">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="enableonlinerevocationchecks"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7697">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7697">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-online-ocspcrl-checks"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7698">Activer les vérifications OCSP/CRL en ligne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7698">Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7699">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7699">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7700">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7700">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7701">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7701">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7702">Les contrôles de révocation en ligne étant sujets à erreur, ils ne présentent aucun avantage concret en termes de sécurité, ils sont désactivés par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7702">Online revocation checks don't provide a significant security benefit and are disabled by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7703">Si vous activez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge effectue des contrôles de vérification OCSP/CRL en ligne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7703">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will perform soft-fail, online OCSP/CRL checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7704">«Soft fail» signifie que si le serveur de révocation n'est pas accessible, le certificat sera considéré comme valide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7704">"Soft fail" means that if the revocation server can't be reached, the certificate will be considered valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7705">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas la stratégie, MicrosoftEdge n’effectue pas de vérifications de révocation en ligne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7705">If you disable the policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge won't perform online revocation checks.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7706">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7706">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7707">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7707">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7708">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7708">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7709">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7709">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7710">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7710">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7711">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7711">Boolean</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7714">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7714">GP unique name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7715">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer les vérifications OCSP/CRL en ligne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7715">GP name: Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7716">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7716">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7718">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7718">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7719">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7719">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7720">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7720">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7721">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7721">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7722">Nom de la valeur: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7722">Value Name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```
