  ### <a name="enablesha1forlocalanchors"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7729">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7729">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-certificates-signed-using-sha-1-when-issued-by-local-trust-anchors-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7730">Autoriser les certificats signés à l’aide de l’algorithme SHA-1 lorsqu’ils sont émis par des ancres d’approbation locales (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7730">Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7731">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7731">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7732">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7732">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7733">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7733">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7734">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7734">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7735">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7735">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7736">Lorsque ce paramètre est activé, Microsoft Edge autorise les connexions sécurisées par des certificats signés SHA-1 tant que le certificat est lié à un certificat racine installé localement et est en outre valide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7736">When this setting is enabled, Microsoft Edge allows connections secured by SHA-1 signed certificates so long as the the certificate chains to a locally-installed root certificate and is otherwise valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7737">Notez que cette stratégie dépend de ce que la pile de vérification du certificat de système d’exploitation autorise les signatures SHA-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7737">Note that this policy depends on the operating system (OS) certificate verification stack allowing SHA-1 signatures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7738">Si une mise à jour de système d’exploitation modifie son traitement des certificats SHA-1, cette stratégie risque de ne plus être appliquée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7738">If an OS update changes the OS handling of SHA-1 certificates, this policy might no longer have effect.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7739">De plus, cette stratégie est conçue comme une solution de contournement temporaire pour offrir aux entreprises davantage de temps pour abandonner SHA-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7739">Further, this policy is intended as a temporary workaround to give enterprises more time to move away from SHA-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7740">Cette stratégie sera supprimée dans Microsoft Edge 92 disponible mi-2021.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7740">This policy will be removed in Microsoft Edge 92 releasing in mid 2021.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7741">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie ou si vous la définissez sur « false », ou si le certificat SHA-1 est lié à une racine de certificat approuvé publiquement, Microsoft Edge n’autorise pas les certificats signés par SHA-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7741">If you don't set this policy or set it to false, or the SHA-1 certificate chains to a publicly trusted certificate root, then Microsoft Edge won't allow certificates signed by SHA-1.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7742">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7742">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7743">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7743">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7744">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7744">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7745">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7745">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7746">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7746">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7747">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7747">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7748">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7748">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7749">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7749">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7750">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7750">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7751">Nom unique GP : EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7751">GP unique name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7752">Nom GP : Autoriser les certificats signés à l’aide de l’algorithme SHA-1 lorsqu’ils sont émis par des ancres d’approbation locales (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7752">GP name: Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7753">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7753">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7754">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7754">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7755">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7755">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7756">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7756">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7757">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7757">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7758">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7758">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7759">Nom de la valeur : EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7759">Value Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7760">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7760">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7761">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7761">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7762">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7762">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7763">Nom de la clé de préférence: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7763">Preference Key Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7764">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7764">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="enterprisehardwareplatformapienabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7766">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7766">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-managed-extensions-to-use-the-enterprise-hardware-platform-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7767">Autoriser les extensions gérées de manière à utiliser l’API de plateforme de matériel d’entreprise</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7767">Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7768">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7768">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7769">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7769">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7770">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7770">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7771">Lorsque cette stratégie est activée, les extensions installées par la stratégie d'entreprise sont autorisées à utiliser l'API de plateforme de matériel d'entreprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7771">When this policy is set to enabled, extensions installed by enterprise policy are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7772">Lorsque cette stratégie est désactivée ou si elle n’est pas configurée, laucune extension n'est autorisée à utiliser l'API de plateforme de matériel d'entreprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7772">When this policy is set to disabled or isn't set, no extensions are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7773">Cette stratégie s'applique également aux extensions de composant.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7773">This policy also applies to component extensions.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7774">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7774">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7775">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7775">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7776">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7776">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7777">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7777">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7778">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7778">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7779">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7779">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7780">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7780">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7781">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7781">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7782">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7782">GP unique name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7783">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les extensions gérées de manière à utiliser l'API de plateforme de matériel d'entreprise</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7783">GP name: Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7784">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7784">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7785">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7785">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7786">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7786">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7787">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7787">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7788">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7788">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7789">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7789">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7790">Nom de la valeur: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7790">Value Name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7791">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7791">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7792">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7792">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7793">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7793">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7794">Nom clé de la préférence: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7794">Preference Key Name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7795">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7795">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="enterprisemodesitelistmanagerallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7797">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7797">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-access-to-the-enterprise-mode-site-list-manager-tool"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7798">Autoriser l’accès à l’outil Enterprise Mode Site List Manager</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7798">Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7799">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7799">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7800">Sur Windows depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7800">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7801">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7801">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7802">Vous permet de définir si Enterprise Mode Site List Manager est disponible pour les utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7802">Allows you to set whether Enterprise Mode Site List Manager is available to users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7803">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent voir le bouton de navigation Enterprise Mode Site List Manager sur la page edge://compat, accéder à l’outil et l’utiliser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7803">If you enable this policy, users can see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button on edge://compat page, navigate to the tool and use it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7804">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne voient pas le bouton de navigation Enterprise Mode Site List Manager et ne peuvent pas l’utiliser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7804">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users won't see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button and won't be able to use it.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7805">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7805">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7806">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7806">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7807">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7807">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7808">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7808">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7809">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7809">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7810">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7810">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7811">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7811">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7812">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7812">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7813">Nom unique GP : EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7813">GP unique name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7814">Nom GP : Autoriser l’accès à l’outil Enterprise Mode Site List Manager</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7814">GP name: Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7815">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7815">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7816">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7816">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7817">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7817">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7818">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7818">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7819">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7819">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7820">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7820">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7821">Nom de la valeur : EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7821">Value Name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7822">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7822">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7823">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7823">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="exemptdomainfiletypepairsfromfiletypedownloadwarnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7825">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7825">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-download-file-type-extension-based-warnings-for-specified-file-types-on-domains"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7826">Désactiver le téléchargement des avertissements basés sur l’extension de fichier pour les types de fichiers spécifiés sur les domaines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7826">Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7827">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7827">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7828">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7828">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7829">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7829">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7830">Vous pouvez activer cette stratégie pour créer un dictionnaire d’extensions de type de fichier avec une liste correspondante de domaines qui seront exemptés des avertissements de téléchargement basés sur une extension de type de fichier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7830">You can enable this policy to create a dictionary of file type extensions with a corresponding list of domains that will be exempted from file type extension-based download warnings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7831">Ainsi, les administrateurs d’entreprise bloquent les avertissements de téléchargement basés sur l’extension de type de fichier pour les fichiers associés à un domaine répertorié.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7831">This lets enterprise administrators block file type extension-based download warnings for files that are associated with a listed domain.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7832">Par exemple, si l’extension «JNLP» est associée à «website1.com», les utilisateurs ne verront pas d’avertissement lors du téléchargement de fichiers «JNLP» de «website1.com», mais un avertissement de téléchargement apparaît lorsque vous téléchargez des fichiers «JNLP» de «website2.com».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7832">For example, if  the "jnlp" extension is associated with "website1.com", users would not see a warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website1.com", but see a download warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website2.com".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7833">Les fichiers avec les extensions de type de fichier spécifiées pour les domaines identifiés par cette stratégie sont néanmoins soumis à des avertissements de sécurité basés sur une extension de type non-fichier, tels que des avertissements de téléchargement de contenu mixte et des avertissements Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7833">Files with file type extensions specified for domains identified by this policy will still be subject to non-file type extension-based security warnings such as mixed-content download warnings and Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7834">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les types de fichiers déclenchant des avertissements de téléchargement basés sur une extension affichent des avertissements à l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7834">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, file types that trigger extension-based download warnings will show warnings to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7835">Si vous activez cette stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7835">If you enable this policy:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7836">Le modèle d’URL doit être mis en forme en fonction de [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7836">The URL pattern should be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>
* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7837">L’extension de type de fichier entrée doit être en minuscules ASCII.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7837">The file type extension entered must be in lower-cased ASCII.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7838">Il n’est pas possible d’inclure le séparateur principal dans la liste des types de fichiers. par conséquent, vous devez utiliser la liste «JNLP» à la place de «. jnlp».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7838">The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type extension, so list "jnlp" should be used instead of ".jnlp".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7839">Exemple:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7839">Example:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7840">La valeur d’exemple suivante empêche les avertissements de téléchargement basés sur l’extension de type de fichier sur les extensions SWF, exe et JNLP pour les domaines \*. contoso.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7840">The following example value would prevent file type extension-based download warnings on swf, exe, and jnlp extensions for \*.contoso.com domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7841">L’utilisateur affiche un avertissement de téléchargement basé sur une extension de type de fichier sur un autre domaine pour les fichiers exe et JNLP, mais pas pour les fichiers SWF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7841">It will show the user a file type extension-based download warning on any other domain for exe and jnlp files, but not for swf files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7842">[{"file_extension": "JNLP", "Domains": ["contoso.com"]}, {"file_extension": "exe", "Domains": ["contoso.com"]}, {"file_extension": "swf", "Domains": ["\*"]}]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7842">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7843">Notez que, bien que l’exemple précédent montre la suppression des avertissements de téléchargement basés sur l’extension de type de fichier pour les fichiers «SWF» pour tous les domaines, il n’est pas recommandé d’appliquer la suppression de tels avertissements pour tous les domaines pour toute extension de type de fichier dangereuse en raison de problèmes de sécurité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7843">Note that while the preceding example shows the suppression of file type extension-based download warnings for "swf" files for all domains, applying suppression of such warnings for all domains for any dangerous file type extension is not recommended due to security concerns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7844">Il s’affiche dans l’exemple simplement pour illustrer la possibilité de le faire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7844">It is shown in the example merely to demonstrate the ability to do so.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7845">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7845">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7846">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7846">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7847">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7847">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7848">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7848">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7849">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7849">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7850">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7850">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7851">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7851">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7852">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7852">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7853">Nom unique GP: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7853">GP unique name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7854">Nom de la stratégie de protection: désactiver le téléchargement des avertissements basés sur l’extension de fichier pour les types de fichiers spécifiés sur les domaines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7854">GP name: Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7855">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7855">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7856">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7856">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7857">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7857">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7858">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7858">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7859">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7859">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7860">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7860">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7861">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7861">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7862">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7862">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7863">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7863">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\1 = {"domains": ["https://contoso.com", "contoso2.com"], "file_extension": "jnlp"}
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\2 = {"domains": ["*"], "file_extension": "swf"}

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7864">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7864">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7865">Nom de la clé de préférence: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7865">Preference Key Name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7866">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7866">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{'domains': ['https://contoso.com', 'contoso2.com'], 'file_extension': 'jnlp'}</string>
  <string>{'domains': ['*'], 'file_extension': 'swf'}</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7868">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7868">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-communication-with-the-experimentation-and-configuration-service"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7869">Contrôler la communication avec le service d’expérimentation et de configuration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7869">Control communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7870">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7870">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7871">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7871">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7872">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7872">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7873">Dans Microsoft Edge, le service d'expérimentation et de configuration permet de déployer la charge utile d'expérimentation et de configuration.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7873">In Microsoft Edge, the Experimentation and Configuration Service is used to deploy Experimentation and Configuration payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7874">La charge utile de l'expérimentation consiste en une liste des fonctionnalités à un stade précoce de développement qui sont activées par Microsoft à des fins de test et de commentaires.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7874">Experimentation payload consists of a list of early in development features that Microsoft is enabling for testing and feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7875">La charge utile de la configuration consiste en une liste de paramètres que Microsoft souhaite déployer pour MicrosoftEdge afin d'optimiser l'expérience utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7875">Configuration payload consists of a list of settings that Microsoft wants to deploy to Microsoft Edge to optimize user experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7876">Par exemple, la charge utile de la configuration peut spécifier la fréquence à laquelle MicrosoftEdge envoie des demandes au service d'expérimentation et de configuration pour récupérer la charge utile la plus récente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7876">For example, configuration payload may specify how often Microsoft Edge sends requests to the Experimentation and Configuration Service to retrieve the newest payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7877">De plus, la charge utile de configuration peut également contenir une liste des actions à effectuer sur certains domaines pour des raisons de compatibilité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7877">Additionaly, configuration payload may also contain a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7878">Par exemple, le navigateur peut remplacer la chaîne Agent utilisateur sur un site web si ce site web a été bloqué en raison de la nouvelle chaîne Agent utilisateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7878">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7879">Chacune de ces actions est destinée à être temporaire, tandis que Microsoft tente de résoudre le problème avec le propriétaire du site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7879">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7880">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur le mode «FullMode», la charge utile complète est téléchargée à partir du service d'expérimentation et de configuration.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7880">If you set this policy to 'FullMode', the full payload is downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7881">Cela inclut les charges utiles de l'expérimentation et celles de la configuration.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7881">This includes both the experimentation and configuration payloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7882">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur le mode «ConfigurationsOnlyMode», seule la charge utile de la configuration est livrée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7882">If you set this policy to 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode', only the configuration payload is delivered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7883">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «RestrictedMode», la communication avec le service d’expérimentation et de configuration est arrêtée complètement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7883">If you set this policy to 'RestrictedMode', the communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service is stopped completely.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7884">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le comportement sur un appareil géré sur des canaux stables et bêta est le même qu'avec le mode «ConfigurationsOnlyMode».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7884">If you don't configure this policy, on a managed device on Stable and Beta channels the behavior is the same as the 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7885">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le comportement sur un appareil non géré est le même qu'avec le mode «FullMode».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7885">If you don't configure this policy, on an unmanaged device the behavior is the same as the 'FullMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7886">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7886">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7887">FullMode (2)=Récupérer les configurations et les expérimentations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7887">FullMode (2) = Retrieve configurations and experiments</span></span>

  ### <a name="externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7914">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7914">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-an-always-open-checkbox-in-external-protocol-dialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7915">Afficher une case à cocher «Toujours ouvrir» dans la boîte de dialogue de protocole externe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7915">Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7916">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7916">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7917">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version79 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7917">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7918">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7918">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7919">Cette stratégie contrôle si la case à cocher «Toujours autoriser ce site à ouvrir des liens de ce type» est affichée dans les invites de confirmation de lancement du protocole externe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7919">This policy controls whether the "Always allow this site to open links of this type" checkbox is shown on external protocol launch confirmation prompts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7920">Cette stratégie s’applique uniquement aux liens https://.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7920">This policy only applies to https:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7921">Si vous activez cette stratégie, lorsqu'une invite de confirmation de protocole externe s'affiche, l'utilisateur peut sélectionner «Toujours ouvrir». L'utilisateur ne reçoit pas les invites de confirmation futures de ce protocole sur ce site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7921">If you enable this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7922">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, la case à cocher «Toujours ouvrir» n'est pas affichée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7922">If you disable this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7923">L'utilisateur est invité à confirmer chaque fois qu'un protocole externe est appelé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7923">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7924">Avant Microsoft Edge83, si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la case à cocher «Toujours ouvrir» ne s’affiche pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7924">Prior to Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7925">L'utilisateur est invité à confirmer chaque fois qu'un protocole externe est appelé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7925">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7926">Dans MicrosoftEdge83, si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la visibilité de la case à cocher est contrôlée par l'indicateur «Activer la mémorisation des préférences d'invite de lancement de protocole» dans edge://flags</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7926">On Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the checkbox visibility is controlled by the "Enable remembering protocol launch prompting preferences" flag in edge://flags</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7927">En ce qui concerne MicrosoftEdge84, si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, lorsqu'une invite de confirmation de protocole externe s'affiche, l'utilisateur peut sélectionner «Toujours ouvrir». L'utilisateur ne reçoit pas les invites de confirmation futures de ce protocole sur ce site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7927">As of Microsoft Edge 84, if you don't configure this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7928">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7928">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7929">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7929">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7930">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7930">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7931">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7931">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7932">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7932">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7933">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7933">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7934">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7934">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7935">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7935">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7936">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7936">GP unique name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7937">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: afficher une case à cocher «Toujours ouvrir» dans la boîte de dialogue de protocole externe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7937">GP name: Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7938">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7938">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7939">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7939">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7940">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7940">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7941">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7941">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7942">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7942">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7943">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7943">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7944">Nom de la valeur: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7944">Value Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7945">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7945">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7946">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7946">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7947">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7947">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7948">Nom clé de la préférence: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7948">Preference Key Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7949">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7949">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="familysafetysettingsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7951">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7951">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7953">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7953">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7954">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7954">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7955">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7955">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7956">Cette stratégie désactive deux fonctionnalités liées à la sécurité de la famille dans le navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7956">This data-ttu-id="f0a67-7959">En savoir plus sur le Contrôle parental ici : ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432) ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7959">Learn more about Family Safety here: ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7960">À partir de Microsoft Edge90, cette stratégie   ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7971">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7971">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7972">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7972">GP unique name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7978">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7978">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7979">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7979">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7980">Nom de la valeur: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7980">Value Name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7981">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7981">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7982">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7982">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7983">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7983">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7984">Nom clé de la préférence: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7984">Preference Key Name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7985">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7985">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="favoritesbarenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7987">FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7987">FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-favorites-bar"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7988">Activer la barre des favoris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7988">Enable favorites bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7989">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7989">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7990">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7990">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7991">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7991">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7992">Active ou désactive la barre des favoris.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7992">Enables or disables the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7993">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs voient la barre des favoris.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7993">If you enable this policy, users will see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7994">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne voient pas la barre des favoris.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7994">If you disable this policy, users won't see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7995">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, l’utilisateur peut décider d’utiliser ou non la barre des favoris.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7995">If this policy is not configured, then the user can decide to use the favorites bar or not.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7996">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7996">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7997">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7997">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7998">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7998">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-7999">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-7999">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8000">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8000">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8001">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8001">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8002">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8002">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8003">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8003">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8004">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8004">GP unique name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8005">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la barre des favoris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8005">GP name: Enable favorites bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8006">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8006">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8007">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8007">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8008">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8008">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8009">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8009">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8010">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8010">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8011">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8011">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8012">Nom de la valeur: FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8012">Value Name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8013">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8013">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8014">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8014">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8015">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8015">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8016">Nom clé de la préférence: FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8016">Preference Key Name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8017">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8017">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="fetchkeepalivedurationsecondsonshutdown"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8019">FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8019">FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span></span>

  #### <a name="fetch-keepalive-duration-on-shutdown"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8020">Récupérer la durée de mise à jour à l’arrêt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8020">Fetch keepalive duration on shutdown</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8021">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8021">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8022">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version 90 ou ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8022">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8023">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8023">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8024">Contrôle la durée (en secondes) de la mise à jour des demandes afin d’empêcher le navigateur de terminer son arrêt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8024">Controls the duration (in seconds) that keepalive requests are allowed to prevent the browser from completing its shutdown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8025">Si vous configurez cette stratégie, le navigateur bloquera l’arrêt complet pendant qu’il traite les demandes de conservation en attente (voir https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/#request-keepalive-flag) jusqu’à la période maximale spécifiée par cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8025">If you configure this policy, the browser will block completing shutdown while it processes any outstanding keepalive requests (see https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/#request-keepalive-flag) up to the maximum period of time specified by this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8026">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la valeur par défaut de 0 seconde est utilisée et les demandes de conservation en suspens sont immédiatement annulées pendant l’arrêt du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8026">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default value of 0 seconds is used and outstanding keepalive requests will be immediately cancelled during browser shutdown.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8027">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8027">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8028">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8028">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8029">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8029">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8030">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8030">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8031">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8031">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8032">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8032">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8033">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8033">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8034">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8034">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8035">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe : FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8035">GP unique name: FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8036">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : récupérer la durée de mise à jour à l’arrêt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8036">GP name: Fetch keepalive duration on shutdown</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8037">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8037">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8038">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8038">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8039">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8039">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8040">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8040">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8041">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8041">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8042">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8042">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8043">Nom de la valeur : FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8043">Value Name: FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8044">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8044">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8045">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8045">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8046">Informations et paramètres Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8046">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8047">Nom clé de la préférence : FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8047">Preference Key Name: FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8048">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8048">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="forcebingsafesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8050">ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8050">ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>

  #### <a name="enforce-bing-safesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8051">Appliquer le filtre adulte Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8051">Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8052">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8052">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8053">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8053">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8054">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8054">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8055">Vérifiez que les requêtes de recherche sur le web Bing sont effectuées avec le Filtre adulte définie sur la valeur spécifiée. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8055">Ensure that queries in Bing web search are done with SafeSearch set to the value specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8056">Les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8056">Users can't change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8057">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode», le Filtre adulte de recherche Bing revient à la valeur bing.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8057">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode', SafeSearch in Bing search falls back to the bing.com value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8058">Si vous configurez cette stratégie sur «BingSafeSearchModerateMode», le paramètre modéré est utilisé dans le Filtre adulte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8058">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchModerateMode', the moderate setting is used in SafeSearch.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8059">Le paramètre modéré filtre les vidéos pour adultes et les images, mais pas le texte, des résultats de recherche. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8059">The moderate setting filters adult videos and images but not text from search results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8060">Si vous configurez cette stratégie sur «BingSafeSearchStrictMode», le paramètre strict du Filtre adulte est utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8060">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchStrictMode', the strict setting in SafeSearch is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8061">Le paramètre strict filtre le texte, les images et les vidéos pour adultes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8061">The strict setting filters adult text, images, and videos.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8062">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou ne la configurez pas, le Filtre adulte de Recherche Bing n'est pas appliquée et les utilisateurs peuvent définir la valeur de leur choix sur bing.com. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8062">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Bing search isn't enforced, and users can set the value they want on bing.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8063">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8063">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8064">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = Ne pas configurer de restrictions de recherche dans Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8064">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = Don't configure search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8065">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1)=Configurer des restrictions de recherche modérées dans Bing </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8065">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = Configure moderate search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8066">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2)=Configurer des restrictions de recherche strictes dans Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8066">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = Configure strict search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8067">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8067">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8068">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8068">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8069">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8069">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8070">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8070">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8071">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8071">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8072">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8072">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8073">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8073">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8074">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8074">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8075">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8075">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8076">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8076">GP unique name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8077">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: appliquer le filtre adulte Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8077">GP name: Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8078">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8078">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8079">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8079">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8080">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8080">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8081">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8081">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8082">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8082">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8083">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8083">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8084">Nom de la valeur: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8084">Value Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8085">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8085">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8086">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8086">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8087">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8087">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8088">Nom clé de la préférence: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8088">Preference Key Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8089">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8089">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
