  ### <a name="forcecertificatepromptsonmultiplematches"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8091">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8091">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-whether-microsoft-edge-should-automatically-select-a-certificate-when-there-are-multiple-certificate-matches-for-a-site-configured-with-autoselectcertificateforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8092">Configurer la sélection automatique d’un certificat par MicrosoftEdge lorsqu’il existe plusieurs correspondances de certificats pour un site configuré avec «AutoSelectCertificateForUrls»</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8092">Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8093">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8093">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8094">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version81 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8094">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8095">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8095">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8096">vIndique si les utilisateurs sont invités à sélectionner un certificat si plusieurs certificats sont disponibles et qu'un site est configuré avec [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8096">Toggles whether users are prompted to select a certificate if there are multiple certificates available and a site is configured with [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8097">Si vous ne configurez pas [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) pour un site, l'utilisateur est toujours invité à sélectionner un certificat. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8097">If you don't configure [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) for a site, the user will always be prompted to select a certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8098">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur True, MicrosoftEdge invite un utilisateur à sélectionner un certificat pour les sites de la liste définie dans [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) si et seulement s'il y a plusieurs certificats. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8098">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge will prompt a user to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) if and only if there is more than one certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8099">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur False ou si vous ne la configurez pas, MicrosoftEdge sélectionne automatiquement un certificat, même s'il existe plusieurs correspondances pour un certificat. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8099">If you set this policy to False or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will automatically select a certificate even if there are multiple matches for a certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8100">L'utilisateur n'est pas invité à sélectionner un certificat pour les sites de la liste définie dans [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8100">The user will not be prompted to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8101">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8101">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8102">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8102">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8103">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8103">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8104">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8104">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8105">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8105">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8106">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8106">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8107">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8107">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8108">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8108">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8109">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8109">GP unique name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8110">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la sélection automatique d’un certificat par MicrosoftEdge lorsqu'il existe plusieurs correspondances de certificats pour un site configuré avec «AutoSelectCertificateForUrls»</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8110">GP name: Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8111">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8111">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8112">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8112">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8113">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8113">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8114">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8114">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8115">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8115">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8116">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8116">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8117">Nom de la valeur: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8117">Value Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8118">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8118">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8119">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8119">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8120">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8120">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8121">Nom clé de la préférence: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8121">Preference Key Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8122">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8122">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="forceephemeralprofiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8124">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8124">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-use-of-ephemeral-profiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8125">Activer l’utilisation des profils éphémères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8125">Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8126">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8126">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8127">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8127">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8128">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8128">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8129">Détermine si les profils utilisateur sont basculés en mode éphémère.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8129">Controls whether user profiles are switched to ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8130">Un profil éphémère est créé lorsqu’une session commence, est supprimé lorsque la session se termine, et est associé au profil d’origine de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8130">An ephemeral profile is created when a session begins, is deleted when the session ends, and is associated with the user's original profile.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8131">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les profils s’exécutent en mode éphémère.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8131">If you enable this policy, profiles run in ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8132">Cela permet aux utilisateurs de travailler à partir de leurs propres appareils sans enregistrer les données de navigation sur ces appareils.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8132">This lets users work from their own devices without saving browsing data to those devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8133">Si vous activez cette stratégie en tant que stratégie de système d’exploitation (à l’aide de GPO sur Windows, par exemple), elle s’applique à tous les profils sur le système.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8133">If you enable this policy as an OS policy (by using GPO on Windows, for example), it applies to every profile on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8134">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, les utilisateurs reçoivent leurs profils habituels lorsqu’ils se connectent au navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8134">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users get their regular profiles when they sign in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8135">En mode éphémère, les données de profil ne sont enregistrées sur le disque uniquement le temps de la session utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8135">In ephemeral mode, profile data is saved on disk only for the length of the user session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8136">Des fonctionnalités telles que l'historique du navigateur, les extensions et leurs données, les données web comme les cookies et les bases de données web ne sont pas enregistrées après la fermeture du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8136">Features like browser history, extensions and their data, web data like cookies, and web databases aren't saved after the browser is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8137">Cela n'empêche pas un utilisateur de télécharger manuellement des données sur le disque, ni d'enregistrer des pages ou de les imprimer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8137">This doesn't prevent a user from manually downloading any data to disk, or from saving pages or printing them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8138">Si l'utilisateur a activé la synchronisation, toutes les données sont conservées dans leurs comptes de synchronisation, de la même manière que les profils standard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8138">If the user has enabled sync, all data is preserved in their sync accounts just like with regular profiles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8139">Les utilisateurs peuvent également utiliser la navigation InPrivate en mode éphémère, sauf si vous désactivez explicitement cette possibilité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8139">Users can also use InPrivate browsing in ephemeral mode unless you explicitly disable this.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8140">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8140">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8141">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8141">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8142">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8142">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8143">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8143">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8144">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8144">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8145">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8145">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8146">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8146">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8147">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8147">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8148">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8148">GP unique name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8149">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer l’utilisation des profils éphémères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8149">GP name: Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8150">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8150">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8151">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8151">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8152">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8152">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8153">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8153">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8154">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8154">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8155">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8155">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8156">Nom de la valeur: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8156">Value Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8157">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8157">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8158">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8158">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8159">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8159">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8160">Nom clé de la préférence: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8160">Preference Key Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8161">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8161">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="forcegooglesafesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8163">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8163">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>

  #### <a name="enforce-google-safesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8164">Appliquer le filtre adulte Google</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8164">Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8165">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8165">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8166">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8166">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8167">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8167">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8168">Force l’exécution des requêtes dans la recherche sur le web Google avec le Filtre adulte activé, et empêche les utilisateurs de modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8168">Forces queries in Google Web Search to be performed with SafeSearch set to active, and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8169">Si vous activez ce paramètre, le Filtre adulte est toujours activé dans la recherche Google.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8169">If you enable this policy, SafeSearch in Google Search is always active.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8170">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre ou ne définissez pas de valeur, le Filtre adulte n'est pas activé dans la recherche Google.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8170">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Google Search isn't enforced.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8176">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8176">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8177">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8177">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8179">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8179">GP unique name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8180">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: appliquer le filtre adulte Google</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8180">GP name: Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8181">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8181">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8182">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8182">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8183">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8183">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8185">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8185">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8186">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8186">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8187">Nom de la valeur: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8187">Value Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8188">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8188">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8191">Nom clé de la préférence: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8191">Preference Key Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>

  ### <a name="forcelegacydefaultreferrerpolicy"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8194">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8194">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-a-default-referrer-policy-of-no-referrer-when-downgrade-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8195">Utiliser une stratégie de référence par défaut de no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8195">Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8196">OBSOLÈTE : cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas après MicrosoftEdge88.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8196">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8197">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8197">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8198">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la 81, jusqu’à la 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8198">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8199">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8199">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8200">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, car elle était destinée uniquement à être un mécanisme à court terme permettant aux entreprises de mettre à jour leur contenu web s’il était jugé incompatible avec la nouvelle stratégie de référence par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8200">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if it was found to be incompatible with the new default referrer policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8201">La stratégie de référence par défaut de MicrosoftEdge a été renforcée de la valeur no-referrer-when-downgrade vers la valeur strict-origin-when-cross-origin plus sécurisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8201">Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy was strengthened from the value of no-referrer-when-downgrade to the more secure strict-origin-when-cross-origin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8202">Lorsque cette stratégie d’entreprise est activée, la stratégie de référence par défaut de MicrosoftEdge est définie sur son ancienne valeur no-referrer-when-downgrade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8202">When this enterprise policy is enabled, Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy will be set to its old value of no-referrer-when-downgrade.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8203">Cette stratégie d’entreprise est désactivée par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8203">This enterprise policy is disabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8204">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8204">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8205">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8205">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8206">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8206">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8207">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8207">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8208">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8208">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8209">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8209">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8210">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8210">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8211">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8211">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8212">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8212">GP unique name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8213">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : utiliser une stratégie de référence par défaut de no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8213">GP name: Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8214">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8214">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8215">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8215">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8216">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8216">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8217">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8217">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8218">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8218">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8219">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8219">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8220">Nom de la valeur: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8220">Value Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8221">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8221">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8222">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8222">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8223">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8223">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8224">Nom clé de la préférence: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8224">Preference Key Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8225">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8225">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="forcenetworkinprocess"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8227">ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8227">ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-networking-code-to-run-in-the-browser-process-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8228">Forcer l’exécution du code de mise en réseau dans le processus du navigateur (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8228">Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8229">OBSOLÈTE: Cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas après la version 83 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8229">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 83.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8230">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8230">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8231">Sur Windows depuis 78, jusqu’à 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8231">On Windows since 78, until 83</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8232">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8232">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8233">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, car elle n’a pour but qu’être un mécanisme à court terme pour offrir aux entreprises davantage de temps pour la migration vers des logiciels tiers qui ne dépendent pas de l’accrochage des API réseau.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8233">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to migrate to 3rd party software that doesn't depend on hooking networking APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8234">Les serveurs proxy sont recommandés via la mise à jour corrective des API LSP et Win32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8234">Proxy servers are recommended over LSPs and Win32 API patching.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8235">Cette stratégie force l'exécution du code réseaux dans le processus du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8235">This policy forces networking code to run in the browser process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8236">Cette stratégie est désactivée par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8236">This policy is disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8237">Si elle est activée, les utilisateurs risquent d'être confrontés à des problèmes de sécurité une fois le processus réseaux isolé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8237">If enabled, users are open to security issues when the networking process is sandboxed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8238">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8238">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8239">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8239">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8240">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8240">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8241">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8241">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8242">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8242">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8243">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8243">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8244">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8244">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8245">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8245">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8246">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8246">GP unique name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8247">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: forcer l’exécution du code de mise en réseau dans le processus du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8247">GP name: Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8248">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8248">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8249">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8249">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8250">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8250">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8251">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8251">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8252">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8252">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8253">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8253">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8254">Nom de la valeur: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8254">Value Name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8255">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8255">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8256">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8256">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="forcesync"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8258">ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8258">ForceSync</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-synchronization-of-browser-data-and-do-not-show-the-sync-consent-prompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8259">Forcer la synchronisation des données du navigateur et ne pas afficher l’invite de consentement de synchronisation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8259">Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8260">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8260">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8261">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8261">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8262">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8262">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8263">Force la synchronisation des données dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8263">Forces data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8264">Cette stratégie empêche également l’utilisateur de désactiver la synchronisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8264">This policy also prevents the user from turning sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8265">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs pourront activer ou désactiver la synchronisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8265">If you don't configure this policy, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8266">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne pourront pas désactiver la synchronisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8266">If you enable this policy, users will not be able to turn sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8267">Pour que cette stratégie fonctionne correctement, la stratégie [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) ne doit pas être configurée ou doit être activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8267">For this policy to work as intended, [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy must not be configured, or must be set to enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8268">Si [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) est désactivée, [ForceSync](#forcesync) ne sera pas prise en compte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8268">If [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) is set to disabled, then [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8269">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) ne doit pas être configurée ou doit être définie sur False.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8269">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) must not be configured or must be set to False.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8270">Si ce paramètre est défini sur True, [ForceSync](#forcesync) ne sera pas prise en compte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8270">If this is set to True, [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8271">0 = ne pas démarrer automatiquement la synchronisation et afficher le consentement de synchronisation (par défaut) 1 = forcer l’activation de la synchronisation pour le profil utilisateur AzureAD/Azure AD-Degraded et ne pas afficher l’invite de consentement de synchronisation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8271">0 = Do not automatically start sync and show the sync consent (default) 1 = Force sync to be turned on for Azure AD/Azure AD-Degraded user profile and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8272">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8272">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8273">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8273">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8274">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8274">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8275">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8275">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8276">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8276">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8277">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8277">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8278">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8278">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8279">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8279">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8280">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8280">GP unique name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8281">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: forcer la synchronisation des données du navigateur et ne pas afficher l’invite de consentement de synchronisation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8281">GP name: Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8282">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8282">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8283">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8283">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8284">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8284">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8285">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8285">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8286">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8286">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8287">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8287">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8288">Nom de la valeur: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8288">Value Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8289">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8289">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8290">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8290">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8291">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8291">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8292">Nom clé de la préférence: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8292">Preference Key Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8293">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8293">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="forceyoutuberestrict"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8295">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8295">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-minimum-youtube-restricted-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8296">Forcer le mode restreint minimal sur YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8296">Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8297">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8297">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8298">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8298">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8299">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8299">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8300">Applique un mode restreint minimal sur YouTube et empêche l'utilisateur de choisir un mode moins restrictif.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8300">Enforces a minimum Restricted Mode on YouTube and prevents users from picking a less restricted mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8301">Définissez la stratégie sur «Strict» pour appliquer le mode restreint strict sur YouTube.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8301">Set to 'Strict' to enforce Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8302">Définissez la stratégie sur «Moderate» pour obliger les utilisateurs a utiliser les modes restreints strict ou modéré sur YouTube.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8302">Set to 'Moderate' to enforce the user to only use Moderate Restricted Mode and Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8303">Ils ne peuvent pas désactiver le mode restreint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8303">They can't disable Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8304">Si vous définissez la stratégie sur « Off » ou ne la configurez pas, le mode restreint n’est pas appliqué sur YouTube.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8304">Set to 'Off' or don't configure this policy to not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8305">Des stratégies externes comme les stratégies de YouTube peuvent toujours appliquer le mode restreint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8305">External policies such as YouTube policies might still enforce Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8306">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8306">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8307">Off (0)=Ne pas appliquer le mode restreint sur YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8307">Off (0) = Do not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8308">Moderate (1)=Appliquer au moins le mode restreint modéré sur YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8308">Moderate (1) = Enforce at least Moderate Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8309">Strict (2)=Appliquer le mode restreint strict sur YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8309">Strict (2) = Enforce Strict Restricted Mode for YouTube</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8310">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8310">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8311">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8311">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8312">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8312">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8313">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8313">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8314">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8314">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8315">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8315">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8316">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8316">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8317">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8317">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8318">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8318">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8319">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8319">GP unique name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8320">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: forcer le mode restreint minimal sur YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8320">GP name: Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8321">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8321">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8322">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8322">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8323">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8323">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8324">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8324">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8325">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8325">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8326">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8326">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8327">Nom de la valeur: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8327">Value Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8328">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8328">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8329">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8329">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8330">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8330">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8331">Nom clé de la préférence: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8331">Preference Key Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8332">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8332">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```

  ### <a name="fullscreenallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8334">FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8334">FullscreenAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-full-screen-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8335">Autoriser le mode plein écran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8335">Allow full screen mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8336">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8336">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8337">sur Windows depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8337">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8338">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8338">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8339">Définissez la disponibilité du mode plein écran: toute l'interface utilisateur de MicrosoftEdge est masquée et seul le contenu web est visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8339">Set the availability of full screen mode - all Microsoft Edge UI is hidden and only web content is visible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8340">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou ne la configurez pas, l’utilisateur, les applications et les extensions disposant des autorisations appropriées peuvent passer en mode plein écran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8340">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the user, apps, and extensions with appropriate permissions can enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8341">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs, les applications et les extensions ne peuvent pas passer en mode plein écran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8341">If you disable this policy, users, apps, and extensions can't enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8342">L'ouverture de Microsoft Edge en mode kiosque à l'aide de la ligne de commande n'est pas disponible lorsque le mode plein écran est désactivé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8342">Opening Microsoft Edge in kiosk mode using the command line is unavailable when full screen mode is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8343">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8343">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8344">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8344">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8345">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8345">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8346">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8346">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8347">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8347">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8348">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8348">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8349">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8349">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8350">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8350">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8351">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8351">GP unique name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8352">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser le mode plein écran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8352">GP name: Allow full screen mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8353">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8353">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8354">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8354">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8355">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8355">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8356">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8356">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8357">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8357">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8358">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8358">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8359">Nom de la valeur: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8359">Value Name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8360">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8360">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8361">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8361">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="globallyscopehttpauthcacheenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8363">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8363">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-globally-scoped-http-auth-cache"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8364">Activer le cache d’authentification HTTP de portée globale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8364">Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8365">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8365">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8366">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version81 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8366">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8367">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8367">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8368">Cette stratégie configure un cache global unique par profil avec les informations d'identification du serveur HTTP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8368">This policy configures a single global per profile cache with HTTP server authentication credentials.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8369">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre de stratégie ou si vous ne le configurez pas, le navigateur utilise le comportement par défaut de l'authentification intersite, qui, à partir de la version80, comprendra toutes les informations d'authentification du serveur HTTP en commençant par le site de meilleur niveau.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8369">If you disable or don't set this policy, the browser will use the default behavior of cross-site auth, which as of version 80, will be to scope HTTP server authentication credentials by top-level site.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8370">Par conséquent, si deux sites utilisent des ressources provenant du même domaine d'authentification, les informations d'identification devront être renseignées indépendamment dans le contexte des deux sites. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8370">So, if two sites use resources from the same authenticating domain, credentials will need to be provided independently in the context of both sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8371">Les informations d'identification du proxy mis en cache seront réutilisées sur les sites. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8371">Cached proxy credentials will be reused across sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8372">Si vous activez ce paramètre, les informations d'authentification HTTP de stratégie entrées dans le contexte d'un site sont automatiquement utilisées dans le contexte d'un autre site. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8372">If you enable this policy HTTP auth credentials entered in the context of one site will automatically be used in the context of another site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8373">L'activation de cette stratégie laisse les sites ouverts à certains types d'attaques intersite et permet d'effectuer le suivi des utilisateurs sur les sites, même sans cookies, en ajoutant des entrées au cache d'authentification HTTP à l'aide d'informations d'identification incorporées dans les URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8373">Enabling this policy leaves sites open to some types of cross-site attacks, and allows users to be tracked across sites even without cookies by adding entries to the HTTP auth cache using credentials embedded in URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8374">Cette stratégie est destinée à fournir aux entreprises, en fonction du comportement hérité, une possibilité de mettre à jour leurs procédures de connexion et elle sera supprimée à l'avenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8374">This policy is intended to give enterprises depending on the legacy behavior a chance to update their login procedures and will be removed in the future.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8375">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8375">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8376">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8376">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8377">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8377">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8378">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8378">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8379">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8379">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8380">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8380">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8381">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8381">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8382">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8382">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8383">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8383">GP unique name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8384">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer le cache d'authentification HTTP de portée globale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8384">GP name: Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8385">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8385">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8386">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8386">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8387">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8387">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8388">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8388">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8389">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8389">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8390">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8390">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8391">Nom de la valeur: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8391">Value Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8392">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8392">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8393">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8393">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8394">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8394">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8395">Nom clé de la préférence: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8395">Preference Key Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8396">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8396">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8398">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8398">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-direct-intranet-site-navigation-instead-of-searching-on-single-word-entries-in-the-address-bar"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8399">Forcer la navigation directe sur le site intranet au lieu de rechercher des entrées à mots uniques dans la barre d’adresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8399">Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8400">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8400">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8401">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8401">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8402">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8402">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8403">Si vous activez cette stratégie, le premier résultat de la suggestion automatique dans la liste de suggestions de la barre d'adresses navigue vers les sites intranet si le texte entré dans la barre d'adresses est un mot unique sans ponctuation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8403">If you enable this policy, the top auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will navigate to intranet sites if the text entered in the address bar is a single word without punctuation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8404">La navigation par défaut lors de la saisie d'un mot unique sans ponctuation effectue une navigation vers un site intranet correspondant au texte saisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8404">Default navigation when typing a single word without punctuation will conduct a navigation to an intranet site matching the entered text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8405">Si vous activez cette stratégie, le deuxième résultat de la suggestion automatique dans la liste de suggestions de la barre d'adresses mène à une recherche sur le web exactement telle qu'elle a été entrée, à condition que ce texte ne comporte qu'un seul mot sans ponctuation. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8405">If you enable this policy, the second auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will conduct a web search exactly as it was entered, provided that this text is a single word without punctuation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8406">Le moteur de recherche par défaut est utilisé, sauf si une stratégie empêchant la recherche sur le web a également été activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8406">The default search provider will be used unless a policy to prevent web search is also enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8407">L'activation de cette stratégie peut avoir deux effets: </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8407">Two effects of enabling this policy are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8408">La navigation vers les sites en réponse à des requêtes avec un seul mot se concentrant sur un seul élément de l'historique n'apparaît plus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8408">Navigation to sites in response to single word queries that would typically resolve to a history item will no longer happen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8409">Au lieu de cela, le navigateur tente de naviguer vers des sites internes qui n'existent peut-être plus dans le réseau intranet d'une organisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8409">Instead, the browser will attempt navigate to internal sites that may not exist in an organization's intranet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8410">Cette action génère une erreur 404.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8410">This will result in a 404 error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8411">Les termes de recherche populaires à mot unique nécessitent une sélection manuelle des suggestions de recherche pour mener une recherche de manière correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8411">Popular, single-word search terms will require manual selection of search suggestions to properly conduct a search.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8412">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8412">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8413">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8413">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8414">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8414">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8415">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8415">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8416">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8416">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8417">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8417">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8418">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8418">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8419">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8419">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8420">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8420">GP unique name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8421">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: forcer la navigation directe sur le site intranet au lieu de rechercher des entrées à mots uniques dans la barre d'adresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8421">GP name: Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8422">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8422">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8423">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8423">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8424">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8424">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8425">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8425">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8426">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8426">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8427">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8427">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8428">Nom de la valeur: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8428">Value Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8429">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8429">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8430">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8430">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8431">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8431">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8432">Nom clé de la préférence: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8432">Preference Key Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8433">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8433">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
