  ### <a name="hstspolicybypasslist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8435">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8435">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-names-that-will-bypass-the-hsts-policy-check"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8436">Configurer la liste des noms qui vont contourner la vérification de stratégie HSTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8436">Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8437">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8437">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8438">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version79 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8438">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8439">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8439">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8440">La définition de la stratégie spécifie une liste de noms d’hôtes qui contournent les mises à niveau HSTS préchargés de http vers https.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8440">Setting the policy specifies a list of hostnames that bypass preloaded HSTS upgrades from http to https.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8441">Seuls les noms d’hôte à étiquette unique sont autorisés dans cette stratégie, et cette stratégie s’applique uniquement aux entrées statiques HSTS préchargés (par exemple, «application», «nouveau», «rechercher», «lire»).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8441">Only single-label hostnames are allowed in this policy, and this policy only applies to static HSTS-preloaded entries (for example, "app", "new", "search", "play").</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8442">Cette stratégie n’empêche pas les mises à niveau HSTS pour les serveurs qui ont demandé dynamiquement des mises à niveau HSTS à l’aide d’un en-tête de réponse Strict-Transport-Security.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8442">This policy does not prevent HSTS upgrades for servers that have dynamically requested HSTS upgrades using a Strict-Transport-Security response header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8443">Les noms d’hôte fournis doivent être canonisés: tous les IDN doivent être convertis au format A-label et toutes les lettres ASCII doivent être en minuscules.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8443">Supplied hostnames must be canonicalized: Any IDNs must be converted to their A-label format, and all ASCII letters must be lowercase.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8444">Cette stratégie s’applique uniquement aux noms d’hôte à étiquette unique spécifiés, et non aux sous-domaine de ces noms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8444">This policy only applies to the specific single-label hostnames specified, not to subdomains of those names.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8445">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8445">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8446">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8446">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8447">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8447">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8448">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8448">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8449">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8449">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8450">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8450">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8451">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8451">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8452">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8452">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8453">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8453">GP unique name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8454">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la liste des noms qui vont contourner la vérification de stratégie HSTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8454">GP name: Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8455">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8455">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8456">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8456">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8457">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8457">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8458">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8458">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8459">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8459">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8460">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8460">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8461">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8461">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8462">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8462">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8463">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8463">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList\1 = "meet"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8464">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8464">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8465">Nom clé de la préférence: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8465">Preference Key Name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8466">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8466">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>meet</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8468">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8468">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-hardware-acceleration-when-available"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8469">Utiliser l’accélération matérielle lorsque celle-ci est disponible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8469">Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8470">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8470">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8471">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8471">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8472">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8472">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8473">Indique s’il faut utiliser l’accélération matérielle si elle est disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8473">Specifies whether to use hardware acceleration if it's available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8474">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, l'accélération matérielle est activée, sauf si une fonctionnalité GPU figure sur la liste noire. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8474">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, hardware acceleration is enabled unless a GPU feature is explicitly blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8475">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, l'accélération matérielle est désactivée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8475">If you disable this policy, hardware acceleration is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8476">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8476">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8477">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8477">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8478">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8478">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8479">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8479">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8480">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8480">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8481">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8481">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8482">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8482">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8483">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8483">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8484">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8484">GP unique name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8485">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: utiliser l’accélération matérielle lorsque celle-ci est disponible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8485">GP name: Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8486">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8486">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8487">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8487">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8488">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8488">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8489">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8489">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8490">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8490">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8491">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8491">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8492">Nom de la valeur: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8492">Value Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8493">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8493">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8494">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8494">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8495">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8495">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8496">Nom clé de la préférence: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8496">Preference Key Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8497">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8497">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="hidefirstrunexperience"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8499">HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8499">HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-first-run-experience-and-splash-screen"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8500">Masquer l’expérience de première utilisation et l’écran de démarrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8500">Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8501">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8501">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8502">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8502">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8503">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8503">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8504">Si vous activez cette stratégie, l'expérience de première exécution et l'écran de démarrage ne sont pas affichés aux utilisateurs lorsqu'ils exécutent MicrosoftEdge pour la première fois.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8504">If you enable this policy, the First-run experience and the splash screen will not be shown to users when they run Microsoft Edge for the first time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8505">Pour les options de configuration affichées dans l'expérience de première exécution, le navigateur prend par défaut les valeurs suivantes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8505">For the configuration options shown in the First Run Experience, the browser will default to the following:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8506">- Sous la page Nouvel onglet, le type de flux est défini sur MSN News et la mise en page sur Source d'inspiration. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8506">-On the New Tab Page, the feed type will be set to MSN News and the layout to Inspirational.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8507">- L'utilisateur est toujours connecté automatiquement à MicrosoftEdge si le compte Windows est de type AAD ou MSA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8507">-The user will still be automatically signed into Microsoft Edge if the Windows account is of Azure AD or MSA type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8508">-La synchronisation n’est pas activée par défaut et les utilisateurs sont invités à décider s’ils souhaitent effectuer une synchronisation au démarrage du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8508">-Sync will not be enabled by default and users will be prompted to choose whether they'd like to sync on browser startup.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8509">Vous pouvez utiliser la stratégie [ForceSync](#forcesync) ou [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) pour configurer la synchronisation et l’invite de consentement à la synchronisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8509">You can use the [ForceSync](#forcesync) or the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy to configure sync and the sync consent prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8510">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, l'expérience de première exécution et l'écran de démarrage s'affichent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8510">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the First-run experience and the Splash screen will be shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8511">Remarque : les options de configuration spécifiques qui s'affichent à l'utilisateur lors de la première utilisation peuvent également être gérées à l'aide d'autres stratégies spécifiques.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8511">Note: The specific configuration options shown to the user in the First Run Experience, can also be managed by using other specific policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8512">Vous pouvez utiliser la stratégie HideFirstRunExperience en association avec ces stratégies pour configurer une expérience de navigateur spécifique sur vos appareils gérés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8512">You can use the HideFirstRunExperience policy in combination with these policies to configure a specific browser experience on your managed devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8513">Voici quelques-unes de ces autres stratégies:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8513">Some of these other policies are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8514">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8514">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8515">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8515">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8516">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8516">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8517">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8517">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8518">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8518">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8519">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8519">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8520">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8520">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8521">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8521">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8522">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8522">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8523">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8523">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8524">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8524">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8525">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8525">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8526">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8526">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8527">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8527">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8528">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8528">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8529">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8529">GP unique name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8530">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: masquer l'expérience de première utilisation et l'écran de démarrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8530">GP name: Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8531">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8531">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8532">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8532">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8533">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8533">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8534">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8534">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8535">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8535">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8536">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8536">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8537">Nom de la valeur: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8537">Value Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8538">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8538">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8539">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8539">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8540">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8540">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8541">Nom clé de la préférence: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8541">Preference Key Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8542">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8542">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="hideinternetexplorerredirectuxforincompatiblesitesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8544">HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8544">HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-one-time-redirection-dialog-and-the-banner-on-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8545">Masquer la bannière et la boîte de dialogue de redirection ponctuelle sur Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8545">Hide the one-time redirection dialog and the banner on Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8546">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8546">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8547">Sur Windows depuis la version87 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8547">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8548">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8548">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8549">Cette stratégie donne la possibilité de désactiver la bannière et la boîte de dialogue de redirection ponctuelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8549">This policy gives an option to disable one-time redirection dialog and the banner.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8550">Lorsque cette stratégie est activée, les utilisateurs ne voient pas la bannière ni la boîte de dialogue ponctuelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8550">When this policy is enabled, users will not see both the one-time dialog and the banner.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8551">Les utilisateurs continuent à être redirigés vers Microsoft Edge lorsqu’ils visitent un site web incompatible sur Internet Explorer, mais leurs données de navigation ne sont pas importées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8551">Users will continue to be redirected to Microsoft Edge when they encounter an incompatible website on Internet Explorer, but their browsing data will not be imported.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8552">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne voient pas la bannière ni la boîte de dialogue de redirection ponctuelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8552">If you enable this policy the one-time redirection dialog and banner will never be shown to users.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8553">Les données de navigation des utilisateurs ne sont pas importées en cas de redirection.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8553">Users' browsing data will not be imported when a redirection happens.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8554">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou ne la configurez pas, la boîte de dialogue de redirection s’affiche lors de la première redirection et la bannière de redirection permanente apparaît pour les sessions commençant par une redirection.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8554">If you disable or don't set this policy, the redirection dialog will be shown on the first redirection and the persistent redirection banner will be shown to users on sessions that begin with a redirection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8555">Les données de navigation de l’utilisateur sont importées à chaque redirection (uniquement s’il l’a autorisé dans la boîte de dialogue ponctuelle).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8555">Users' browsing data will be imported every time user encounters such redirection (ONLY IF user consents to it on the one-time dialog).</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8556">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8556">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8557">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8557">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8558">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8558">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8559">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8559">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8560">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8560">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8561">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8561">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8562">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8562">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8563">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8563">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8564">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8564">GP unique name: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8565">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: masquer la bannière et la boîte de dialogue de redirection ponctuelle sur Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8565">GP name: Hide the one-time redirection dialog and the banner on Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8566">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8566">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8567">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8567">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8568">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8568">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8569">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8569">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8570">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8570">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8571">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8571">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8572">Nom de la valeur: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8572">Value Name: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8573">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8573">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8574">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8574">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8575">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8575">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importautofillformdata"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8576">ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8576">ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-autofill-form-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8577">Autoriser l’importation des données de saisie automatique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8577">Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8578">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8578">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8579">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8579">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8580">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8580">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8581">Permet aux utilisateurs d’importer des données de saisie automatique à partir d’un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8581">Allows users to import autofill form data from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8582">Si vous activez cette stratégie, l'option d'importation manuelle des données de saisie automatique est automatiquement sélectionnée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8582">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import autofill data is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8583">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les données du formulaire de saisie automatique ne sont pas importées lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas les importer manuellement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8583">If you disable this policy, autofill form data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8584">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les données de saisie automatique sont importées lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs peuvent choisir d'importer ces données manuellement lors des sessions de navigation ultérieures.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8584">If you don't configure this policy, autofill data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8585">Vous pouvez définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8585">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8586">Cela signifie que MicrosoftEdge importera les données de saisie automatique lors de la première exécution, mais que les utilisateurs peuvent sélectionner ou effacer l'option de **saisie automatique des données** lors de l'importation manuelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8586">This means that Microsoft Edge will import autofill data on first run, but users can select or clear **autofill data** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8587">**Remarque**: cette stratégie gère actuellement l'importation des navigateurs Google Chrome (sur Windows7, 8 et 10 et sur macOS) et Mozilla Firefox (sur Windows7, 8 et 10 et sur macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8587">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8588">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8588">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8589">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8589">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8590">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8590">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8591">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8591">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8592">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8592">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8593">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8593">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8594">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8594">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8595">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8595">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8596">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8596">GP unique name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8597">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’importation des données de saisie automatique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8597">GP name: Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8598">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8598">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8599">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8599">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8600">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8600">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8601">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8601">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8602">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8602">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8603">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8603">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8604">Nom de la valeur: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8604">Value Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8605">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8605">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8606">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8606">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8607">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8607">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8608">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8608">Preference Key Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8609">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8609">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8610">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8610">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importbrowsersettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8611">ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8611">ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-browser-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8612">Autoriser l’importation des paramètres du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8612">Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8613">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8613">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8614">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8614">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8615">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8615">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8616">Permet aux utilisateurs d'importer les paramètres du navigateur à partir d'un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8616">Allows users to import browser settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8617">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la case **Paramètres du navigateur** est automatiquement cochée dans la boîte de dialogue **Importer des données du navigateur**. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8617">If you enable this policy, the **Browser settings** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8618">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les paramètres du navigateur ne sont pas importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas les importer manuellement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8618">If you disable this policy, browser settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8619">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les paramètres du navigateur sont importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs peuvent choisir s'ils souhaitent les importer manuellement lors des sessions de navigation ultérieures.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8619">If you don't configure this policy, browser settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8620">Vous pouvez également définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8620">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8621">Cela signifie que Microsoft Edge importe les paramètres lors de la première exécution, mais que les utilisateurs peuvent sélectionner ou désactiver l'option **Paramètres du navigateur** pendant l'importation manuelle. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8621">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **browser settings** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8622">**Remarque**: cette stratégie gère actuellement l'importation de Google Chrome (sous Windows7, 8 et 10 et sous macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8622">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8623">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8623">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8624">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8624">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8625">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8625">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8626">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8626">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8627">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8627">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8628">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8628">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8629">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8629">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8630">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8630">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8631">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8631">GP unique name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8632">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l'importation des paramètres du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8632">GP name: Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8633">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8633">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8634">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8634">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8635">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8635">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8636">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8636">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8637">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8637">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8638">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8638">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8639">Nom de la valeur: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8639">Value Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8640">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8640">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8641">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8641">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8642">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8642">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8643">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8643">Preference Key Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8644">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8644">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importcookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8646">ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8646">ImportCookies</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8647">Autoriser l’importation des cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8647">Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8648">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8648">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8649">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version81 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8649">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8650">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8650">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8651">Permet aux utilisateurs d'importer des cookies à partir d'un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8651">Allows users to import Cookies from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8652">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les cookies ne sont pas importés lors de la première utilisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8652">If you disable this policy, Cookies aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8653">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les cookies sont importés lors de la première utilisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8653">If you don't configure this policy, Cookies are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8654">Vous pouvez également définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8654">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8655">Cela signifie que MicrosoftEdge importe les cookies lors de la première utilisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8655">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Cookies on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8656">**Remarque**: cette stratégie gère actuellement l'importation de Google Chrome (sous Windows7, 8 et 10 et sous macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8656">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8657">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8657">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8658">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8658">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8659">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8659">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8660">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8660">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8661">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8661">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8662">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8662">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8663">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8663">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8664">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8664">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8665">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8665">GP unique name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8666">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’importation des cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8666">GP name: Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8667">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8667">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8668">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8668">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8669">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8669">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8670">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8670">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8671">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8671">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8672">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8672">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8673">Nom de la valeur: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8673">Value Name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8674">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8674">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8675">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8675">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8676">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8676">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8677">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8677">Preference Key Name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8678">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8678">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importextensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8680">ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8680">ImportExtensions</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-extensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8681">Autoriser l’importation des extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8681">Allow importing of extensions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8682">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8682">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8683">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version81 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8683">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8684">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8684">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8685">Permet aux utilisateurs d'importer des extensions à partir d'un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8685">Allows users to import extensions from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8686">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la case **Extensions** est automatiquement cochée dans la boîte de dialogue **Importer des données du navigateur**. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8686">If you enable this policy, the **Extensions** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8687">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les extensions ne sont pas importées lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas les importer manuellement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8687">If you disable this policy, extensions aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8688">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les extensions sont importées lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs peuvent choisir s'ils souhaitent les importer manuellement lors des sessions de navigation ultérieures.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8688">If you don't configure this policy, extensions are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8689">Vous pouvez également définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8689">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8690">Cela signifie que Microsoft Edge importe les extensions lors de la première exécution, mais que les utilisateurs peuvent sélectionner ou désactiver l'option **Favoris** pendant l'importation manuelle. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8690">This means that Microsoft Edge imports extensions on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8691">**Remarque**: cette stratégie prend uniquement en charge l'importation de Google Chrome (sous Windows7, 8 et 10 et sous macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8691">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8692">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8692">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8693">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8693">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8694">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8694">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8695">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8695">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8696">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8696">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8697">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8697">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8698">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8698">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8699">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8699">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8700">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8700">GP unique name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8701">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’importation des extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8701">GP name: Allow importing of extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8702">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8702">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8703">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8703">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8704">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8704">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8705">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8705">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8706">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8706">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8707">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8707">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8708">Nom de la valeur: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8708">Value Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8709">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8709">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8710">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8710">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8711">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8711">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8712">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8712">Preference Key Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8713">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8713">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importfavorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8715">ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8715">ImportFavorites</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8716">Autoriser l’importation des favoris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8716">Allow importing of favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8717">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8717">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8718">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8718">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8719">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8719">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8720">Permet aux utilisateurs d'importer des favoris à partir d'un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8720">Allows users to import favorites from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8721">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la case **Favoris** est automatiquement cochée dans la boîte de dialogue **Importer des données du navigateur**. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8721">If you enable this policy, the **Favorites** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8722">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les favoris ne sont pas importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas les importer manuellement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8722">If you disable this policy, favorites aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8723">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les favoris sont importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs peuvent choisir s'ils souhaitent les importer manuellement lors des sessions de navigation ultérieures.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8723">If you don't configure this policy, favorites are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8724">Vous pouvez également définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8724">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8725">Cela signifie que Microsoft Edge importe les favoris lors de la première exécution, mais que les utilisateurs peuvent sélectionner ou désactiver l'option **Favoris** pendant l'importation manuelle. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8725">This means that Microsoft Edge imports favorites on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8726">**Remarque**: cette stratégie gère actuellement l'importation des navigateurs Internet Explorer (sur Windows7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (sur Windows7, 8, et 10 and sur macOS), Mozilla Firefox (sur Windows7, 8, and 10 et sur macOS), and Apple Safari (sur macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8726">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8727">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8727">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8728">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8728">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8729">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8729">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8730">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8730">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8731">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8731">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8732">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8732">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8733">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8733">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8734">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8734">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8735">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8735">GP unique name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8736">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’importation des favoris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8736">GP name: Allow importing of favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8737">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8737">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8738">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8738">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8739">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8739">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8740">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8740">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8741">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8741">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8742">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8742">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8743">Nom de la valeur: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8743">Value Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8744">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8744">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8745">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8745">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8746">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8746">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8747">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8747">Preference Key Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8748">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8748">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
