  ### <a name="importhistory"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8750">ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8750">ImportHistory</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-browsing-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8751">Autoriser l’importation de l’historique de navigation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8751">Allow importing of browsing history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8752">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8752">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8753">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8753">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8754">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8754">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8755">Permet aux utilisateurs d'importer leur historique de navigation à partir d'un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8755">Allows users to import their browsing history from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8756">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la case **Historique de navigation** est automatiquement cochée dans la boîte de dialogue **Importer des données du navigateur**. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8756">If you enable this policy, the **Browsing history** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8757">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les données de l’historique de navigation ne sont pas importées lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas les importer manuellement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8757">If you disable this policy, browsing history data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import this data manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8758">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les données de l’historique de navigation sont importées lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs peuvent choisir d'importer ces données manuellement lors des sessions de navigation ultérieures.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8758">If you don't configure this policy, browsing history data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8759">Vous pouvez également définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8759">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8760">Cela signifie que Microsoft Edge importe l’historique de navigation lors de la première exécution, mais que les utilisateurs peuvent sélectionner ou désactiver l'option **Historique** pendant l'importation manuelle. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8760">This means that Microsoft Edge imports browsing history on first run, but users can select or clear the **history** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8761">**Remarque**: cette stratégie gère actuellement l'importation des navigateurs Internet Explorer (sur Windows7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (sur Windows7, 8, et 10 and sur macOS), Mozilla Firefox (sur Windows7, 8, and 10 et sur macOS), and Apple Safari (macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8761">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8762">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8762">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8763">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8763">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8764">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8764">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8765">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8765">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8766">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8766">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8767">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8767">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8768">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8768">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8769">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8769">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8770">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8770">GP unique name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8771">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l'importation de l’historique de navigation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8771">GP name: Allow importing of browsing history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8772">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8772">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8773">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8773">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8774">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8774">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8775">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8775">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8776">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8776">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8777">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8777">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8778">Nom de la valeur: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8778">Value Name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8779">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8779">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8780">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8780">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8781">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8781">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8782">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8782">Preference Key Name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8783">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8783">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importhomepage"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8785">ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8785">ImportHomepage</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-home-page-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8786">Autoriser l’importation des paramètres de la page d’accueil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8786">Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8787">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8787">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8788">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8788">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8789">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8789">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8790">Permet aux utilisateurs d'importer leur page d’accueil à partir d'un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8790">Allows users to import their home page setting from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8791">Si vous activez cette stratégie, l'option d'importation manuelle de la page d’accueil est automatiquement sélectionnée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8791">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import the home page setting is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8792">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les paramètres de la page d’accueil ne sont pas importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas les importer manuellement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8792">If you disable this policy, the home page setting isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8793">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les paramètres de la page d’accueil sont importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs peuvent choisir d'importer ces données manuellement lors des sessions de navigation ultérieures.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8793">If you don't configure this policy, the home page setting is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8794">Vous pouvez définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8794">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8795">Cela signifie que Microsoft Edge importe les paramètres de la page d’accueil lors de la première exécution, mais que les utilisateurs peuvent sélectionner ou désactiver l'option **Page d'accueil** pendant l'importation manuelle. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8795">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the home page setting on first run, but users can select or clear the **home page** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8796">**Remarque**: cette stratégie gère actuellement l'importation de Internet Explorer (sous Windows7, 8 et 10). </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8796">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8797">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8797">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8798">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8798">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8799">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8799">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8800">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8800">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8801">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8801">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8802">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8802">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8803">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8803">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8804">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8804">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8805">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8805">GP unique name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8806">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l'importation des paramètres de la page d'accueil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8806">GP name: Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8807">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8807">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8808">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8808">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8809">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8809">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8810">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8810">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8811">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8811">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8812">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8812">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8813">Nom de la valeur: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8813">Value Name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8814">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8814">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8815">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8815">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8816">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8816">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8817">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8817">Preference Key Name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8818">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8818">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importopentabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8820">ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8820">ImportOpenTabs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-open-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8821">Autoriser l’importation des onglets ouverts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8821">Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8822">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8822">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8823">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version79 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8823">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8824">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8824">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8825">Permet aux utilisateurs d'importer les onglets ouverts et épinglés à partir d'un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8825">Allows users to import open and pinned tabs from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8826">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la case **Onglets ouverts** est automatiquement cochée dans la boîte de dialogue **Importer des données du navigateur**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8826">If you enable this policy, the **Open tabs** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8827">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les onglets ouverts ne sont pas importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas les importer manuellement. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8827">If you disable this policy, open tabs aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8828">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les onglets ouverts sont importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs peuvent choisir s'ils souhaitent les importer manuellement lors des sessions de navigation ultérieures. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8828">If you don't configure this policy, open tabs are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8829">Vous pouvez également définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8829">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8830">Cela signifie que MicrosoftEdge importe les onglets ouverts lors de la première exécution, mais que les utilisateurs peuvent sélectionner ou désactiver l'option **Onglets ouverts** pendant l'importation manuelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8830">This means that Microsoft Edge imports open tabs on first run, but users can select or clear the **Open tabs** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8831">**Remarque**: cette stratégie prend uniquement en charge l'importation de Google Chrome (sous Windows7, 8 et 10 et sous macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8831">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8832">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8832">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8833">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8833">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8834">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8834">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8835">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8835">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8836">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8836">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8837">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8837">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8838">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8838">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8839">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8839">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8840">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8840">GP unique name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8841">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l'importation des onglets ouverts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8841">GP name: Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8842">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8842">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8843">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8843">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8844">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8844">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8845">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8845">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8846">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8846">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8847">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8847">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8848">Nom de la valeur: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8848">Value Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8849">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8849">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8850">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8850">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8851">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8851">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8852">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8852">Preference Key Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8853">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8853">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importpaymentinfo"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8855">ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8855">ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-payment-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8856">Autoriser l’importation des informations de paiement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8856">Allow importing of payment info</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8857">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8857">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8858">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8858">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8859">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8859">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8860">Permet aux utilisateurs d’importer des infos de paiement à partir d'un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8860">Allows users to import payment info from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8861">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la case à cocher **Infos de paiement** est automatiquement activée dans la boîte de dialogue **Importer les données du navigateur**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8861">If you enable this policy, the **payment info** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8862">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les infos de paiement ne sont pas importées lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas les importer manuellement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8862">If you disable this policy, payment info isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8863">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les infos de paiement sont importées lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs peuvent décider de les importer manuellement lors des sessions de navigation ultérieures.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8863">If you don't configure this policy, payment info is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8864">Vous pouvez également définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8864">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8865">Cela signifie que MicrosoftEdge importe les infos de paiement lors de la première exécution, mais que les utilisateurs peuvent sélectionner ou effacer l'option **infos de paiement** pendant l'importation manuelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8865">This means that Microsoft Edge imports payment info on first run, but users can select or clear the **payment info** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8866">**Remarque:** cette stratégie gère actuellement l'importation à partir de Google Chrome (sous Windows7, 8 et 10 et sous macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8866">**Note:** This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8867">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8867">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8868">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8868">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8869">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8869">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8870">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8870">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8871">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8871">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8872">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8872">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8873">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8873">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8874">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8874">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8875">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8875">GP unique name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8876">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l'importation des informations de paiement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8876">GP name: Allow importing of payment info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8877">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8877">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8878">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8878">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8879">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8879">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8880">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8880">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8881">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8881">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8882">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8882">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8883">Nom de la valeur: ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8883">Value Name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8884">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8884">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8885">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8885">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8886">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8886">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8887">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8887">Preference Key Name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8888">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8888">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importsavedpasswords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8890">ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8890">ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-saved-passwords"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8891">Autoriser l’importation des mots de passe enregistrés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8891">Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8892">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8892">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8893">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8893">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8894">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8894">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8895">Permet aux utilisateurs d'importer des mots de passe enregistrés à partir d'un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8895">Allows users to import saved passwords from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8896">Si vous activez cette stratégie, l'option d'importation manuelle des mots de passe enregistrés est automatiquement sélectionnée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8896">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import saved passwords is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8897">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les mots de passe enregistrés ne sont pas importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas les importer manuellement. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8897">If you disable this policy, saved passwords aren't imported on first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8898">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les mots de passe enregistrés sont importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs peuvent choisir s'ils souhaitent les importer manuellement lors des sessions de navigation ultérieures. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8898">If you don't configure this policy, passwords are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8899">Vous pouvez définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8899">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8900">Cela signifie que MicrosoftEdge importe les onglets ouverts lors de la première exécution, mais que les utilisateurs peuvent sélectionner ou désactiver l'option **mots de passe enregistrés** pendant l'importation manuelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8900">This means that Microsoft Edge imports passwords on first run, but users can select or clear the **passwords** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8901">**Remarque**: cette stratégie gère actuellement l'importation des navigateurs Internet Explorer (sur Windows7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (sur Windows7, 8, et 10 and sur macOS) et Mozilla Firefox (sur Windows7, 8, and 10 et sur macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8901">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8902">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8902">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8903">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8903">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8904">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8904">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8905">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8905">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8906">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8906">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8907">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8907">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8908">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8908">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8909">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8909">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8910">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8910">GP unique name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8911">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’importation des mots de passe enregistrés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8911">GP name: Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8912">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8912">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8913">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8913">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8914">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8914">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8915">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8915">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8916">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8916">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8917">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8917">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8918">Nom de la valeur: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8918">Value Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8919">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8919">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8920">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8920">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8921">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8921">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8922">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8922">Preference Key Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8923">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8923">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importsearchengine"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8925">ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8925">ImportSearchEngine</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-search-engine-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8926">Autoriser l’importation des paramètres du moteur de recherche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8926">Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8927">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8927">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8928">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8928">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8929">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8929">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8930">Permet aux utilisateurs d'importer les paramètres du moteur de recherche à partir d'un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8930">Allows users to import search engine settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8931">Si vous activez cette stratégie, l'option d'importation du moteur de recherche est automatiquement sélectionnée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8931">If you enable, this policy, the option to import search engine settings is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8932">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les paramètres du moteur de recherche ne sont pas importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas les importer manuellement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8932">If you disable this policy, search engine settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8933">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les paramètres du moteur de recherche sont importés lors de la première exécution et les utilisateurs peuvent choisir d'importer ces données manuellement lors des sessions de navigation ultérieures.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8933">If you don't configure this policy, search engine settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8934">Vous pouvez définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8934">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8935">Cela signifie que MicrosoftEdge importe les paramètres du moteur de recherche lors de la première exécution, mais que les utilisateurs peuvent sélectionner ou désactiver l'option **moteur de recherche** pendant l'importation manuelle. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8935">This means that Microsoft Edge imports search engine settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **search engine** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8936">**Remarque**: cette stratégie gère actuellement l'importation de Internet Explorer (sous Windows7, 8 et 10). </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8936">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8937">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8937">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8938">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8938">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8939">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8939">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8940">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8940">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8941">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8941">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8942">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8942">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8943">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8943">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8944">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8944">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8945">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8945">GP unique name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8946">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’importation des paramètres du moteur de recherche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8946">GP name: Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8947">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8947">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8948">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8948">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8949">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8949">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8950">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8950">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8951">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8951">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8952">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8952">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8953">Nom de la valeur: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8953">Value Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8954">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8954">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8955">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8955">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8956">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8956">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8957">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8957">Preference Key Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8958">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8958">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importshortcuts"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8960">ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8960">ImportShortcuts</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-shortcuts"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8961">Autoriser l’importation des raccourcis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8961">Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8962">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8962">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8963">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version81 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8963">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8964">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8964">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8965">Permet aux utilisateurs d'importer les raccourcis à partir d'un autre navigateur dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8965">Allows users to import Shortcuts from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8966">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les raccourcis ne sont pas importés lors de la première exécution.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8966">If you disable this policy, Shortcuts aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8967">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les raccourcis sont importés lors de la première exécution.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8967">If you don't configure this policy, Shortcuts are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8968">Vous pouvez également définir cette stratégie comme une recommandation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8968">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8969">Cela signifie que MicrosoftEdge importe les raccourcis lors de la première exécution. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8969">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Shortcuts on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8970">**Remarque**: cette stratégie gère actuellement l'importation depuis Google Chrome (sous Windows7, 8 et 10 et sous macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8970">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8971">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8971">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8972">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8972">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8973">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8973">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8974">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8974">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8975">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8975">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8976">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8976">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8977">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8977">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8978">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8978">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8979">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8979">GP unique name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8980">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’importation des raccourcis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8980">GP name: Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8981">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8981">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8982">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8982">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8983">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8983">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8984">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8984">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8985">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8985">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8986">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8986">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8987">Nom de la valeur: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8987">Value Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8988">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8988">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8989">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8989">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8990">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8990">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8991">Nom clé de la préférence: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8991">Preference Key Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8992">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8992">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="inprivatemodeavailability"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8994">InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8994">InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-inprivate-mode-availability"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8995">Configurer la disponibilité du mode InPrivate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8995">Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8996">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8996">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8997">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8997">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8998">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8998">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-8999">Indique si l'utilisateur peut ouvrir des pages en mode InPrivate dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-8999">Specifies whether the user can open pages in InPrivate mode in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9000">Si vous ne configurez cette stratégie ou si vous la définissez sur «Enabled», les utilisateurs peuvent ouvrir des pages en mode InPrivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9000">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Enabled', users can open pages in InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9001">Définissez cette stratégie sur «Disabled» pour empêcher les utilisateurs d'utiliser le mode InPrivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9001">Set this policy to 'Disabled' to stop users from using InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9002">Définissez cette stratégie sur «Forced» pour toujours utiliser le mode InPrivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9002">Set this policy to 'Forced' to always use InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9003">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9003">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9004">Enabled (0)=Mode InPrivate disponible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9004">Enabled (0) = InPrivate mode available</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9005">Disabled (1)=Mode InPrivate désactivé </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9005">Disabled (1) = InPrivate mode disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9006">Forced (2)=Mode InPrivate obligatoire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9006">Forced (2) = InPrivate mode forced</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9007">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9007">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9008">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9008">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9009">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9009">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9010">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9010">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9011">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9011">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9012">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9012">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9013">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9013">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9014">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9014">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9015">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9015">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9016">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9016">GP unique name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9017">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la disponibilité du mode InPrivate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9017">GP name: Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9018">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9018">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9019">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9019">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9020">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9020">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9021">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9021">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9022">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9022">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9023">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9023">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9024">Nom de la valeur: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9024">Value Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9025">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9025">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9026">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9026">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9027">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9027">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9028">Nom clé de la préférence: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9028">Preference Key Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9029">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9029">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
