  ### <a name="insecureformswarningsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9031">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9031">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-warnings-for-insecure-forms"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9032">Activer les avertissements pour les formulaires non sécurisés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9032">Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9033">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9033">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9034">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9034">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9035">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9035">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9036">Cette stratégie contrôle la gestion des formulaires non sécurisés (formulaires soumis via HTTP) intégrés dans des sites sécurisés (HTTPS) dans le navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9036">This policy controls the handling of insecure forms (forms submitted over HTTP) embedded in secure (HTTPS) sites in the browser.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9037">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou ne la définissez pas, un avertissement en plein écran s’affiche lorsqu’un formulaire non sécurisé est soumis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9037">If you enable this policy or don't set it, a full page warning will be shown when an insecure form is submitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9038">De plus, une bulle d’avertissement s’affiche à côté des champs de formulaire lorsqu’ils sont sélectionnés et la saisie automatique est désactivée pour ces formulaires.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9038">Additionally, a warning bubble will be shown next to the form fields when they are focused, and autofill will be disabled for those forms.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9039">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les avertissements ne seront pas affichés pour les formulaires non sécurisés et la saisie automatique fonctionnera normalement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9039">If you disable this policy, warnings will not be shown for insecure forms, and autofill will work normally.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9040">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9040">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9041">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9041">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9042">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9042">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9043">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9043">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9044">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9044">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9045">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9045">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9046">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9046">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9047">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9047">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9048">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9048">GP unique name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9049">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer les avertissements pour les formulaires non sécurisés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9049">GP name: Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9050">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9050">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9051">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9051">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9052">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9052">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9053">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9053">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9054">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9054">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9055">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9055">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9056">Nom de la valeur: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9056">Value Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9057">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9057">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9058">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9058">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9059">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9059">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9060">Nom clé de la préférence: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9060">Preference Key Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9061">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9061">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9062">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9062">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="intensivewakeupthrottlingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9063">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9063">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-the-intensivewakeupthrottling-feature"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9064">Contrôler la fonctionnalité IntensiveWakeUpThrottling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9064">Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9065">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9065">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9066">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9066">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9067">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9067">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9068">Lorsque la fonctionnalité IntensiveWakeUpThrottling est activée, les timers JavaScript dans les onglets d’arrière-plan sont considérablement accélérés et fusionnés, et ne s’exécutent pas plus d’une fois par minute après qu’une page ait été mise en arrière-plan pendant 5 minutes ou plus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9068">When enabled the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature causes Javascript timers in background tabs to be aggressively throttled and coalesced, running no more than once per minute after a page has been backgrounded for 5 minutes or more.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9069">Il s’agit d’une fonctionnalité conforme aux normes Web, mais elle risque de rompre la fonctionnalité de certains sites Web en forçant certaines actions à être différées de quelques minutes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9069">This is a web standards compliant feature, but it may break functionality on some websites by causing certain actions to be delayed by up to a minute.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9070">Cependant, l’utilisation de la CPU et de la batterie entraîne une économie considérable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9070">However, it results in significant CPU and battery savings when enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9071">Voir https://bit.ly/30b1XR4 pour plus d’informations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9071">See https://bit.ly/30b1XR4 for more details.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9072">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la fonctionnalité est activée et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9072">If you enable this policy, the feature will be force enabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9073">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, la fonctionnalité sera désactivée et les utilisateurs ne pourront pas modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9073">If you disable this policy, the feature will be force disabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9074">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la fonctionnalité est contrôlée par sa propre logique interne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9074">If you don't configure this policy, the feature will be controlled by its own internal logic.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9075">Les utilisateurs peuvent configurer manuellement ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9075">Users can manually configure this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9076">Notez que la stratégie est appliquée par processus de convertisseur, et la valeur la plus récente du paramètre de stratégie est appliquée au démarrage du processus de rendu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9076">Note that the policy is applied per renderer process, with the most recent value of the policy setting in force when a renderer process starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9077">Un redémarrage complet est nécessaire pour s’assurer que tous les onglets chargés reçoivent un paramètre de stratégie cohérent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9077">A full restart is required to ensure that all the loaded tabs receive a consistent policy setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9078">Il est inoffensif pour les processus qui s’exécutent avec différentes valeurs de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9078">It is harmless for processes to be running with different values of this policy.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9079">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9079">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9080">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9080">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9081">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9081">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9082">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9082">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9083">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9083">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9084">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9084">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9085">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9085">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9086">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9086">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9087">Nom unique GP: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9087">GP unique name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9088">Nom de la stratégie de protection: contrôler la fonctionnalité IntensiveWakeUpThrottling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9088">GP name: Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9089">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9089">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9090">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9090">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9091">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9091">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9092">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9092">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9093">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9093">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9094">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9094">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9095">Nom de la valeur: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9095">Value Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9096">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9096">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9097">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9097">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9098">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9098">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9099">Nom de la clé de préférence: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9099">Preference Key Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9100">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9100">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9101">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9101">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationenhancedhangdetection"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9102">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9102">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-enhanced-hang-detection-for-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9103">Configurer la détection de blocage avancée pour le mode Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9103">Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9104">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9104">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9105">Sur Windows depuis la version84 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9105">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9106">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9106">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9107">La détection améliorée des blocages est une approche plus granulaire pour la détection de pages Web bloquées en mode Internet, plutôt que d’utiliser la version autonome d’Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9107">Enhanced hang detection is a more granular approach to detecting hung webpages in Internet Explorer mode than what standalone Internet Explorer uses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9108">Lorsqu’une page Web suspendue est détectée, le navigateur applique une atténuation pour empêcher le blocage du reste du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9108">When a hung webpage is detected, the browser will apply a mitigation to prevent the rest of the browser from hanging.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9109">Ce paramètre vous permet de configurer l’utilisation de la détection de blocage renforcée au cas où vous rencontriez des problèmes d’incompatibilité avec vos sites Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9109">This setting allows you to configure the use of enhanced hang detection in case you run into incompatible issues with any of your websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9110">Nous vous recommandons de désactiver cette stratégie uniquement si les notifications telles que «(site Web) ne répondent pas» en mode Internet Explorer, mais pas dans la version autonome d’Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9110">We recommend disabling this policy only if you see notifications such as "(website) is not responding" in Internet Explorer mode but not in standalone Internet Explorer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9111">Ce paramètre fonctionne conjointement avec: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) défini sur «IEMode» et [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) avec une liste comportant au moins une entrée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9111">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9112">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «Enabled» ou si vous ne la configurez pas, les sites Web en mode Internet Explorer utilisent la détection d’arrêt intempestif améliorée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9112">If you set this policy to 'Enabled' or don't configure it, websites running in Internet Explorer mode will use enhanced hang detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9113">Si vous configurez cette stratégie sur «Disabled», la détection d’arrêt intempestif renforcée est désactivée et les utilisateurs obtiendront le comportement de détection d’arrêt intempestif de base d’Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9113">If you set this policy to 'Disabled', enhanced hang detection is disabled, and users will get the basic Internet Explorer hang detection behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9114">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur le mode Internet Explorer, consultez la page [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9114">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9115">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9115">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9116">Disabled (0) = Détection d’arrêt intempestif améliorée désactivée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9116">Disabled (0) = Enhanced hang detection disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9117">Enabled (1) = Détection d’arrêt intempestif améliorée activée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9117">Enabled (1) = Enhanced hang detection enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9118">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9118">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9120">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9120">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9121">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9121">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9122">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9122">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9124">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9124">Integer</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9126">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9126">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9127">Nom unique GP: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9127">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9128">Nom de la stratégie de protection: configurer la détection de blocage avancée pour le mode Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9128">GP name: Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9129">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9129">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9130">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9130">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9131">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9131">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9132">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9132">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9133">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9133">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9134">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9134">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9135">Nom de la valeur: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9135">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9136">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9136">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlevel"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9139">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9139">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9144">Si vous souhaitez obtenir des instructions sur la configuration optimale de l'expérience pour Internet Explorer, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9144">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9145">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9145">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9147">IEMode (1) = Mode InternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9147">IEMode (1) = Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9148">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9148">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9149">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9149">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9150">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9150">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9151">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9151">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9152">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9152">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9153">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9153">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9155">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9155">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9156">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9156">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9158">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9158">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9159">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer l’intégration d’Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9159">GP name: Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9160">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9160">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9162">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9162">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9164">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9164">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9165">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9165">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9170">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9170">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-launching-of-local-files-in-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9171">Autoriser le lancement de fichiers locaux en mode InternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9171">Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9172">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9172">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9173">Sur Windows depuis la version88 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9173">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9174">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9174">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9175">Cette stratégie contrôle la disponibilité de l’argument de ligne de commande --ie-mode-file-url qui est utilisé pour lancer MicrosoftEdge avec un fichier local spécifié sur la ligne de commande en mode InternetExplorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9175">This policy controls the availability of the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument which is used to launch Microsoft Edge with a local file specified on the command line into Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9176">Ce paramètre fonctionne conjointement avec: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) est défini sur «IEMode».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9176">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9177">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur true ou si vous ne la configurez pas, l’utilisateur est autorisé à utiliser l’argument de ligne de commande --ie-mode-file-url pour lancer des fichiers locaux en mode InternetExplorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9177">If you set this policy to true, or don't configure it, the user is allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9178">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur false, l’utilisateur n’est pas autorisé à utiliser l’argument de ligne de commande --ie-mode-file-url pour lancer des fichiers locaux en mode InternetExplorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9178">If you set this policy to false, the user isn't allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9179">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur le mode Internet Explorer, consultez la page [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9179">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9180">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9180">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9181">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9181">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9182">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9182">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9183">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9183">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9184">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9184">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9185">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9185">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9186">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9186">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9187">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9187">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9188">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9188">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9189">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser le lancement de fichiers locaux en mode InternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9189">GP name: Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9190">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9190">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9191">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9191">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9192">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9192">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9193">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9193">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9194">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9194">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9195">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9195">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9196">Nom de la valeur: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9196">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9197">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9197">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9198">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9198">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileextensionallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9200">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9200">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>

  #### <a name="open-local-files-in-internet-explorer-mode-file-extension-allow-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9201">Ouvrir les fichiers locaux dans la liste verte des extensions de fichier en mode InternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9201">Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9202">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9202">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9203">Sur Windows depuis la version88 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9203">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9204">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9204">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9205">Cette stratégie limite les URL file:// autorisées à être lancées en mode InternetExplorer en fonction de l’extension de fichier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9205">This policy limits which file:// URLs are allowed to be launched into Internet Explorer mode based on file extension.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9206">Ce paramètre fonctionne conjointement avec: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) est défini sur «IEMode».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9206">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9207">Lorsqu’une URL file:// doit être lancée en mode InternetExplorer, l’extension de fichier de l’URL doit être présente dans cette liste pour que l’URL soit autorisée à se lancer en mode InternetExplorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9207">When a file:// URL is requested to launch in Internet Explorer mode, the file extension of the URL must be present in this list in order for the URL to be allowed to launch in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9208">Une URL dont l’ouverture est bloquée dans le mode InternetExplorer s’ouvre en mode Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9208">A URL which is blocked from opening in Internet Explorer mode will instead open in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9209">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur la valeur spéciale «\*» ou si vous ne la configurez pas, toutes les extensions de fichier sont autorisées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9209">If you set this policy to the special value "\*" or don't configure it, all file extensions are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9210">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur le mode Internet Explorer, consultez la page [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9210">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9211">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9211">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9212">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9212">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9213">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9213">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9214">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9214">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9215">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9215">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9216">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9216">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9217">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9217">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9218">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9218">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9219">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9219">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9220">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: ouvrir les fichiers locaux dans la liste verte des extensions de fichier en mode InternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9220">GP name: Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9221">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9221">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9222">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9222">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9223">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9223">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9224">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9224">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9225">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9225">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9226">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9226">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9227">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9227">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9228">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9228">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9229">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9229">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\1 = ".mht"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\2 = ".pdf"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\3 = ".vsdx"

```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileshowcontextmenu"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9231">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9231">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-context-menu-to-open-a-link-in-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9232">Afficher le menu contextuel pour ouvrir un lien en mode InternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9232">Show context menu to open a link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9233">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9233">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9234">Sur Windows depuis la version88 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9234">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9235">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9235">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9236">Cette stratégie contrôle la visibilité de l’option «Ouvrir le lien dans un nouvel onglet Mode Internet Explorer» dans le menu contextuel des liens file://.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9236">This policy controls the visibility of the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' option on the context menu for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9237">Ce paramètre fonctionne conjointement avec: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) est défini sur «IEMode».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9237">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9238">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur true, l’élément de menu contextuel «Ouvrir le lien dans un nouvel onglet Mode InternetExplorer» sera disponible pour les liens file://.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9238">If you set this policy to true, the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' context menu item will be available for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9239">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur false ou si vous ne la configurez pas, l’élément de menu contextuel ne sera pas ajouté.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9239">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the context menu item will not be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9240">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur le mode Internet Explorer, consultez la page [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9240">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9241">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9241">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9242">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9242">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9243">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9243">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9244">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9244">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9246">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9246">Boolean</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9248">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9248">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9249">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9249">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9250">Nom de la stratégie: afficher le menu contextuel pour ouvrir un lien en mode InternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9250">GP name: Show context menu to open a link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9251">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9251">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9252">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9252">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9253">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9253">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9254">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9254">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9255">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9255">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9256">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9256">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9257">Nom de la valeur: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9257">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9258">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9258">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9259">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9259">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationsiteredirect"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9287">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9287">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-how-in-page-navigations-to-unconfigured-sites-behave-when-started-from-internet-explorer-mode-pages"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9288">Spécifier le comportement des navigations «sur la page» vers des sites non configurés lors du démarrage à partir des pages du mode Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9288">Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9289">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9289">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9290">sur Windows depuis la version81 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9290">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9291">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9291">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9292">Une navigation «entre les pages» est lancée à partir d'un lien, d'un script ou d'un formulaire de la page active.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9292">An "in-page" navigation is started from a link, a script, or a form on the current page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9293">Il peut également s'agir d'une redirection côté serveur d'une tentative de navigation «entre les pages» précédente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9293">It can also be a server-side redirect of a previous "in-page" navigation attempt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9294">À l’inverse, un utilisateur peut démarrer une navigation qui n'est pas «entre les pages» et qui est indépendante de la page active de plusieurs façons en utilisant les contrôles du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9294">Conversely, a user can start a navigation that isn't "in-page" that's independent of the current page in several ways by using the browser controls.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9295">Par exemple, à l'aide de la barre d'adresses, du bouton précédent ou d'un lien favori.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9295">For example, using the address bar, the back button, or a favorite link.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9296">Ce paramètre vous permet de spécifier si les navigations à partir de pages chargées en mode Internet Explorer sur des sites non configurés (qui ne sont pas configurés dans la liste de sites en mode Entreprise) basculent vers MicrosoftEdge ou restent en mode Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9296">This setting lets you specify whether navigations from pages loaded in Internet Explorer mode to unconfigured sites (that are not configured in the Enterprise Mode Site List) switch back to Microsoft Edge or remain in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9297">Ce paramètre fonctionne conjointement avec: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) défini sur «IEMode» et [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) avec une liste comportant au moins une entrée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9297">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9298">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, seuls les sites configurés pour s'ouvrir en mode Internet Explorer s'ouvrent dans ce mode.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9298">If you disable or don't configure this policy, only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9299">Les sites non configurés pour être ouverts en mode Internet Explorer sont redirigés vers MicrosoftEdge. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9299">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9300">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur « Default », seuls les sites configurés pour être ouverts en mode Internet Explorer s'ouvrent dans ce mode.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9300">If you set this policy to 'Default', only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9301">Les sites non configurés pour être ouverts en mode Internet Explorer sont redirigés vers MicrosoftEdge. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9301">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9302">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur « AutomaticNavigationsOnly », vous bénéficiez de l'expérience par défaut, mais toutes les navigations automatiques (par exemple, les redirections 302) vers des sites non configurés restent en mode Internet Explorer. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9302">If you set this policy to 'AutomaticNavigationsOnly', you get the default experience except that all automatic navigations (such as 302 redirects) to unconfigured sites will be kept in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9303">Si vous configurez cette stratégie sur « AllInPageNavigations », toutes les navigations depuis les pages chargées en mode IE vers des sites non configurés restent en mode Internet Explorer (le moins recommandé). </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9303">If you set this policy to 'AllInPageNavigations', all navigations from pages loaded in IE mode to unconfigured sites are kept in Internet Explorer mode (Least Recommended).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9304">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur le mode Internet Explorer, consultez la page [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9304">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9305">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9305">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9306">Default (0) = Par défaut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9306">Default (0) = Default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9307">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1)=Conserver les navigations automatiques en mode Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9307">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Keep only automatic navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9308">AllInPageNavigations (2)=Conserver toutes les navigations en page en mode Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9308">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Keep all in-page navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9309">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9309">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9310">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9310">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9311">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9311">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9312">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9312">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9313">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9313">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9314">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9314">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9315">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9315">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9316">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9316">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9317">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9317">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9318">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9318">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9319">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: spécifier le comportement des navigations «sur la page» vers des sites non configurés lors du démarrage à partir des pages du mode Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9319">GP name: Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9320">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9320">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9321">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9321">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9322">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9322">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9323">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9323">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9324">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9324">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9325">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9325">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9326">Nom de la valeur: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9326">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9327">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9327">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9328">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9328">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationtestingallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9330">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9330">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-internet-explorer-mode-testing"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9331">Autoriser le test du mode InternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9331">Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9332">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9332">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9333">Sur Windows depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9333">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9334">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9334">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9335">Cette stratégie permet aux utilisateurs de tester les applications en mode Internet Explorer en ouvrant l’onglet mode Internet Explorer dans Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9335">This policy allows users to test applications in Internet Explorer mode by opening an Internet Explorer mode tab in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9336">Les utilisateurs peuvent le faire dans le menu «Autres Outils» en sélectionnant «Ouvrir les sites en mode Internet Explorer».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9336">Users can do so from within the "More tools" menu by selecting 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9337">Par ailleurs, les utilisateurs peuvent tester leurs applications dans un navigateur moderne sans supprimer les applications de la liste des sites à l’aide de l’option «Ouvrir les sites en mode Edge».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9337">Additionally, users can test their applications in a modern browser without removing applications from the site list using the option 'Open sites in Edge mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9338">Ce paramètre fonctionne conjointement avec: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) est défini sur «IEMode».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9338">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9339">Si vous activez cette stratégie, l’option «Ouvrir les sites en mode Internet Explorer» est visible sous «Autres outils».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9339">If you enable this policy, the option to 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode' will be visible under "More tools".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9340">Les utilisateurs peuvent afficher leurs sites en mode Internet Explorer dans cet onglet. Une autre option servant à «Ouvrir les sites en mode Edge» apparaît également sous «Autres outils» pour permettre le test des sites dans un navigateur moderne sans les supprimer de la liste des sites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9340">Users can view their sites in Internet Explorer mode on this tab. Another option to 'Open sites in Edge mode' will also be visible under "More tools" to help testing sites in a modern browser without removing them from the site list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9341">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas voir les options «Ouvrir dans le mode Internet Explorer» et «Ouvrir en mode Edge» sous le menu «Autres outils».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9341">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can't see the options 'Open in Internet Explorer mode' and 'Open in Edge mode' under "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9342">Toutefois, les utilisateurs peuvent configurer ces options avec l’indicateur --ie-mode-test.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9342">However, users can configure these options with the --ie-mode-test flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9343">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9343">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9344">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9344">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9345">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9345">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9346">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9346">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9347">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9347">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9348">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9348">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9349">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9349">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9350">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9350">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9351">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9351">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9352">Nom de la stratégie: autoriser le test du mode InternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9352">GP name: Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9353">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9353">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9354">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9354">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9355">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9355">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9356">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9356">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9357">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9357">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9358">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9358">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9359">Nom de la valeur: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9359">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9360">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9360">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9361">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9361">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```
