  ### <a name="intranetredirectbehavior"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9363">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9363">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>

  #### <a name="intranet-redirection-behavior"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9364">Comportement de la redirection intranet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9364">Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9365">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9365">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9366">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 88 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9366">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9367">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9367">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9368">Cette stratégie configure le comportement pour la redirection intranet via les vérifications d’interception DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9368">This policy configures behavior for intranet redirection via DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9369">Les vérifications tentent de découvrir si le navigateur se trouve derrière un proxy qui redirige les noms d’hôtes inconnus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9369">The checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9370">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, le navigateur utilisera le comportement par défaut des vérifications d’interception DNS et des suggestions de redirection intranet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9370">If this policy isn't configured, the browser will use the default behavior of DNS interception checks and intranet redirect suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9371">Dans M88, elles sont activées par défaut, mais elles seront désactivées par défaut dans la prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9371">In M88, they are enabled by default but will be disabled by default in the future release.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9372">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) est une stratégie associée à celle-ci qui peut également désactiver les vérifications d’interception DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9372">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) is a related policy that might also disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9373">Cependant, cette stratégie est une version plus flexible qui pourrait contrôler séparément les barres d’information de redirection intranet et pourrait être étendue à l’avenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9373">However, this policy is a more flexible version which might separately control intranet redirection infobars and might be expanded in the future.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9374">Si [DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) ou cette stratégie effectue une demande de désactivation des vérifications d’interception, les vérifications sont désactivées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9374">If either [DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) or this policy make a request to disable interception checks, the checks will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9375">Si les vérifications d’interception DNS sont désactivées par cette stratégie mais que [GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar) est activé, les requêtes de mots uniques entraînent toujours des navigations intranet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9375">If DNS interception checks are disabled by this policy but [GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar) is enabled, single word queries will still result in intranet navigations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9376">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9376">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9377">Par défaut(0)=utiliser le comportement par défaut du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9377">Default (0) = Use default browser behavior.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9378">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar(1)=désactiver les vérifications d’interception DNS et les barres d’information «http://intranetsite/».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9378">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar (1) = Disable DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9379">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar(2)=désactiver les vérifications d’interception DNS; autoriser les barres d’information «http://intranetsite/».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9379">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (2) = Disable DNS interception checks; allow did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9380">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar(3)=autorise les vérifications d’interception DNS et les barres d’information «http://intranetsite/».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9380">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (3) = Allow DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9381">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9381">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9382">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9382">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9383">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9383">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9384">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9384">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9385">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9385">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9386">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9386">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9387">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9387">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9388">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9388">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9389">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9389">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9390">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9390">GP unique name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9391">Nom de la stratégie: comportement de la redirection intranet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9391">GP name: Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9392">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9392">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9393">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9393">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9394">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9394">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9395">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9395">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9396">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9396">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9397">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9397">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9398">Nom de la valeur: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9398">Value Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9399">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9399">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9400">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9400">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9401">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9401">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9402">Nom clé de la préférence: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9402">Preference Key Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9403">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9403">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="isolateorigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9405">IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9405">IsolateOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-site-isolation-for-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9406">Activer l’isolation de site pour des origines spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9406">Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9407">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9407">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9408">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9408">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9409">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9409">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9410">Spécifiez les origines à exécuter dans une isolation, dans leur propre processus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9410">Specify origins to run in isolation, in their own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9411">Cette stratégie isole également les origines nommées par sous-domaine. Par exemple, la définition de https://contoso.com/ provoque l'isolation de https://foo.contoso.com/ dans le cadre du site https://contoso.com/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9411">This policy also isolates origins named by subdomains - for example, specifying https://contoso.com/ will cause https://foo.contoso.com/ to be isolated as part of the https://contoso.com/ site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9412">Si la stratégie est activée, chacune des origines nommées dans une liste séparée par des virgules s'exécute dans son propre processus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9412">If the policy is enabled, each of the named origins in a comma-separated list will run in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9413">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les fonctionnalités «IsolateOrigins» et «SitePerProcess» sont désactivées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9413">If you disable this policy, then both the 'IsolateOrigins' and 'SitePerProcess' features are disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9414">Les utilisateurs peuvent toujours activer la stratégie «IsolateOrigins» manuellement, via les indicateurs de ligne de commande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9414">Users can still enable 'IsolateOrigins' policy manually, via command line flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9415">Si vous ne configurez pas la stratégie, l'utilisateur peut modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9415">If you don't configure the policy, the user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9416">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9416">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9417">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9417">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9418">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9418">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9419">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9419">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9420">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9420">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9421">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9421">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9422">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9422">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9423">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9423">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9424">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9424">GP unique name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9425">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer l’isolation de site pour des origines spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9425">GP name: Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9426">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9426">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9427">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9427">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9428">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9428">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9429">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9429">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9430">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9430">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9431">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9431">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9432">Nom de la valeur: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9432">Value Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9433">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9433">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9434">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9434">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9435">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9435">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9436">Nom clé de la préférence: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9436">Preference Key Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9437">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9437">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/</string>
```

  ### <a name="localprovidersenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9439">LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9439">LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-suggestions-from-local-providers"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9440">Autoriser les suggestions des fournisseurs de services locaux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9440">Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9441">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9441">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9442">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9442">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9443">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9443">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9444">Autoriser les suggestions des fournisseurs de suggestion sur l’appareil (fournisseurs locaux), comme par exemple, les favoris et l’historique de navigation, dans la barre d’adresse de MicrosoftEdge et la liste de suggestions automatiques.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9444">Allow suggestions from suggestion providers on the device (local providers), for example, Favorites and Browsing History, in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9445">Si vous activez cette stratégie, des suggestions provenant de fournisseurs locaux sont utilisées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9445">If you enable this policy, suggestions from local providers are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9446">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les suggestions des fournisseurs locaux ne sont jamais utilisées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9446">If you disable this policy, suggestions from local providers are never used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9447">Les suggestions de l’historique local et des favoris locaux n’apparaissent pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9447">Local history and local favorites suggestions will not appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9448">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les suggestions des fournisseurs locaux sont autorisées, mais l’utilisateur peut modifier ce paramètre à l’aide du bouton bascule.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9448">If you do not configure this policy, suggestions from local providers are allowed but the user can change that using the settings toggle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9449">Certaines fonctionnalités ne sont pas disponibles si une stratégie de désactivation de cette fonctionnalité a été appliquée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9449">Note that some features may not be available if a policy to disable this feature has been applied.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9450">Par exemple, les suggestions d’historique de navigation ne sont pas disponibles si vous activez la stratégie [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9450">For example, Browsing History suggestions will not be available if you enable the [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9451">Cette stratégie nécessite un redémarrage du navigateur pour finaliser l’application.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9451">This policy requires a browser restart to finish applying.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9452">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9452">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9453">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9453">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9454">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9454">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9455">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9455">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9456">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9456">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9457">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9457">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9458">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9458">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9459">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9459">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9460">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9460">GP unique name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9461">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les suggestions des fournisseurs de services locaux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9461">GP name: Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9462">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9462">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9463">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9463">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9464">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9464">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9465">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9465">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9466">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9466">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9467">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9467">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9468">Nom de la valeur: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9468">Value Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9469">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9469">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9470">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9470">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9471">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9471">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9472">Nom clé de la préférence: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9472">Preference Key Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9473">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9473">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="managedconfigurationperorigin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9475">ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9475">ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>

  #### <a name="sets-managed-configuration-values-for-websites-to-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9476">Définit des valeurs de configuration gérées pour des sites web avec des origines spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9476">Sets managed configuration values for websites to specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9477">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9477">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9478">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version 90 ou ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9478">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9479">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9479">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9480">La définition de cette stratégie définit la valeur de retour de l’API de configuration gérée pour une origine donnée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9480">Setting this policy defines the return value of Managed Configuration API for given origin.</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9481">L’API de configuration gérée est une configuration clé-valeur accessible via l’appel javascript navigator.device.getManagedConfiguration().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9481">Managed Configuration API is a key-value configuration that can be accessed via navigator.device.getManagedConfiguration() javascript call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9482">Cette API est uniquement disponible pour les origines qui correspondent aux applications web installées de force via [WebAppInstallForceList](#webappinstallforcelist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9482">This API is only available to origins which correspond to force-installed web applications via [WebAppInstallForceList](#webappinstallforcelist).</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9483">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9483">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9484">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9484">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9485">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9485">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9486">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9486">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9487">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9487">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9488">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9488">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9489">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9489">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9490">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9490">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9491">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe : ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9491">GP unique name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9492">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : définit des valeurs de configuration gérées pour des sites web avec des origines spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9492">GP name: Sets managed configuration values for websites to specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9493">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9493">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9494">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9494">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9495">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9495">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9496">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9496">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9497">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9497">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9498">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9498">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9499">Nom de la valeur : ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9499">Value Name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9500">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9500">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9501">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9501">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin = [
  {
    "managed_configuration_hash": "asd891jedasd12ue9h", 
    "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json", 
    "origin": "https://www.contoso.com"
  }, 
  {
    "managed_configuration_hash": "djio12easd89u12aws", 
    "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json", 
    "origin": "https://www.example.com"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9502">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9502">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin = [{"managed_configuration_hash": "asd891jedasd12ue9h", "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json", "origin": "https://www.contoso.com"}, {"managed_configuration_hash": "djio12easd89u12aws", "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json", "origin": "https://www.example.com"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9503">Informations et paramètres Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9503">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9504">Nom clé de la préférence : ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9504">Preference Key Name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9505">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9505">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>managed_configuration_hash</key>
    <string>asd891jedasd12ue9h</string>
    <key>managed_configuration_url</key>
    <string>https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json</string>
    <key>origin</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>managed_configuration_hash</key>
    <string>djio12easd89u12aws</string>
    <key>managed_configuration_url</key>
    <string>https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json</string>
    <key>origin</key>
    <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="managedfavorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9507">ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9507">ManagedFavorites</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9508">Configurer les favoris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9508">Configure favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9509">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9509">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9510">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9510">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9511">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9511">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9512">Configure la liste des favoris gérés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9512">Configures a list of managed favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9513">La stratégie crée une liste de favoris.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9513">The policy creates a list of favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9514">Chaque favori contient les clés «nom» et «URL», qui contiennent le nom du favori et sa cible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9514">Each favorite contains the keys "name" and "url," which hold the favorite's name and its target.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9515">Vous pouvez configurer un sous-dossier en définissant un favori sans clé «URL», mais avec une clé supplémentaire «enfants» qui contient une liste de favoris définie ci-dessus (certains peuvent être de nouveau des dossiers).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9515">You can configure a subfolder by defining a favorites without an "url" key but with an additional "children" key that contains a list of favorites as defined above (some of which may be folders again).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9516">MicrosoftEdge modifie les URL incomplètes comme si elles étaient envoyées par le biais de la barre d'adresses, par exemple, «microsoft.com» devient «https://microsoft.com/». </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9516">Microsoft Edge amends incomplete URLs as if they were submitted via the Address Bar, for example "microsoft.com" becomes "https://microsoft.com/".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9517">Ces favoris sont placés dans un dossier qui ne peut pas être modifié par l'utilisateur (mais l'utilisateur peut choisir de le masquer dans la barre des favoris).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9517">These favorites are placed in a folder that can't be modified by the user (but the user can choose to hide it from the favorites bar).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9518">Par défaut, le nom du dossier est « Favoris gérés », mais vous pouvez le modifier en ajoutant à la liste des favoris un dictionnaire contenant la clé « toplevel_name » avec le nom de dossier souhaité comme valeur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9518">By default the folder name is "Managed favorites" but you can change it by adding to the list of favorites a dictionary containing the key "toplevel_name" with the desired folder name as the value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9519">Les favoris gérés ne sont pas synchronisés avec le compte d'utilisateur et ne peuvent pas être modifiés par des extensions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9519">Managed favorites are not synced to the user account and can't be modified by extensions.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9520">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9520">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9521">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9521">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9522">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9522">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9523">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9523">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9524">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9524">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9525">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9525">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9526">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9526">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9527">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9527">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9528">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9528">GP unique name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9529">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer les favoris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9529">GP name: Configure favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9530">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9530">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9531">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9531">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9532">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9532">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9533">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9533">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9534">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9534">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9535">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9535">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9536">Nom de la valeur: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9536">Value Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9537">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9537">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9538">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9538">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [
  {
    "toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Microsoft", 
    "url": "microsoft.com"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Bing", 
    "url": "bing.com"
  }, 
  {
    "children": [
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", 
        "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"
      }, 
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge", 
        "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"
      }
    ], 
    "name": "Microsoft Edge links"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9539">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9539">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [{"toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"}, {"name": "Microsoft", "url": "microsoft.com"}, {"name": "Bing", "url": "bing.com"}, {"children": [{"name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"}, {"name": "Microsoft Edge", "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"}], "name": "Microsoft Edge links"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9540">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9540">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9541">Nom clé de la préférence: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9541">Preference Key Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9542">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9542">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedFavorites</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>toplevel_name</key>
    <string>My managed favorites folder</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>microsoft.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Bing</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>bing.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>children</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge Insiders</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoftedgeinsider.com</string>
      </dict>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge</string>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft Edge links</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="managedsearchengines"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9544">ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9544">ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-search-engines"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9545">Gérer les moteurs de recherche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9545">Manage Search Engines</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9546">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9546">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9547">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9547">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9548">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9548">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9549">Permet de configurer une liste de 10moteurs de recherche maximum, dont un doit être défini comme moteur de recherche par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9549">Lets you configure a list of up to 10 search engines, one of which must be marked as the default search engine.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9550">Vous ne devez pas spécifier l'encodage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9550">You do not need to specify the encoding.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9551">À partir de MicrosoftEdge80, les paramètres suggest_url et image_search_url sont facultatifs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9551">Starting in Microsoft Edge 80, the suggest_url and image_search_url parameters are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9552">Le paramètre facultatif, image_search_post_params, (qui est constitué de paires de noms/valeurs séparés par des virgules) est disponible à partir de MicrosoftEdge80.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9552">The optional parameter, image_search_post_params (consists of comma-separated name/value pairs), is available starting in Microsoft Edge 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9553">À partir de MicrosoftEdge83, vous pouvez activer la découverte de moteurs de recherche avec le paramètre facultatif allow_search_engine_discovery.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9553">Starting in Microsoft Edge 83, you can enable search engine discovery with the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9554">Ce paramètre doit être le premier élément de la liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9554">This parameter must be the first item in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9555">Si allow_search_engine_discovery n’est pas spécifié, la découverte des moteurs de recherche est désactivée par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9555">If allow_search_engine_discovery is not specified, search engine discovery will be disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9556">À partir de Microsoft Edge84, vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie comme stratégie recommandée pour autoriser la découverte de fournisseurs de recherche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9556">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy to allow search provider discovery.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9557">Vous n’avez pas besoin d’ajouter le paramètre facultatif allow_search_engine_discovery.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9557">You do not need to add the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9558">Si cette stratégie est activée, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas ajouter, supprimer ou modifier un moteur de recherche de la liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9558">If you enable this policy, users can't add, remove, or change any search engine in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9559">Les utilisateurs peuvent définir leur moteur de recherche par défaut sur n'importe quel moteur de recherche de la liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9559">Users can set their default search engine to any search engine in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9560">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent modifier la liste des moteurs de recherche en cas de besoin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9560">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can modify the search engines list as desired.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9561">Si la stratégie [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) est définie, cette stratégie (ManagedSearchEngines) est ignorée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9561">If the [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policy is set, this policy (ManagedSearchEngines) is ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9562">L'utilisateur doit redémarrer son navigateur pour terminer l'application de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9562">The user must restart their browser to finish applying this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9563">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9563">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9564">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9564">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9565">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9565">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9566">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9566">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9567">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9567">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9568">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9568">Dictionary</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9570">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9570">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9571">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9571">GP unique name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9572">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: gérer les moteurs de recherche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9572">GP name: Manage Search Engines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9573">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9573">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9574">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9574">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9575">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9575">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9576">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9576">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9577">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9577">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9578">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9578">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9579">Nom de la valeur: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9579">Value Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9580">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9580">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9581">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9581">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [
  {
    "allow_search_engine_discovery": true
  }, 
  {
    "is_default": true, 
    "keyword": "example1.com", 
    "name": "Example1", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example2.com", 
    "name": "Example2", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "encoding": "UTF-8", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example3.com", 
    "name": "Example3", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "keyword": "example4.com", 
    "name": "Example4", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
  }
]
```


  ### <a name="maxconnectionsperproxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9587">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9587">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>

  #### <a name="maximum-number-of-concurrent-connections-to-the-proxy-server"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9588">Nombre maximal de connexions simultanées au serveur proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9588">Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9589">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9589">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9590">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9590">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9591">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9591">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9592">Indique le nombre maximal de connexions simultanées à un serveur proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9592">Specifies the maximum number of simultaneous connections to the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9593">Certains serveurs proxy ne peuvent pas gérer un grand nombre de connexions simultanées par client. La définition d'une valeur inférieure pour cette règle peut résoudre ce problème. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9593">Some proxy servers can't handle a high number of concurrent connections per client - you can solve this by setting this policy to a lower value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9594">La valeur de cette règle doit être inférieure à 100 et supérieure à 6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9594">The value of this policy should be lower than 100 and higher than 6.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9595">La valeur par défaut est 32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9595">The default value is 32.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9596">Certaines applications Web consomment de nombreuses connexions avec blocage des opérations GET. Par conséquent, le fait de définir une valeur inférieure à 32 peut entraîner des blocages de l'accès réseau du navigateur si un trop grand nombre d'applications Web de ce type sont ouvertes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9596">Some web apps are known to consume many connections with hanging GETs - lowering the maximum connections below 32 may lead to browser networking hangs if too many of these kind of web apps are open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9597">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la valeur par défaut (32) est utilisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9597">If you don't configure this policy, the default value (32) is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9598">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9598">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9599">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9599">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9600">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9600">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9601">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9601">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9602">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9602">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9603">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9603">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9604">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9604">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9605">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9605">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9606">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9606">GP unique name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9607">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: nombre maximal de connexions simultanées au serveur proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9607">GP name: Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9608">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9608">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9609">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9609">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9610">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9610">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9611">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9611">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9612">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9612">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9613">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9613">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9614">Nom de la valeur: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9614">Value Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9615">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9615">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9616">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9616">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000020
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9617">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9617">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9618">Nom clé de la préférence: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9618">Preference Key Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9619">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9619">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>32</integer>
```

  ### <a name="mediaroutercastallowallips"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9621">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9621">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-google-cast-to-connect-to-cast-devices-on-all-ip-addresses"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9622">Autoriser Google Cast à se connecter aux appareils Cast sur toutes les adresses IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9622">Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9623">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9623">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9624">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9624">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9625">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9625">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9626">Activez cette stratégie pour permettre à Google Cast de se connecter à tous les appareils Cast sur toutes les adresses IP, sans se limiter aux adresses privées RFC1918/RFC4193.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9626">Enable this policy to let Google Cast connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses, not just RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9627">Désactivez cette stratégie pour limiter Google Cast aux appareils Cast sur les adresses privées RFC1918/RFC4193.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9627">Disable this policy to restrict Google Cast to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9628">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, Google Cast se connecte aux appareils Cast uniquement sur les adresses privées RFC1918/RFC4193, à moins que vous n'activiez la fonctionnalité CastAllowAllIPs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9628">If you don't configure this policy, Google Cast connects to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses only, unless you enable the CastAllowAllIPs feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9629">Si la stratégie [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) est désactivée, cette stratégie n'a aucun effet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9629">If the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy is disabled, then this policy has no effect.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9630">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9630">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9631">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9631">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9632">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9632">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9633">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9633">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9634">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9634">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9635">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9635">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9636">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9636">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9637">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9637">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9638">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9638">GP unique name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9639">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser Google Cast à se connecter aux appareils Cast sur toutes les adresses IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9639">GP name: Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9640">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9640">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9641">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9641">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9642">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9642">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9643">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9643">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9644">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9644">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9645">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9645">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9646">Nom de la valeur: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9646">Value Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9647">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9647">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9648">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9648">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9649">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9649">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9650">Nom clé de la préférence: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9650">Preference Key Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9651">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9651">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
