  ### <a name="metricsreportingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9653">MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9653">MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-usage-and-crash-related-data-reporting-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9654">Activer les rapports de données liés à l’utilisation et aux incidents (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9654">Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9655">OBSOLÈTE : cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas après MicrosoftEdge88.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9655">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9656">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9656">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9657">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la 77, jusqu’à la 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9657">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9658">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9658">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9659">Cette stratégie n’est plus prise en charge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9659">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9660">Elle est remplacée par [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (pour Windows7, Windows8 et macOS) et Autoriser la télémétrie sur Windows10 ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569) ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9660">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9661">Cette stratégie permet l’envoi à Microsoft de rapports sur l’utilisation et les incidents liés à MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9661">This policy enables reporting of usage and crash-related data about Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9662">Activez cette stratégie pour envoyer des rapports sur l’utilisation et les incidents à Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9662">Enable this policy to send reporting of usage and crash-related data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9663">Désactivez cette stratégie pour ne pas envoyer les données à Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9663">Disable this policy to not send the data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9664">Dans un cas comme dans l’autre, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas modifier ou remplacer le paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9664">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9665">Dans Windows10, MicrosoftEdge prendra par défaut le paramètre de données de diagnostic Windows, si vous ne configurez cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9665">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9666">Si cette stratégie est activée, MicrosoftEdge envoie des données d’utilisation uniquement si le paramètre de données de Diagnostic Windows est défini sur Avancé ou Complet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9666">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will only send usage data if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Enhanced or Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9667">Si cette stratégie est désactivée, MicrosoftEdge n’enverra pas de données d’utilisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9667">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not send usage data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9668">Les données liées aux incidents sont envoyées en fonction du paramètre de données de diagnostic Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9668">Crash-related data is sent based on the Windows Diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9669">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur les paramètres de données de diagnostic Windows, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9669">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9670">Sur Windows7, Windows8 et macOS, cette stratégie contrôle l’envoi des données relatives à l’utilisation et aux incidents.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9670">On Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS, this policy controls sending usage and crash-related data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9671">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge est défini par défaut sur les préférences de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9671">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9672">Pour activer cette stratégie,[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) doit être configuré sur Activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9672">To enable this policy,[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9673">Si [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) ou [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) est défini comme Non configuré ou Désactivé, ces données ne sont pas envoyées à Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9673">If [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) or [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9674">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise inscrites pour la gestion des appareils ou des instances macOS gérées via la Gestion des périphériques mobiles ou jointes à un domaine via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9674">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9675">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9675">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9676">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9676">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9677">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9677">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9678">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9678">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9679">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9679">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9680">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9680">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9681">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9681">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9682">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9682">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9683">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9683">GP unique name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9684">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : activer les rapports de données d’utilisation et d’incident (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9684">GP name: Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9685">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9685">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9686">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9686">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9687">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9687">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9688">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9688">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9689">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9689">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9690">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9690">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9691">Nom de la valeur: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9691">Value Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9692">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9692">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9693">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9693">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9694">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9694">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9695">Nom clé de la préférence: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9695">Preference Key Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9696">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9696">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="nativewindowocclusionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9698">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9698">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-native-window-occlusion-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9699">Activer l’occlusion de fenêtre native (supprimé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9699">Enable Native Window Occlusion (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9700">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9700">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9701">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9701">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9702">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9702">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9703">Sur Windows depuis la version84 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9703">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9704">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9704">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9705">Cette stratégie est déconseillée, utilisez la stratégie «[WindowOcclusionEnabled](#windowocclusionenabled)» à la place.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9705">This policy is deprecated, use the '[WindowOcclusionEnabled](#windowocclusionenabled)' policy instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9706">Elle ne fonctionnera pas dans Microsoft Edge version 92.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9706">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 92.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9707">Active l’occlusion de fenêtre native dans Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9707">Enables native window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9708">Si vous activez ce paramètre pour réduire la consommation du processeur et d’énergie, MicrosoftEdge détecte quand une fenêtre est couverte par d’autres fenêtres et suspend les pixels de peinture.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9708">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9709">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre, MicrosoftEdge ne détectera pas les fenêtres couvertes par d’autres fenêtres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9709">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9710">Si cette stratégie n’est pas définie, la détection de l’occlusion sera activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9710">If this policy is left not set, occlusion detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9711">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9711">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9712">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9712">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9713">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9713">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9714">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9714">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9715">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9715">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9716">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9716">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9717">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9717">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9718">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9718">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9719">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9719">GP unique name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9720">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer l’occlusion de fenêtre native (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9720">GP name: Enable Native Window Occlusion (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9721">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9721">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9722">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9722">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9723">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9723">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9724">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9724">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9725">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9725">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9726">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9726">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9727">Nom de la valeur: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9727">Value Name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9728">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9728">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9729">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9729">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9731">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9731">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-a-timeout-for-delay-of-tab-navigation-for-the-enterprise-mode-site-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9732">Définition d’un délai d’expiration pour la navigation à l’onglet de la liste des sites en mode entreprise</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9732">Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9733">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9733">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9734">Sur Windows depuis la version84 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9734">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9735">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9735">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9736">Vous permet de spécifier un délai d’expiration (en secondes) pour les onglets Microsoft Edge en attente de navigation jusqu’à ce que le navigateur ait téléchargé la liste initiale des sites de mode entreprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9736">Allows you to set a timeout, in seconds, for Microsoft Edge tabs waiting to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9737">Ce paramètre fonctionne conjointement avec: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) défini sur «IEMode», [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) avec une liste comportant au moins une entrée et [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) défini sur «Toutes les navigations éligibles» (1).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9737">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry and [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) is set to "All eligible navigations" (1).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9738">Les onglets n’attendent pas plus longtemps que ce délai pour la liste des sites en mode entreprise à télécharger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9738">Tabs will not wait longer than this timeout for the Enterprise Mode Site List to download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9739">Si le navigateur n’a pas terminé de télécharger la liste des sites en mode entreprise à l’expiration du délai d’expiration, les onglets Microsoft Edge continueront à se déplacer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9739">If the browser has not finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List when the timeout expires, Microsoft Edge tabs will continue navigating anyway.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9740">La valeur du délai d’expiration ne doit pas excéder 20 secondes et pas moins de 1 seconde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9740">The value of the timeout should be no greater than 20 seconds and no fewer than 1 second.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9741">Si vous configurez le délai d’expiration dans cette stratégie sur une valeur supérieure à la valeur par défaut de 2 secondes, une barre d’informations est affichée à l’utilisateur après 2 secondes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9741">If you set the timeout in this policy to a value greater than the default of 2 seconds, an information bar is shown to the user after 2 seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9742">La barre d’informations contient un bouton qui permet à l’utilisateur de quitter l’attente de la fin du téléchargement de la liste de sites en mode entreprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9742">The information bar contains a button that allows the user to quit waiting for the Enterprise Mode Site List download to complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9743">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le délai d’expiration par défaut de 2 secondes est utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9743">If you don't configure this policy, the default timeout of 2 seconds is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9744">Cette valeur par défaut est susceptible d’être modifiée à l’avenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9744">This default is subject to change in the future.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9745">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9745">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9746">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9746">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9747">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9747">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9748">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9748">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9749">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9749">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9750">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9750">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9751">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9751">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9752">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9752">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9753">Nom unique GP: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9753">GP unique name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9754">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définition d’un délai d’expiration pour la navigation dans les onglets de la liste des sites en entreprise</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9754">GP name: Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9755">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9755">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9756">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9756">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9757">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9757">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9758">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9758">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9759">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9759">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9760">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9760">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9761">Nom de la valeur: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9761">Value Name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9762">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9762">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9763">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9763">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x0000000a
```

  ### <a name="networkpredictionoptions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9765">NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9765">NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-network-prediction"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9766">Activer la prédiction réseau</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9766">Enable network prediction</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9767">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9767">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9768">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9768">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9769">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9769">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9770">Active la prédiction réseau dans Google Chrome et empêche les utilisateurs de modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9770">Enables network prediction and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9771">Cela contrôle la prélecture des DNS, ainsi que la préconnexion et le préchargement TCP et SSL des pages Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9771">This controls DNS prefetching, TCP and SSL preconnection, and prerendering of web pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9772">Si vous ne configurez pas cette règle, la prédiction réseau est activée, mais les utilisateurs peuvent la modifier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9772">If you don't configure this policy, network prediction is enabled but the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9773">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9773">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9774">NetworkPredictionAlways (0)=Prédire les actions réseau sur toute connexion réseau</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9774">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = Predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9775">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = Non pris en charge, l’option «Prédire les actions réseau sur toute connexion réseau» (0) est appliquée si cette valeur est utilisée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9775">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = Not supported, if this value is used it will be treated as if 'Predict network actions on any network connection' (0) was set</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9776">NetworkPredictionNever (2)=Ne prédire les actions réseau sur aucune connexion réseau</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9776">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = Don't predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9777">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9777">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9778">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9778">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9779">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9779">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9780">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9780">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9781">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9781">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9782">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9782">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9783">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9783">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9784">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9784">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9785">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9785">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9786">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9786">GP unique name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9787">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la prédiction réseau</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9787">GP name: Enable network prediction</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9788">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9788">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9789">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9789">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9790">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9790">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9791">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9791">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9792">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9792">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9793">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9793">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9794">Nom de la valeur: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9794">Value Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9795">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9795">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9796">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9796">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9797">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9797">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9798">Nom clé de la préférence: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9798">Preference Key Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9799">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9799">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="nonremovableprofileenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9801">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9801">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-whether-a-user-always-has-a-default-profile-automatically-signed-in-with-their-work-or-school-account"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9802">Configurer la connexion automatique du profil par défaut de l’utilisateur avec son compte professionnel ou scolaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9802">Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9803">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9803">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9804">sur Windows depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9804">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9805">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9805">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9806">Cette stratégie détermine si un utilisateur peut supprimer le profil MicrosoftEdge connecté automatiquement dans le compte professionnel ou scolaire d'un utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9806">This policy determines if a user can remove the Microsoft Edge profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9807">Si vous activez cette stratégie, un profil impossible à supprimer est créé avec le compte professionnel ou scolaire de l'utilisateur sous Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9807">If you enable this policy, a non-removable profile will be created with the user's work or school account on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9808">Ce profil ne peut pas être déconnecté ni supprimé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9808">This profile can't be signed out or removed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9809">Le profil ne sera pas amovible uniquement si le profil est signé avec un compte local ou un compte AzureAD qui correspond au compte de signature du système d’exploitation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9809">The profile will be non-removable only if profile is signed-in with either on-premises account or Azure AD account that matches OS sign-in account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9810">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou ne la configurez pas, le profil connecté automatiquement avec le compte professionnel ou scolaire d'un utilisateur sous Windows peut être déconnecté ou supprimé par l'utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9810">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account on Windows can be signed out or removed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9811">Si vous souhaitez configurer la connexion du navigateur, utilisez la stratégie [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9811">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9812">Cette stratégie est disponible uniquement sur les instances de Windows qui sont jointes à un domaine Microsoft ActiveDirectory, des instances de Windows10 Professionnel ou Entreprise qui sont inscrites pour la gestion des appareils.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9812">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9813">À partir de Microsoft Edge89, s’il existe un profil local avec synchronisation désactivée et que l’ordinateur est joint de manière hybride, il va mettre à niveau automatiquement le profil local vers le profil AzureAD et le rendre non amovible au lieu de créer un profil AzureAD non amovible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9813">From Microsoft Edge 89 onwards, if there is an existing on-premises profile with sync disabled and machine is hybrid joined, it will auto-upgrade the on-premises profile to Azure AD profile and make it non-removable instead of creating a new non-removable Azure AD profile.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9814">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9814">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9815">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9815">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9816">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9816">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9817">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9817">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9818">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9818">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9819">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9819">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9820">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9820">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9821">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9821">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9822">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9822">GP unique name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9823">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la connexion automatique du profil par défaut de l’utilisateur avec son compte professionnel ou scolaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9823">GP name: Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9824">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9824">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9825">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9825">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9826">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9826">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9827">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9827">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9828">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9828">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9829">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9829">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9830">Nom de la valeur: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9830">Value Name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9831">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9831">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9832">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9832">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="overridesecurityrestrictionsoninsecureorigin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9834">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9834">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-where-security-restrictions-on-insecure-origins-apply"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9835">Contrôler l’application des restrictions de sécurité aux origines non sécurisées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9835">Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9836">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9836">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9837">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9837">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9838">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9838">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9839">Spécifie la liste des origines (URL) ou des modèles de nom d'hôte (tels que «\*.contoso.com») pour lesquels des restrictions de sécurité ne s'appliquent pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9839">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "\*.contoso.com") for which security restrictions on insecure origins don't apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9840">Cette stratégie vous permet de spécifier des origines autorisées pour les applications héritées qui ne peuvent pas déployer TLS ni définir de serveur de gestion intermédiaire pour le développement web interne afin que les développeurs puissent tester les fonctions nécessitant des contextes de sécurité sans devoir déployer TLS sur le serveur de gestion intermédiaire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9840">This policy lets you specify allowed origins for legacy applications that can't deploy TLS or set up a staging server for internal web development so that developers can test out features requiring secure contexts without having to deploy TLS on the staging server.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9841">Cette stratégie empêche également l'origine d'être étiquetée « Non sécurisé » dans l'omnibox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9841">This policy also prevents the origin from being labeled "Not Secure" in the omnibox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9842">La définition d'une liste d'URL dans cette stratégie a le même effet que la définition de l'indicateur de ligne de commande «--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure» dans une liste d'URL identiques séparées par des virgules.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9842">Setting a list of URLs in this policy has the same effect as setting the command-line flag '--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure' to a comma-separated list of the same URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9843">Si vous activez cette stratégie, elle remplace l'indicateur de ligne de commande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9843">If you enable this policy, it overrides the command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9844">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur les contextes de sécurité, consultez https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9844">For more information on secure contexts, see https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9845">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9845">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9846">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9846">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9847">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9847">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9848">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9848">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9849">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9849">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9850">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9850">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9851">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9851">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9852">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9852">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9853">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9853">GP unique name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9854">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: contrôler l'application des restrictions de sécurité aux origines non sécurisées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9854">GP name: Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9855">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9855">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9856">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9856">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9857">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9857">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9858">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9858">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9859">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9859">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9860">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9860">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9861">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9861">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9862">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9862">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9863">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9863">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\1 = "http://testserver.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\2 = "*.contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9864">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9864">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9865">Nom clé de la préférence: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9865">Preference Key Name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9866">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9866">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>http://testserver.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>*.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="paymentmethodqueryenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9868">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9868">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-websites-to-query-for-available-payment-methods"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9869">Autoriser les sites web à vérifier les modes de paiement disponibles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9869">Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9870">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9870">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9871">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9871">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9872">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9872">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9873">Permet de déterminer si les sites web peuvent vérifier si l'utilisateur a enregistré des modes de paiement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9873">Allows you to set whether websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9874">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les sites web qui utilisent les API PaymentRequest.canMakePayment ou PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument seront informés qu'aucun mode de paiement n'est disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9874">If you disable this policy, websites that use PaymentRequest.canMakePayment or PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API will be informed that no payment methods are available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9875">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la définissez pas, les sites web peuvent vérifier si les modes de paiement de l'utilisateur sont enregistrés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9875">If you enable this policy or don't set this policy, websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9876">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9876">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9877">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9877">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9878">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9878">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9879">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9879">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9880">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9880">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9881">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9881">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9882">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9882">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9883">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9883">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9884">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9884">GP unique name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9885">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les sites web à vérifier les modes de paiement disponibles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9885">GP name: Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9886">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9886">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9887">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9887">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9888">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9888">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9889">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9889">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9890">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9890">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9891">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9891">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9892">Nom de la valeur: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9892">Value Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9893">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9893">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9894">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9894">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9895">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9895">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9896">Nom clé de la préférence: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9896">Preference Key Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9897">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9897">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="personalizationreportingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9899">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9899">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-personalization-of-microsoft-services-by-sending-browsing-and-browser-related-data-to-microsoft"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9900">Autoriser la personnalisation des services Microsoft en envoyant des données de navigation et de navigateur à Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9900">Allow personalization of Microsoft services by sending browsing and browser-related data to Microsoft</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9901">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9901">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9902">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9902">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9903">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9903">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9904">Cette stratégie empêche Microsoft de collecter l’historique de navigation Microsoft Edge d’un utilisateur, les collections et favoris, les données d’utilisation du navigateur et la saisie comme dans la barre d’adresses à utiliser pour personnaliser les publicités, la recherche, les actualités, Microsoft Edge et d’autres services Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9904">This policy prevents Microsoft from collecting a user's Microsoft Edge browsing history, favorites & collections, browser usage data and typing like in the address bar to be used for personalizing advertising, search, news, Microsoft Edge and other Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9905">Ce paramètre n'est pas disponible pour les comptes enfants ou les comptes d'entreprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9905">This setting is not available for child accounts or enterprise accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9906">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas modifier ou remplacer le paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9906">If you disable this policy, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9907">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, MicrosoftEdge sera par défaut la préférence de l'utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9907">If this policy is enabled or not configured, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9908">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9908">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9909">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9909">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9910">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9910">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9911">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9911">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9912">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9912">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9913">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9913">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9914">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9914">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9915">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9915">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9916">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9916">GP unique name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9917">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : autoriser la personnalisation des services Microsoft en envoyant des données de navigation et de navigateur à Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9917">GP name: Allow personalization of Microsoft services by sending browsing and browser-related data to Microsoft</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9918">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9918">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9919">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9919">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9920">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9920">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9921">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9921">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9922">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9922">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9923">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9923">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9924">Nom de la valeur: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9924">Value Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9925">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9925">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9926">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9926">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9927">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9927">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9928">Nom clé de la préférence: PersonalizationReportingEnabled </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9928">Preference Key Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9929">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9929">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="pinningwizardallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9931">PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9931">PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-pin-to-taskbar-wizard"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9932">Autoriser l’Assistant Épingler à la barre des tâches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9932">Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9933">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9933">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9934">sur Windows depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9934">On Windows since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9935">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9935">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9936">MicrosoftEdge utilise l'Assistant Épingler à la barre des tâches pour aider les utilisateurs à épingler les sites suggérés dans la barre des tâches.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9936">Microsoft Edge uses the Pin to taskbar wizard to help users pin suggested sites to the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9937">La fonctionnalité d'Assistant Épingler à la barre des tâches est activée par défaut et accessible par l'utilisateur via le menu Paramètres et plus. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9937">The Pin to taskbar wizard feature is enabled by default and accessible to the user through the Settings and more menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9938">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, les utilisateurs peuvent appeler l'Assistant Épingler à la barre des tâches à partir du menu Paramètres et plus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9938">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can call the Pin to taskbar wizard from the Settings and More menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9939">L'Assistant peut également être appelé via le lancement d'un protocole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9939">The wizard can also be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9940">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, l'Assistant Épingler à la barre des tâches est désactivé dans le menu et ne peut pas être appelé via le lancement d'un protocole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9940">If you disable this policy, the Pin to taskbar wizard is disabled in the menu and cannot be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9941">Les paramètres utilisateur permettant d'activer ou de désactiver l'Assistant Épingler à la barre des tâches ne sont pas disponibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9941">User settings to enable or disable the Pin to taskbar wizard aren't available.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9942">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9942">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9943">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9943">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9944">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9944">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9945">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9945">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9946">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9946">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9947">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9947">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9948">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9948">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9949">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9949">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9950">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9950">GP unique name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9951">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l'Assistant Épingler à la barre des tâches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9951">GP name: Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9952">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9952">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9953">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9953">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9954">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9954">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9955">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9955">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9956">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9956">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9957">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9957">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9958">Nom de la valeur: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9958">Value Name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9959">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9959">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9960">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9960">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```
