  ### <a name="proactiveauthenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9962">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9962">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-proactive-authentication-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9963">Activer l’authentification proactive (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9963">Enable Proactive Authentication (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9964">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9964">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9965">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9965">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9966">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9966">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9967">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9967">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9968">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9968">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9969">Cette stratégie est déconseillée, car elle ne fonctionne pas indépendamment de la connexion du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9969">This policy is deprecated because it does not work independently of browser sign in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9970">Elle ne fonctionne pas dans la version91 de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9970">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9971">Si vous souhaitez configurer la connexion du navigateur, utilisez la stratégie [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9971">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9972">Vous permet de configurer l’activation de l’authentification proactive dans Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9972">Lets you configure whether to turn on Proactive Authentication in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9973">Si vous activez cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge tente de s’authentifier en toute transparence sur les sites Web et services à l’aide du compte connecté au navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9973">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to seamlessly authenticate to websites and services using the account which is signed-in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9974">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge ne tente pas d’authentifier auprès de sites Web ou services à l’aide de l’authentification unique (SSO).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9974">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge does not try to authenticate with websites or services using single sign-on (SSO).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9975">Les expériences authentifiées comme la nouvelle page de l’onglet entreprise nouveau ne fonctionneront pas (par exemple, les documents Office récents et recommandés ne seront pas disponibles).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9975">Authenticated experiences like the Enterprise New Tab Page will not work (e.g. recent and recommended Office documents will not be available).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9976">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, l'authentification proactive est activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9976">If you don't configure this policy, Proactive Authentication is turned on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9977">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9977">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9978">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9978">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9979">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9979">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9980">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9980">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9981">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9981">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9982">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9982">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9983">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9983">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9984">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9984">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9985">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9985">GP unique name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9986">Nom de la stratégie de protection: activer l’authentification proactive (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9986">GP name: Enable Proactive Authentication (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9987">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9987">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9988">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9988">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9989">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9989">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9990">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9990">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9991">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9991">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9992">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9992">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9993">Nom de la valeur: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9993">Value Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9994">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9994">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-9995">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-9995">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="promotionaltabsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10000">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10000">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-full-tab-promotional-content"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10001">Activer le contenu promotionnel dans les onglets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10001">Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10002">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10002">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10003">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10003">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10004">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10004">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10005">Contrôler la présentation de contenu pédagogique ou promotionnel dans des onglets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10005">Control the presentation of full-tab promotional or educational content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10006">Ce paramètre contrôle la présentation des pages d'accueil qui aident les utilisateurs à se connecter à MicrosoftEdge, à choisir leur navigateur par défaut ou à en savoir plus sur les fonctionnalités du produit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10006">This setting controls the presentation of welcome pages that help users sign into Microsoft Edge, choose their default browser, or learn about product features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10007">Si vous activez cette stratégie (définie sur true) ou si vous ne la configurez pas, MicrosoftEdge peut afficher le contenu dans des onglets pour fournir des informations sur le produit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10007">If you enable this policy (set it true) or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge can show full-tab content to users to provide product information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10008">Si vous désactivez (définissez sur false) cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge ne peut pas afficher le contenu dans des onglets aux utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10008">If you disable (set to false) this policy, Microsoft Edge can't show full-tab content to users.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10009">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10009">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10010">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10010">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10011">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10011">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10012">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10012">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10013">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10013">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10014">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10014">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10015">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10015">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10016">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10016">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10017">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10017">GP unique name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10018">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer le contenu promotionnel dans les onglets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10018">GP name: Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10019">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10019">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10020">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10020">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10021">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10021">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10022">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10022">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10023">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10023">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10024">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10024">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10025">Nom de la valeur: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10025">Value Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10026">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10026">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10027">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10027">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10028">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10028">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10029">Nom clé de la préférence: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10029">Preference Key Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10030">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10030">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="promptfordownloadlocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10032">PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10032">PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="ask-where-to-save-downloaded-files"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10033">Demander où enregistrer les fichiers téléchargés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10033">Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10034">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10034">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10035">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10035">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10036">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10036">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10037">Indiquez si vous souhaitez demander où un fichier doit être enregistré avant de le télécharger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10037">Set whether to ask where to save a file before downloading it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10038">Si vous activez cette stratégie, l’utilisateur est interrogé sur l’emplacement d’enregistrement d’un fichier avant chaque téléchargement. Si vous ne la configurez pas, les fichiers sont enregistrés automatiquement dans l’emplacement par défaut, sans demande préalable à l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10038">If you enable this policy, the user is asked where to save each file before downloading; if you don't configure it, files are saved automatically to the default location, without asking the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10039">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, l’utilisateur peut modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10039">If you don't configure this policy, the user will be able to change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10040">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10040">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10041">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10041">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10042">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10042">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10043">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10043">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10044">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10044">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10045">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10045">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10046">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10046">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10047">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10047">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10048">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10048">GP unique name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10049">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: demander où enregistrer les fichiers téléchargés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10049">GP name: Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10050">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10050">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10051">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10051">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10052">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10052">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10053">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10053">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10054">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10054">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10055">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10055">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10056">Nom de la valeur: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10056">Value Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10057">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10057">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10058">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10058">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10059">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10059">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10060">Nom clé de la préférence: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10060">Preference Key Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10061">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10061">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="quicallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10063">QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10063">QuicAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-quic-protocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10064">Autoriser le protocole QUIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10064">Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10065">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10065">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10066">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10066">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10067">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10067">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10068">Permet d’utiliser le protocole QUIC dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10068">Allows use of the QUIC protocol in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10069">Si cette stratégie n’est pas activée ou si elle n’est pas configurée, l'utilisation du protocole QUIC est autorisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10069">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the QUIC protocol is allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10070">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, l'utilisation du protocole QUIC n'est pas autorisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10070">If you disable this policy, the QUIC protocol is blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10071">QUIC est un protocole réseau de couche de transport qui permet d’améliorer les performances des applications web utilisant actuellement TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10071">QUIC is a transport layer network protocol that can improve performance of web applications that currently use TCP.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10072">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10072">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10073">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10073">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10074">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10074">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10075">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10075">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10076">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10076">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10077">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10077">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10078">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10078">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10079">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10079">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10080">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10080">GP unique name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10081">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser le protocole QUIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10081">GP name: Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10082">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10082">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10083">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10083">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10084">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10084">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10085">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10085">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10086">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10086">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10087">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10087">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10088">Nom de la valeur: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10088">Value Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10089">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10089">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10090">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10090">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10091">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10091">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10092">Nom clé de la préférence: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10092">Preference Key Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10093">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10093">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="quickviewofficefilesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10095">QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10095">QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-quickview-office-files-capability-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10096">Gérer les fonctionnalités de fichiers QuickView Office dans MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10096">Manage QuickView Office files capability in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10097">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10097">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10098">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version 90 ou ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10098">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10099">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10099">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10100">Vous permet de définir si les utilisateurs peuvent afficher des fichiers Office sur le web qui ne sont pas sur OneDrive ou SharePoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10100">Allows you to set whether users can view Office files on the web that aren't on OneDrive or SharePoint.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10101">(par exemple : le documents Word, les présentations PowerPoint et les feuilles de calcul Excel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10101">(For example: Word documents, PowerPoint presentations, and Excel spreadsheets)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10102">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, ces fichiers peuvent être visualisés dans Microsoft Edge à l’aide de la visionneuse Office au lieu de les télécharger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10102">If you enable or don't configure this policy, these files can be viewed in Microsoft Edge using Office Viewer instead of downloading the files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10103">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, ces fichiers sont téléchargés pour l’affichage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10103">If you disable this policy, these files will be downloaded to be viewed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10104">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10104">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10105">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10105">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10106">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10106">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10107">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10107">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10108">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10108">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10109">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10109">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10110">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10110">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10111">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10111">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10112">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe : QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10112">GP unique name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10113">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : gérer la fonctionnalité de fichiers QuickView Office dans Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10113">GP name: Manage QuickView Office files capability in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10114">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10114">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10115">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10115">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10116">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10116">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10117">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10117">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10118">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10118">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10119">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10119">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10120">Nom de la valeur : QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10120">Value Name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10121">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10121">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10122">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10122">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10123">Informations et paramètres Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10123">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10124">Nom clé de la préférence : QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10124">Preference Key Name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10125">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10125">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerpreventbhoinstall"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10127">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10127">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-install-of-the-bho-to-redirect-incompatible-sites-from-internet-explorer-to-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10128">Empêcher l’installation de l’objet application d'assistance du navigateur pour rediriger les sites incompatibles d’Internet Explorer vers Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10128">Prevent install of the BHO to redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10129">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10129">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10130">Sur Windows depuis la version87 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10130">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10131">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10131">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10132">Ce paramètre vous permet de bloquer l’installation de l’objet application d'assistance du navigateur qui permet de rediriger les sites incompatibles d’Internet Explorer vers Microsoft Edge lorsqu’un navigateur moderne est requis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10132">This setting lets you specify whether to block the install of the Browser Helper Object (BHO) that enables redirecting incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge for sites that require a modern browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10133">Si vous activez cette stratégie, l’objet application d'assistance du navigateur n’est pas installé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10133">If you enable this policy, the BHO will not be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10134">S’il est déjà installé, il sera désinstallé lors de la prochaine mise à jour de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10134">If it is already installed it will be uninstalled on the next Microsoft Edge update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10135">Si cette stratégie est désactivée ou non configurée, l’objet application d'assistance du navigateur est installé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10135">If this policy is not configured or is disabled, the BHO will be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10136">L’objet application d'assistance du navigateur est nécessaire pour qu’une redirection de site incompatible ait lieu, mais la redirection est également conditionnée par [RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode](#redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10136">The BHO is required for incompatible site redirection to occur, however whether redirection occurs or not is also controlled by [RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode](#redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10137">Pour plus d’informations sur cette stratégie, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10137">For more information about this policy see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10138">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10138">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10139">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10139">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10140">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10140">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10141">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10141">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10142">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10142">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10143">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10143">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10144">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10144">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10145">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10145">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10146">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10146">GP unique name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10147">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: empêcher l’installation de l’objet application d'assistance du navigateur pour rediriger les sites incompatibles d’Internet Explorer vers Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10147">GP name: Prevent install of the BHO to redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10148">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10148">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10149">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10149">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10150">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10150">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10151">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10151">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10152">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10152">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10153">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10153">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10154">Nom de la valeur: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10154">Value Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10155">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10155">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10156">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10156">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10158">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10158">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="redirect-incompatible-sites-from-internet-explorer-to-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10159">Rediriger les sites incompatibles d’Internet Explorer vers Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10159">Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10160">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10160">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10161">Sur Windows depuis la version87 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10161">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10162">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10162">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10163">Ce paramètre vous permet de spécifier si Internet Explorer redirige vers Microsoft Edge les utilisateurs qui se rendent sur des sites qui nécessitent un navigateur moderne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10163">This setting lets you specify whether Internet Explorer will redirect navigations to sites that require a modern browser to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10164">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie ou si vous la définissez sur Liste de sites, à partir de M87, InternetExplorer redirige vers MicrosoftEdge les sites qui requièrent un navigateur moderne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10164">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Sitelist', beginning in M87, Internet Explorer will redirect sites that require a modern browser to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10165">Lors de la redirection d’un site d’InternetExplorer vers MicrosoftEdge, l’onglet InternetExplorer qui a commencé le chargement du site est fermé s’il ne dispose pas de contenu antérieur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10165">When a site is redirected from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge, the Internet Explorer tab that began loading that site is closed if it had no prior content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10166">Dans le cas contraire, il redirige vers une page d’aide de Microsoft qui explique pourquoi l’utilisateur a été redirigé vers Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10166">Otherwise, it is navigated to a Microsoft help page explaining why the site was redirected to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10167">Lorsque Microsoft Edge est lancé pour charger un site à partir d’IE, une barre d’informations s’affiche afin d’expliquer à l’utilisateur que le site fonctionne de façon optimale dans un navigateur moderne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10167">When Microsoft Edge is launched to load a site from IE, an information bar is shown to the user explaining that the site works best in a modern browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10168">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur Désactiver, Internet Explorer ne redirige pas le trafic vers Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10168">If you set this policy to 'Disable', Internet Explorer will not redirect any traffic to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10169">Pour plus d’informations sur cette stratégie, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10169">For more information about this policy see  [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10170">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10170">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10171">Disable (0) = désactiver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10171">Disable (0) = Disable</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10172">Sitelist (1) = rediriger les sites sur la base de la liste des sites incompatibles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10172">Sitelist (1) = Redirect sites based on the incompatible sites sitelist</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10173">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10173">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10174">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10174">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10175">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10175">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10176">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10176">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10177">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10177">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10178">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10178">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10179">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10179">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10180">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10180">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10181">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10181">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10182">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10182">GP unique name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10183">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: rediriger les sites incompatibles d’Internet Explorer vers Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10183">GP name: Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10184">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10184">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10185">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10185">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10186">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10186">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10187">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10187">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10188">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10188">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10189">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10189">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10190">Nom de la valeur: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10190">Value Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10191">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10191">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10192">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10192">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="relaunchnotification"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10194">RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10194">RelaunchNotification</span></span>

  #### <a name="notify-a-user-that-a-browser-restart-is-recommended-or-required-for-pending-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10195">Avertir un utilisateur qu’un redémarrage du navigateur est recommandé ou requis pour les mises à jour en attente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10195">Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10196">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10196">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10197">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10197">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10198">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10198">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10199">Informez les utilisateurs qu'ils doivent redémarrer MicrosoftEdge pour appliquer une mise à jour en attente. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10199">Notify users that they need to restart Microsoft Edge to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10200">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge ajoute une icône de recyclage à l'extrême droite de la barre de menus supérieure pour inviter les utilisateurs à redémarrer le navigateur afin d'appliquer la mise à jour.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10200">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge adds a recycle icon at the far right of the top menu bar to prompt users to restart the browser to apply the update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10201">Si vous activez cette stratégie et la définissez sur «Recommended», un avertissement périodique informe les utilisateurs qu'un redémarrage est recommandé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10201">If you enable this policy and set it to 'Recommended', a recurring warning prompts users that a restart is recommended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10202">Les utilisateurs peuvent ignorer cet avertissement et reporter le redémarrage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10202">Users can dismiss this warning and defer the restart.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10203">Si vous définissez la stratégie sur «Required», un avertissement périodique informe les utilisateurs que le navigateur sera redémarré automatiquement dès que la période de notification est passée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10203">If you set the policy to 'Required', a recurring warning prompts users that the browser will be restarted automatically as soon as a notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10204">La période par défaut est de sept jours.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10204">The default period is seven days.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10205">Vous pouvez configurer cette période avec la stratégie [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod). </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10205">You can configure this period with the [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10206">La session de l'utilisateur est restaurée au redémarrage du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10206">The user's session is restored when the browser restarts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10207">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10207">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10208">Recommended (1)=Recommandé : Afficher un avertissement périodique pour l'utilisateur indiquant qu'un redémarrage est recommandé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10208">Recommended (1) = Recommended - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is recommended</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10209">Required (2)=Obligatoire : Afficher un avertissement périodique pour l'utilisateur indiquant qu'un redémarrage est obligatoire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10209">Required (2) = Required - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is required</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10210">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10210">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10211">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10211">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10212">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10212">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10213">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10213">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10214">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10214">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10215">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10215">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10216">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10216">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10217">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10217">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10218">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10218">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10219">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10219">GP unique name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10220">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: avertir un utilisateur qu'un redémarrage du navigateur est recommandé ou requis pour les mises à jour en attente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10220">GP name: Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10221">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10221">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10222">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10222">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10223">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10223">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10224">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10224">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10225">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10225">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10226">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10226">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10227">Nom de la valeur: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10227">Value Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10228">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10228">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10229">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10229">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10230">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10230">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10231">Nom clé de la préférence: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10231">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10232">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10232">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10233">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10233">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="relaunchnotificationperiod"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10234">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10234">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-time-period-for-update-notifications"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10235">Définir la période d’affichage pour les notifications de mise à jour</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10235">Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10236">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10236">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10237">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10237">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10238">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10238">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10239">Vous permet de définir la période, en millisecondes, au cours de laquelle les utilisateurs sont avertis que MicrosoftEdge doit être relancé pour appliquer une mise à jour en attente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10239">Allows you to set the time period, in milliseconds, over which users are notified that Microsoft Edge must be relaunched to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10240">Au cours de cette période, l'utilisateur est informé à plusieurs reprises qu'une mise à jour est nécessaire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10240">Over this time period, the user will be repeatedly informed of the need for an update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10241">Dans MicrosoftEdge, le menu de l'application change pour indiquer qu'un redémarrage est nécessaire une fois qu'un tiers de la période de notification est écoulé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10241">In Microsoft Edge the app menu changes to indicate that a relaunch is needed once one third of the notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10242">Cette notification change de couleur une fois que les deux tiers de la période de notification sont écoulés, puis de nouveau lorsque toute la période de notification est écoulée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10242">This notification changes color once two thirds of the notification period passes, and again once the full notification period has passed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10243">Les notifications supplémentaires activées par la stratégie [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) suivent ce même schéma. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10243">The additional notifications enabled by the [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) policy follow this same schedule.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10244">Si cette valeur n'est pas définie, la période par défaut de 604 800 000 millisecondes (une semaine) est utilisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10244">If not set, the default period of 604800000 milliseconds (one week) is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10245">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10245">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10246">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10246">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10247">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10247">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10248">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10248">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10249">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10249">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10250">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10250">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10251">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10251">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10252">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10252">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10253">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10253">GP unique name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10254">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir la période d’affichage pour les notifications de mise à jour</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10254">GP name: Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10255">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10255">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10256">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10256">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10257">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10257">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10258">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10258">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10259">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10259">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10260">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10260">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10261">Nom de la valeur: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10261">Value Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10262">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10262">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10263">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10263">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x240c8400
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10264">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10264">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10265">Nom clé de la préférence: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10265">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10266">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10266">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>604800000</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10267">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10267">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="renderercodeintegrityenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10268">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10268">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-renderer-code-integrity"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10269">Activer l’intégrité du code du convertisseur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10269">Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10270">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10270">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10271">sur Windows depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10271">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10272">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10272">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10273">Lorsque la stratégie est activée ou qu’elle est désactivée, l’intégrité du code de rendu est activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10273">Setting the policy to Enabled or leaving it unset turns Renderer Code Integrity on.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10274">Définir la stratégie sur Désactivé affecte la sécurité et la stabilité de Microsoft Edge en tant qu’inconnu et le code potentiellement dangereux peut être chargé dans les processus de rendu Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10274">Setting the policy to Disabled has a detrimental effect on Microsoft Edge's security and stability as unknown and potentially hostile code can load inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10275">Désactivez la stratégie uniquement en cas de problèmes de compatibilité avec le logiciel tiers qui doit s’exécuter dans les processus du moteur de rendu de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10275">Only turn off the policy if there are compatibility issues with third-party software that must run inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10276">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10276">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10277">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10277">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10278">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10278">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10279">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10279">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10280">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10280">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10281">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10281">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10282">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10282">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10283">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10283">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10284">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10284">GP unique name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10285">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer l’intégrité du code du convertisseur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10285">GP name: Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10286">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10286">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10287">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10287">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10288">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10288">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10289">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10289">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10290">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10290">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10291">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10291">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10292">Nom de la valeur: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10292">Value Name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10293">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10293">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10294">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10294">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```
