  ### <a name="requireonlinerevocationchecksforlocalanchors"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10296">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10296">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-if-online-ocspcrl-checks-are-required-for-local-trust-anchors"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10297">Spécifier si les vérifications OCSP/CRL en ligne sont requises pour les ancres d’approbation locales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10297">Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10298">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10298">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10299">sur Windows depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10299">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10300">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10300">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10301">Contrôler la nécessité d’effectuer des vérifications de révocation (OCSP/CRL) en ligne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10301">Control whether online revocation checks (OCSP/CRL checks) are required.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10302">Si MicrosoftEdge ne peut pas obtenir d’informations sur l’état de la révocation, ces certificats sont traités comme révoqués («échec»).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10302">If Microsoft Edge can't get revocation status information, these certificates are treated as revoked ("hard-fail").</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10303">Si vous activez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge exécute toujours une vérification de la révocation des certificats de serveur qui sont correctement validés et qui sont signés par des certificats de signature installés localement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10303">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge always performs revocation checking for server certificates that successfully validate and are signed by locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10304">Si cette stratégie n'est pas configurée ou si elle est désactivée, les paramètres de vérification en ligne de la révocation sont utilisés dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10304">If you don't configure or disable this policy, then Microsoft Edge uses the existing online revocation checking settings.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10305">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10305">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10306">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10306">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10307">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10307">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10308">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10308">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10309">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10309">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10310">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10310">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10311">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10311">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10312">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10312">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10313">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10313">GP unique name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10314">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: spécifier si les vérifications OCSP/CRL en ligne sont requises pour les ancres d’approbation locales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10314">GP name: Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10315">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10315">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10316">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10316">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10317">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10317">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10318">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10318">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10319">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10319">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10320">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10320">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10321">Nom de la valeur: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10321">Value Name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10322">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10322">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10323">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10323">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="resolvenavigationerrorsusewebservice"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10325">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10325">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-resolution-of-navigation-errors-using-a-web-service"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10326">Activer la résolution des erreurs de navigation à l’aide d’un service web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10326">Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10327">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10327">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10328">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10328">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10329">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10329">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10330">Autorisez MicrosoftEdge à émettre une connexion sans donnée vers un service web pour sonder les réseaux afin de détecter la connectivité, par exemple dans le cas du réseau Wi-Fi d'un hôtel ou d'un aéroport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10330">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a dataless connection to a web service to probe networks for connectivity in cases like hotel and airport Wi-Fi.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10331">Si vous activez cette stratégie, un service web est utilisé pour les tests de connectivité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10331">If you enable this policy, a web service is used for network connectivity tests.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10332">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge utilise les API natives pour tenter de résoudre les problèmes de connectivité au réseau et de navigation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10332">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses native APIs to try to resolve network connectivity and navigation issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10333">**Remarque**: sauf dans le cas de Windows8 ou des versions ultérieures de Windows, MicrosoftEdge utilise *toujours* les API natives pour résoudre les problèmes de connectivité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10333">**Note**: Except on Windows 8 and later versions of Windows, Microsoft Edge *always* uses native APIs to resolve connectivity issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10334">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge respecte les préférences de l’utilisateur, définies dans Services sur edge://settings/privacy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10334">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10335">De manière spécifique, il existe un bouton bascule **Utiliser un service web pour résoudre les erreurs de navigation** qui peut être activé ou désactivé par l'utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10335">Specifically, there's a **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10336">Sachez que si vous avez activé cette stratégie (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService), le bouton bascule **Utiliser un service web pour résoudre les erreurs de navigation** est activé, mais l'utilisateur n'est pas en mesure de modifier ce paramètre en utilisant le bouton bascule.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10336">Be aware that if you have enabled this policy (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService), the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10337">Si vous avez désactivé cette stratégie, le paramètre the **Utiliser un service web pour résoudre les erreurs de navigation** est désactivé et l'utilisateur n'est pas en mesure de modifier ce paramètre en utilisant le bouton bascule.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10337">If you have disabled this policy, the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10338">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10338">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10339">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10339">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10340">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10340">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10341">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10341">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10342">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10342">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10343">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10343">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10344">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10344">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10345">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10345">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10346">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10346">GP unique name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10347">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la résolution des erreurs de navigation à l'aide d'un service web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10347">GP name: Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10348">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10348">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10349">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10349">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10350">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10350">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10351">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10351">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10352">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10352">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10353">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10353">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10354">Nom de la valeur: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10354">Value Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10355">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10355">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10356">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10356">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10357">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10357">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10358">Nom clé de la préférence: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10358">Preference Key Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10359">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10359">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10360">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10360">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="restrictsignintopattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10361">RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10361">RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-which-accounts-can-be-used-as-microsoft-edge-primary-accounts"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10362">Limiter les comptes qui peuvent être utilisés comme comptes principaux sur MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10362">Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10363">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10363">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10364">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10364">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10365">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10365">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10366">Détermine quels comptes peuvent être configurés comme comptes de navigation principaux sur MicrosoftEdge (par exemple, le compte choisi au moment d'activer la synchronisation).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10366">Determines which accounts can be set as browser primary accounts in Microsoft Edge (the account that is chosen during the Sync opt-in flow).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10367">Le message d'erreur approprié s'affiche et l’utilisateur est bloqué si celui-ci essaie de définir un compte de navigation principal dont l'identifiant ne correspond pas à ce format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10367">If a user tries to configure a browser primary account with a username that doesn't match this pattern, they are blocked and will get the appropriate error message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10368">Vous pouvez configurer cette stratégie pour qu’elle corresponde à plusieurs comptes à l’aide d’une expression régulière de style Perl pour le motif.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10368">You can configure this policy to match multiple accounts using a Perl style regular expression for the pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10369">Notez que les correspondances de motif respectent la casse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10369">Note that pattern matches are case sensitive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10370">Pour plus d’informations sur les règles d’expression régulière utilisées, voir https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10370">For more information about the regular expression rules that are used, refer to https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10371">Si cette stratégie est laissée vide ou n'est pas configurée, l'utilisateur peut utiliser n'importe quel compte comme compte de navigation principal sur MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10371">If you don't configure this policy or leave it blank, users can set any account as a browser primary account in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10372">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10372">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10373">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10373">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10374">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10374">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10375">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10375">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10379">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10379">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10380">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10380">GP unique name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10381">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: limiter les comptes qui peuvent être utilisés comme comptes principaux sur MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10381">GP name: Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10382">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10382">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10383">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10383">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10384">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10384">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10385">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10385">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10386">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10386">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10387">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10387">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10388">Nom de la valeur: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10388">Value Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10389">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10389">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10390">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10390">Example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="roamingprofilelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10395">RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10395">RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-roaming-profile-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10396">Définition du répertoire de profil itinérant</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10396">Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10397">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10397">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10398">Sur Windows depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10398">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10399">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10399">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10400">Configure l’annuaire à utiliser pour stocker la copie itinérante des profils.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10400">Configures the directory to use to store the roaming copy of profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10401">Si vous activez cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge utilise l’annuaire fourni pour stocker une copie itinérante des profils, à partir du moment où vous avez également activé la stratégie de [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10401">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory to store a roaming copy of the profiles, as long as you've also enabled the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10402">Si vous désactivez la stratégie de [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) ou si vous ne la configurez pas, la valeur stockée dans cette stratégie n’est pas utilisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10402">If you disable the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy or don't configure it, the value stored in this policy isn't used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10403">Pour obtenir la liste des variables que vous pouvez utiliser, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10403">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10404">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le chemin d’accès du profil itinérant par défaut est utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10404">If you don't configure this policy, the default roaming profile path is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10405">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10405">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10406">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10406">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10407">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10407">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10408">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10408">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10409">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10409">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10410">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10410">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10411">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10411">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10412">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10412">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10413">Nom unique GP: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10413">GP unique name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10414">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définition du répertoire de profil itinérant</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10414">GP name: Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10415">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10415">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10416">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10416">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10417">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10417">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10418">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10418">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10419">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10419">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10420">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10420">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10421">Nom de la valeur: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10421">Value Name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10422">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10422">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10423">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10423">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${roaming_app_data}\\edge-profile"
```

  ### <a name="roamingprofilesupportenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10425">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10425">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-using-roaming-copies-for-microsoft-edge-profile-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10426">Activer l’utilisation des copies itinérantes pour les données de profil Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10426">Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10427">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10427">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10428">Sur Windows depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10428">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10429">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10429">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10430">Activez cette stratégie pour utiliser les profils itinérants sur Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10430">Enable this policy to use roaming profiles on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10431">Les paramètres stockés dans les profils Microsoft Edge (favoris et préférences) sont également enregistrés dans un fichier stocké dans le dossier de profil utilisateur itinérant (ou l’emplacement spécifié par l’administrateur par le biais de la stratégie de [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10431">The settings stored in Microsoft Edge profiles (favorites and preferences) are also saved to a file stored in the Roaming user profile folder (or the location specified by the administrator through the [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) policy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10432">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, seuls les profils locaux standard sont utilisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10432">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, only the regular local profiles are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10433">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) désactive uniquement la synchronisation cloud et n’a aucun impact sur cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10433">The [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) only disables cloud synchronization and has no impact on this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10434">Voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058) pour plus d’informations sur l’utilisation des profils utilisateur itinérants.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10434">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058) for more information on using roaming user profiles.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10435">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10435">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10436">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10436">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10437">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10437">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10438">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10438">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10439">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10439">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10440">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10440">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10441">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10441">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10442">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10442">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10443">Nom unique GP: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10443">GP unique name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10444">Nom de la stratégie de protection: activer à l’aide de copies itinérantes pour les données de profil Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10444">GP name: Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10445">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10445">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10446">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10446">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10447">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10447">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10448">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10448">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10449">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10449">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10450">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10450">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10451">Nom de la valeur: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10451">Value Name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10452">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10452">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10453">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10453">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="runallflashinallowmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10455">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10455">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="extend-adobe-flash-content-setting-to-all-content-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10456">Étendre le paramètre de contenu Adobe Flash à tout le contenu (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10456">Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10457">OBSOLÈTE: cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas sur les versions ultérieures à Microsoft Edge87.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10457">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10458">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10458">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10459">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 et jusqu’à la version87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10459">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10460">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10460">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10461">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, car Flash n’est plus pris en charge par MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10461">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10462">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la totalité du contenu Adobe Flash incorporé dans les sites web définis de manière à autoriser Adobe Flash dans les paramètres de contenu, que ce soit par l'utilisateur ou par la stratégie d'entreprise, est exécutée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10462">If you enable this policy, all Adobe Flash content embedded in websites that are set to allow Adobe Flash in the content settings -- either by the user or by enterprise policy -- will run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10463">Ceci inclut le contenu provenant d'autres origines et/ou du contenu de petite taille.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10463">This includes content from other origins and/or small content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10464">Pour contrôler les sites web autorisés à exécuter Adobe Flash, consultez les spécifications dans les stratégies [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) et [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls). </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10464">To control which websites are allowed to run Adobe Flash, see the specifications in the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls), and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10465">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, le contenu Adobe Flash provenant d'autres origines (provenant de sites qui ne sont pas spécifiés dans les trois stratégies mentionnées ci-dessus) ou le contenu de petite taille risque d'être bloqué.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10465">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Adobe Flash content from other origins (from sites that aren't specified in the three policies mentioned immediately above) or small content might be blocked.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10466">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10466">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10467">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10467">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10468">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10468">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10469">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10469">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10470">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10470">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10471">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10471">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10472">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10472">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10473">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10473">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10474">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10474">GP unique name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10475">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: étendre le paramètre de contenu Adobe Flash à tout le contenu (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10475">GP name: Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10476">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10476">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10477">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10477">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10478">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10478">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10479">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10479">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10480">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10480">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10481">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10481">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10482">Nom de la valeur: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10482">Value Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10483">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10483">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10484">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10484">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10485">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10485">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10486">Nom clé de la préférence: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10486">Preference Key Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10487">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10487">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="sslerroroverrideallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10489">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10489">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-proceed-from-the-https-warning-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10490">Autoriser les utilisateurs à poursuivre la navigation depuis une page d’avertissement SSL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10490">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10491">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10491">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10492">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10492">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10493">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10493">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10494">MicrosoftEdge affiche une page d'avertissement lorsque les utilisateurs consultent des sites présentant des erreurs SSL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10494">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10495">Si vous activez ou ne configurée par cette stratégie (configuration par défaut), les utilisateurs sont autorisés à poursuivre leur navigation vers la page concernée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10495">If you enable or don't configure (default) this policy, users can click through these warning pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10496">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas poursuivre leur navigation au-delà de la page d'avertissement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10496">If you disable this policy, users are blocked from clicking through any warning page.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10497">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10497">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10498">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10498">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10499">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10499">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10500">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10500">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10501">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10501">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10502">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10502">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10503">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10503">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10504">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10504">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10505">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10505">GP unique name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10506">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les utilisateurs à poursuivre la navigation depuis une page d'avertissement SSL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10506">GP name: Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10507">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10507">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10508">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10508">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10509">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10509">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10510">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10510">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10511">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10511">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10512">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10512">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10513">Nom de la valeur: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10513">Value Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10514">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10514">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10515">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10515">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10516">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10516">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10517">Nom clé de la préférence: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10517">Preference Key Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10518">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10518">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10519">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10519">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sslerroroverrideallowedfororigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10520">SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10520">SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-proceed-from-the-https-warning-page-for-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10521">Autoriser les utilisateurs à poursuivre à partir de la page d’avertissement HTTPS pour des origines spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10521">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page for specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10522">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10522">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10523">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version 90 ou ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10523">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10524">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10524">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10525">MicrosoftEdge affiche une page d'avertissement lorsque les utilisateurs consultent des sites présentant des erreurs SSL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10525">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10526">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas la stratégie [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed,](#sslerroroverrideallowed) cette stratégie ne fait rien.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10526">If you enable or don't configure the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy, this policy does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10527">Si vous désactivez la stratégie [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed,](#sslerroroverrideallowed) la configuration de cette stratégie vous permet de configurer une liste de modèles d’origine pour les sites où les utilisateurs peuvent continuer à cliquer sur les pages d’erreur SSL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10527">If you disable the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy, configuring this policy lets you configure a list of origin patterns for sites where users can continue to click through SSL error pages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10528">Les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas cliquer sur les pages d’erreur SSL sur les origines qui ne se trouve pas dans cette liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10528">Users can't click through SSL error pages on origins that are not on this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10529">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la stratégie [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) s’applique à tous les sites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10529">If you don't configure this policy, the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy applies for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10530">Pour plus d’informations sur les modèles d’origine valides, voir [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10530">For detailed information about valid origin patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10531">\* n’est pas une valeur acceptée pour cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10531">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10532">Cette stratégie ne correspond qu’en fonction de l’origine, de sorte que tout chemin d’accès ou requête dans le modèle d’URL est ignoré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10532">This policy only matches based on origin, so any path or query in the URL pattern is ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10533">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10533">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10534">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10534">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10535">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10535">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10536">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10536">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10537">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10537">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10538">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10538">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10539">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10539">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10540">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10540">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10541">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10541">GP unique name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10542">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les utilisateurs à poursuivre à partir de la page d’avertissement HTTPS pour des origines spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10542">GP name: Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10543">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10543">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10544">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10544">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10545">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10545">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10546">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10546">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10547">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10547">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10548">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10548">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10549">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10549">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10550">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10550">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10551">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10551">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10552">Informations et paramètres Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10552">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10553">Nom clé de la préférence: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10553">Preference Key Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10554">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10554">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10555">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10555">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sslversionmin"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10556">SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10556">SSLVersionMin</span></span>

  #### <a name="minimum-tls-version-enabled-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10557">Version TLS minimale activée (déconseillée)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10557">Minimum TLS version enabled (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10558">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10558">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10559">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10559">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10560">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10560">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10561">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10561">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10562">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10562">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10563">La prise en charge de la suppression de l’avertissement TLS1.0/1.1 sera supprimée de MicrosoftEdge à partir de la version91 (vers le mois de mai2021) et cette stratégie cessera de fonctionner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10563">Support for suppressing the TLS 1.0/1.1 warning will be removed from Microsoft Edge starting in version 91 (around May 2021) and this policy will stop working then.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10564">Définit la version minimale de TLS prise en charge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10564">Sets the minimum supported version of TLS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10565">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, Microsoft Edge affiche une erreur pour TLS 1,0 et TLS 1,1, mais l’utilisateur peut la contourner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10565">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show an error for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1, but the user will be able to bypass it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10566">Si vous activez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge n'utilise pas de versions SSL/TLS antérieures à la version précisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10566">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge won't use any version of SSL/TLS lower than the specified version.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10567">Toute valeur non reconnue sera ignorée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10567">Any unrecognized value is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10568">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10568">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10569">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10569">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10570">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10570">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10571">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10571">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10572">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10572">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10573">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10573">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10574">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10574">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10575">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10575">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10576">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10576">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10577">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10577">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10578">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10578">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10579">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10579">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10580">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10580">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10581">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10581">GP unique name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10582">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : version TLS minimale activée (supprimé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10582">GP name: Minimum TLS version enabled (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10583">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10583">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10584">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10584">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10585">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10585">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10586">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10586">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10587">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10587">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10588">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10588">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10589">Nom de la valeur: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10589">Value Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10590">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10590">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10591">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10591">Example value:</span></span>

```
"tls1"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10592">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10592">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10593">Nom clé de la préférence: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10593">Preference Key Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10594">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10594">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>tls1</string>
```

  ### <a name="savecookiesonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10596">SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10596">SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="save-cookies-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10597">Enregistrer les cookies lors de la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10597">Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10598">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10598">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10599">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10599">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10600">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10600">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10601">Lorsque cette stratégie est activée, le groupe de cookies spécifié est exempt de la suppression lorsque le navigateur se ferme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10601">When this policy is enabled, the specified set of cookies is exempt from deletion when the browser closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10602">Cette stratégie ne s’applique que lorsque:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10602">This policy is only effective when:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10603">L’activation/désactivation de «Cookies et autres données de site» est configurée dans Paramètres/Confidentialité et services/Effacer les données de navigation à la fermeture ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10603">The 'Cookies and other site data' toggle is configured in Settings/Privacy and services/Clear browsing data on close or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10604">La stratégie [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) est activée ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10604">The policy [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) is enabled or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10605">La stratégie [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) est définie sur «Conserver les cookies pendant la durée de la session».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10605">The policy [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) is set to 'Keep cookies for the duration of the session'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10606">Vous pouvez définir une liste de sites sur la base des modèles d’URL dont les cookies seront conservés entre les sessions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10606">You can define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that will have their cookies preserved across sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10607">Remarque: Les utilisateurs peuvent encore modifier la liste des sites de cookies pour ajouter ou supprimer des URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10607">Note: Users can still edit the cookie site list to add or remove URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10608">Toutefois, ils ne peuvent pas supprimer les URL ajoutées par un administrateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10608">However, they can't remove URLs that have been added by an Admin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10609">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la liste de cookies n’est pas supprimée lorsque le navigateur se ferme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10609">If you enable this policy, the list of cookies won't be cleared when the browser closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10610">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur est utilisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10610">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the user's personal configuration is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10611">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10611">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10612">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10612">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10613">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10613">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10614">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10614">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10615">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10615">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10616">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10616">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10617">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10617">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10618">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10618">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10619">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10619">GP unique name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10620">Nom la stratégie de groupe: Enregistrer les cookies lors de la fermeture de MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10620">GP name: Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10621">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10621">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10622">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10622">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10623">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10623">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10624">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10624">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10625">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10625">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10626">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10626">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10627">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10627">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10628">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10628">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10629">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10629">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10630">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10630">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10631">Nom de la clé de préférence: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10631">Preference Key Name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10632">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10632">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
