  ### <a name="savingbrowserhistorydisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10634">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10634">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-saving-browser-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10635">Désactiver l’enregistrement de l’historique du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10635">Disable saving browser history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10636">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10636">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10637">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10637">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10638">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10638">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10639">Désactive l'enregistrement de l'historique du navigateur et empêche les utilisateurs de modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10639">Disables saving browser history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10640">Si cette stratégie est activée, l'historique de navigation n'est pas enregistré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10640">If you enable this policy, browsing history isn't saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10641">Elle désactive également la synchronisation des onglets. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10641">This also disables tab syncing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10642">Si cette stratégie est désactivée ou n'est pas configurée, l'historique de navigation est enregistré.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10642">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, browsing history is saved.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10643">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10643">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10644">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10644">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10645">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10645">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10646">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10646">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10647">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10647">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10648">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10648">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10649">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10649">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10650">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10650">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10651">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10651">GP unique name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10652">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: désactiver l’enregistrement de l’historique du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10652">GP name: Disable saving browser history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10653">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10653">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10654">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10654">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10655">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10655">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10656">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10656">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10657">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10657">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10658">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10658">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10659">Nom de la valeur: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10659">Value Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10660">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10660">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10661">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10661">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10663">Nom clé de la préférence: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10663">Preference Key Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10664">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10664">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="screencaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10666">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10666">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-deny-screen-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10667">Autoriser ou interdire la capture d’écran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10667">Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10668">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10668">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10669">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10669">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10670">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10670">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10671">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou ne la configurez pas, une page web peut utiliser des API de partage d’écran (par exemple, getDisplayMedia() ou l’API d’extension de capture de bureau) pour faire une capture d’écran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10671">If you enable this policy, or don't configure this policy, a web page can use screen-share APIs (for example, getDisplayMedia() or the Desktop Capture extension API) for a screen capture.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10672">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les appels aux API de partage d'écran échoueront.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10672">If you disable this policy, calls to screen-share APIs will fail.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10673">Par exemple, si vous organisez une réunion en ligne sur le web, le partage de vidéo ou d'écran ne fonctionnera pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10673">For example, if you're using a web-based online meeting, video or screen sharing will not work.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10674">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10674">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10675">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10675">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10676">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10676">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10677">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10677">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10678">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10678">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10679">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10679">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10680">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10680">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10681">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10681">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10682">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10682">GP unique name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10683">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser ou interdire la capture d’écran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10683">GP name: Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10684">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10684">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10685">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10685">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10686">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10686">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10687">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10687">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10688">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10688">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10689">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10689">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10690">Nom de la valeur: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10690">Value Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10691">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10691">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10692">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10692">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10693">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10693">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10694">Nom clé de la préférence: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10694">Preference Key Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10695">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10695">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="scrolltotextfragmentenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10697">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10697">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-scrolling-to-text-specified-in-url-fragments"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10698">Activer le défilement jusqu’au texte spécifié dans les fragments d’URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10698">Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10699">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10699">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10700">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10700">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10701">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10701">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10702">Cette fonctionnalité permet aux hyperliens et aux URL de la barre d'adresse de cibler du texte spécifique sur une page web, sur lequel l’utilisateur sera amené à la fin du chargement de la page web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10702">This feature lets hyperlink and address bar URL navigations target specific text on a web page, which will be scrolled to after the web page finishes loading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10703">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le défilement de pages web vers des fragments de texte spécifiques via une URL est activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10703">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10704">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, le défilement de pages web vers des fragments de texte spécifiques via une URL est désactivé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10704">If you disable this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10705">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10705">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10706">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10706">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10707">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10707">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10708">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10708">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10709">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10709">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10710">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10710">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10711">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10711">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10712">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10712">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10713">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10713">GP unique name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10714">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer le défilement jusqu’au texte spécifié dans les fragments d’URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10714">GP name: Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10715">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10715">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10716">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10716">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10717">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10717">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10718">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10718">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10719">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10719">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10720">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10720">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10721">Nom de la valeur: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10721">Value Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10722">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10722">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10723">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10723">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10724">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10724">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10725">Nom clé de la préférence: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10725">Preference Key Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10726">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10726">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="searchsuggestenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10728">SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10728">SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-search-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10729">Activer les suggestions de recherche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10729">Enable search suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10730">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10730">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10731">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10731">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10732">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10732">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10733">Active les suggestions de recherche dans la barre d'adresse de MicrosoftEdge et empêche les utilisateurs de modifier ce paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10733">Enables web search suggestions in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List and prevents users from changing this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10734">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les suggestions de recherche web sont utilisées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10734">If you enable this policy, web search suggestions are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10735">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les suggestions de recherche web ne sont jamais utilisées mais l'historique local et les suggestions de favoris locaux apparaissent toujours.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10735">If you disable this policy, web search suggestions are never used, however local history and local favorites suggestions still appear.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10736">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, ni les caractères tapés, ni les URL visitées ne sont inclus dans la télémétrie vers Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10736">If you disable this policy, neither the typed characters, nor the URLs visited will be included in telemetry to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10737">Si cette règle n'est pas configurée, ce paramètre est activé, mais l'utilisateur est en mesure de le modifier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10737">If this policy is left not set, search suggestions are enabled but the user can change that.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10738">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10738">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10739">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10739">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10740">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10740">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10741">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10741">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10742">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10742">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10743">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10743">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10744">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10744">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10745">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10745">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10746">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10746">GP unique name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10747">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer les suggestions de recherche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10747">GP name: Enable search suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10748">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10748">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10749">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10749">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10750">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10750">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10751">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10751">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10752">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10752">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10753">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10753">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10754">Nom de la valeur: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10754">Value Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10755">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10755">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10756">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10756">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10757">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10757">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10758">Nom clé de la préférence: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10758">Preference Key Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10759">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10759">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="securitykeypermitattestation"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10761">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10761">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>

  #### <a name="websites-or-domains-that-dont-need-permission-to-use-direct-security-key-attestation"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10762">Sites web ou domaines automatiquement autorisés à utiliser l’attestation de clé de sécurité directe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10762">Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10763">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10763">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10764">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10764">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10765">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10765">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10766">Spécifie les sites web et les domaines qui ne nécessitent pas d'autorisation utilisateur explicite lorsque des certificats d'attestation provenant des clés de sécurité sont obligatoires.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10766">Specifies websites and domains that don't need explicit user permission when attestation certificates from security keys are requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10767">En outre, un signal est envoyé à la clé de sécurité indiquant qu'elle peut utiliser l'attestation individuelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10767">Additionally, a signal is sent to the security key indicating that it can use individual attestation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10768">Sans cela, les utilisateurs sont invités chaque fois qu'un site demande une attestation de clés de sécurité. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10768">Without this, users are prompted each time a site requests attestation of security keys.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10769">Les sites (par exemple, https://contoso.com/some/path)) ne correspondent qu'en tant qu'appID U2F.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10769">Sites (like https://contoso.com/some/path) only match as U2F appIDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10770">Les domaines (par exemple, contoso.com) ne correspondent qu'en tant qu'ID RP webauthn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10770">Domains (like contoso.com) only match as webauthn RP IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10771">Pour couvrir à la fois les API U2F et webauthn pour un site donné, vous devez répertorier les domaines et URL appID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10771">To cover both U2F and webauthn APIs for a given site, you need to list both the appID URL and domain.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10772">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10772">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10773">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10773">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10774">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10774">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10775">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10775">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10776">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10776">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10777">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10777">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10778">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10778">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10779">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10779">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10780">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10780">GP unique name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10781">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: sites web ou domaines automatiquement autorisés à utiliser l'attestation de clé de sécurité directe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10781">GP name: Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10782">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10782">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10783">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10783">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10784">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10784">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10785">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10785">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10786">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10786">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10787">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10787">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10788">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10788">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10789">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10789">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10790">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10790">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation\1 = "https://contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10791">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10791">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10792">Nom clé de la préférence: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10792">Preference Key Name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10793">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10793">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
</array>
```

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10797">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10797">Supported versions:</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10799">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10799">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10800">Si vous souhaitez obtenir des instructions sur la configuration optimale de l'expérience pour Internet Explorer, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10800">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10801">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10801">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10802">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10802">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10803">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10803">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10804">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10804">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10807">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10807">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10808">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10808">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10809">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10809">GP unique name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10810">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: envoyer tous les sites intranet vers Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10810">GP name: Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10811">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10811">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10812">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10812">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10813">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10813">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10814">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10814">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10815">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10815">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10816">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10816">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10817">Nom de la valeur: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10817">Value Name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="sendsiteinfotoimproveservices"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10821">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10821">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>

  #### <a name="send-site-information-to-improve-microsoft-services-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10822">Envoyer des informations sur le site pour améliorer les services Microsoft (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10822">Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10823">OBSOLÈTE : cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas après MicrosoftEdge88.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10823">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10824">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10824">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10825">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la 77, jusqu’à la 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10825">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10826">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10826">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10827">Cette stratégie n’est plus prise en charge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10827">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10828">Elle est remplacée par [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (pour Windows7, Windows8 et macOS) et Autoriser la télémétrie sur Windows10 ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569) ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10828">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10829">Cette stratégie permet d'envoyer à Microsoft des informations sur les sites web visités dans MicrosoftEdge afin d'améliorer les services, tels que la recherche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10829">This policy enables sending info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft to improve services like search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10830">Activez cette stratégie pour envoyer à Microsoft des informations sur les sites web visités dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10830">Enable this policy to send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10831">Désactivez cette stratégie pour ne pas envoyer à Microsoft d'informations sur les sites web visités dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10831">Disable this policy to not send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10832">Dans un cas comme dans l’autre, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas modifier ou remplacer le paramètre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10832">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10833">Dans Windows10, MicrosoftEdge prendra par défaut le paramètre de données de diagnostic Windows, si vous ne configurez cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10833">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10834">Si cette stratégie est activée, MicrosoftEdge n'envoie que des informations sur les sites web visités dans MicrosoftEdge si le paramètre Données de diagnostic Windows est défini sur Complet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10834">If this policy is enabled Microsoft Edge will only send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10835">Si cette stratégie est désactivée, MicrosoftEdge n’enverra pas d’informations concernant les sites web visités.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10835">If this policy is disabled Microsoft Edge will not send info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10836">Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur les paramètres de données de diagnostic Windows, rendez-vous sur: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10836">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10837">Sous Windows7, Windows8 et macOS, cette stratégie contrôle l'envoi d'informations sur les sites web visités.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10837">On Windows 7, windows 8, and macOS this policy controls sending info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10838">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge est défini par défaut sur les préférences de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10838">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10839">Pour activer cette stratégie, [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) doit être défini sur Activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10839">To enable this policy, [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10840">Si [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) ou [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) est défini comme Non configuré ou Désactivé, ces données ne sont pas envoyées à Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10840">If [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) or [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10841">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10841">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10842">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10842">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10843">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10843">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10844">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10844">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10845">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10845">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10846">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10846">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10847">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10847">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10848">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10848">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10849">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10849">GP unique name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10850">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : envoyer des informations sur le site pour améliorer les services Microsoft (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10850">GP name: Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10851">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Modèles d'administration/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10851">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10852">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10852">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10853">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10853">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10854">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10854">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10855">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10855">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10856">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10856">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10857">Nom de la valeur: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10857">Value Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10858">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10858">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10859">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10859">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10861">Nom clé de la préférence: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10861">Preference Key Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10862">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10862">Example value:</span></span>

  ### <a name="sensorsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10864">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10864">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-access-to-sensors-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10865">Autoriser l’accès aux capteurs sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10865">Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10866">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10866">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10867">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10867">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10868">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10868">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10869">Déterminer une liste de sites, basée sur des modèles d’URL, qui peuvent accéder et utiliser des capteurs tels que des capteurs de mouvement et de luminosité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10869">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10870">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10870">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10871">Pour les modèles d’URL qui ne correspondent pas à cette stratégie, l’ordre de priorité suivant est utilisé: la stratégie [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) (s’il y a une correspondance), la stratégie [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) (si elle est définie) ou les paramètres personnels de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10871">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10872">Les modèles d’URL définis dans cette stratégie ne peuvent pas entrer en conflit avec ceux configurés dans la stratégie [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10872">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10873">Vous ne pouvez pas autoriser et bloquer une URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10873">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10874">Si vous souhaitez obtenir plus d’informations concernant les modèles d’URL valides, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10874">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10875">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10875">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10876">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10876">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10877">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10877">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10878">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10878">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10879">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10879">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10880">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10880">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10881">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10881">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10882">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10882">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10883">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10883">GP unique name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10884">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser l’accès aux capteurs sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10884">GP name: Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10885">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10885">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10886">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10886">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10887">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10887">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10888">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10888">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10889">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10889">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10890">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10890">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10891">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10891">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10892">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10892">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10893">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10893">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10894">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10894">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10895">Nom clé de préférence: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10895">Preference Key Name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10896">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10896">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="sensorsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10898">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10898">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-access-to-sensors-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10899">Bloquer l’accès aux capteurs sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10899">Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10900">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10900">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10901">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10901">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10902">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10902">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10903">Déterminer une liste de sites, basée sur des modèles d’URL, qui ne peuvent pas accéder aux capteurs tels que les capteurs de mouvement et de luminosité.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10903">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't access sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10904">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10904">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10905">Pour les modèles d’URL qui ne correspondent pas à cette stratégie, l’ordre de priorité suivant est utilisé: la stratégie [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) (s’il existe une correspondance), la stratégie [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) (si définie) ou les paramètres personnels de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10905">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10906">Les modèles d’URL définis dans cette stratégie ne peuvent pas entrer en conflit avec ceux configurés dans la stratégie [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10906">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10907">Vous ne pouvez pas autoriser et bloquer une URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10907">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10908">Si vous souhaitez obtenir plus d’informations concernant les modèles d’URL valides, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10908">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10909">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10909">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10910">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10910">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10911">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10911">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10912">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10912">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10913">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10913">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10914">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10914">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10915">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10915">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10916">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10916">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10917">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10917">GP unique name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10918">Nom de la stratégie: bloquer l’accès aux capteurs sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10918">GP name: Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10919">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10919">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10920">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10920">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10921">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10921">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10922">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10922">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10923">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10923">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10924">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10924">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10925">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10925">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10926">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10926">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10927">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10927">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10928">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10928">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10929">Nom clé de préférence: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10929">Preference Key Name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10930">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10930">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="serialaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10932">SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10932">SerialAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-serial-api-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10933">Autoriser l’API Serial sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10933">Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10934">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10934">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10935">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10935">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10936">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10936">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10937">Déterminer une liste de sites, basée sur des modèles d’URL, qui peuvent demander à l’utilisateur d’accéder à un port série.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10937">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10938">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10938">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10939">Pour les modèles d’URL qui ne correspondent pas à cette stratégie, l’ordre de priorité suivant est utilisé: la stratégie [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) (s’il y a une correspondance), la stratégie [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) (si elle est définie) ou les paramètres personnels de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10939">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10940">Les modèles d’URL définis dans cette stratégie ne peuvent pas entrer en conflit avec ceux configurés dans la stratégie [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10940">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10941">Vous ne pouvez pas autoriser et bloquer une URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10941">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10942">Si vous souhaitez obtenir plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10942">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10943">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10943">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10944">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10944">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10945">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10945">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10946">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10946">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10947">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10947">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10948">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10948">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10949">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10949">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10950">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10950">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10951">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10951">GP unique name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10952">Nom de la stratégie: autoriser l’API Serial sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10952">GP name: Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10953">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10953">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10954">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10954">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10955">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10955">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10956">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10956">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10957">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10957">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10958">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10958">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10959">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10959">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10960">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10960">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10961">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10961">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10962">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10962">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10963">Nom clé de préférence: SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10963">Preference Key Name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10964">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10964">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
