  ### <a name="serialblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10966">SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10966">SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-the-serial-api-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10967">Bloquer l’API Serial sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10967">Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10968">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10968">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10969">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10969">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10970">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10970">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10971">Déterminer une liste de sites, basée sur des modèles d’URL, qui ne peuvent pas demander à l’utilisateur de lui accorder l’accès à un port série.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10971">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10972">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la valeur par défaut globale sera utilisée pour tous les sites à partir de la stratégie [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting), si elle est définie, ou à défaut, à partir de la configuration personnelle de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10972">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10973">Pour les modèles d’URL qui ne correspondent pas à cette stratégie, l’ordre de priorité suivant est utilisé: la stratégie [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) (s’il y a une correspondance), la stratégie [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) (si elle est définie) ou les paramètres personnels de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10973">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10974">Les modèles d’URL dans cette stratégie ne peuvent pas être en conflit avec ceux configurés dans la stratégie [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10974">The URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10975">Vous ne pouvez pas autoriser et bloquer une URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10975">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10976">Si vous souhaitez obtenir plus d’informations sur les modèles d’URL valides, consultez [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10976">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10977">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10977">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10978">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10978">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10979">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10979">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10980">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10980">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10981">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10981">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10982">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10982">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10983">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10983">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10984">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10984">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10985">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10985">GP unique name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10986">Nom de la stratégie: bloquer l’API Serial sur des sites spécifiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10986">GP name: Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10987">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10987">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10988">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10988">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10989">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10989">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10990">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10990">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10991">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10991">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10992">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10992">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10993">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10993">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10994">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10994">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10995">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10995">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10996">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10996">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-10997">Nom clé de préférence: SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-10997">Preference Key Name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  ### <a name="showmicrosoftrewards"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11000">ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11000">ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-microsoft-rewards-experiences"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11001">Afficher les expériences de Microsoft Rewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11001">Show Microsoft Rewards experiences</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11002">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11002">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11003">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 88 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11003">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11004">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11004">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11005">Afficher les notifications et l’expertise de Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11005">Show Microsoft Rewards experience and notifications.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11006">Si vous activez cette stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11006">If you enable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11007">Les utilisateurs de compte Microsoft (à l’exclusion des comptes Azure Active Directory) dans le cadre de la recherche et de gagner des marchés pourront voir l’utilisation de Microsoft Edge dans le profil utilisateur Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11007">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11008">Le paramètre permettant d’activer Microsoft Rewards dans les paramètres MicrosoftEdge sera activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11008">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11009">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11009">If you disable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11010">Les utilisateurs de compte Microsoft (à l’exclusion des comptes Azure AD) dans la recherche et gagner des marchés ne verront pas l’interface utilisateur de Microsoft Edge dans le profil utilisateur Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11010">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will not see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11011">Le paramètre permettant d’activer Microsoft Rewards dans les paramètres Microsoft Edge sera désactivé ou désactivé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11011">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be disabled and toggled off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11012">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11012">If you don't configure this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11013">Les utilisateurs de compte Microsoft (à l’exclusion des comptes Azure Active Directory) dans le cadre de la recherche et de gagner des marchés pourront voir l’utilisation de Microsoft Edge dans le profil utilisateur Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11013">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11014">Le paramètre permettant d’activer Microsoft Rewards dans les paramètres MicrosoftEdge sera activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11014">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11015">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11015">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11016">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11016">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11017">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11017">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11018">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11018">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11019">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11019">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11020">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11020">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11021">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11021">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11022">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11022">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11023">Nom unique de la stratégie de ShowMicrosoftRewards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11023">GP unique name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11024">Nom de la stratégie de protection: afficher les expériences de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11024">GP name: Show Microsoft Rewards experiences</span></span>

  ### <a name="showofficeshortcutinfavoritesbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11038">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11038">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-microsoft-office-shortcut-in-favorites-bar-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11039">Afficher le raccourci MicrosoftOffice dans la barre des favoris (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11039">Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11040">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11040">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11041">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11041">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11042">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11042">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11043">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11043">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11044">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11044">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11045">Cette stratégie ne fonctionnait pas comme prévu en raison de modifications apportées aux besoins opérationnels.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11045">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11046">Therefore it's deprecated and should not be used.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11046">Therefore it's deprecated and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11047">Indique s'il faut inclure un raccourci vers Office.com dans la barre des favoris.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11047">Specifies whether to include a shortcut to Office.com in the favorites bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11048">Pour les utilisateurs connectés à MicrosoftEdge, le raccourci dirige les utilisateurs vers leurs applications et documents Microsoft Office. Si cette stratégie est activée ou si vous ne la configurez pas, les utilisateurs peuvent choisir d'afficher le raccourci en modifiant le bouton bascule dans le menu contextuel de la barre des favoris.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11048">For users signed into Microsoft Edge the shortcut takes users to their Microsoft Office apps and docs. If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to see the shortcut by changing the toggle in the favorites bar context menu.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11049">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, le raccourci n’apparaît pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11049">If you disable this policy, the shortcut isn't shown.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11053">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11053">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11124">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11124">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11125">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11125">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11126">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11126">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11127">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11127">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11128">Nom de la valeur: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11128">Value Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11129">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11129">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11130">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11130">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11131">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11131">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11132">Nom clé de la préférence: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11132">Preference Key Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11133">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11133">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="siteperprocess"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11135">SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11135">SitePerProcess</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-site-isolation-for-every-site"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11136">Activer l’isolation de site pour tous les sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11136">Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11137">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11137">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11138">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11138">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11139">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11139">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11140">La stratégie SitePerProcess peut être employée pour empêcher les utilisateurs de désactiver le comportement par défaut qui isole tous les sites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11140">The 'SitePerProcess' policy can be used to prevent users from opting out of the default behavior of isolating all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11141">Vous pouvez également utiliser la stratégie [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) pour isoler d'autres origines de manière plus précise. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11141">Note that you can also use the [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policy to isolate additional, finer-grained origins.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11142">Si la règle est activée, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas désactiver le comportement par défaut, dans lequel chaque site exécute son propre processus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11142">If you enable this policy, users can't opt out of the default behavior where each site runs in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11143">Si cette règle n'est pas configurée ou si elle est désactivée, les utilisateurs peuvent désactiver l'isolation de sites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11143">If you disable or don't configure this policy, a user can opt out of site isolation.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11144">(Par exemple, en accédant à l'option «Désactiver l'isolation de sites» sur edge://flags.) Le fait de désactiver cette règle, ou de ne pas la configurer, ne désactive pas l'isolation de sites. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11144">(For example, by using "Disable site isolation" entry in edge://flags.)  Disabling the policy or not configuring the policy doesn't turn off Site Isolation.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11145">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11145">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11146">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11146">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11147">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11147">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11148">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11148">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11149">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11149">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11150">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11150">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11151">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11151">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11152">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11152">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11153">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11153">GP unique name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11154">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer l'isolation de site pour tous les sites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11154">GP name: Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11155">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11155">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11156">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11156">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11157">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11157">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11158">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11158">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11159">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11159">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11160">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11160">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11161">Nom de la valeur: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11161">Value Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11162">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11162">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11163">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11163">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11164">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11164">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11165">Nom clé de la préférence: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11165">Preference Key Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11166">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11166">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="smartactionsblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11168">SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11168">SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-smart-actions-for-a-list-of-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11169">Bloquer les actions intelligentes pour une liste de services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11169">Block smart actions for a list of services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11170">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11170">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11171">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 89 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11171">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11172">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11172">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11173">Établir une liste de services spécifiques, tels que les fichiers, qui n’affichent aucune action intelligente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11173">List specific services, such as PDFs, that don't show smart actions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11174">(les actions intelligentes sont des actions telles que «définir» qui sont disponibles dans les menus contextuels complets et mini dans MicrosoftEdge.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11174">(Smart actions are actions like "define" which are available in full and mini context menus in Microsoft Edge.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11175">Si vous activez la stratégie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11175">If you enable the policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11176">l’action intelligente dans le menu contextuel complet et mini sera désactivée pour tous les profils pour les services qui correspondent à la liste donnée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11176">The smart action in the mini and full context menu will be disabled for all profiles for services that match the given list.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11177">Les utilisateurs ne voient pas l’action intelligente dans le menu contextuel mini et complet de la sélection de texte pour les services qui correspondent à la liste donnée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11177">Users will not see the smart action in the mini and full context menu on text selection for services that match the given list.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11178">Dans les paramètres de Microsoft Edge, l’action intelligente dans le menu contextuel mini et complet est désactivée pour les services qui correspondent à la liste donnée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11178">In Microsoft Edge settings, the smart action in the mini and full context menu will be disabled for services that match the given list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11179">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11179">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11180">L’action intelligente dans le menu contextuel entier et mini sera activée pour tous les profils.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11180">The smart action in the mini and full context menu will be enabled for all profiles.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11181">Les utilisateurs voient l’action intelligente dans le menu contextuel mini et complet sur la sélection de texte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11181">Users will see the smart action in the mini and full context menu on text selection.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11182">Dans les paramètres de Microsoft Edge, l’action intelligente dans le menu contextuel mini et complet est activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11182">In Microsoft Edge settings, the smart action in the mini and full context menu will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11183">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11183">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11184">smart_actions_pdf (smart_actions_pdf) = actions intelligentes dans un fichier PDF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11184">smart_actions_pdf (smart_actions_pdf) = Smart actions in PDF</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11185">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11185">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11186">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11186">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11187">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11187">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11188">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11188">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11189">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11189">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11190">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11190">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11191">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11191">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11192">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11192">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11193">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11193">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11194">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11194">GP unique name: SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11195">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : bloquer les actions intelligentes pour une liste de services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11195">GP name: Block smart actions for a list of services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11196">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11196">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11197">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11197">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11198">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11198">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11199">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11199">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11200">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11200">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11201">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11201">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11202">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11202">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11203">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11203">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11204">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11204">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList\1 = "smart_actions_pdf"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11205">Informations et paramètres Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11205">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11206">Nom de la clé de préférence: SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11206">Preference Key Name: SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11207">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11207">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>smart_actions_pdf</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="speechrecognitionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11209">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11209">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-speech-recognition"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11210">Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11210">Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11211">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11211">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11212">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11212">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11213">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11213">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11214">Indiquez si les sites Web peuvent utiliser l’API Web Speech du W3C pour reconnaître la voix de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11214">Set whether websites can use the W3C Web Speech API to recognize speech from the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11215">L’implémentation Microsoft Edge de l’API Web Speech utilise les services cognitifs d’Azure, de sorte que les données vocales quittent l’ordinateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11215">The Microsoft Edge implementation of the Web Speech API uses Azure Cognitive Services, so voice data will leave the machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11216">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les applications Web qui utilisent l’API de reconnaissance vocale Web peuvent utiliser la reconnaissance vocale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11216">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the Web Speech API can use Speech Recognition.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11217">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, la reconnaissance vocale n’est pas disponible via l’API de reconnaissance vocale Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11217">If you disable this policy, Speech Recognition is not available through the Web Speech API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11218">Read more about this feature here: SpeechRecognition API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11218">Read more about this feature here: SpeechRecognition API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11219">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11219">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11227">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11227">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11228">Nom GP: Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11228">GP name: Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11229">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11229">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11230">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11230">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11231">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11231">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11233">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11233">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>

  ### <a name="spellcheckenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11242">SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11242">SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-spellcheck"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11243">Activer la vérification orthographique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11243">Enable spellcheck</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11244">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11244">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11245">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11245">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11246">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11246">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11247">Si cette stratégie est activée ou si elle n’est pas configurée, les utilisateurs peuvent utiliser la vérification orthographique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11247">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the user can use spellcheck.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11248">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, l’utilisateur ne peut pas utiliser la vérification orthographique et les stratégies [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) et [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) sont également désactivées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11248">If you disable this policy, the user can't use spellcheck and the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policies are also disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11249">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11249">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11250">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11250">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11251">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11251">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11252">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11252">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11253">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11253">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11254">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11254">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11255">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11255">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11256">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11256">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11257">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11257">GP unique name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11258">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la vérification orthographique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11258">GP name: Enable spellcheck</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11259">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11259">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11260">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11260">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11261">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11261">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11262">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11262">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11263">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11263">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11264">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11264">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11265">Nom de la valeur: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11265">Value Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11266">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11266">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11267">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11267">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11269">Nom clé de la préférence: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11269">Preference Key Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11270">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11270">Example value:</span></span>

  ### <a name="spellchecklanguage"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11272">SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11272">SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-specific-spellcheck-languages"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11273">Activer des langues spécifiques pour la vérification orthographique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11273">Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11274">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11274">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11275">sur Windows depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11275">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11276">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11276">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11277">Active des langues différentes pour la vérification orthographique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11277">Enables different languages for spellcheck.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11278">Les langues spécifiées qui ne sont pas reconnues sont ignorées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11278">Any language that you specify that isn't recognized is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11279">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la vérification orthographique est activée pour les langues spécifiées, ainsi que pour les langues que l'utilisateur a activées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11279">If you enable this policy, spellcheck is enabled for the languages specified, as well as any languages the user has enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11280">Si vous ne configurez pas ou si vous désactivez cette stratégie, aucune modification n'est apportée aux préférences de vérification orthographique de l'utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11280">If you don't configure or disable this policy, there's no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11281">Si la stratégie [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) est désactivée, cette stratégie n'aura aucun effet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11281">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11282">Si une langue est incluse dans les deux stratégies «SpellcheckLanguage» et [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist), la langue du vérificateur orthographique est activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11282">If a language is included in both the 'SpellcheckLanguage' and the [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11283">Les langues prises en charge sont les suivantes : af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11283">The supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11284">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11284">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11285">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11285">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11286">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11286">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11287">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11287">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11288">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11288">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11289">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11289">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11290">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11290">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11291">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11291">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11292">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11292">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11293">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer des langues spécifiques pour la vérification orthographique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11293">GP name: Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11294">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11294">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11295">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11295">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11296">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11296">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11297">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11297">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11298">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11298">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11299">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11299">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11300">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11300">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11301">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11301">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11302">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11302">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\2 = "es"

```

  ### <a name="spellchecklanguageblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11304">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11304">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-disable-spellcheck-languages"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11305">Forcer la désactivation de langues spécifiques pour la vérification orthographique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11305">Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11306">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11306">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11307">sur Windows depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11307">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11308">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11308">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11309">Désactive de force les langues de la vérification orthographique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11309">Force-disables spellcheck languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11310">Les langues non reconnues dans cette liste seront ignorées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11310">Unrecognized languages in that list will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11311">Si vous activez cette stratégie, la vérification orthographique est désactivée pour les langues spécifiées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11311">If you enable this policy, spellcheck will be disabled for the languages specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11312">L'utilisateur peut toujours activer ou désactiver la vérification orthographique pour les langues qui ne sont pas dans la liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11312">The user can still enable or disable spellcheck for languages not in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11313">Si vous ne définissez pas cette stratégie ou si vous la désactivez, les préférences de la vérification orthographique de l'utilisateur ne sont pas modifiées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11313">If you do not set this policy, or disable it, there will be no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11314">Si la stratégie [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) est désactivée, cette stratégie n'a aucun effet. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11314">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is set to disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11315">Si une langue est incluse, à la fois, dans les stratégies [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) et «SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist», la langue de la vérification orthographique est activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11315">If a language is included in both the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and the 'SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist' policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11316">Les langues actuellement prises en charge sont les suivantes: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11316">The currently supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11317">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11317">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11318">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11318">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11319">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11319">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11320">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11320">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11321">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11321">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11322">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11322">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11323">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11323">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11324">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11324">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11325">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11325">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11326">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: forcer la désactivation de langues spécifiques pour la vérification orthographique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11326">GP name: Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11327">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11327">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11328">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11328">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11329">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11329">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11330">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11330">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11331">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11331">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11332">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11332">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11333">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11333">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11334">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11334">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11335">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11335">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\2 = "es"

```

  ### <a name="strictermixedcontenttreatmentenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11337">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11337">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-stricter-treatment-for-mixed-content-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11338">Activer un traitement plus strict pour le contenu mixte (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11338">Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11339">OBSOLÈTE: Cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas après la version84 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11339">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11340">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11340">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11341">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version 81 jusqu’à la 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11341">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11342">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11342">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11343">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, car elle était destinée uniquement à être un mécanisme à court terme permettant aux entreprises de mettre à jour leur contenu web s’il était jugé incompatible avec un traitement de contenu mixte plus strict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11343">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if it was found to be incompatible with stricter mixed content treatment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11344">Cette stratégie contrôle le traitement du contenu mixte (contenu HTTP dans les sites HTTPS) dans le navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11344">This policy controls the treatment for mixed content (HTTP content in HTTPS sites) in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11345">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur true ou si vous ne la configurez pas, le contenu mixte audio et vidéo est automatiquement mis à jour vers HTTPS (c'est-à-dire que l'URL sera réécrite en tant que HTTPS, sans substitution si la ressource n'est pas disponible via HTTPS) et un avertissement «non sécurisé» s'affiche dans la barre d'URL pour le contenu d'image mixte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11345">If you set this policy to true or not set, audio and video mixed content will be automatically upgraded to HTTPS (that is, the URL will be rewritten as HTTPS, without a fallback if the resource isn't available over HTTPS) and a 'Not Secure' warning will be shown in the URL bar for image mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11346">Si vous définissez la stratégie sur false, les mises à jour automatiques sont désactivées pour l'audio et la vidéo, et aucun avertissement ne s'affiche pour les images.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11346">If you set the policy to false, auto upgrades will be disabled for audio and video, and no warning will be shown for images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11347">Cette stratégie n'affecte pas les autres types de contenu mixte autres que l'audio, la vidéo et les images. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11347">This policy does not affect other types of mixed content other than audio, video, and images.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11348">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11348">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11349">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11349">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11350">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11350">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11351">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11351">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11352">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11352">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11353">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11353">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11354">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11354">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11355">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11355">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11356">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11356">GP unique name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11357">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : activer un traitement plus strict pour le contenu mixte (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11357">GP name: Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11358">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11358">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11359">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11359">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11360">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11360">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11361">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11361">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11362">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11362">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11363">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11363">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11364">Nom de la valeur: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11364">Value Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11365">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11365">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11366">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11366">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11367">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11367">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11368">Nom clé de la préférence: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11368">Preference Key Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11369">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11369">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="suppressunsupportedoswarning"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11371">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11371">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>

  #### <a name="suppress-the-unsupported-os-warning"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11372">Supprimer l’avertissement relatif au système d’exploitation non pris en charge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11372">Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11373">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11373">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11374">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11374">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11375">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11375">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11376">Supprime l'avertissement qui s'affiche lorsque MicrosoftEdge s'exécute sur un ordinateur ou un système d'exploitation qui n'est plus accepté.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11376">Suppresses the warning that appears when Microsoft Edge is running on a computer or operating system that is no longer supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11377">Si cette stratégie est définie sur false ou si elle n'est pas définie, les avertissements s'affichent sur les ordinateurs ou les systèmes d'exploitation non pris en charge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11377">If this policy is false or unset, the warnings will appear on such unsupported computers or operating systems.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11378">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11378">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11379">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11379">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11380">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11380">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11381">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11381">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11382">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11382">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11383">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11383">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11384">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11384">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11385">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11385">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11386">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11386">GP unique name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11387">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: supprimer l'avertissement relatif au système d'exploitation non pris en charge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11387">GP name: Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11388">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11388">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11389">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11389">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11390">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11390">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11391">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11391">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11392">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11392">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11393">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11393">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11394">Nom de la valeur: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11394">Value Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11395">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11395">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11396">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11396">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11397">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11397">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11398">Nom clé de la préférence: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11398">Preference Key Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11399">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11399">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```
