  ### <a name="syncdisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11401">SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11401">SyncDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-synchronization-of-data-using-microsoft-sync-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11402">Désactiver la synchronisation des données à l’aide des services de synchronisation Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11402">Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11403">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11403">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11404">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11404">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11405">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11405">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11406">Désactive la synchronisation des données dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11406">Disables data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11407">Cette stratégie empêche également l'invite de consentement de synchronisation de s’afficher.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11407">This policy also prevents the sync consent prompt from appearing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11408">Cette stratégie désactive uniquement la synchronisation cloud et n’a aucun impact sur la stratégie [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11408">This policy disables cloud synchronization only and has no impact on the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11409">Si vous configurez pas cette stratégie, ou si vous ne la configurez pas de la façon recommandée, les utilisateurs peuvent activer ou désactiver la synchronisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11409">If you don't set this policy or apply it as recommended, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11410">Si vous définissez cette stratégie comme étant obligatoire, les utilisateurs ne pourront pas activer la synchronisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11410">If you apply this policy as mandatory, users will not be able to turn sync on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11411">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11411">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11412">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11412">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11413">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11413">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11414">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11414">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11415">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11415">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11416">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11416">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11417">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11417">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11418">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11418">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11419">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11419">GP unique name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11420">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: désactiver la synchronisation des données à l'aide des services de synchronisation Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11420">GP name: Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11421">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11421">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11422">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11422">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11423">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11423">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11424">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11424">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11425">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11425">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11426">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11426">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11427">Nom de la valeur: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11427">Value Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11428">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11428">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11429">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11429">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11430">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11430">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11431">Nom clé de la préférence: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11431">Preference Key Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11432">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11432">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="synctypeslistdisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11434">SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11434">SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-types-that-are-excluded-from-synchronization"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11435">Configurer la liste des types exclus de la synchronisation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11435">Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11436">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11436">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11437">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version83 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11437">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11438">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11438">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11439">Si vous activez cette stratégie, tous les types de données spécifiés sont exclus de la synchronisation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11439">If you enable this policy all the specified data types will be excluded from synchronization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11440">Cette stratégie peut être utiliser pour limiter le type de données téléchargées vers le service de synchronisation MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11440">This policy can be used to limit the type of data uploaded to the Microsoft Edge synchronization service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11441">Vous pouvez définir l’un des types de données suivants pour cette stratégie: «favoris», «paramètres», «mots de passe», «addressesAndMore», «extensions», «historique», «openTabs» et «Collections».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11441">You can provide one of the following data types for this policy: "favorites", "settings", "passwords", "addressesAndMore", "extensions", "history", "openTabs", and "collections".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11442">Les noms des types de données sont sensibles à la casse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11442">Note that these data type names are case sensitive.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11443">Les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas remplacer les types de données désactivés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11443">Users will not be able to override the disabled data types.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11444">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11444">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11445">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11445">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11446">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11446">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11447">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11447">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11448">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11448">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11449">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11449">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11450">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11450">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11451">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11451">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11452">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11452">GP unique name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11453">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la liste des types exclus de la synchronisation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11453">GP name: Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11454">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11454">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11455">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11455">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11456">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11456">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11457">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11457">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11458">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11458">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11459">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11459">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11460">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11460">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11461">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11461">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11462">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11462">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled\1 = "favorites"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11463">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11463">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11464">Nom clé de la préférence: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11464">Preference Key Name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11465">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11465">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>favorites</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="tls13hardeningforlocalanchorsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11467">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11467">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-a-tls-13-security-feature-for-local-trust-anchors-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11468">Activer une fonctionnalité de sécurité TLS1.3 pour les ancres d’approbation locales (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11468">Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11469">OBSOLÈTE: Cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas après la version85 de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11469">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11470">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11470">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11471">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version81 et jusqu’à la version85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11471">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 85</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11472">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11472">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11473">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, car elle n’a pour but qu’être un mécanisme à court terme pour offrir aux entreprises davantage de temps pour la mise à niveau des proxys affectés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11473">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to upgrade affected proxies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11474">Cette stratégie contrôle une fonctionnalité de sécurité TLS 1.3 qui protège les connexions contre les attaques par déclassement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11474">This policy controls a security feature in TLS 1.3 that protects connections against downgrade attacks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11475">Elle est rétrocompatible et n'affecte pas les connexions à des serveurs ou proxys conformes aux normes TLS 1.2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11475">It is backwards-compatible and will not affect connections to compliant TLS 1.2 servers or proxies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11476">Toutefois, les versions plus anciennes de certains proxys interceptant les paramètres TLS sont incompatibles en raison de défauts d'intégration. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11476">However, older versions of some TLS-intercepting proxies have an implementation flaw which causes them to be incompatible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11477">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, MicrosoftEdge active ces protections de sécurité pour toutes les connexions. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11477">If you enable this policy or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will enable these security protections for all connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11478">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge désactive ces protections de sécurité pour les connexions authentifiées par des certificats de signature installés localement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11478">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will disable these security protections for connections authenticated with locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11479">Ces protections sont toujours activées pour les connexions authentifiées par des certificats de signature reconnus publiquement. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11479">These protections are always enabled for connections authenticated with publicly-trusted CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11480">Cette stratégie peut être utilisée pour tester les proxys concernés et les mettre à jour.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11480">This policy can be used to test for any affected proxies and upgrade them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11481">En principe, les proxys affectés provoqueront un échec de connexion avec le code d'erreur "ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11481">Affected proxies are expected to fail connections with an error code of ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11482">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11482">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11483">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11483">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11484">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11484">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11485">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11485">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11486">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11486">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11487">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11487">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11488">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11488">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11489">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11489">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11490">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11490">GP unique name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11491">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: Activer une fonctionnalité de sécurité TLS1.3 pour les ancres d’approbation locales (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11491">GP name: Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11492">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11492">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11493">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11493">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11494">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11494">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11495">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11495">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11496">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11496">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11497">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11497">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11498">Nom de la valeur: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11498">Value Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11499">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11499">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11500">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11500">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11501">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11501">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11502">Nom clé de la préférence: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11502">Preference Key Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11503">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11503">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="tlsciphersuitedenylist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11505">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11505">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-the-tls-cipher-suites-to-disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11506">Spécifier les suites de chiffrement TLS à désactiver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11506">Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11507">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11507">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11508">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version85 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11508">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11509">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11509">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11510">Configurez la liste des suites de chiffrement désactivées pour les connexions TLS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11510">Configure the list of cipher suites that are disabled for TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11511">Si vous configurez cette stratégie, la liste des suites de chiffrement configurées ne sera pas utilisée lors de l’établissement de connexions TLS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11511">If you configure this policy, the list of configured cipher suites will not be used when establishing TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11512">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le navigateur choisit les suites de chiffrement TLS à utiliser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11512">If you don't configure this policy, the browser will choose which TLS cipher suites to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11513">Les valeurs de la suite de chiffrement à désactiver sont spécifiées en tant que valeurs hexadécimales 16 bits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11513">Cipher suite values to be disabled are specified as 16-bit hexadecimal values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11514">Les valeurs sont affectées par le registre IANA (Internet Assigned Numbers Authority).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11514">The values are assigned by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) registry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11515">La suite de chiffrement TLS 1,3 TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) est nécessaire pour TLS 1,3 et ne peut pas être désactivée par cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11515">The TLS 1.3 cipher suite TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) is required for TLS 1.3 and can't be disabled by this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11516">Cette stratégie n’affecte pas les connexions basées sur QUIC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11516">This policy does not affect QUIC-based connections.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11517">QUIC peut être désactivé par le biais de la stratégie [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11517">QUIC can be turned off via the [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11518">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11518">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11519">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11519">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11520">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11520">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11521">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11521">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11522">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11522">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11523">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11523">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11524">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11524">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11525">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11525">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11526">Nom unique GP: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11526">GP unique name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11527">Nom de la stratégie de protection: spécifier les suites de chiffrement TLS à désactiver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11527">GP name: Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11528">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11528">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11529">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11529">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11530">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11530">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11531">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11531">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11532">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11532">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11533">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11533">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11534">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11534">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11535">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11535">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11536">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11536">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\1 = "0x1303"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\2 = "0xcca8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\3 = "0xcca9"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11537">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11537">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11538">Nom de la clé de préférence: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11538">Preference Key Name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11539">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11539">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>0x1303</string>
  <string>0xcca8</string>
  <string>0xcca9</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="tabfreezingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11541">TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11541">TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-freezing-of-background-tabs-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11542">Autoriser le gel des onglets d’arrière-plan (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11542">Allow freezing of background tabs (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11543">OBSOLÈTE: Cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas après la version 86 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11543">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 86.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11544">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11544">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11545">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la 79, jusqu’à la 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11545">On Windows and macOS since 79, until 86</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11546">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11546">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11547">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, utilisez [Plutôt SleepingTabsEnabled.](#sleepingtabsenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11547">This policy doesn't work, use [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11548">Détermine si MicrosoftEdge peut geler ou non des onglets qui sont en arrière-plan depuis au moins cinq minutes. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11548">Controls whether Microsoft Edge can freeze tabs that are in the background for at least 5 minutes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11549">Le gel des onglets permet de moins solliciter le processeur, la batterie et la mémoire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11549">Tab freezing reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11550">MicrosoftEdge utilise des heuristiques pour ne pas figer les onglets qui exécutent une tâche utile en arrière-plan, comme l'affichage de notifications, la lecture audio et la diffusion d'une vidéo en streaming. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11550">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid freezing tabs that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11551">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les onglets qui s’affichent en arrière-plan pendant au moins 5 minutes peuvent être figés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11551">If you enable or don't configure this policy, tabs that have been in the background for at least 5 minutes might be frozen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11552">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, aucun onglet n’est figé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11552">If you disable this policy, no tabs will be frozen.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11553">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11553">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11554">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11554">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11555">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11555">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11556">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11556">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11557">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11557">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11558">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11558">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11559">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11559">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11560">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11560">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11561">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11561">GP unique name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11562">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : autoriser le gel des onglets d’arrière-plan (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11562">GP name: Allow freezing of background tabs (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11563">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11563">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11564">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11564">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11565">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11565">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11566">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11566">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11567">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11567">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11568">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11568">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11569">Nom de la valeur: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11569">Value Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11570">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11570">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11571">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11571">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11572">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11572">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11573">Nom clé de la préférence: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11573">Preference Key Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11574">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11574">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="targetblankimpliesnoopener"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11576">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11576">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>

  #### <a name="do-not-set-windowopener-for-links-targeting-_blank"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11577">Ne définissez pas window.opener pour les liens ciblant _blank</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11577">Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11578">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11578">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11579">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 88 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11579">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11580">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11580">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11581">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou si vous la laissez non définie, la propriété window.opener est définie sur null, sauf si l’ancrage spécifie rel="opener».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11581">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, the window.opener property is set to null unless the anchor specifies rel="opener".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11582">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les fenêtres popup qui ciblent _blank sont autorisées à accéder (via JavaScript) à la page qui a demandé à ouvrir la fenêtre contextuelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11582">If you disable this policy, popups that target _blank are permitted to access (via JavaScript) the page that requested to open the popup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11583">Cette stratégie sera obsolète dans MicrosoftEdge version95.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11583">This policy will be obsoleted in Microsoft Edge version 95.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11584">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11584">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11585">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11585">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11586">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11586">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11587">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11587">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11588">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11588">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11589">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11589">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11590">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11590">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11591">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11591">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11592">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe : TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11592">GP unique name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11593">Nom de la stratégie de groupe : ne définissez pas window.opener pour les liens ciblant _blank</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11593">GP name: Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11594">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11594">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11595">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11595">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11596">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11596">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11597">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11597">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11598">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11598">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11599">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11599">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11600">Nom de la valeur : TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11600">Value Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11601">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11601">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11602">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11602">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11603">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11603">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11604">Nom de clé de la préférence : TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11604">Preference Key Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>

  ### <a name="taskmanagerendprocessenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11607">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11607">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-ending-processes-in-the-browser-task-manager"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11608">Activer la possibilité de mettre fin aux processus dans le gestionnaire des tâches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11608">Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11609">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11609">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11610">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11610">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11611">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11611">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11612">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent arrêter les processus dans le gestionnaire de tâches du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11612">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can end processes in the Browser task manager.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11613">Si vous la désactivez, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas terminer les processus, et le bouton terminer le processus est désactivé dans le gestionnaire de tâches du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11613">If you disable it, users can't end processes, and the End process button is disabled in the Browser task manager.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11614">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11614">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11615">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11615">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11616">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11616">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11617">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11617">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11618">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11618">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11619">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11619">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11620">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11620">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11621">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11621">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11622">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11622">GP unique name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11623">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la possibilité de mettre fin aux processus dans le gestionnaire des tâches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11623">GP name: Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11624">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11624">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11625">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11625">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11626">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11626">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11627">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11627">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11628">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11628">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11629">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11629">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11630">Nom de la valeur: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11630">Value Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11631">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11631">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11632">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11632">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11633">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11633">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11634">Nom clé de la préférence: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11634">Preference Key Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11635">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11635">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="totalmemorylimitmb"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11637">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11637">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-limit-on-megabytes-of-memory-a-single-microsoft-edge-instance-can-use"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11638">Définir une limite de mémoire en mégaoctets qu’une seule instance de MicrosoftEdge peut utiliser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11638">Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11639">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11639">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11640">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11640">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11641">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11641">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11642">Configure la quantité de mémoire qu'une instance de MicrosoftEdge peut utiliser avant que des onglets ne commencent à être ignorés afin d'économiser de la mémoire. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11642">Configures the amount of memory that a single Microsoft Edge instance can use before tabs start getting discarded to save memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11643">La mémoire utilisée par l’onglet est libérée et l’onglet doit être réactualisé lorsqu’il sera sélectionné.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11643">The memory used by the tab will be freed and the tab will have to be reloaded when switched to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11644">Si vous activez cette stratégie, le navigateur commence à ignorer des onglets pour économiser de la mémoire lorsque la limite est dépassée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11644">If you enable this policy, the browser will start to discard tabs to save memory once the limitation is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11645">Il n'est cependant pas garanti que le navigateur fonctionne toujours en deçà de cette limite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11645">However, there is no guarantee that the browser is always running under the limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11646">Toute valeur inférieure à 1024 est arrondie à ce nombre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11646">Any value under 1024 will be rounded up to 1024.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11647">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le navigateur ne commence à économiser de la mémoire que s'il détecte que la quantité de mémoire physique sur l'ordinateur est faible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11647">If you don't set this policy, the browser will only attempt to save memory when it has detected that the amount of physical memory on its machine is low.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11648">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11648">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11649">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11649">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11650">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11650">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11651">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11651">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11652">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11652">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11653">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11653">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11654">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11654">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11655">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11655">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11656">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11656">GP unique name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11657">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir une limite de mémoire en mégaoctets qu'une seule instance de MicrosoftEdge peut utiliser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11657">GP name: Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11658">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11658">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11659">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11659">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11660">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11660">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11661">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11661">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11662">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11662">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11663">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11663">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11664">Nom de la valeur: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11664">Value Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11665">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11665">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11666">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11666">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000800
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11667">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11667">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11668">Nom clé de la préférence: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11668">Preference Key Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11669">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11669">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2048</integer>
```
