  ### <a name="trackingprevention"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11671">TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11671">TrackingPrevention</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-tracking-of-users-web-browsing-activity"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11672">Bloquer le suivi de l’activité de navigation sur le web des utilisateurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11672">Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11673">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11673">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11674">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version78 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11674">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11675">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11675">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11676">Vous permet de décider de bloquer les sites web effectuant le suivi des activités de navigation des utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11676">Lets you decide whether to block websites from tracking users' web-browsing activity.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11677">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou ne la configurez pas, les utilisateurs peuvent définir leur propre niveau de prévention du suivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11677">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users can set their own level of tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11678">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11678">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11679">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = Désactivé (pas de prévention de suivi)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11679">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = Off (no tracking prevention)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11680">TrackingPreventionBasic (1)=Basique (bloque les suivis malveillants, le contenu et les publicités seront personnalisés)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11680">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = Basic (blocks harmful trackers, content and ads will be personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11681">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2)=Équilibré (bloque les suivis malveillants et les suivis des sites Web que l'utilisateur n'a pas visités ; le contenu et les publicités seront moins personnalisés)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11681">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = Balanced (blocks harmful trackers and trackers from sites user has not visited; content and ads will be less personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11682">TrackingPreventionStrict (3)=Strict (bloque les suivis malveillants et la majorité des suivis de tous les sites ; le contenu et les publicités auront une personnalisation minimale)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11682">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = Strict (blocks harmful trackers and majority of trackers from all sites; content and ads will have minimal personalization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11683">Certaines parties des sites pourront ne pas fonctionner) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11683">Some parts of sites might not work)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11684">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11684">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11685">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11685">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11686">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11686">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11687">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11687">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11688">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11688">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11689">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11689">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11690">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11690">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11691">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11691">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11692">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11692">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11693">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11693">GP unique name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11694">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer le suivi de l'activité de navigation sur le web des utilisateurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11694">GP name: Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11695">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11695">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11696">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11696">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11697">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11697">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11698">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11698">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11699">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11699">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11700">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11700">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11701">Nom de la valeur: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11701">Value Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11702">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11702">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11703">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11703">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11704">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11704">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11705">Nom clé de la préférence: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11705">Preference Key Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11706">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11706">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11707">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11707">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="translateenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11708">TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11708">TranslateEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-translate"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11709">Activer la traduction</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11709">Enable Translate</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11710">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11710">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11711">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11711">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11712">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11712">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11713">Active le service de traduction Microsoft intégré sur MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11713">Enables the integrated Microsoft translation service on Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11714">Si vous activez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge propose à l’utilisateur une fonctionnalité intégrée de traduction, qui s’affiche grâce à un menu déroulant de traduction intégré, le cas échéant, ou une option de traduction disponible dans le menu contextuel que l'utilisateur peut afficher en effectuant un clic droit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11714">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge offers translation functionality to the user by showing an integrated translate flyout when appropriate, and a translate option on the right-click context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11715">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, toutes les fonctionnalités intégrées de traduction sont désactivées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11715">Disable this policy to disable all built-in translate features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11716">Si vous ne configurez pas la stratégie, les utilisateurs peuvent décider d'utiliser ou non la fonctionnalité de traduction.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11716">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to use the translation functionality or not.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11717">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11717">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11718">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11718">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11719">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11719">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11720">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11720">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11721">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11721">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11722">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11722">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11723">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11723">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11724">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11724">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11725">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11725">GP unique name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11726">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la traduction</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11726">GP name: Enable Translate</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11727">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11727">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11728">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (peut être remplacé par les utilisateurs)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11728">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11729">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11729">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11730">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11730">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11731">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11731">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11732">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11732">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11733">Nom de la valeur: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11733">Value Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11734">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11734">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11735">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11735">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11736">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11736">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11737">Nom clé de la préférence: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11737">Preference Key Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11738">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11738">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11739">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11739">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="urlallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11740">URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11740">URLAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-a-list-of-allowed-urls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11741">Définir une liste d’URL autorisées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11741">Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11742">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11742">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11743">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11743">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11744">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11744">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11745">La définition de la stratégie permet d’accéder aux URL répertoriées en tant qu’exceptions à [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11745">Setting the policy provides access to the listed URLs, as exceptions to [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11746">Le format d'un modèle d’URL doit être conforme aux règles stipulées à l'adresse [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11746">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11747">Vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie pour ouvrir des exceptions aux listes rouges restrictives.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11747">You can use this policy to open exceptions to restrictive block lists.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11748">Par exemple, vous pouvez inclure « \* » dans la liste d’adresses url pour bloquer toutes les demandes, puis utiliser cette stratégie pour autoriser l’accès à une liste limitée d’URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11748">For example, you can include '\*' in the block list to block all requests, and then use this policy to allow access to a limited list of URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11749">Vous pouvez utiliser cette stratégie pour ouvrir des exceptions pour certains schémas, sous-domaines d'autres domaines, ports ou chemins d'accès spécifiques.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11749">You can use this policy to open exceptions to certain schemes, subdomains of other domains, ports, or specific paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11750">Le filtre plus spécifique détermine si une URL est bloquée ou autorisée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11750">The most specific filter determines if a URL is blocked or allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11751">La liste verte prévaut sur la liste rouge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11751">The allowed list takes precedence over the block list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11752">Cette stratégie est limitée à 1000 entrées. Les entrées suivantes sont ignorées. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11752">This policy is limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11753">Cette stratégie permet également au navigateur d’appeler automatiquement les applications externes enregistrées comme gestionnaires de protocoles pour des protocoles tels que «tel:» ou «ssh:».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11753">This policy also allows the browser to automatically invoke external applications registered as protocol handlers for protocols like "tel:" or "ssh:".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11754">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, il n'existe aucune exception à la liste rouge dans la stratégie [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11754">If you don't configure this policy, there are no exceptions to the block list in the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11755">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11755">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11756">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11756">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11757">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11757">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11758">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11758">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11759">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11759">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11760">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11760">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11761">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11761">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11762">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11762">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11763">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11763">GP unique name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11764">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir une liste d’URL autorisées</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11764">GP name: Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11765">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11765">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11766">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11766">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11767">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11767">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11768">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11768">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11769">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11769">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11770">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11770">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11771">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11771">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11772">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11772">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11773">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11773">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11774">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11774">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11775">Nom clé de la préférence: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11775">Preference Key Name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11776">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11776">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11777">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11777">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="urlblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11778">URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11778">URLBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-access-to-a-list-of-urls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11779">Bloquer l’accès à une liste d’URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11779">Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11780">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11780">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11781">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11781">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11782">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11782">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11783">Définissez la liste des sites, en fonction des modèles d'URL, qui sont bloqués (les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas les charger).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11783">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked (your users can't load them).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11784">Le format d'un modèle d’URL doit être conforme aux règles stipulées à l'adresse [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11784">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11785">Vous pouvez définir des exceptions dans la stratégie [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11785">You can define exceptions in the [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11786">Ces stratégies sont limitées à 1000 entrées. Les entrées suivantes sont ignorées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11786">These policies are limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11787">Notez qu'il est déconseillé de bloquer les URL internes «edge://\*» car cela peut entraîner des erreurs inattendues.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11787">Note that blocking internal 'edge://\*' URLs isn't recommended - this may lead to unexpected errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11788">Cette stratégie n'empêche pas la mise à jour dynamique de la page par le biais de JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11788">This policy doesn't prevent the page from updating dynamically through JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11789">Par exemple, si vous bloquez «contoso.com/abc», les utilisateurs pourront toujours visiter «contoso.com» et cliquer sur un lien pour accéder à «contoso.com/abc» tant que la page n'a pas été actualisée. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11789">For example, if you block 'contoso.com/abc', users might still be able to visit 'contoso.com' and click on a link to visit 'contoso.com/abc', as long as the page doesn't refresh.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11790">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, aucune URL n'est bloquée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11790">If you don't configure this policy, no URLs are blocked.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11791">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11791">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11792">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11792">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11793">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11793">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11794">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11794">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11795">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11795">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11796">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11796">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11797">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11797">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11798">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11798">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11799">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11799">GP unique name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11800">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: bloquer l’accès à une liste d’URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11800">GP name: Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11801">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11801">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11802">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11802">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11803">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11803">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11804">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11804">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11805">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11805">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11806">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11806">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11807">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11807">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11808">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11808">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11809">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11809">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\3 = "hosting.com/bad_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\6 = "file://*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\7 = "custom_scheme:*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\8 = "*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11810">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11810">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11811">Nom clé de la préférence: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11811">Preference Key Name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11812">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11812">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/bad_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
  <string>file://*</string>
  <string>custom_scheme:*</string>
  <string>*</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="updatepolicyoverride"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11814">UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11814">UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-how-microsoft-edge-update-handles-available-updates-from-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11815">Indique comment MicrosoftEdgeUpdate gère les mises à jour disponibles à partir de MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11815">Specifies how Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates from Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11816">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11816">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11817">sur macOS depuis la version89 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11817">On macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11818">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11818">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11819">Si vous activez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdgeUpdate gère les mises à jour de MicrosoftEdge en fonction de la façon dont vous configurez les options suivantes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11819">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles Microsoft Edge updates according to how you configure the following options:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11820">Mises à jour automatiques sans assistance uniquement: les mises à jour sont appliquées uniquement lorsqu’elles sont détectées par la recherche de mise à jour périodique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11820">Automatic silent updates only: Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11821">Mises à jour manuelles uniquement: les mises à jour sont appliquées uniquement lorsque l’utilisateur exécute une recherche de mise à jour manuelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11821">Manual updates only: Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11822">(Certaines applications n’offrent pas d’interface pour cette option.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11822">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11823">Si vous sélectionnez les mises à jour manuelles, assurez-vous de rechercher périodiquement des mises à jour avec Microsoft AutoUpdate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11823">If you select manual updates, make sure you periodically check for updates by using Microsoft Autoupdate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11824">Si vous n’activez et configurez pas cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdgeUpdate vérifie automatiquement les mises à jour.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11824">If you don't enable and configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Update automatically checks for updates.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11825">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11825">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11826">automatic-silent-only (automatic-silent-only)=les mises à jour sont appliquées uniquement lorsqu’elles sont détectées par la recherche périodique des mises à jour.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11826">automatic-silent-only (automatic-silent-only) = Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11827">manual-only (manual-only) = les mises à jour sont appliquées uniquement lorsque l’utilisateur recherche manuellement des mises à jour.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11827">manual-only (manual-only) = Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11828">(Certaines applications n’offrent pas d’interface pour cette option.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11828">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11829">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11829">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11830">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11830">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11831">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11831">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11832">Peut être recommandée: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11832">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11833">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11833">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11834">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11834">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11835">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11835">String</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11836">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11836">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11837">Nom clé de la préférence: UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11837">Preference Key Name: UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11838">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11838">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>automatic-silent-only</string>
```

  ### <a name="useragentclienthintsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11840">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11840">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-user-agent-client-hints-feature-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11841">Activer la fonctionnalité User-Agent Client Hints (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11841">Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11842">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11842">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11843">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11843">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11844">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11844">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11845">Sur Windows et macOS depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11845">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11846">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11846">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11847">Cette stratégie est déconseillée, car elle a pour but de servir uniquement comme mécanisme à court terme afin d’offrir aux entreprises davantage de temps pour mettre à jour leurs environnements si et quand ils sont détectés comme étant incompatibles avec la fonctionnalité User-Agent Client Hints.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11847">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the User-Agent Client Hints feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11848">Elle ne fonctionne pas dans Microsoft Edge version93.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11848">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 93.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11849">Lorsque la fonctionnalité User-Agent Client Hints est activée, des en-têtes de demande granulaires sont envoyés, ils fournissent des informations sur le navigateur de l’utilisateur (par exemple la version du navigateur) et l’environnement (par exemple l’architecture système).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11849">When enabled the User-Agent Client Hints feature sends granular request headers that provide information about the user browser (for example, the browser version) and environment (for example, the system architecture).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11850">Il s’agit d’une fonctionnalité supplémentaire, mais les nouveaux en-têtes peuvent provoquer des disfonctionnements sur certains sites Web qui restreignent les caractères que les demandes peuvent contenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11850">This is an additive feature, but the new headers may break some websites that restrict the characters that requests may contain.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11851">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la fonctionnalité User-Agent Client Hints est activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11851">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the User-Agent Client Hints feature is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11852">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, cette fonctionnalité n’est pas disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11852">If you disable this policy, this feature is unavailable.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11853">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11853">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11854">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11854">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11855">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11855">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11856">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11856">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11857">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11857">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11858">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11858">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11859">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11859">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11860">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11860">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11861">Nom unique GP : UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11861">GP unique name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11862">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: Activer la fonctionnalité User-Agent Client Hints (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11862">GP name: Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11863">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11863">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11864">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11864">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11865">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11865">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11866">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11866">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11867">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11867">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11868">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11868">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11869">Nom de la valeur : UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11869">Value Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11870">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11870">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11871">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11871">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11872">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11872">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11873">Nom de la clé de préférence: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11873">Preference Key Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11874">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11874">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11875">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11875">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="userdatadir"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11876">UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11876">UserDataDir</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-user-data-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11877">Définir le répertoire de données utilisateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11877">Set the user data directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11878">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11878">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11879">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11879">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11880">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11880">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11881">Définit l’annuaire à utiliser pour stocker les données de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11881">Set the directory to use for storing user data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11882">Si vous activez cette stratégie, MicrosoftEdge utilise le répertoire fourni, que l'utilisateur ait ou non spécifié l'indicateur de ligne de commande "--disk-cache-dir".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11882">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified directory regardless of whether the user has set the '--user-data-dir' command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11883">Si vous n’activez pas cette stratégie, le chemin d’accès du profil par défaut est utilisé, mais l’utilisateur peut le remplacer à l’aide de l’indicateur «--User-Data-dir».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11883">If you don't enable this policy, the default profile path is used, but the user can override it by using the '--user-data-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11884">Les utilisateurs peuvent trouver le répertoire associé au profil sur edge://version/ sous le chemin d’accès du profil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11884">Users can find the directory for the profile at edge://version/ under profile path.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11885">Pour éviter la perte de données ou d'autres erreurs inattendues, ne définissez pas cette stratégie sur le répertoire racine d'un volume ni sur un répertoire utilisé à d'autres fins, car MicrosoftEdge gère son contenu. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11885">To avoid data loss or other errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory that's used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11886">Vous pouvez consulter la liste des variables utilisables sur [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041). </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11886">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11887">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11887">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11888">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11888">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11889">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11889">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11890">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11890">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11891">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11891">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11892">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11892">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11893">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11893">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11894">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11894">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11895">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11895">GP unique name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11896">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir le répertoire de données utilisateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11896">GP name: Set the user data directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11897">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11897">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11898">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11898">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11899">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11899">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11900">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11900">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11901">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11901">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11902">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11902">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11903">Nom de la valeur: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11903">Value Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11904">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11904">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11905">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11905">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${users}/${user_name}/Edge"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11906">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11906">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11907">Nom clé de la préférence: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11907">Preference Key Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11908">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11908">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${users}/${user_name}/Edge</string>
```

  ### <a name="userdatasnapshotretentionlimit"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11910">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11910">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>

  #### <a name="limits-the-number-of-user-data-snapshots-retained-for-use-in-case-of-emergency-rollback"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11911">Limite le nombre de captures instantanées des données utilisateur conservées qui sont utilisées en cas de restauration d’urgence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11911">Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11912">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11912">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11913">Sur Windows depuis la version86 ou ultérieur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11913">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11914">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11914">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11915">Après chaque mise à jour de version importante, MicrosoftEdge créera une capture instantanée des parties des données de navigation de l’utilisateur à utiliser en cas d’urgence ultérieure nécessitant une restauration temporaire de la version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11915">Following each major version update, Microsoft Edge will create a snapshot of parts of the user's browsing data to use in case of a later emergency that requires a temporary version rollback.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11916">Si une restauration temporaire est effectuée vers une version pour laquelle un utilisateur dispose d’une capture instantanée correspondante, les données de la capture instantanée sont restaurées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11916">If a temporary rollback is performed to a version for which a user has a corresponding snapshot, the data in the snapshot is restored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11917">Cela permet aux utilisateurs de conserver des paramètres comme les signets et les données de saisie automatique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11917">This lets users keep settings such as bookmarks and autofill data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11918">Si vous ne définissez pas cette stratégie, la valeur par défaut du nombre de captures instantanées est définie sur 3.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11918">If you don't set this policy, the default value of 3 snapshots is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11919">Si vous définissez cette stratégie, les anciennes captures instantanées sont supprimées si nécessaire, pour respecter la limite que vous avez définie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11919">If you set this policy, old snapshots are deleted as needed to respect the limit you set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11920">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur 0, aucune capture instantanée n’est prise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11920">If you set this policy to 0, no snapshots are taken.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11921">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11921">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11922">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11922">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11923">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11923">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11924">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11924">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11925">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11925">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11926">entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11926">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11927">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11927">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11928">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11928">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11929">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11929">GP unique name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11930">Nom de la stratégie: limite le nombre de captures instantanées des données utilisateur conservées qui sont utilisées en cas de restauration d’urgence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11930">GP name: Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11931">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11931">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11932">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11932">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11933">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11933">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11934">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11934">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11935">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11935">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11936">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11936">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11937">Nom de la valeur: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11937">Value Name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11938">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11938">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11939">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11939">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000003
```

  ### <a name="userfeedbackallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11941">UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11941">UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-user-feedback"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11942">Autoriser les commentaires des utilisateurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11942">Allow user feedback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11943">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11943">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11944">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11944">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11945">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11945">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11946">MicrosoftEdge utilise la fonctionnalité de commentaires Edge (activée par défaut) pour permettre aux utilisateurs d'envoyer des commentaires, des suggestions ou des enquêtes client et de signaler des problèmes liés au navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11946">Microsoft Edge uses the Edge Feedback feature (enabled by default) to allow users to send feedback, suggestions or customer surveys and to report any issues with the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11947">En outre, par défaut, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas désactiver la fonctionnalité de commentaires Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11947">Also, by default, users can't disable (turn off) the Edge Feedback feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11948">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou ne la configurez pas, les utilisateurs peuvent appeler des commentaires Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11948">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11949">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas invoquer les commentaires Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11949">If you disable this policy, users can't invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11950">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11950">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11951">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11951">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11952">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11952">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11953">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11953">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11954">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11954">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11955">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11955">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11956">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11956">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11957">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11957">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11958">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11958">GP unique name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11959">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser les commentaires des utilisateurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11959">GP name: Allow user feedback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11960">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11960">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11961">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11961">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11962">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11962">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11963">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11963">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11964">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11964">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11965">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11965">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11966">Nom de la valeur: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11966">Value Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11967">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11967">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11968">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11968">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11969">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11969">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11970">Nom clé de la préférence: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11970">Preference Key Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11971">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11971">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="verticaltabsallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11973">VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11973">VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="configures-availability-of-a-vertical-layout-for-tabs-on-the-side-of-the-browser"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11974">Configure la disponibilité d’une disposition verticale, pour les onglets, sur le côté du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11974">Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11975">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11975">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11976">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 88 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11976">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11977">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11977">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11978">Indique si un utilisateur peut accéder à une autre disposition dans laquelle les onglets sont alignés de façon verticale sur le côté du navigateur plutôt que dans la partie supérieure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11978">Configures whether a user can access an alternative layout where tabs are vertically aligned on the side of the browser instead of at the top.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11979">Lorsque plusieurs onglets sont ouverts, cette disposition offre un meilleure affichage et une meilleure gestion des onglets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11979">When there are several tabs open, this layout provides better tab viewing and management.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11980">La visibilité des titres du site est meilleure, il est plus facile de scanner les icônes alignées et vous disposez plus d’espace pour gérer et fermer les onglets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11980">There's better visibility of the site titles, it's easier to scan aligned icons, and there's more space to manage and close tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11981">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, l’option de disposition verticale des onglets ne sera pas disponible pour les utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11981">If you disable this policy, then the vertical tab layout will not be available as an option for users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11982">Si vous activez ou si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, la disposition de l’onglet restera horizontale, mais un utilisateur a la possibilité d’activer les onglets verticaux sur le côté.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11982">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the tab layout will still be at the top, but a user has the option to turn on vertical tabs on the side.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11983">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11983">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11984">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11984">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11985">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11985">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11986">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11986">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11987">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11987">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11988">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11988">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11989">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11989">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11990">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11990">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11991">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11991">GP unique name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11992">Nom de la stratégie: configure la disponibilité d’une disposition verticale, pour les onglets, sur le côté du navigateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11992">GP name: Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11993">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11993">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11994">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11994">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11995">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11995">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11996">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11996">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11997">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11997">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11998">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11998">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-11999">Nom de la valeur: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-11999">Value Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12000">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12000">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12001">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12001">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12002">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12002">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12003">Nom clé de la préférence: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12003">Preference Key Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12004">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12004">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
