  ### <a name="videocaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12006">VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12006">VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-block-video-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12007">Autoriser ou bloquer la capture de vidéos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12007">Allow or block video capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12008">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12008">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12009">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12009">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12010">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12010">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12011">Déterminez si les sites peuvent faire des captures de vidéo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12011">Control whether sites can capture video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12012">Si cette stratégie est activée ou n'est pas configurée (par défaut), l'utilisateur est invité à accepter l'accès à la capture vidéo, excepté pour les URL configurées dans la liste de la stratégie [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls), qui bénéficient d'un accès instantané. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12012">If enabled or not configured (default), the user will be asked about video capture access for all sites except those with URLs configured in the [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy list, which will be granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12013">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, l’utilisateur n’est pas interrogé et la capture vidéo est accessible uniquement aux URL configurées dans la stratégie [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12013">If you disable this policy, the user isn't prompted, and video capture is only available to URLs configured in [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12014">Cette stratégie a une incidence sur tous les types d'entrée vidéo, et pas uniquement sur la caméra intégrée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12014">This policy affects all types of video inputs, not only the built-in camera.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12015">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12015">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12016">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12016">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12017">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12017">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12018">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12018">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12019">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12019">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12020">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12020">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12021">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12021">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12022">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12022">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12023">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12023">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12024">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser ou bloquer la capture de vidéos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12024">GP name: Allow or block video capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12025">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12025">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12026">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12026">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12027">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12027">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12028">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12028">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12029">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12029">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12030">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12030">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12031">Nom de la valeur: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12031">Value Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12032">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12032">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12033">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12033">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12034">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12034">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12035">Nom clé de la préférence: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12035">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12036">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12036">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12037">Retour au début</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12037">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="videocaptureallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12038">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12038">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-that-can-access-video-capture-devices-without-requesting-permission"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12039">Sites autorisés à accéder aux appareils de capture vidéo sans autorisation préalable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12039">Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12040">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12040">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12041">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12041">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12042">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12042">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12043">Spécifiez les sites web, basés sur des formats d’URL, qui peuvent utiliser les appareils de capture vidéo sans autorisation préalable de la part de l’utilisateur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12043">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use video capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12044">Les modèles de cette liste sont comparés à la source de sécurité de l’URL à l’origine de la demande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12044">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12045">En cas de correspondance, l'accès aux appareils de capture vidéo est autorisé automatiquement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12045">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to video capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12046">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12046">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12047">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12047">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12048">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12048">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12049">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12049">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12050">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12050">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12051">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12051">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12052">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12052">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12053">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12053">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12054">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12054">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12055">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: sites autorisés à accéder aux appareils de capture vidéo sans autorisation préalable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12055">GP name: Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12056">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12056">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12057">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12057">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12058">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12058">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12059">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12059">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12060">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12060">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12061">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12061">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12062">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12062">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12063">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12063">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12064">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12064">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12065">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12065">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12066">Nom clé de la préférence: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12066">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12067">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12067">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="wpadquickcheckenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12069">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12069">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-wpad-optimization"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12070">Définir l’optimisation WPAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12070">Set WPAD optimization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12071">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12071">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12072">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12072">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12073">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12073">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12074">Vous permet de désactiver l’optimisation WPAD (Web Proxy Auto-Discovery) dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12074">Allows you to turn off WPAD (Web Proxy Auto-Discovery) optimization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12075">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, l’optimisation WPAD est désactivée. Par conséquent, l'attente est plus longue pour obtenir une réponse des serveurs WPAD basés sur le DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12075">If you disable this policy, WPAD optimization is disabled, which makes the browser wait longer for DNS-based WPAD servers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12076">Si vous activez ou ne configurez pas la stratégie, l’optimisation WPAD est activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12076">If you enable or don't configure the policy, WPAD optimization is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12077">Quelle que soit la façon dont cette stratégie est activée, le paramètre d’optimisation WPAD ne peut pas être modifié par les utilisateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12077">Independent of whether or how this policy is enabled, the WPAD optimization setting cannot be changed by users.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12078">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12078">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12079">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12079">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12080">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12080">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12081">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12081">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12082">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12082">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12083">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12083">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12084">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12084">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12085">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12085">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12086">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12086">GP unique name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12087">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: définir l'optimisation WPAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12087">GP name: Set WPAD optimization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12088">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12088">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12089">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12089">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12090">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12090">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12091">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12091">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12092">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12092">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12093">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12093">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12094">Nom de la valeur: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12094">Value Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12095">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12095">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12096">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12096">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12097">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12097">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12098">Nom clé de la préférence: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12098">Preference Key Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12099">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12099">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="webappinstallforcelist"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12101">WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12101">WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-list-of-force-installed-web-apps"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12102">Configurer la liste des applications web dont l’installation est forcée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12102">Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12103">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12103">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12104">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12104">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12105">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12105">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12106">Configurez cette stratégie pour spécifier la liste d’applications web qui s’installent de manière silencieuse, sans intervention de l’utilisateur, et les utilisateurs qui ne peuvent pas effectuer une désinstallation ou une désactivation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12106">Configure this policy to specify a list of web apps that install silently, without user interaction, and which users can't uninstall or turn off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12107">Chaque élément de liste de la stratégie est un objet avec un membre obligatoire : url (URL de l’application web à installer)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12107">Each list item of the policy is an object with a mandatory member: url (the URL of the web app to install)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12108">et 3 membres facultatifs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12108">and 3 optional members:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12109">default_launch_container (spécifie le mode fenêtre que l’application web ouvre avec un nouvel onglet, est la valeur par défaut.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12109">default_launch_container (specifies the window mode that the web app opens with-a new tab is the default.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12110">create_desktop_shortcut (vrai si vous souhaitez créer des raccourcis de bureau Linux et Microsoft Windows.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12110">create_desktop_shortcut (True if you want to create Linux and Microsoft Windows desktop shortcuts.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12111">fallback_app_name (à partir de Microsoft Edge 90, vous permet de remplacer le nom de l’application s’il ne s’agit pas d’une application web progressive (PWA) ou du nom de l’application qui est temporairement installé s’il s’agit d’un PWA, mais l’authentification est requise avant la fin de l’installation.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12111">fallback_app_name (Starting with Microsoft Edge 90, allows you to override the app name if it is not a Progressive Web App (PWA), or the app name that is temporarily installed if it is a PWA but authentication is required before the installation can be completed.)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12112">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12112">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12113">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12113">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12114">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12114">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12115">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12115">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12116">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12116">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12117">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12117">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12118">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12118">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12119">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12119">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12120">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12120">GP unique name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12121">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: configurer la liste des applications web dont l’installation est forcée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12121">GP name: Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12122">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12122">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12123">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12123">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12124">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12124">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12125">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12125">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12126">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12126">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12127">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12127">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12128">Nom de la valeur: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12128">Value Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12129">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12129">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12130">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12130">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [
  {
    "create_desktop_shortcut": true, 
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "tab", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "fallback_app_name": "Editor", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12131">Exemple de valeur compacte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12131">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [{"create_desktop_shortcut": true, "default_launch_container": "window", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"}, {"default_launch_container": "tab", "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"}, {"default_launch_container": "window", "fallback_app_name": "Editor", "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12132">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12132">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12133">Nom clé de la préférence: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12133">Preference Key Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12134">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12134">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebAppInstallForceList</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>create_desktop_shortcut</key>
    <true/>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/maps</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>tab</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.edu</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>fallback_app_name</key>
    <string>Editor</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.com/editor</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webcaptureenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12136">WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12136">WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-web-capture-feature-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12137">Activer la fonctionnalité de capture web dans Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12137">Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12138">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12138">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12139">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12139">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12140">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12140">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12141">Active la fonctionnalité de capture web dans Microsoft Edge qui permet aux utilisateurs de capturer du contenu web et d’annoter la capture à l’aide d’outils d’entrée manuscrite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12141">Enables the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge that allows users to capture web content and annotate the capture using inking tools.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12142">Si vous activez cette stratégie ou que vous ne la configurez pas, l’option Capture web s’affiche dans le menu contextuel, dans le menu Paramètres et autres, ainsi qu’à l’aide du raccourci clavier CTRL+MAJ+S.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12142">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the Web capture option shows up in the context menu, Settings and more menu, and by using the keyboard shortcut, CTRL+SHIFT+S.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12143">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie, les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas accéder à la fonctionnalité de capture web dans MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12143">If you disable this policy, users can't access the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12144">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12144">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12145">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12145">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12146">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12146">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12147">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12147">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12148">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12148">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12149">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12149">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12150">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12150">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12151">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12151">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12152">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12152">GP unique name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12153">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer la fonctionnalité de capture web dans Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12153">GP name: Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12154">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12154">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12155">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12155">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12156">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12156">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ### <a name="webcomponentsv0enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12167">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12167">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="re-enable-web-components-v0-api-until-m84-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12168">Réactiver l'API Web Components v0 jusqu'à M84 (obsolète)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12168">Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12169">OBSOLÈTE: Cette stratégie est obsolète et ne fonctionne pas après la version 84 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12169">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12170">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12170">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12171">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 et jusqu’à la version84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12171">On Windows and macOS since 80, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12172">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12172">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12173">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, car cette stratégie permettait de réactiver sélectivement ces fonctionnalités jusqu’à la version 85 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12173">This policy doesn't work because this policy allowed these features to be selectively re-enabled until Microsoft Edge version 85.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12174">Les API Web Components v0 (Shadow DOM v0, Custom Elements v0 et HTML Imports) sont obsolètes depuis 2018 et ont été désactivées par défaut à partir de Microsoft Edge versionM80.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12174">The Web Components v0 APIs (Shadow DOM v0, Custom Elements v0, and HTML Imports) were deprecated in 2018, and have been disabled by default starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12175">Si elle est définie sur True, les fonctionnalités de Web Components v0 sont activées pour tous les sites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12175">If you set this policy is set to True, the Web Components v0 features will be enabled for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12176">Si elle est définie sur False ou si elle n'est pas définie, les fonctionnalités de Web Components v0 sont désactivées par défaut à compter de Microsoft Edge versionM80.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12176">If you set this policy to False or don't set this policy, the Web Components v0 features will be disabled by default, starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12177">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12177">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12178">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12178">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12179">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12179">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12180">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12180">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12185">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12185">GP unique name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12186">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: réactiver l'API Web Components v0 jusqu'à M84.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12186">GP name: Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12187">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12187">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12189">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12189">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12190">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12190">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12191">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12191">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12192">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12192">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12193">Nom de la valeur: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12193">Value Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12194">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12194">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12195">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12195">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12197">Nom clé de la préférence: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12197">Preference Key Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="webdriveroverridesincompatiblepolicies"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12200">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12200">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-webdriver-to-override-incompatible-policies-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12201">Autoriser WebDriver à remplacer les stratégies incompatibles (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12201">Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12202">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12202">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12203">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12203">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12204">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12204">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12205">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 et jusqu’à la version84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12205">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12206">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12206">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12207">Cette stratégie ne fonctionne pas, car WebDriver est désormais compatible avec toutes les stratégies existantes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12207">This policy doesn't work because WebDriver is now compatible with all existing policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12208">Cette stratégie permet aux utilisateurs de la fonctionnalité WebDriver de remplacer des stratégies pouvant interférer avec son fonctionnement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12208">This policy allows users of the WebDriver feature to override policies which can interfere with its operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12209">Actuellement, cette stratégie désactive les stratégies [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) et [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12209">Currently this policy disables [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) and [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12210">Si la stratégie est activée, WebDriver peut remplacer les stratégies incompatibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12210">If the policy is enabled, WebDriver will be able to override incomaptible policies.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12211">Si la stratégie est désactivée ou n'est pas configurée, WebDriver n'est pas autorisé à remplacer les stratégies incompatibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12211">If the policy is disabled or not configured, WebDriver will not be allowed to override incompatible policies.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12212">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12212">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12213">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12213">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12214">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12214">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12215">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12215">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12216">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12216">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12217">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12217">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12218">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12218">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12219">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12219">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12220">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12220">GP unique name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12221">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: autoriser WebDriver à remplacer les stratégies incompatibles (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12221">GP name: Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12222">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12222">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12223">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12223">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12224">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12224">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12225">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12225">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12226">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12226">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12227">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12227">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12228">Nom de la valeur: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12228">Value Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12229">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12229">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12230">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12230">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12231">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12231">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12232">Nom clé de la préférence: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12232">Preference Key Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>

  ### <a name="webrtcallowlegacytlsprotocols"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12235">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12235">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12239">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12239">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12240">Sur Windows et macOS depuis 88 ou version ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12240">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12241">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12241">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12242">Si vous activez cette stratégie, les connexions homologues WebRTC peuvent être mises à niveau vers des versions obsolètes des protocoles TLS/DTLS (DTLS1.0, TLS1.0 et TLS1.1).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12242">If you enable this policy, WebRTC peer connections can downgrade to obsolete versions of the TLS/DTLS (DTLS 1.0, TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1) protocols.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12243">Si vous désactivez ou ne définissez pas cette stratégie, les versions TLS/DTLS suivantes sont désactivées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12243">If you disable or don't set this policy, these TLS/DTLS versions are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12244">Cette stratégie est temporaire et sera supprimée dans les versions ultérieures de MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12244">This policy is temporary and will be removed in a future version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12246">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12246">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12247">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12247">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12248">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12248">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12250">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12250">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12251">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12251">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12252">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12252">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12253">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12253">GP unique name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12254">Nom de la stratégie: autoriser la mise à niveau vers une ancienne version de TLS/DTLS dans WebRTC (déconseillé)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12254">GP name: Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12255">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12255">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12256">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12256">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12257">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12257">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12258">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12258">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12259">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12259">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12260">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12260">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12261">Nom de la valeur: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12261">Value Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12262">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12262">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12263">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12263">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12265">Nom clé de la préférence: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12265">Preference Key Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12266">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12266">Example value:</span></span>

  ### <a name="webrtclocalipsallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12268">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12268">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-exposure-of-local-ip-addressess-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12269">Gérer l’exposition des adresses IP locales par WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12269">Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12270">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12270">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12271">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version80 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12271">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12272">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12272">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12273">Spécifie une liste d'origines (URL) ou de modèles de noms d'hôte (par exemple, «*contoso.com*») pour laquelle l'adresse IP locale doit être exposée par WebRTC. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12273">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "*contoso.com*") for which local IP address should be exposed by WebRTC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12274">Si vous activez cette stratégie et définissez une liste d'origines (URL) ou des modèles de noms d'hôte, lorsque edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns est activé, WebRTC expose l'adresse IP locale pour les cas qui correspondent aux modèles dans la liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12274">If you enable this policy and set a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns, when edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will expose the local IP address for cases that match patterns in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12275">Si vous désactivez cette stratégie ou si vous ne la configurez pas, et si edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns est activé, WebRTC n'expose pas les adresses IP locales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12275">If you disable or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will not expose local IP addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12276">L'adresse IP locale est cachée avec un nom d'hôte mDNS. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12276">The local IP address is concealed with an mDNS hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12277">Si vous activez, désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, et si edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns est désactivé, WebRTC expose les adresses IP locales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12277">If you enable, disable, or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Disabled, WebRTC will expose local IP addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12278">Veuillez noter que cette stratégie affaiblit la protection des adresses IP locales qui peuvent être nécessaires aux administrateurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12278">Please note that this policy weakens the protection of local IP addresses that might be needed by administrators.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12279">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12279">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12280">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12280">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12281">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12281">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12282">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12282">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12283">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12283">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12284">Liste composée de chaînes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12284">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12285">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12285">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12286">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12286">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12287">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12287">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12288">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: gérer l’exposition des adresses IP locales par WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12288">GP name: Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12289">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12289">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12290">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12290">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12291">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12291">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12292">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12292">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12293">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12293">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12294">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12294">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12295">Nom de la valeur: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12295">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12296">Type de valeur: liste composée de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12296">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12297">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12297">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\2 = "*contoso.com*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12298">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12298">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12299">Nom clé de la préférence: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12299">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12300">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12300">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>*contoso.com*</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webrtclocalhostiphandling"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12302">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12302">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-exposure-of-local-ip-address-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12303">Limiter l’exposition de l’adresse IP locale par WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12303">Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12304">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12304">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12305">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12305">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12306">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12306">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12307">Vous permet de définir si WebRTC expose son l'adresse IP locale de l'utilisateur. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12307">Allows you to set whether or not WebRTC exposes the user's local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12308">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «AllowAllInterfaces» ou sur «AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces», WebRTC expose l'adresse IP locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12308">If you set this policy to "AllowAllInterfaces" or "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces", WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12309">Si vous définissez cette stratégie sur «AllowPublicInterfaceOnly » ou  sur «DisableNonProxiedUdp», WebRTC n'expose pas l'adresse IP locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12309">If you set this policy to "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" or "DisableNonProxiedUdp", WebRTC doesn't expose the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12310">Si vous ne définissez pas cette stratégie ou si vous la désactivez, WebRTC expose l'adresse IP locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12310">If you don't set this policy, or if you disable it, WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12311">Mappage des options de stratégie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12311">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12312">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = Autoriser toutes les interfaces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12312">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = Allow all interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12313">Ceci expose l'adresse IP locale. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12313">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12314">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces)=Autoriser les interfaces publiques et privées sur l'itinéraire http par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12314">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = Allow public and private interfaces over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12315">Ceci expose l'adresse IP locale. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12315">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12316">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only)=Autoriser l'interface publique sur l'itinéraire http par défaut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12316">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = Allow public interface over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12317">Ceci n'expose pas l'adresse IP locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12317">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12318">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp)=Utiliser TCP, sauf si le serveur proxy prend en charge UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12318">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = Use TCP unless proxy server supports UDP.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12319">Ceci n'expose pas l'adresse IP locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12319">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12320">Utilisez les informations précédentes lors de la configuration de cette stratégie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12320">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12321">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12321">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12322">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12322">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12323">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12323">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12324">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12324">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12325">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12325">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12326">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12326">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12327">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12327">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12328">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12328">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12329">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12329">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12330">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: limiter l’exposition de l’adresse IP locale par WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12330">GP name: Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12331">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12331">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12332">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12332">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12333">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12333">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12334">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12334">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12335">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12335">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12336">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12336">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12337">Nom de la valeur: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12337">Value Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12338">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12338">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12339">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12339">Example value:</span></span>

```
"default"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12340">Informations et paramètres sur Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12340">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12341">Nom clé de la préférence: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12341">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12342">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12342">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>default</string>
```

  ### <a name="webrtcudpportrange"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12344">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12344">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-the-range-of-local-udp-ports-used-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12345">Restreindre la portée des ports UDP locaux utilisés par WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12345">Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12346">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12346">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12347">sur Windows et macOS depuis la version77 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12347">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12348">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12348">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12349">Restreint la portée des ports UDP utilisés par WebRTC à un intervalle de ports spécifié (points de terminaison inclus).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12349">Restricts the UDP port range used by WebRTC to a specified port interval (endpoints included).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12350">La configuration de cette stratégie vous permet de spécifier la portée des ports UDP locaux que WebRTC peut utiliser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12350">By configuring this policy, you specify the range of local UDP ports that WebRTC can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12351">Si vous ne configurez pas cette stratégie, ou si vous définissez une chaîne vide ou une portée de ports non valide, WebRTC peut utiliser n’importe quel port UDP local disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12351">If you don't configure this policy, or if you set it to an empty string or invalid port range, WebRTC can use any available local UDP port.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12352">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12352">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12353">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12353">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12355">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12355">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12357">Chaîne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12357">String</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12360">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12360">GP unique name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12361">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: restreindre la portée des ports UDP locaux utilisés par WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12361">GP name: Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12362">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12362">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12363">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12363">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12364">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12364">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12366">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12366">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12367">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12367">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12368">Nom de la valeur: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12368">Value Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12369">Type de valeur: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12369">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

```
"10000-11999"
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12372">Nom clé de la préférence: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12372">Preference Key Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>

``` xml
<string>10000-11999</string>
```

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12391">Si la stratégie [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) est désactivée ou n’est pas configurée, l’option permettant d’activer le widget au démarrage est désactivée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12391">If the [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) is disabled or not configured, the option to enable the widget at startup will be toggled off.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12392">Les utilisateurs verront l’élément de menu pour le lancement du widget à partir du menu «Autres outils» de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12392">Users will see the menu item to launch the widget from the Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12393">Les utilisateurs peuvent lancer le widget à partir de l’option «Autres outils».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12393">Users can launch the widget from "More tools".</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12394">Le widget peut être désactivé à l’aide de l’option «Quitter» dans la barre d’état système ou en fermant le widget à partir de la barre des tâches.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12394">The widget can be turned off by the "Quit" option in the System tray or by closing the widget from the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12395">Le widget est redémarré lors du redémarrage du système si le démarrage automatique est activé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12395">The widget will be restarted on system reboot if auto-start is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12398">L’option de lancement de démarrage du widget au démarrage de Windows (démarrage automatique) est désactivée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12398">The option to launch start the widget at Windows startup (auto-start) will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12399">L’option de lancement du widget à partir du menu «Autres outils» de Microsoft Edge est désactivée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12399">The option to launch the widget from Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu will be disabled.</span></span>
