  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12440">Nom unique GP: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12440">GP unique name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12441">Nom GP: Autoriser le widget Web au démarrage de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12441">GP name: Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12442">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12442">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12443">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12443">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12444">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12444">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12445">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12445">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12446">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12446">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12447">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12447">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12448">Nom de valeur: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12448">Value Name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>


  ### <a name="winhttpproxyresolverenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12452">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12452">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-windows-proxy-resolver-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12453">Utiliser la résolution du proxy Windows (déconseillée)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12453">Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12454">DÉCONSEILLÉ: cette stratégie est déconseillée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12454">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12455">Elle est actuellement prise en charge, mais deviendra obsolète dans une prochaine version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12455">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12456">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12456">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12457">Sur Windows depuis la version84 ou versions ultérieures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12457">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12458">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12458">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12459">Cette stratégie est déconseillée car elle sera remplacée par une fonctionnalité similaire dans une version ultérieure. Consultez https://crbug.com/1032820.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12459">This policy is deprecated because it will be superseded by a similar feature in a future release, see https://crbug.com/1032820.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12460">Utilisez Windows pour résoudre les proxys pour tout le réseau de navigation, au lieu du solveur proxy intégré à Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12460">Use Windows to resolve proxies for all browser networking instead of the proxy resolver built into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12461">Le solveur Windows proxy active les fonctionnalités de proxy Windows telles que DirectAccess/NRPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12461">The Windows proxy resolver enables Windows proxy features such as DirectAccess/NRPT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12462">Cette stratégie inclut les problèmes décrits par https://crbug.com/644030.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12462">This policy comes with the problems described by https://crbug.com/644030.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12463">Il entraîne l’extraction et l’exécution des fichiers PAC par le code Windows, y compris les fichiers PAC définis via la stratégie [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12463">It causes PAC files to be fetched and executed by Windows code, including PAC files set via the [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12464">Étant donné que les récupérations de réseau pour le fichier PAC se produisent par le biais de Windows à la place du code Microsoft Edge, les stratégies réseau telles que [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) ne s’appliquent pas aux récupérations de réseau pour un fichier PAC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12464">Since Network Fetches for the PAC file happen via Windows instead of Microsoft Edge code, network policies such as [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) will not apply to network fetches for a PAC file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12465">Si vous activez cette stratégie, le résolveur proxy Windows est utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12465">If you enable this policy, the Windows proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12466">Si vous désactivez ou ne configurez pas cette stratégie, le solveur Microsoft Edge proxy est utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12466">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the Microsoft Edge proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12467">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12467">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12468">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12468">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12469">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12469">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12470">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Non, nécessite le redémarrage du navigateur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12470">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12471">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12471">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12472">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12472">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12473">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12473">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12474">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12474">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12475">Nom unique GP: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12475">GP unique name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12476">Nom de la stratégie de protection: utiliser la résolution du proxy Windows (déconseillée)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12476">GP name: Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12477">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12477">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12478">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12478">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12479">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12479">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12480">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12480">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12481">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12481">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12482">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12482">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12483">Nom de la valeur: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12483">Value Name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12484">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12484">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12485">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12485">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="windowocclusionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12487">WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12487">WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-window-occlusion"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12488">Activer l’occlusion de fenêtre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12488">Enable Window Occlusion</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12489">Versions prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12489">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12490">Sur Windows depuis la version 89 ou ultérieure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12490">On Windows since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12491">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12491">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12492">Active l’occlusion de fenêtre dans Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12492">Enables window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12493">Si vous activez ce paramètre pour réduire la consommation du processeur et d’énergie, MicrosoftEdge détecte quand une fenêtre est couverte par d’autres fenêtres et suspend les pixels de peinture.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12493">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12494">Si vous désactivez ce paramètre, MicrosoftEdge ne détecte pas les fenêtres couvertes par d’autres fenêtres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12494">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12495">Si cette stratégie n’est pas configurée, la détection du masquage des fenêtres est activée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12495">If this policy is left not set, window hiding detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12496">Fonctionnalités prises en charge:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12496">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12497">Peut être obligatoire: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12497">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12498">Peut être recommandée: Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12498">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12499">Actualisation dynamique de la stratégie: Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12499">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12500">Type de données:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12500">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12501">Booléen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12501">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12502">Informations et paramètres Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12502">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12503">Informations relatives à la stratégie de groupe (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12503">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12504">Nom unique de la stratégie de groupe: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12504">GP unique name: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12505">Nom de la stratégie de groupe: activer l’occlusion de fenêtre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12505">GP name: Enable Window Occlusion</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12506">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe(obligatoire): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12506">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12507">Chemin d’accès de la stratégie de groupe (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12507">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12508">Nom du fichier ADMX de la stratégie de groupe: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12508">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12509">Paramètres du Registre Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12509">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12510">Chemin d’accès (obligatoire): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12510">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12511">Chemin d’accès (recommandé): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12511">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12512">Nom de la valeur: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12512">Value Name: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12513">Type de valeur: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12513">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0a67-12514">Exemple de valeur:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0a67-12514">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```
